Session Grothendieck_Schemes

This is an unofficial reimagining of the Archive of Formal Proofs

Theory Set_Extras

text ‚ÄπAuthors: Anthony Bordg and Lawrence Paulson‚Ä∫

theory Set_Extras
  imports "Jacobson_Basic_Algebra.Set_Theory"

begin

text ‚ÄπSome new notation for built-in primitives‚Ä∫

section ‚ÄπSets‚Ä∫

abbreviation complement_in_of:: "'a set ‚áí 'a set ‚áí 'a set" ("_‚àñ_" [65,65]65)
  where "A ‚àñ B ‚â° A-B"

section ‚ÄπFunctions‚Ä∫

abbreviation preimage:: "('a ‚áí 'b) ‚áí 'a set ‚áí 'b set ‚áí 'a set" ("_ ‚áß¬Ø _ _" [90,90,1000]90)
  where "f‚áß¬Ø X V ‚â° (vimage f V) ‚à© X"

lemma preimage_of_inter:
  fixes f::"'a ‚áí 'b" and X::"'a set" and V::"'b set" and V'::"'b set"
  shows "f‚áß¬Ø X (V ‚à© V') = (f‚áß¬Ø X V) ‚à© (f‚áß¬Ø X V')"
  by blast

lemma preimage_identity_self: "identity A ‚áß¬Ø A B = B ‚à© A"
  by (simp add: vimage_inter_cong)

text ‚ÄπSimplification actually replaces the RHS by the LHS‚Ä∫
lemma preimage_vimage_eq: "(f ‚áß¬Ø (f -` U') U) ‚à© X = f‚áß¬Ø X (U ‚à© U')"
  by simp

definition inverse_map:: "('a ‚áí 'b) ‚áí 'a set ‚áí 'b set ‚áí ('b ‚áí 'a)"
  where "inverse_map f S T ‚â° restrict (inv_into S f) T"

lemma bijective_map_preimage:
  assumes "bijective_map f S T"
  shows "bijective_map (inverse_map f S T) T S"
proof
  show "inverse_map f S T ‚àà T ‚Üí‚á©E S"
    by (simp add: assms bij_betw_imp_funcset bij_betw_inv_into bijective.bijective bijective_map.axioms(2) inverse_map_def)
  show "bij_betw (inverse_map f S T) T S"
    using assms by (simp add: bij_betw_inv_into bijective_def bijective_map_def inverse_map_def)
qed

lemma inverse_map_identity [simp]:
  "inverse_map (identity S) S S = identity S"
  by (metis Id_compose compose_id_inv_into image_ident image_restrict_eq inv_into_funcset inverse_map_def restrict_extensional)

abbreviation composing ("_ ‚àò _ ‚Üì _" [60,0,60]59)
  where "g ‚àò f ‚Üì D ‚â° compose D g f"

lemma comp_maps:
  assumes "Set_Theory.map Œ∑ A B" and "Set_Theory.map Œ∏ B C"
  shows "Set_Theory.map (Œ∏ ‚àò Œ∑ ‚Üì A) A C"
proof-
  have "(Œ∏ ‚àò Œ∑ ‚Üì A) ‚àà A ‚Üí‚á©E C"
    using assms by (metis Int_iff PiE_def compose_def funcset_compose map.graph restrict_extensional)
  thus ?thesis by (simp add: Set_Theory.map_def)
qed

lemma undefined_is_map_on_empty:
  fixes f:: "'a set ‚áí 'b set"
  assumes "f = (Œªx. undefined)"
  shows "map f {} {}"
  using assms by (simp add: map.intro)

lemma restrict_on_source:
  assumes "map f S T"
  shows "restrict f S = f"
  using assms by (meson PiE_restrict map.graph)

lemma restrict_further:
  assumes "map f S T" and "U ‚äÜ S" and "V ‚äÜ U"
  shows "restrict (restrict f U) V = restrict f V"
  using assms by (simp add: inf.absorb_iff2)

lemma map_eq:
  assumes "map f S T" and "map g S T" and "‚ãÄx. x ‚àà S ‚üπ f x = g x"
  shows "f = g"
  using assms by (metis restrict_ext restrict_on_source)

lemma image_subset_of_target:
  assumes "map f S T"
  shows "f ` S ‚äÜ T"
  using assms by (meson image_subsetI map.map_closed)

end

Theory Group_Extras

text ‚ÄπAuthors: Anthony Bordg and Lawrence Paulson‚Ä∫

theory Group_Extras
  imports Main
          "Jacobson_Basic_Algebra.Group_Theory"
          "Set_Extras"

begin

section ‚ÄπFold operator with a subdomain‚Ä∫

inductive_set
  foldSetD :: "['a set, 'b ‚áí 'a ‚áí 'a, 'a] ‚áí ('b set * 'a) set"
  for D :: "'a set" and f :: "'b ‚áí 'a ‚áí 'a" and e :: 'a
  where
    emptyI [intro]: "e ‚àà D ‚üπ ({}, e) ‚àà foldSetD D f e"
  | insertI [intro]: "‚ü¶x ‚àâ A; f x y ‚àà D; (A, y) ‚àà foldSetD D f e‚üß ‚üπ
                      (insert x A, f x y) ‚àà foldSetD D f e"

inductive_cases empty_foldSetDE [elim!]: "({}, x) ‚àà foldSetD D f e"

definition
  foldD :: "['a set, 'b ‚áí 'a ‚áí 'a, 'a, 'b set] ‚áí 'a"
  where "foldD D f e A = (THE x. (A, x) ‚àà foldSetD D f e)"

lemma foldSetD_closed: "(A, z) ‚àà foldSetD D f e ‚üπ z ‚àà D"
  by (erule foldSetD.cases) auto

lemma Diff1_foldSetD:
  "‚ü¶(A - {x}, y) ‚àà foldSetD D f e; x ‚àà A; f x y ‚àà D‚üß ‚üπ
   (A, f x y) ‚àà foldSetD D f e"
  by (metis Diff_insert_absorb foldSetD.insertI mk_disjoint_insert)

lemma foldSetD_imp_finite [simp]: "(A, x) ‚àà foldSetD D f e ‚üπ finite A"
  by (induct set: foldSetD) auto

lemma finite_imp_foldSetD:
  "‚ü¶finite A; e ‚àà D; ‚ãÄx y. ‚ü¶x ‚àà A; y ‚àà D‚üß ‚üπ f x y ‚àà D‚üß
    ‚üπ ‚àÉx. (A, x) ‚àà foldSetD D f e"
proof (induct set: finite)
  case empty then show ?case by auto
next
  case (insert x F)
  then obtain y where y: "(F, y) ‚àà foldSetD D f e" by auto
  with insert have "y ‚àà D" by (auto dest: foldSetD_closed)
  with y and insert have "(insert x F, f x y) ‚àà foldSetD D f e"
    by (intro foldSetD.intros) auto
  then show ?case ..
qed

lemma foldSetD_backwards:
  assumes "A ‚â† {}" "(A, z) ‚àà foldSetD D f e"
  shows "‚àÉx y. x ‚àà A ‚àß (A - { x }, y) ‚àà foldSetD D f e ‚àß z = f x y"
  using assms(2) by (cases) (simp add: assms(1), metis Diff_insert_absorb insertI1)

subsection ‚ÄπLeft-Commutative Operations‚Ä∫

locale LCD =
  fixes B :: "'b set"
  and D :: "'a set"
  and f :: "'b ‚áí 'a ‚áí 'a"    (infixl "‚ãÖ" 70)
  assumes left_commute:
    "‚ü¶x ‚àà B; y ‚àà B; z ‚àà D‚üß ‚üπ x ‚ãÖ (y ‚ãÖ z) = y ‚ãÖ (x ‚ãÖ z)"
  and f_closed [simp, intro!]: "!!x y. ‚ü¶x ‚àà B; y ‚àà D‚üß ‚üπ f x y ‚àà D"

lemma (in LCD) foldSetD_closed [dest]: "(A, z) ‚àà foldSetD D f e ‚üπ z ‚àà D"
  by (erule foldSetD.cases) auto

lemma (in LCD) Diff1_foldSetD:
  "‚ü¶(A - {x}, y) ‚àà foldSetD D f e; x ‚àà A; A ‚äÜ B‚üß ‚üπ
  (A, f x y) ‚àà foldSetD D f e"
  by (meson Diff1_foldSetD f_closed local.foldSetD_closed subsetCE)

lemma (in LCD) finite_imp_foldSetD:
  "‚ü¶finite A; A ‚äÜ B; e ‚àà D‚üß ‚üπ ‚àÉx. (A, x) ‚àà foldSetD D f e"
proof (induct set: finite)
  case empty then show ?case by auto
next
  case (insert x F)
  then obtain y where y: "(F, y) ‚àà foldSetD D f e" by auto
  with insert have "y ‚àà D" by auto
  with y and insert have "(insert x F, f x y) ‚àà foldSetD D f e"
    by (intro foldSetD.intros) auto
  then show ?case ..
qed


lemma (in LCD) foldSetD_determ_aux:
  assumes "e ‚àà D" and A: "card A < n" "A ‚äÜ B" "(A, x) ‚àà foldSetD D f e" "(A, y) ‚àà foldSetD D f e"
  shows "y = x"
  using A
proof (induction n arbitrary: A x y)
  case 0
  then show ?case
    by auto
next
  case (Suc n)
  then consider "card A = n" | "card A < n"
    by linarith
  then show ?case
  proof cases
    case 1
    show ?thesis
      using foldSetD.cases [OF ‚Äπ(A,x) ‚àà foldSetD D (‚ãÖ) e‚Ä∫]
    proof cases
      case 1
      then show ?thesis
        using ‚Äπ(A,y) ‚àà foldSetD D (‚ãÖ) e‚Ä∫ by auto
    next
      case (2 x' A' y')
      note A' = this
      show ?thesis
        using foldSetD.cases [OF ‚Äπ(A,y) ‚àà foldSetD D (‚ãÖ) e‚Ä∫]
      proof cases
        case 1
        then show ?thesis
          using ‚Äπ(A,x) ‚àà foldSetD D (‚ãÖ) e‚Ä∫ by auto
      next
        case (2 x'' A'' y'')
        note A'' = this
        show ?thesis
        proof (cases "x' = x''")
          case True
          show ?thesis
          proof (cases "y' = y''")
            case True
            then show ?thesis
              using A' A'' ‚Äπx' = x''‚Ä∫ by (blast elim!: equalityE)
          next
            case False
            then show ?thesis
              using A' A'' ‚Äπx' = x''‚Ä∫
              by (metis ‚Äπcard A = n‚Ä∫ Suc.IH Suc.prems(2) card_insert_disjoint foldSetD_imp_finite insert_eq_iff insert_subset lessI)
          qed
        next
          case False
          then have *: "A' - {x''} = A'' - {x'}" "x'' ‚àà A'" "x' ‚àà A''"
            using A' A'' by fastforce+
          then have "A' = insert x'' A'' - {x'}"
            using ‚Äπx' ‚àâ A'‚Ä∫ by blast
          then have card: "card A' ‚â§ card A''"
            using A' A'' * by (metis card_Suc_Diff1 eq_refl foldSetD_imp_finite)
          obtain u where u: "(A' - {x''}, u) ‚àà foldSetD D (‚ãÖ) e"
            using finite_imp_foldSetD [of "A' - {x''}"] A' Diff_insert ‚ÄπA ‚äÜ B‚Ä∫ ‚Äπe ‚àà D‚Ä∫ by fastforce
          have "y' = f x'' u"
            using Diff1_foldSetD [OF u] ‚Äπx'' ‚àà A'‚Ä∫ ‚Äπcard A = n‚Ä∫ A' Suc.IH ‚ÄπA ‚äÜ B‚Ä∫ by auto
          then have "(A'' - {x'}, u) ‚àà foldSetD D f e"
            using "*"(1) u by auto
          then have "y'' = f x' u"
            using A'' by (metis * ‚Äπcard A = n‚Ä∫ A'(1) Diff1_foldSetD Suc.IH ‚ÄπA ‚äÜ B‚Ä∫
                card card_Suc_Diff1 card_insert_disjoint foldSetD_imp_finite insert_subset le_imp_less_Suc)
          then show ?thesis
            using A' A''
            by (metis ‚ÄπA ‚äÜ B‚Ä∫ ‚Äπy' = x'' ‚ãÖ u‚Ä∫ insert_subset left_commute local.foldSetD_closed u)
        qed
      qed
    qed
  next
    case 2 with Suc show ?thesis by blast
  qed
qed

lemma (in LCD) foldSetD_determ:
  "‚ü¶(A, x) ‚àà foldSetD D f e; (A, y) ‚àà foldSetD D f e; e ‚àà D; A ‚äÜ B‚üß
  ‚üπ y = x"
  by (blast intro: foldSetD_determ_aux [rule_format])

lemma (in LCD) foldD_equality:
  "‚ü¶(A, y) ‚àà foldSetD D f e; e ‚àà D; A ‚äÜ B‚üß ‚üπ foldD D f e A = y"
  by (unfold foldD_def) (blast intro: foldSetD_determ)

lemma foldD_empty [simp]:
  "e ‚àà D ‚üπ foldD D f e {} = e"
  by (unfold foldD_def) blast

lemma (in LCD) foldD_insert_aux:
  "‚ü¶x ‚àâ A; x ‚àà B; e ‚àà D; A ‚äÜ B‚üß
    ‚üπ ((insert x A, v) ‚àà foldSetD D f e) ‚ü∑ (‚àÉy. (A, y) ‚àà foldSetD D f e ‚àß v = f x y)"
  apply auto
  by (metis Diff_insert_absorb f_closed finite_Diff foldSetD.insertI foldSetD_determ foldSetD_imp_finite insert_subset local.finite_imp_foldSetD local.foldSetD_closed)

lemma (in LCD) foldD_insert:
  assumes "finite A" "x ‚àâ A" "x ‚àà B" "e ‚àà D" "A ‚äÜ B"
  shows "foldD D f e (insert x A) = f x (foldD D f e A)"
proof -
  have "(THE v. ‚àÉy. (A, y) ‚àà foldSetD D (‚ãÖ) e ‚àß v = x ‚ãÖ y) = x ‚ãÖ (THE y. (A, y) ‚àà foldSetD D (‚ãÖ) e)"
    by (rule the_equality) (use assms foldD_def foldD_equality foldD_def finite_imp_foldSetD in ‚Äπmetis+‚Ä∫)
  then show ?thesis
    unfolding foldD_def using assms by (simp add: foldD_insert_aux)
qed

lemma (in LCD) foldD_closed [simp]:
  "‚ü¶finite A; e ‚àà D; A ‚äÜ B‚üß ‚üπ foldD D f e A ‚àà D"
proof (induct set: finite)
  case empty then show ?case by simp
next
  case insert then show ?case by (simp add: foldD_insert)
qed

lemma (in LCD) foldD_commute:
  "‚ü¶finite A; x ‚àà B; e ‚àà D; A ‚äÜ B‚üß ‚üπ
   f x (foldD D f e A) = foldD D f (f x e) A"
  by (induct set: finite) (auto simp add: left_commute foldD_insert)

lemma Int_mono2:
  "‚ü¶A ‚äÜ C; B ‚äÜ C‚üß ‚üπ A Int B ‚äÜ C"
  by blast

lemma (in LCD) foldD_nest_Un_Int:
  "‚ü¶finite A; finite C; e ‚àà D; A ‚äÜ B; C ‚äÜ B‚üß ‚üπ
   foldD D f (foldD D f e C) A = foldD D f (foldD D f e (A Int C)) (A Un C)"
proof (induction set: finite)
  case (insert x F)
  then show ?case
    by (simp add: foldD_insert foldD_commute Int_insert_left insert_absorb Int_mono2)
qed simp

lemma (in LCD) foldD_nest_Un_disjoint:
  "‚ü¶finite A; finite B; A Int B = {}; e ‚àà D; A ‚äÜ B; C ‚äÜ B‚üß
    ‚üπ foldD D f e (A Un B) = foldD D f (foldD D f e B) A"
  by (simp add: foldD_nest_Un_Int)

‚Äï ‚ÄπDelete rules to do with ‚ÄπfoldSetD‚Ä∫ relation.‚Ä∫

declare foldSetD_imp_finite [simp del]
  empty_foldSetDE [rule del]
  foldSetD.intros [rule del]
declare (in LCD)
  foldSetD_closed [rule del]

section ‚ÄπMonoids‚Ä∫

lemma comp_monoid_morphisms:
  assumes "monoid_homomorphism Œ∑ A multA oneA B multB oneB" and
          "monoid_homomorphism Œ∏ B multB oneB C multC oneC"
shows "monoid_homomorphism (Œ∏ ‚àò Œ∑ ‚Üì A) A multA oneA C multC oneC"
proof-
  have "map (Œ∏ ‚àò Œ∑ ‚Üì A) A C" using assms comp_maps by (metis monoid_homomorphism.axioms(1))
  moreover have "(Œ∏ ‚àò Œ∑ ‚Üì A) oneA = oneC"
    using assms
    by (metis compose_eq monoid.unit_closed monoid_homomorphism.axioms(2) monoid_homomorphism.commutes_with_unit)
  moreover have "(Œ∏ ‚àò Œ∑ ‚Üì A) (multA x y) = multC ((Œ∏ ‚àò Œ∑ ‚Üì A) x) ((Œ∏ ‚àò Œ∑ ‚Üì A) y)"
      if "x ‚àà A" "y ‚àà A" for x y
    using that assms monoid_homomorphism.commutes_with_composition
    by (smt compose_eq map.map_closed monoid.composition_closed monoid_homomorphism.axioms)
  ultimately show ?thesis
    using monoid_homomorphism_def assms comp_maps by (smt monoid_homomorphism_axioms.intro)
qed

text ‚ÄπCommutative Monoids‚Ä∫

text ‚Äπ
  We enter a more restrictive context, with ‚Äπf :: 'a ‚áí 'a ‚áí 'a‚Ä∫
  instead of ‚Äπ'b ‚áí 'a ‚áí 'a‚Ä∫.
‚Ä∫

locale ACeD =
  fixes D :: "'a set"
    and f :: "'a ‚áí 'a ‚áí 'a"    (infixl "‚ãÖ" 70)
    and e :: 'a
  assumes ident [simp]: "x ‚àà D ‚üπ x ‚ãÖ e = x"
    and commute: "‚ü¶x ‚àà D; y ‚àà D‚üß ‚üπ x ‚ãÖ y = y ‚ãÖ x"
    and assoc: "‚ü¶x ‚àà D; y ‚àà D; z ‚àà D‚üß ‚üπ (x ‚ãÖ y) ‚ãÖ z = x ‚ãÖ (y ‚ãÖ z)"
    and e_closed [simp]: "e ‚àà D"
    and f_closed [simp]: "‚ü¶x ‚àà D; y ‚àà D‚üß ‚üπ x ‚ãÖ y ‚àà D"

lemma (in ACeD) left_commute:
  "‚ü¶x ‚àà D; y ‚àà D; z ‚àà D‚üß ‚üπ x ‚ãÖ (y ‚ãÖ z) = y ‚ãÖ (x ‚ãÖ z)"
proof -
  assume D: "x ‚àà D" "y ‚àà D" "z ‚àà D"
  then have "x ‚ãÖ (y ‚ãÖ z) = (y ‚ãÖ z) ‚ãÖ x" by (simp add: commute)
  also from D have "... = y ‚ãÖ (z ‚ãÖ x)" by (simp add: assoc)
  also from D have "z ‚ãÖ x = x ‚ãÖ z" by (simp add: commute)
  finally show ?thesis .
qed

lemmas (in ACeD) AC = assoc commute left_commute

lemma (in ACeD) left_ident [simp]: "x ‚àà D ‚üπ e ‚ãÖ x = x"
proof -
  assume "x ‚àà D"
  then have "x ‚ãÖ e = x" by (rule ident)
  with ‚Äπx ‚àà D‚Ä∫ show ?thesis by (simp add: commute)
qed

lemma (in ACeD) foldD_Un_Int:
  "‚ü¶finite A; finite B; A ‚äÜ D; B ‚äÜ D‚üß ‚üπ
    foldD D f e A ‚ãÖ foldD D f e B =
    foldD D f e (A Un B) ‚ãÖ foldD D f e (A Int B)"
proof (induction set: finite)
  case empty
  then show ?case
    by(simp add: left_commute LCD.foldD_closed [OF LCD.intro [of D]])
next
  case (insert x F)
  then show ?case
    by(simp add: AC insert_absorb Int_insert_left Int_mono2
                 LCD.foldD_insert [OF LCD.intro [of D]]
                 LCD.foldD_closed [OF LCD.intro [of D]])
qed

lemma (in ACeD) foldD_Un_disjoint:
  "‚ü¶finite A; finite B; A Int B = {}; A ‚äÜ D; B ‚äÜ D‚üß ‚üπ
    foldD D f e (A Un B) = foldD D f e A ‚ãÖ foldD D f e B"
  by (simp add: foldD_Un_Int
    left_commute LCD.foldD_closed [OF LCD.intro [of D]])


subsection ‚ÄπFinite Products‚Ä∫

context monoid
begin

definition finprod:: "'b set => ('b => 'a) ‚áí 'a"
  where "finprod I f ‚â° if finite I then foldD M (composition ‚àò f) ùü≠ I else ùü≠"

end (* monoid *)


section ‚ÄπGroups‚Ä∫

lemma comp_group_morphisms:
  assumes "group_homomorphism Œ∑ A multA oneA B multB oneB" and
"group_homomorphism Œ∏ B multB oneB C multC oneC"
shows "group_homomorphism (Œ∏ ‚àò Œ∑ ‚Üì A) A multA oneA C multC oneC"
  using assms group_homomorphism_def comp_monoid_morphisms by metis

subsection ‚ÄπSubgroup Generated by a Subset‚Ä∫

context group
begin

inductive_set generate :: "'a set ‚áí 'a set"
  for H where
    unit:  "ùü≠ ‚àà generate H"
  | incl: "a ‚àà H ‚üπ a ‚àà generate H"
  | inv:  "a ‚àà H ‚üπ inverse a ‚àà generate H"
  | mult:  "a ‚àà generate H ‚üπ b ‚àà generate H ‚üπ a ‚ãÖ b ‚àà generate H"

lemma generate_into_G: "a ‚àà generate (G ‚à© H) ‚üπ a ‚àà G"
  by (induction rule: generate.induct) auto


definition subgroup_generated :: "'a set ‚áí 'a set"
  where "subgroup_generated S = generate (G ‚à© S)"

lemma inverse_in_subgroup_generated: "a ‚àà subgroup_generated H ‚üπ inverse a ‚àà subgroup_generated H"
  unfolding subgroup_generated_def
proof (induction rule: generate.induct)
  case (mult a b)
  then show ?case
    by (simp add: generate.mult generate_into_G inverse_composition_commute)
qed (auto simp add: generate.unit generate.incl generate.inv)

lemma subgroup_generated_is_monoid:
  fixes H
  shows "Group_Theory.monoid (subgroup_generated H) (‚ãÖ) ùü≠"
  unfolding subgroup_generated_def
proof qed (auto simp: generate.unit generate.mult associative generate_into_G)

lemma subgroup_generated_is_subset:
  fixes H
  shows "subgroup_generated H ‚äÜ G"
    using generate_into_G subgroup_generated_def by blast

lemma subgroup_generated_is_subgroup:
  fixes H
  shows "subgroup (subgroup_generated H) G (‚ãÖ) ùü≠"
proof
  show "subgroup_generated H ‚äÜ G"
    by (simp add: subgroup_generated_is_subset)
  show "a ‚ãÖ b ‚àà subgroup_generated H"
    if "a ‚àà subgroup_generated H" "b ‚àà subgroup_generated H" for a b
    using that by (meson monoid.composition_closed subgroup_generated_is_monoid)
  show "a ‚ãÖ b ‚ãÖ c = a ‚ãÖ (b ‚ãÖ c)"
    if "a ‚àà subgroup_generated H" "b ‚àà subgroup_generated H" "c ‚àà subgroup_generated H"
    for a b c
    using that by (meson monoid.associative subgroup_generated_is_monoid)
  show "monoid.invertible (subgroup_generated H) (‚ãÖ) ùü≠ u"
    if "u ‚àà subgroup_generated H" for u
  proof (rule monoid.invertibleI )
    show "Group_Theory.monoid (subgroup_generated H) (‚ãÖ) ùü≠"
      by (simp add: subgroup_generated_is_monoid)
    show "u ‚ãÖ local.inverse u = ùü≠" "local.inverse u ‚ãÖ u = ùü≠" "u ‚àà subgroup_generated H"
      using ‚Äπsubgroup_generated H ‚äÜ G‚Ä∫ that by auto
    show "local.inverse u ‚àà subgroup_generated H"
      using inverse_in_subgroup_generated that by blast
  qed
qed (auto simp: generate_into_G generate.unit subgroup_generated_def)


end (* group *)


section ‚ÄπAbelian Groups‚Ä∫

context abelian_group
begin

definition minus:: "'a ‚áí 'a ‚áí 'a" (infixl "‚Äê" 70)
  where "x ‚Äê y ‚â° x ‚ãÖ inverse y "

definition finsum:: "'b set ‚áí ('b ‚áí 'a) ‚áí 'a"
  where "finsum I f ‚â° finprod I f"

(* A notation "‚àëi‚ààI. f i" should be introduced for a sum of a family of elements of an abelian group *)

end (* abelian_group*)

end

Theory Topological_Space

text ‚ÄπAuthors: Anthony Bordg and Lawrence Paulson,
with some contributions from Wenda Li‚Ä∫

theory Topological_Space
  imports Complex_Main
          "Jacobson_Basic_Algebra.Set_Theory"
          Set_Extras

begin

section ‚ÄπTopological Spaces‚Ä∫

locale topological_space = fixes S :: "'a set" and is_open :: "'a set ‚áí bool"
  assumes open_space [simp, intro]: "is_open S" and open_empty [simp, intro]: "is_open {}"
    and open_imp_subset: "is_open U ‚üπ U ‚äÜ S"
    and open_inter [intro]: "‚ü¶is_open U; is_open V‚üß ‚üπ is_open (U ‚à© V)"
    and open_union [intro]: "‚ãÄF::('a set) set. (‚ãÄx. x ‚àà F ‚üπ is_open x) ‚üπ is_open (‚ãÉx‚ààF. x)"

begin

definition is_closed :: "'a set ‚áí bool"
  where "is_closed U ‚â° U ‚äÜ S ‚àß is_open (S - U)"

definition neighborhoods:: "'a ‚áí ('a set) set"
  where "neighborhoods x ‚â° {U. is_open U ‚àß x ‚àà U}"

text ‚ÄπNote that by a neighborhood we mean what some authors call an open neighborhood.‚Ä∫

lemma open_union' [intro]: "‚ãÄF::('a set) set. (‚ãÄx. x ‚àà F ‚üπ is_open x) ‚üπ is_open (‚ãÉF)"
  using open_union by auto

lemma open_preimage_identity [simp]: "is_open B ‚üπ identity S ‚áß¬Ø S B = B"
  by (metis inf.orderE open_imp_subset preimage_identity_self)


definition is_connected:: "bool" where
"is_connected ‚â° ¬¨ (‚àÉU V. is_open U ‚àß is_open V ‚àß (U ‚â† {}) ‚àß (V ‚â† {}) ‚àß (U ‚à© V = {}) ‚àß (U ‚à™ V = S))"

definition is_hausdorff:: "bool" where
"is_hausdorff ‚â°
‚àÄx y. (x ‚àà S ‚àß y ‚àà S ‚àß x ‚â† y) ‚ü∂ (‚àÉU V. U ‚àà neighborhoods x ‚àß V ‚àà neighborhoods y ‚àß U ‚à© V = {})"

end (* topological_space *)

text ‚ÄπT2 spaces are also known as Hausdorff spaces.‚Ä∫

locale t2_space = topological_space +
  assumes hausdorff: "is_hausdorff"


subsection ‚ÄπTopological Basis‚Ä∫

inductive generated_topology :: "'a set ‚áí 'a set set ‚áí 'a set ‚áí bool"
    for S :: "'a set" and B :: "'a set set"
  where
    UNIV: "generated_topology S B S"
  | Int: "generated_topology S B (U ‚à© V)"
            if "generated_topology S B U" and "generated_topology S B V"
  | UN: "generated_topology S B (‚ãÉK)" if "(‚ãÄU. U ‚àà K ‚üπ generated_topology S B U)"
  | Basis: "generated_topology S B b" if "b ‚àà B ‚àß b ‚äÜ S"

lemma generated_topology_empty [simp]: "generated_topology S B {}"
  by (metis UN Union_empty empty_iff)

lemma generated_topology_subset: "generated_topology S B U ‚üπ U ‚äÜ S"
  by (induct rule:generated_topology.induct) auto

lemma generated_topology_is_topology:
  fixes S:: "'a set" and B:: "'a set set"
  shows "topological_space S (generated_topology S B)"
  by (simp add: Int UN UNIV generated_topology_subset topological_space_def)


subsection ‚ÄπCovers‚Ä∫

locale cover_of_subset =
  fixes X:: "'a set" and U:: "'a set" and index:: "real set" and cover:: "real ‚áí 'a set"
(* We use real instead of index::"'b set" otherwise we get some troubles with locale sheaf_of_rings
in Comm_Ring_Theory.thy *)
  assumes is_subset: "U ‚äÜ X" and are_subsets: "‚ãÄi. i ‚àà index ‚üπ cover i ‚äÜ X"
and covering: "U ‚äÜ (‚ãÉi‚ààindex. cover i)"
begin

lemma
  assumes "x ‚àà U"
  shows "‚àÉi‚ààindex. x ‚àà cover i"
  using assms covering by auto

definition select_index:: "'a ‚áí real"
  where "select_index x ‚â° SOME i. i ‚àà index ‚àß x ‚àà cover i"

lemma cover_of_select_index:
  assumes "x ‚àà U"
  shows "x ‚àà cover (select_index x)"
  using assms by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) UN_iff covering select_index_def someI_ex subset_iff)

lemma select_index_belongs:
  assumes "x ‚àà U"
  shows "select_index x ‚àà index"
  using assms by (metis (full_types, lifting) UN_iff covering in_mono select_index_def tfl_some)

end (* cover_of_subset *)

locale open_cover_of_subset = topological_space X is_open + cover_of_subset X U I C
  for X and is_open and U and I and C +
  assumes are_open_subspaces: "‚ãÄi. i‚ààI ‚üπ is_open (C i)"
begin

lemma cover_of_select_index_is_open:
  assumes "x ‚àà U"
  shows "is_open (C (select_index x))"
  using assms by (simp add: are_open_subspaces select_index_belongs)

end (* open_cover_of_subset *)

locale open_cover_of_open_subset = open_cover_of_subset X is_open U I C
  for X and is_open and U and I and C +
  assumes is_open_subset: "is_open U"


subsection ‚ÄπInduced Topology‚Ä∫

locale ind_topology = topological_space X is_open for X and is_open +
  fixes S:: "'a set"
  assumes is_subset: "S ‚äÜ X"
begin

definition ind_is_open:: "'a set ‚áí bool"
  where "ind_is_open U ‚â° U ‚äÜ S ‚àß (‚àÉV. V ‚äÜ X ‚àß is_open V ‚àß U = S ‚à© V)"

lemma ind_is_open_S [iff]: "ind_is_open S"
    by (metis ind_is_open_def inf.orderE is_subset open_space order_refl)

lemma ind_is_open_empty [iff]: "ind_is_open {}"
    using ind_is_open_def by auto

lemma ind_space_is_top_space:
  shows "topological_space S (ind_is_open)"
proof
  fix U V
  assume "ind_is_open U" then obtain UX where "UX ‚äÜ X" "is_open UX" "U = S ‚à© UX"
    using ind_is_open_def by auto
  moreover
  assume "ind_is_open V" then obtain VX where "VX ‚äÜ X" "is_open VX" "V = S ‚à© VX"
    using ind_is_open_def by auto
  ultimately have "is_open (UX ‚à© VX) ‚àß (U ‚à© V = S ‚à© (UX ‚à© VX))" using open_inter by auto
  then show "ind_is_open (U ‚à© V)"
    by (metis ‚ÄπUX ‚äÜ X‚Ä∫ ind_is_open_def le_infI1 subset_refl)
next
  fix F
  assume F: "‚ãÄx. x ‚àà F ‚üπ ind_is_open x"
  obtain F' where F': "‚ãÄx. x ‚àà F ‚àß ind_is_open x ‚üπ is_open (F' x) ‚àß x = S ‚à© (F' x)"
    using ind_is_open_def by metis
  have "is_open (‚ãÉ (F' ` F))"
    by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) F F' imageE image_ident open_union)
  moreover
  have "(‚ãÉx‚ààF. x) = S ‚à© ‚ãÉ (F' ` F)"
    using F' ‚Äπ‚ãÄx. x ‚àà F ‚üπ ind_is_open x‚Ä∫ by fastforce
  ultimately show "ind_is_open (‚ãÉx‚ààF. x)"
    by (metis ind_is_open_def inf_sup_ord(1) open_imp_subset)
next
  show "‚ãÄU. ind_is_open U ‚üπ U ‚äÜ S"
    by (simp add: ind_is_open_def)
qed auto

lemma is_open_from_ind_is_open:
  assumes "is_open S" and "ind_is_open U"
  shows "is_open U"
  using assms open_inter ind_is_open_def is_subset by auto

lemma open_cover_from_ind_open_cover:
  assumes "is_open S" and "open_cover_of_open_subset S ind_is_open U I C"
  shows "open_cover_of_open_subset X is_open U I C"
proof
  show "is_open U"
    using assms is_open_from_ind_is_open open_cover_of_open_subset.is_open_subset by blast
  show "‚ãÄi. i ‚àà I ‚üπ is_open (C i)"
    using assms is_open_from_ind_is_open open_cover_of_open_subset_def open_cover_of_subset.are_open_subspaces by blast
  show "‚ãÄi. i ‚àà I ‚üπ C i ‚äÜ X"
    using assms(2) is_subset
    by (meson cover_of_subset_def open_cover_of_open_subset_def open_cover_of_subset_def subset_trans)
  show "U ‚äÜ X"
    by (simp add: ‚Äπis_open U‚Ä∫ open_imp_subset)
  show "U ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ (C ` I)"
    by (meson assms(2) cover_of_subset_def open_cover_of_open_subset_def open_cover_of_subset_def)
qed

end (* induced topology *)

lemma (in topological_space) ind_topology_is_open_self [iff]: "ind_topology S is_open S"
  by (simp add: ind_topology_axioms_def ind_topology_def topological_space_axioms)

lemma (in topological_space) ind_topology_is_open_empty [iff]: "ind_topology S is_open {}"
  by (simp add: ind_topology_axioms_def ind_topology_def topological_space_axioms)

lemma (in topological_space) ind_is_open_iff_open:
  shows "ind_topology.ind_is_open S is_open S U ‚ü∑ is_open U ‚àß U ‚äÜ S"
  by (metis ind_topology.ind_is_open_def ind_topology_is_open_self inf.absorb_iff2)

subsection ‚ÄπContinuous Maps‚Ä∫

locale continuous_map = source: topological_space S is_open + target: topological_space S' is_open'
+ map f S S'
  for S and is_open and S' and is_open' and f +
  assumes is_continuous: "‚ãÄU. is_open' U ‚üπ is_open (f‚áß¬Ø S U)"
begin

lemma open_cover_of_open_subset_from_target_to_source:
  assumes "open_cover_of_open_subset S' is_open' U I C"
  shows "open_cover_of_open_subset S is_open (f‚áß¬Ø S U) I (Œªi. f‚áß¬Ø S (C i))"
proof
  show "f ‚áß¬Ø S U ‚äÜ S" by simp
  show "f ‚áß¬Ø S (C i) ‚äÜ S" if "i ‚àà I" for i
    using that by simp
  show "is_open (f ‚áß¬Ø S U)"
    by (meson assms is_continuous open_cover_of_open_subset.is_open_subset)
  show "‚ãÄi. i ‚àà I ‚üπ is_open (f ‚áß¬Ø S (C i))"
    by (meson assms is_continuous open_cover_of_open_subset_def open_cover_of_subset.are_open_subspaces)
  show "f ‚áß¬Ø S U ‚äÜ (‚ãÉi‚ààI. f ‚áß¬Ø S (C i))"
    using assms unfolding open_cover_of_open_subset_def cover_of_subset_def open_cover_of_subset_def
    by blast
qed

end (* continuous map *)


subsection ‚ÄπHomeomorphisms‚Ä∫

text ‚ÄπThe topological isomorphisms between topological spaces are called homeomorphisms.‚Ä∫

locale homeomorphism =
  continuous_map + bijective_map f S S' +
  continuous_map S' is_open' S is_open "inverse_map f S S'"

lemma (in topological_space) id_is_homeomorphism:
  shows "homeomorphism S is_open S is_open (identity S)"
proof
  show "inverse_map (identity S) S S ‚àà S ‚Üí‚á©E S"
    by (simp add: inv_into_into inverse_map_def)
qed (auto simp: open_inter bij_betwI')


subsection ‚ÄπTopological Filters‚Ä∫ (* Imported from HOL.Topological_Spaces *)

definition (in topological_space) nhds :: "'a ‚áí 'a filter"
  where "nhds a = (INF S‚àà{S. is_open S ‚àß a ‚àà S}. principal S)"

abbreviation (in topological_space)
  tendsto :: "('b ‚áí 'a) ‚áí 'a ‚áí 'b filter ‚áí bool"  (infixr "‚§è" 55)
  where "(f ‚§è l) F ‚â° filterlim f (nhds l) F"

definition (in t2_space) Lim :: "'f filter ‚áí ('f ‚áí 'a) ‚áí 'a"
  where "Lim A f = (THE l. (f ‚§è l) A)"

end

Theory Comm_Ring

text ‚ÄπAuthors: Anthony Bordg and Lawrence Paulson,
with some contributions from Wenda Li‚Ä∫

theory Comm_Ring
  imports
    "Group_Extras"
    "Topological_Space"
    "Jacobson_Basic_Algebra.Ring_Theory"
    "Set_Extras"
begin

(*Suppresses the built-in plus sign, but why does
 no_notation minus (infixl "-" 65)
cause errors with monoid subtraction below? --LCP
*)
no_notation plus (infixl "+" 65)

lemma (in monoid_homomorphism) monoid_preimage: "Group_Theory.monoid (Œ∑ ‚áß¬Ø M M') (‚ãÖ) ùü≠"
  by (simp add: Int_absorb1 source.monoid_axioms subsetI)

lemma (in group_homomorphism) group_preimage: "Group_Theory.group (Œ∑ ‚áß¬Ø G G') (‚ãÖ) ùü≠"
  by (simp add: Int_absorb1 source.group_axioms subsetI)

lemma (in ring_homomorphism) ring_preimage: "ring (Œ∑ ‚áß¬Ø R R') (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠"
  by (simp add: Int_absorb2 Int_commute source.ring_axioms subset_iff)

section ‚ÄπCommutative Rings‚Ä∫

subsection ‚ÄπCommutative Rings‚Ä∫

locale comm_ring = ring +
  assumes comm_mult: "‚ü¶ a ‚àà R; b ‚àà R ‚üß ‚üπ a ‚ãÖ b = b ‚ãÖ a"

text ‚ÄπThe zero ring is a commutative ring.‚Ä∫

lemma invertible_0: "monoid.invertible {0} (Œªn m. 0) 0 0"
    using Group_Theory.monoid.intro monoid.unit_invertible by force

interpretation ring0: ring "{0::nat}" "Œªn m. 0" "Œªn m. 0" 0 0
  using invertible_0 by unfold_locales auto

declare ring0.additive.left_unit [simp del] ring0.additive.invertible [simp del]
declare ring0.additive.invertible_left_inverse [simp del] ring0.right_zero [simp del]

interpretation cring0: comm_ring "{0::nat}" "Œªn m. 0" "Œªn m. 0" 0 0
  by (metis comm_ring_axioms_def comm_ring_def ring0.ring_axioms)

(* def 0.13 *)
definition (in ring) zero_divisor :: "'a ‚áí 'a ‚áí bool"
  where "zero_divisor x y ‚â° (x ‚â† ùü¨) ‚àß (y ‚â† ùü¨) ‚àß (x ‚ãÖ y = ùü¨)"

subsection ‚ÄπEntire Rings‚Ä∫

(* def 0.14 *)
locale entire_ring = comm_ring + assumes units_neq: "ùü≠ ‚â† ùü¨" and
no_zero_div: "‚ü¶ x ‚àà R; y ‚àà R‚üß ‚üπ ¬¨(zero_divisor x y)"

subsection ‚ÄπIdeals‚Ä∫

context comm_ring begin

lemma mult_left_assoc: "‚ü¶ a ‚àà R; b ‚àà R; c ‚àà R ‚üß ‚üπ b ‚ãÖ (a ‚ãÖ c) = a ‚ãÖ (b ‚ãÖ c)"
  using comm_mult multiplicative.associative by auto

lemmas ring_mult_ac = comm_mult multiplicative.associative mult_left_assoc

(* ex. 0.16 *)
lemma ideal_R_R: "ideal R R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠"
proof qed auto

lemma ideal_0_R: "ideal {ùü¨} R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠"
proof
  show "monoid.invertible {ùü¨} (+) ùü¨ u"
    if "u ‚àà {ùü¨}"
    for u :: 'a
  proof (rule monoid.invertibleI)
    show "Group_Theory.monoid {ùü¨} (+) ùü¨"
    proof qed (use that in auto)
  qed (use that in auto)
qed auto

definition ideal_gen_by_prod :: "'a set ‚áí 'a set ‚áí 'a set"
  where "ideal_gen_by_prod ùîû ùîü ‚â° additive.subgroup_generated {x. ‚àÉa b. x = a ‚ãÖ b ‚àß a ‚àà ùîû ‚àß b ‚àà ùîü}"

lemma ideal_zero: "ideal A R add mult zero unit ‚üπ zero ‚àà A"
  by (simp add: ideal_def subgroup_of_additive_group_of_ring_def subgroup_def submonoid_def submonoid_axioms_def)

lemma ideal_implies_subset:
  assumes "ideal A R add mult zero unit"
  shows "A ‚äÜ R"
  by (meson assms ideal_def subgroup_def subgroup_of_additive_group_of_ring_def submonoid_axioms_def submonoid_def)

lemma ideal_inverse:
  assumes "a ‚àà A" "ideal A R (+) mult zero unit"
  shows "additive.inverse a ‚àà A"
  by (meson additive.invertible assms comm_ring.ideal_implies_subset comm_ring_axioms ideal_def subgroup.subgroup_inverse_iff subgroup_of_additive_group_of_ring_def subsetD)

lemma ideal_add:
  assumes "a ‚àà A"  "b ‚àà A" "ideal A R add mult zero unit"
  shows "add a b ‚àà A"
  by (meson Group_Theory.group_def assms ideal_def monoid.composition_closed subgroup_def subgroup_of_additive_group_of_ring_def)

lemma ideal_mult_in_subgroup_generated:
  assumes ùîû: "ideal ùîû R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠" and ùîü: "ideal ùîü R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠" and "a ‚àà ùîû" "b ‚àà ùîü"
  shows "a ‚ãÖ b ‚àà ideal_gen_by_prod ùîû ùîü"
  proof -
  have "‚àÉx y. a ‚ãÖ b = x ‚ãÖ y ‚àß x ‚àà ùîû ‚àß y ‚àà ùîü"
    using assms ideal_implies_subset by blast
  with ideal_implies_subset show ?thesis
    unfolding additive.subgroup_generated_def ideal_gen_by_prod_def
    using assms ideal_implies_subset by (blast intro: additive.generate.incl)
qed

subsection ‚ÄπIdeals generated by an Element‚Ä∫

definition gen_ideal:: "'a ‚áí 'a set" ("‚ü®_‚ü©")
  where "‚ü®x‚ü© ‚â° {y. ‚àÉr‚ààR. y = r ‚ãÖ x}"

lemma zero_in_gen_ideal:
  assumes "x ‚àà R"
  shows "ùü¨ ‚àà ‚ü®x‚ü©"
proof -
  have "‚àÉa. a ‚àà R ‚àß ùü¨ = a ‚ãÖ x"
    by (metis (lifting) additive.unit_closed assms left_zero)
  then show ?thesis
    using gen_ideal_def by blast
qed

lemma add_in_gen_ideal:
  "‚ü¶x ‚àà R; a ‚àà ‚ü®x‚ü©; b ‚àà ‚ü®x‚ü©‚üß ‚üπ a + b ‚àà ‚ü®x‚ü©"
    apply (clarsimp simp : gen_ideal_def)
  by (metis (no_types) additive.composition_closed distributive(2))

lemma gen_ideal_subset:
  assumes "x ‚àà R"
  shows "‚ü®x‚ü© ‚äÜ R"
  using assms comm_ring.gen_ideal_def local.comm_ring_axioms by fastforce

lemma gen_ideal_monoid:
  assumes "x ‚àà R"
  shows "Group_Theory.monoid ‚ü®x‚ü© (+) ùü¨"
proof
  show "a + b ‚àà ‚ü®x‚ü©" if "a ‚àà ‚ü®x‚ü©" "b ‚àà ‚ü®x‚ü©" for a b
    by (simp add: add_in_gen_ideal assms that)
qed (use assms zero_in_gen_ideal gen_ideal_def in auto)

lemma gen_ideal_group:
  assumes "x ‚àà R"
  shows "Group_Theory.group ‚ü®x‚ü© (+) ùü¨"
proof
  fix a b c
  assume "a ‚àà ‚ü®x‚ü©" "b ‚àà ‚ü®x‚ü©" "c ‚àà ‚ü®x‚ü©"
  then show "a + b + c = a + (b + c)"
    by (meson assms gen_ideal_monoid monoid.associative)
next
  fix a
  assume a: "a ‚àà ‚ü®x‚ü©"
  show "ùü¨ + a = a"
    by (meson a assms gen_ideal_monoid monoid.left_unit)
  show "a + ùü¨ = a"
    by (meson a assms gen_ideal_monoid monoid.right_unit)
  interpret M: monoid "‚ü®x‚ü©" "(+)" ùü¨
    by (simp add: assms gen_ideal_monoid)
  obtain r where r: "r‚ààR" "a = r ‚ãÖ x"
    using a gen_ideal_def by auto
  show "monoid.invertible ‚ü®x‚ü© (+) ùü¨ a"
  proof (rule M.invertibleI)
    have "‚àÉr‚ààR. - a = r ‚ãÖ x"
      by (metis assms ideal_R_R ideal_inverse local.left_minus r)
    then show "-a ‚àà ‚ü®x‚ü©" by (simp add: gen_ideal_def)
  qed (use a r assms in auto)
qed (auto simp: zero_in_gen_ideal add_in_gen_ideal assms)

lemma gen_ideal_ideal:
  assumes "x ‚àà R"
  shows "ideal ‚ü®x‚ü© R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠"
proof intro_locales
  show "submonoid_axioms ‚ü®x‚ü© R (+) ùü¨"
    by (simp add: add_in_gen_ideal assms gen_ideal_subset submonoid_axioms.intro zero_in_gen_ideal)
  show "Group_Theory.group_axioms ‚ü®x‚ü© (+) ùü¨"
    by (meson Group_Theory.group_def assms gen_ideal_group)
  show "ideal_axioms ‚ü®x‚ü© R (‚ãÖ)"
  proof
    fix a b
    assume "a ‚àà R" "b ‚àà ‚ü®x‚ü©"
    then obtain r where r: "r‚ààR" "b = r ‚ãÖ x"
      by (auto simp add: gen_ideal_def)
    have "a ‚ãÖ (r ‚ãÖ x) = (a ‚ãÖ r) ‚ãÖ x"
      using ‚Äπa ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr ‚àà R‚Ä∫ assms multiplicative.associative by presburger
    then show "a ‚ãÖ b ‚àà ‚ü®x‚ü©"
      using ‚Äπa ‚àà R‚Ä∫ r gen_ideal_def by blast
    then show "b ‚ãÖ a ‚àà ‚ü®x‚ü©"
      by (simp add: ‚Äπa ‚àà R‚Ä∫ assms comm_mult r)
  qed
qed (auto simp add: assms gen_ideal_monoid)


subsection ‚ÄπExercises‚Ä∫

lemma in_ideal_gen_by_prod:
  assumes ùîû: "ideal ùîû R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠" and ùîü: "ideal ùîü R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠"
    and "a ‚àà R" and b: "b ‚àà ideal_gen_by_prod ùîû ùîü"
  shows "a ‚ãÖ b ‚àà ideal_gen_by_prod ùîû ùîü"
  using b ‚Äπa ‚àà R‚Ä∫
  unfolding additive.subgroup_generated_def ideal_gen_by_prod_def
proof (induction arbitrary: a)
  case unit
  then show ?case
    by (simp add: additive.generate.unit)
next
  case (incl x u)
  with ùîû ùîü have "‚ãÄa b. ‚ü¶a ‚ãÖ b ‚àà R; a ‚àà ùîû; b ‚àà ùîü‚üß ‚üπ ‚àÉx y. u ‚ãÖ (a ‚ãÖ b) = x ‚ãÖ y ‚àß x ‚àà ùîû ‚àß y ‚àà ùîü"
    by simp (metis ideal.ideal(1) ideal_implies_subset multiplicative.associative subset_iff)
  then show ?case
    using additive.generate.incl incl.hyps incl.prems by force
next
  case (inv u v)
  then show ?case
  proof clarsimp
    fix a b
    assume "v ‚àà R" "a ‚ãÖ b ‚àà R" "a ‚àà ùîû" "b ‚àà ùîü"
    then have "v ‚ãÖ (- a ‚ãÖ b) = v ‚ãÖ a ‚ãÖ (- b) ‚àß v ‚ãÖ a ‚àà ùîû ‚àß - b ‚àà ùîü"
      by (metis ùîû ùîü ideal.ideal(1) ideal_implies_subset ideal_inverse in_mono local.right_minus multiplicative.associative)
    then show "v ‚ãÖ (- a ‚ãÖ b) ‚àà additive.generate (R ‚à© {a ‚ãÖ b |a b. a ‚àà ùîû ‚àß b ‚àà ùîü})"
      using ùîû ùîü additive.subgroup_generated_def ideal_mult_in_subgroup_generated
      unfolding ideal_gen_by_prod_def
      by presburger
  qed
next
  case (mult u v)
  then show ?case
    using additive.generate.mult additive.generate_into_G distributive(1) by force
qed

(* ex. 0.12 *)
lemma ideal_subgroup_generated:
  assumes "ideal ùîû R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠" and "ideal ùîü R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠"
  shows "ideal (ideal_gen_by_prod ùîû ùîü) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠"
  proof
  show "ideal_gen_by_prod ùîû ùîü ‚äÜ R"
    by (simp add: additive.subgroup_generated_is_subset ideal_gen_by_prod_def)
  show "a + b ‚àà ideal_gen_by_prod ùîû ùîü"
    if "a ‚àà ideal_gen_by_prod ùîû ùîü" "b ‚àà ideal_gen_by_prod ùîû ùîü"
    for a b
    using that additive.subgroup_generated_is_monoid monoid.composition_closed
    by (fastforce simp: ideal_gen_by_prod_def)
  show "ùü¨ ‚àà ideal_gen_by_prod ùîû ùîü"
    using additive.generate.unit additive.subgroup_generated_def ideal_gen_by_prod_def by presburger
  show "a + b + c = a + (b + c)"
    if "a ‚àà ideal_gen_by_prod ùîû ùîü" "b ‚àà ideal_gen_by_prod ùîû ùîü" "c ‚àà ideal_gen_by_prod ùîû ùîü"
    for a b c
    using that additive.subgroup_generated_is_subset
    unfolding ideal_gen_by_prod_def
    by blast
  show "ùü¨ + a = a" "a + ùü¨ = a"
    if "a ‚àà ideal_gen_by_prod ùîû ùîü" for a
    using that additive.subgroup_generated_is_subset unfolding ideal_gen_by_prod_def
    by blast+
  show "monoid.invertible (ideal_gen_by_prod ùîû ùîü) (+) ùü¨ u"
    if "u ‚àà ideal_gen_by_prod ùîû ùîü" for u
    using that additive.subgroup_generated_is_subgroup group.invertible
    unfolding ideal_gen_by_prod_def subgroup_def
    by fastforce
  show "a ‚ãÖ b ‚àà ideal_gen_by_prod ùîû ùîü"
    if "a ‚àà R" "b ‚àà ideal_gen_by_prod ùîû ùîü" for a b
    using that by (simp add: assms in_ideal_gen_by_prod)
  then show "b ‚ãÖ a ‚àà ideal_gen_by_prod ùîû ùîü"
    if "a ‚àà R" "b ‚àà ideal_gen_by_prod ùîû ùîü" for a b
    using that
    by (metis ‚Äπideal_gen_by_prod ùîû ùîü ‚äÜ R‚Ä∫ comm_mult in_mono)
qed

lemma ideal_gen_by_prod_is_inter:
  assumes "ideal ùîû R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠" and "ideal ùîü R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠"
  shows "ideal_gen_by_prod ùîû ùîü = ‚ãÇ {I. ideal I R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠ ‚àß {a ‚ãÖ b |a b. a ‚àà ùîû ‚àß b ‚àà ùîü} ‚äÜ I}"
    (is "?lhs = ?rhs")
proof
  have "x ‚àà ?rhs" if "x ‚àà ?lhs" for x
    using that
    unfolding ideal_gen_by_prod_def additive.subgroup_generated_def
    by induction (force simp: ideal_zero ideal_inverse ideal_add)+
  then show "?lhs ‚äÜ ?rhs" by blast
  show "?rhs ‚äÜ ?lhs"
    using assms ideal_subgroup_generated by (force simp: ideal_mult_in_subgroup_generated)
qed

end (* comm_ring *)

text ‚Äπdef. 0.18, see remark 0.20‚Ä∫
locale pr_ideal = comm:comm_ring R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" "ùü¨" "ùü≠" + ideal I R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" "ùü¨" "ùü≠"
  for R and I and addition (infixl "+" 65) and multiplication (infixl "‚ãÖ" 70) and zero ("ùü¨") and
unit ("ùü≠")
+ assumes carrier_neq: "I ‚â† R" and absorbent: "‚ü¶x ‚àà R; y ‚àà R‚üß ‚üπ (x ‚ãÖ y ‚àà I) ‚üπ (x ‚àà I ‚à® y ‚àà I)"
begin

text ‚Äπ
Note that in the locale prime ideal the order of I and R is reversed with respect to the locale
ideal, so that we can introduce some syntactic sugar later.
‚Ä∫

text ‚Äπremark 0.21‚Ä∫
lemma not_1 [simp]:
  shows "ùü≠ ‚àâ I"
proof
  assume "ùü≠ ‚àà I"
  then have "‚ãÄx. ‚ü¶ùü≠ ‚àà I; x ‚àà R‚üß ‚üπ x ‚àà I"
    by (metis ideal(1) comm.multiplicative.right_unit)
  with ‚Äπùü≠ ‚àà I‚Ä∫ have "I = R"
    by auto
  then show False
    using carrier_neq by blast
qed

lemma not_invertible:
  assumes "x ‚àà I"
  shows "¬¨ comm.multiplicative.invertible x"
  using assms ideal(2) not_1 by blast

text ‚Äπex. 0.22‚Ä∫
lemma submonoid_notin:
  assumes "S = {x ‚àà R. x ‚àâ I}"
  shows "submonoid S R (‚ãÖ) ùü≠"
proof
  show "S ‚äÜ R"
    using assms by force
  show "a ‚ãÖ b ‚àà S"
    if "a ‚àà S"
      and "b ‚àà S"
    for a :: 'a
      and b :: 'a
    using that
    using absorbent assms by blast
  show "ùü≠ ‚àà S"
    using assms carrier_neq ideal(1) by fastforce
qed

end (* pr_ideal *)


section ‚ÄπSpectrum of a ring‚Ä∫

subsection ‚ÄπThe Zariski Topology‚Ä∫

context comm_ring begin

text ‚ÄπNotation 1‚Ä∫
definition closed_subsets :: "'a set ‚áí ('a set) set" ("ùí± _" [900] 900)
  where "ùí± ùîû ‚â° {I. pr_ideal R I (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠ ‚àß ùîû ‚äÜ I}"

text ‚ÄπNotation 2‚Ä∫
definition spectrum :: "('a set) set" ("Spec")
  where "Spec ‚â° {I. pr_ideal R I (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠}"

lemma cring0_spectrum_eq [simp]: "cring0.spectrum = {}"
  unfolding cring0.spectrum_def pr_ideal_def
  by (metis (no_types, lifting) Collect_empty_eq cring0.ideal_zero pr_ideal.intro pr_ideal.not_1)

text ‚Äπremark 0.11‚Ä∫
lemma closed_subsets_R [simp]:
  shows "ùí± R = {}"
  using ideal_implies_subset
  by (auto simp: closed_subsets_def pr_ideal_axioms_def pr_ideal_def)

lemma closed_subsets_empty [simp]:
  shows "ùí± {} = Spec"
  using closed_subsets_def spectrum_def by force

lemma closed_subsets_ideal_aux:
  assumes ùîû: "ideal ùîû R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠" and ùîü: "ideal ùîü R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠"
      and prime: "pr_ideal R x (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠" and disj: "ùîû ‚äÜ x ‚à® ùîü ‚äÜ x"
  shows "ideal_gen_by_prod ùîû ùîü ‚äÜ x"
  unfolding ideal_gen_by_prod_def additive.subgroup_generated_def
proof
  fix u
  assume u: "u ‚àà additive.generate (R ‚à© {a ‚ãÖ b |a b. a ‚àà ùîû ‚àß b ‚àà ùîü})"
  have "ùîû ‚äÜ R" "ùîü ‚äÜ R"
    using ùîû ùîü ideal_implies_subset by auto
  show "u ‚àà x" using u
  proof induction
    case unit
    then show ?case
      by (meson comm_ring.ideal_zero prime pr_ideal_def)
  next
    case (incl a)
    then have "a ‚àà R"
      by blast
    with incl pr_ideal.axioms [OF prime] show ?case
      by clarsimp (metis ‚Äπùîû ‚äÜ R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπùîü ‚äÜ R‚Ä∫ disj ideal.ideal subset_iff)
  next
    case (inv a)
    then have "a ‚àà R"
      by blast
    with inv pr_ideal.axioms [OF prime] show ?case
      by clarsimp (metis ‚Äπùîû ‚äÜ R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπùîü ‚äÜ R‚Ä∫ disj ideal.ideal ideal_inverse subset_iff)
  next
    case (mult a b)
    then show ?case
      by (meson prime comm_ring.ideal_add pr_ideal_def)
  qed
qed


text ‚Äπex. 0.13‚Ä∫
lemma closed_subsets_ideal_iff:
  assumes "ideal ùîû R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠" and "ideal ùîü R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠"
  shows "ùí± (ideal_gen_by_prod ùîû ùîü) = (ùí± ùîû) ‚à™ (ùí± ùîü)" (is "?lhs = ?rhs")
proof
  show "?lhs ‚äÜ ?rhs"
    unfolding closed_subsets_def
    by clarsimp (meson assms ideal_implies_subset ideal_mult_in_subgroup_generated in_mono pr_ideal.absorbent)
  show "?rhs ‚äÜ ?lhs"
    unfolding closed_subsets_def
    using closed_subsets_ideal_aux [OF assms] by auto
qed

abbreviation finsum:: "'b set ‚áí ('b ‚áí 'a) ‚áí 'a"
  where "finsum I f ‚â° additive.finprod I f"

lemma finsum_empty [simp]: "finsum {} f = ùü¨"
  by (simp add: additive.finprod_def)

lemma finsum_insert:
  assumes "finite I" "i ‚àâ I"
    and R: "f i ‚àà R" "‚ãÄj. j ‚àà I ‚üπ f j ‚àà R"
  shows "finsum (insert i I) f = f i + finsum I f"
  unfolding additive.finprod_def
proof (subst LCD.foldD_insert [where B = "insert i I"])
  show "LCD (insert i I) R ((+) ‚àò f)"
  proof
    show "((+) ‚àò f) x (((+) ‚àò f) y z) = ((+) ‚àò f) y (((+) ‚àò f) x z)"
      if "x ‚àà insert i I" "y ‚àà insert i I" "z ‚àà R" for x y z
      using that additive.associative additive.commutative R by auto
    show "((+) ‚àò f) x y ‚àà R"
      if "x ‚àà insert i I" "y ‚àà R" for x y
      using that R by force
  qed
qed (use assms in auto)

lemma finsum_singleton [simp]:
  assumes "f i ‚àà R"
  shows "finsum {i} f = f i"
  by (metis additive.right_unit assms finite.emptyI finsum_empty finsum_insert insert_absorb insert_not_empty)


(* ex. 0.15 *)
lemma ex_15:
  fixes J :: "'b set" and ùîû :: "'b ‚áí 'a set"
  assumes "J ‚â† {}" and J: "‚ãÄj. j‚ààJ ‚üπ ideal (ùîû j) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠"
  shows "ùí± ({x. ‚àÉI f. x = finsum I f ‚àß I ‚äÜ J ‚àß finite I ‚àß (‚àÄi. i‚ààI ‚ü∂ f i ‚àà ùîû i)}) = (‚ãÇj‚ààJ. ùí± (ùîû j))"
  proof -
  have "y ‚àà U"
    if j: "j ‚àà J" "y ‚àà ùîû j"
      and "pr_ideal R U (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠"
      and U: "{finsum I f |I f. I ‚äÜ J ‚àß finite I ‚àß (‚àÄi. i ‚àà I ‚ü∂ f i ‚àà ùîû i)} ‚äÜ U"
    for U j y
  proof -
    have "y ‚àà R"
      using J j ideal_implies_subset by blast
    then have y: "y = finsum {j} (Œª_. y)"
      by simp
    then have "y ‚àà {finsum I f |I f. I ‚äÜ J ‚àß finite I ‚àß (‚àÄi. i ‚àà I ‚ü∂ f i ‚àà ùîû i)}"
      using that by blast
    then show ?thesis
      by (rule subsetD [OF U])
  qed
  moreover have PI: "pr_ideal R x (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠" if "‚àÄj‚ààJ. pr_ideal R x (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠ ‚àß ùîû j ‚äÜ x" for x
    using that assms(1) by fastforce
  moreover have "finsum I f ‚àà U"
    if "finite I"
      and "‚àÄj‚ààJ. pr_ideal R U (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠ ‚àß ùîû j ‚äÜ U"
      and "I ‚äÜ J" "‚àÄi. i ‚àà I ‚ü∂ f i ‚àà ùîû i" for U I f
    using that
  proof (induction I rule: finite_induct)
    case empty
    then show ?case
      using PI assms ideal_zero by fastforce
  next
    case (insert i I)
    then have "finsum (insert i I) f = f i + finsum I f"
      by (metis assms(2) finsum_insert ideal_implies_subset insertCI subset_iff)
    also have "... ‚àà U"
      using insert by (metis ideal_add insertCI pr_ideal.axioms(2) subset_eq)
    finally show ?case .
  qed
  ultimately show ?thesis
    by (auto simp: closed_subsets_def)
qed

(* ex 0.16 *)
definition is_zariski_open:: "'a set set ‚áí bool" where
"is_zariski_open U ‚â° generated_topology Spec {U. (‚àÉùîû. ideal ùîû R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠ ‚àß U = Spec - ùí± ùîû)} U"

lemma is_zariski_open_empty [simp]: "is_zariski_open {}"
  using UNIV is_zariski_open_def generated_topology_is_topology topological_space.open_empty
  by simp

lemma is_zariski_open_Spec [simp]: "is_zariski_open Spec"
  by (simp add: UNIV is_zariski_open_def)

lemma is_zariski_open_Union [intro]:
  "(‚ãÄx. x ‚àà F ‚üπ is_zariski_open x) ‚üπ is_zariski_open (‚ãÉ F)"
  by (simp add: UN is_zariski_open_def)

lemma is_zariski_open_Int [simp]:
  "‚ü¶is_zariski_open U; is_zariski_open V‚üß ‚üπ is_zariski_open (U ‚à© V)"
  using Int is_zariski_open_def by blast

lemma zariski_is_topological_space [iff]:
  shows "topological_space Spec is_zariski_open"
  unfolding is_zariski_open_def using generated_topology_is_topology
  by blast

lemma zariski_open_is_subset:
  assumes "is_zariski_open U"
  shows "U ‚äÜ Spec"
  using assms zariski_is_topological_space topological_space.open_imp_subset by auto

lemma cring0_is_zariski_open [simp]: "cring0.is_zariski_open = (ŒªU. U={})"
  using cring0.cring0_spectrum_eq cring0.is_zariski_open_empty cring0.zariski_open_is_subset by blast

subsection ‚ÄπStandard Open Sets‚Ä∫

definition standard_open:: "'a ‚áí 'a set set" ("ùíü'(_')")
  where "ùíü(x) ‚â° (Spec ‚àñ ùí±(‚ü®x‚ü©))"

lemma standard_open_is_zariski_open:
  assumes "x ‚àà R"
  shows "is_zariski_open ùíü(x)"
  unfolding is_zariski_open_def standard_open_def
  using assms gen_ideal_ideal generated_topology.simps by fastforce

lemma standard_open_is_subset:
  assumes "x ‚àà R"
  shows "ùíü(x) ‚äÜ Spec"
  by (simp add: assms standard_open_is_zariski_open zariski_open_is_subset)

lemma belongs_standard_open_iff:
  assumes "x ‚àà R" and "ùî≠ ‚àà Spec"
  shows "x ‚àâ ùî≠ ‚ü∑ ùî≠ ‚àà ùíü(x)"
  using assms
  apply (auto simp: standard_open_def closed_subsets_def spectrum_def gen_ideal_def subset_iff)
  apply (metis pr_ideal.absorbent)
  by (meson ideal.ideal(1) pr_ideal_def)

end (* comm_ring *)


subsection ‚ÄπPresheaves of Rings‚Ä∫

(* def 0.17 *)
locale presheaf_of_rings = Topological_Space.topological_space
  + fixes ùîâ:: "'a set ‚áí 'b set"
  and œÅ:: "'a set ‚áí 'a set ‚áí ('b ‚áí 'b)" and b:: "'b"
  and add_str:: "'a set ‚áí ('b ‚áí 'b ‚áí 'b)" ("+‚áò_‚áô")
  and mult_str:: "'a set ‚áí ('b ‚áí 'b ‚áí 'b)" ("‚ãÖ‚áò_‚áô")
  and zero_str:: "'a set ‚áí 'b" ("ùü¨‚áò_‚áô") and one_str:: "'a set ‚áí 'b" ("ùü≠‚áò_‚áô")
assumes is_ring_morphism:
  "‚ãÄU V. is_open U ‚üπ is_open V ‚üπ V ‚äÜ U ‚üπ ring_homomorphism (œÅ U V)
                                                  (ùîâ U) (+‚áòU‚áô) (‚ãÖ‚áòU‚áô) ùü¨‚áòU‚áô ùü≠‚áòU‚áô
                                                  (ùîâ V) (+‚áòV‚áô) (‚ãÖ‚áòV‚áô) ùü¨‚áòV‚áô ùü≠‚áòV‚áô"
  and ring_of_empty: "ùîâ {} = {b}"
  and identity_map [simp]: "‚ãÄU. is_open U ‚üπ (‚ãÄx. x ‚àà ùîâ U ‚üπ œÅ U U x = x)"
  and assoc_comp:
  "‚ãÄU V W. is_open U ‚üπ is_open V ‚üπ is_open W ‚üπ V ‚äÜ U ‚üπ W ‚äÜ V ‚üπ
(‚ãÄx. x ‚àà (ùîâ U) ‚üπ œÅ U W x = (œÅ V W ‚àò œÅ U V) x)"
begin

lemma is_ring_from_is_homomorphism:
  shows "‚ãÄU. is_open U ‚üπ ring (ùîâ U) (+‚áòU‚áô) (‚ãÖ‚áòU‚áô) ùü¨‚áòU‚áô ùü≠‚áòU‚áô"
  using is_ring_morphism ring_homomorphism.axioms(2) by fastforce

lemma is_map_from_is_homomorphism:
  assumes "is_open U" and "is_open V" and "V ‚äÜ U"
  shows "Set_Theory.map (œÅ U V) (ùîâ U) (ùîâ V)"
  using assms by (meson is_ring_morphism ring_homomorphism.axioms(1))

lemma eq_œÅ:
  assumes "is_open U" and "is_open V" and "is_open W" and "W ‚äÜ U ‚à© V" and "s ‚àà ùîâ U" and "t ‚àà ùîâ V"
    and "œÅ U W s = œÅ V W t" and "is_open W'" and "W' ‚äÜ W"
  shows "œÅ U W' s = œÅ V W' t"
  by (metis Int_subset_iff assms assoc_comp comp_apply)

end (* presheaf_of_rings *)

locale morphism_presheaves_of_rings =
source: presheaf_of_rings X is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str
  + target: presheaf_of_rings X is_open ùîâ' œÅ' b' add_str' mult_str' zero_str' one_str'
  for X and is_open
    and ùîâ and œÅ and b and add_str ("+‚áò_‚áô") and mult_str ("‚ãÖ‚áò_‚áô")
    and zero_str ("ùü¨‚áò_‚áô") and one_str ("ùü≠‚áò_‚áô")
    and ùîâ' and œÅ' and b' and add_str' ("+''‚áò_‚áô") and mult_str' ("‚ãÖ''‚áò_‚áô")
    and zero_str' ("ùü¨''‚áò_‚áô") and one_str' ("ùü≠''‚áò_‚áô") +
  fixes fam_morphisms:: "'a set ‚áí ('b ‚áí 'c)"
  assumes is_ring_morphism: "‚ãÄU. is_open U ‚üπ ring_homomorphism (fam_morphisms U)
                                                                (ùîâ U) (+‚áòU‚áô) (‚ãÖ‚áòU‚áô) ùü¨‚áòU‚áô ùü≠‚áòU‚áô
                                                                (ùîâ' U) (+'‚áòU‚áô) (‚ãÖ'‚áòU‚áô) ùü¨'‚áòU‚áô ùü≠'‚áòU‚áô"
    and comm_diagrams: "‚ãÄU V. is_open U ‚üπ is_open V ‚üπ V ‚äÜ U ‚üπ
               (‚ãÄx. x ‚àà ùîâ U ‚üπ (œÅ' U V ‚àò fam_morphisms U) x = (fam_morphisms V ‚àò œÅ U V) x)"
begin

lemma fam_morphisms_are_maps:
  assumes "is_open U"
  shows "Set_Theory.map (fam_morphisms U) (ùîâ U) (ùîâ' U)"
  using assms is_ring_morphism by (simp add: ring_homomorphism_def)

end (* morphism_presheaves_of_rings *)

(* Identity presheaf *)
lemma (in presheaf_of_rings) id_is_mor_pr_rngs:
  shows "morphism_presheaves_of_rings S is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str (ŒªU. identity (ùîâ U))"
proof (intro morphism_presheaves_of_rings.intro morphism_presheaves_of_rings_axioms.intro)
  show "‚ãÄU. is_open U ‚üπ ring_homomorphism (identity (ùîâ U))
                                            (ùîâ U) (add_str U) (mult_str U) (zero_str U) (one_str U)
                                            (ùîâ U) (add_str U) (mult_str U) (zero_str U) (one_str U)"
    by (metis identity_map is_map_from_is_homomorphism is_ring_morphism restrict_ext restrict_on_source subset_eq)
  show "‚ãÄU V. ‚ü¶is_open U; is_open V; V ‚äÜ U‚üß
           ‚üπ (‚ãÄx. x ‚àà (ùîâ U) ‚üπ (œÅ U V ‚àò identity (ùîâ U)) x = (identity (ùîâ V) ‚àò œÅ U V) x)"
    using map.map_closed by (metis comp_apply is_map_from_is_homomorphism restrict_apply')
qed (use presheaf_of_rings_axioms in auto)

lemma comp_ring_morphisms:
  assumes "ring_homomorphism Œ∑ A addA multA zeroA oneA B addB multB zeroB oneB"
and "ring_homomorphism Œ∏ B addB multB zeroB oneB C addC multC zeroC oneC"
shows "ring_homomorphism (compose A Œ∏ Œ∑) A addA multA zeroA oneA C addC multC zeroC oneC"
  using comp_monoid_morphisms comp_group_morphisms assms
  by (metis monoid_homomorphism_def ring_homomorphism_def)

(* Composition of presheaves *)
 lemma comp_of_presheaves:
  assumes 1: "morphism_presheaves_of_rings X is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str ùîâ' œÅ' b' add_str' mult_str' zero_str' one_str' œÜ"
    and 2: "morphism_presheaves_of_rings X is_open ùîâ' œÅ' b' add_str' mult_str' zero_str' one_str' ùîâ'' œÅ'' b'' add_str'' mult_str'' zero_str'' one_str'' œÜ'"
  shows "morphism_presheaves_of_rings X is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str ùîâ'' œÅ'' b'' add_str'' mult_str'' zero_str'' one_str'' (ŒªU. (œÜ' U ‚àò œÜ U ‚Üì ùîâ U))"
proof (intro morphism_presheaves_of_rings.intro morphism_presheaves_of_rings_axioms.intro)
  show "ring_homomorphism (œÜ' U ‚àò œÜ U ‚Üì ùîâ U) (ùîâ U) (add_str U) (mult_str U) (zero_str U) (one_str U) (ùîâ'' U) (add_str'' U) (mult_str'' U) (zero_str'' U) (one_str'' U)"
    if "is_open U"
    for U :: "'a set"
    using that
    by (metis assms comp_ring_morphisms morphism_presheaves_of_rings.is_ring_morphism)
next
  show "‚ãÄx. x ‚àà (ùîâ U) ‚üπ (œÅ'' U V ‚àò (œÜ' U ‚àò œÜ U ‚Üì ùîâ U)) x = (œÜ' V ‚àò œÜ V ‚Üì ùîâ V ‚àò œÅ U V) x"
    if "is_open U" "is_open V" "V ‚äÜ U" for U V
    using that
    using morphism_presheaves_of_rings.comm_diagrams [OF 1]
    using morphism_presheaves_of_rings.comm_diagrams [OF 2]
    using presheaf_of_rings.is_map_from_is_homomorphism [OF morphism_presheaves_of_rings.axioms(1) [OF 1]]
    by (metis "1" comp_apply compose_eq map.map_closed morphism_presheaves_of_rings.fam_morphisms_are_maps)
qed (use assms in ‚Äπauto simp: morphism_presheaves_of_rings_def‚Ä∫)

locale iso_presheaves_of_rings = mor:morphism_presheaves_of_rings
+ assumes is_inv:
"‚àÉœà. morphism_presheaves_of_rings X is_open ùîâ' œÅ' b' add_str' mult_str' zero_str' one_str' ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str œà
‚àß (‚àÄU. is_open U ‚ü∂ (‚àÄx ‚àà (ùîâ' U). (fam_morphisms U ‚àò œà U) x = x) ‚àß (‚àÄx ‚àà (ùîâ U). (œà U ‚àò fam_morphisms U) x = x))"


subsection ‚ÄπSheaves of Rings‚Ä∫

(* def 0.19 *)
locale sheaf_of_rings = presheaf_of_rings +
  assumes locality: "‚ãÄU I V s. open_cover_of_open_subset S is_open U I V ‚üπ (‚ãÄi. i‚ààI ‚üπ V i ‚äÜ U) ‚üπ
s ‚àà ùîâ U ‚üπ (‚ãÄi. i‚ààI ‚üπ œÅ U (V i) s = ùü¨‚áò(V i)‚áô) ‚üπ s = ùü¨‚áòU‚áô"
and
glueing: "‚ãÄU I V s. open_cover_of_open_subset S is_open U I V ‚üπ (‚àÄi. i‚ààI ‚ü∂ V i ‚äÜ U ‚àß s i ‚àà ùîâ (V i)) ‚üπ
(‚ãÄi j. i‚ààI ‚üπ j‚ààI ‚üπ œÅ (V i) (V i ‚à© V j) (s i) = œÅ (V j) (V i ‚à© V j) (s j)) ‚üπ
(‚àÉt. t ‚àà ùîâ U ‚àß (‚àÄi. i‚ààI ‚ü∂ œÅ U (V i) t = s i))"

(* def. 0.20 *)
locale morphism_sheaves_of_rings = morphism_presheaves_of_rings

locale iso_sheaves_of_rings = iso_presheaves_of_rings

(* ex. 0.21 *)
locale ind_sheaf = sheaf_of_rings +
  fixes U:: "'a set"
  assumes is_open_subset: "is_open U"
begin

interpretation it: ind_topology S is_open U
  by (simp add: ind_topology.intro ind_topology_axioms.intro is_open_subset open_imp_subset topological_space_axioms)

definition ind_sheaf:: "'a set ‚áí 'b set"
  where "ind_sheaf V ‚â° ùîâ (U ‚à© V)"

definition ind_ring_morphisms:: "'a set ‚áí 'a set ‚áí ('b ‚áí 'b)"
  where "ind_ring_morphisms V W ‚â° œÅ (U ‚à© V) (U ‚à© W)"

definition ind_add_str:: "'a set ‚áí ('b ‚áí 'b ‚áí 'b)"
  where "ind_add_str V ‚â° Œªx y. +‚áò(U ‚à© V)‚áô x y"

definition ind_mult_str:: "'a set ‚áí ('b ‚áí 'b ‚áí 'b)"
  where "ind_mult_str V ‚â° Œªx y. ‚ãÖ‚áò(U ‚à© V)‚áô x y"

definition ind_zero_str:: "'a set ‚áí 'b"
  where "ind_zero_str V ‚â° ùü¨‚áò(U‚à©V)‚áô"

definition ind_one_str:: "'a set ‚áí 'b"
  where "ind_one_str V ‚â° ùü≠‚áò(U‚à©V)‚áô"

lemma ind_is_open_imp_ring:
  "‚ãÄU. it.ind_is_open U
   ‚üπ ring (ind_sheaf U) (ind_add_str U) (ind_mult_str U) (ind_zero_str U) (ind_one_str U)"
    using ind_add_str_def it.ind_is_open_def ind_mult_str_def ind_one_str_def ind_sheaf_def ind_zero_str_def is_open_subset is_ring_from_is_homomorphism it.is_subset open_inter by force

lemma ind_sheaf_is_presheaf:
  shows "presheaf_of_rings U (it.ind_is_open) ind_sheaf ind_ring_morphisms b
ind_add_str ind_mult_str ind_zero_str ind_one_str"
proof -
  have "topological_space U it.ind_is_open" by (simp add: it.ind_space_is_top_space)
  moreover have "ring_homomorphism (ind_ring_morphisms W V)
                     (ind_sheaf W) (ind_add_str W) (ind_mult_str W) (ind_zero_str W) (ind_one_str W)
                     (ind_sheaf V) (ind_add_str V) (ind_mult_str V) (ind_zero_str V) (ind_one_str V)"
    if "it.ind_is_open W" "it.ind_is_open V" "V ‚äÜ W" for W V
  proof (intro ring_homomorphism.intro ind_is_open_imp_ring)
    show "Set_Theory.map (ind_ring_morphisms W V) (ind_sheaf W) (ind_sheaf V)"
      by (metis that it.ind_is_open_def ind_ring_morphisms_def ind_sheaf_def inf.left_idem is_open_subset is_ring_morphism open_inter ring_homomorphism_def)
    from that
    obtain o: "is_open (U ‚à© V)" "is_open (U ‚à© W)" "U ‚à© V ‚äÜ U ‚à© W"
      by (metis (no_types) it.ind_is_open_def inf.absorb_iff2 is_open_subset open_inter)
    then show "group_homomorphism (ind_ring_morphisms W V) (ind_sheaf W) (ind_add_str W) (ind_zero_str W) (ind_sheaf V) (ind_add_str V) (ind_zero_str V)"
      by (metis ind_sheaf.ind_add_str_def ind_sheaf_axioms ind_ring_morphisms_def ind_sheaf_def ind_zero_str_def is_ring_morphism ring_homomorphism.axioms(4))
    show "monoid_homomorphism (ind_ring_morphisms W V) (ind_sheaf W) (ind_mult_str W) (ind_one_str W) (ind_sheaf V) (ind_mult_str V) (ind_one_str V)"
      using o by (metis ind_mult_str_def ind_one_str_def ind_ring_morphisms_def ind_sheaf_def is_ring_morphism ring_homomorphism_def)
  qed (use that in auto)
  moreover have "ind_sheaf {} = {b}"
    by (simp add: ring_of_empty ind_sheaf_def)
  moreover have "‚ãÄU. it.ind_is_open U ‚üπ (‚ãÄx. x ‚àà (ind_sheaf U) ‚üπ ind_ring_morphisms U U x = x)"
    by (simp add: Int_absorb1 it.ind_is_open_def ind_ring_morphisms_def ind_sheaf_def it.is_open_from_ind_is_open is_open_subset)
  moreover have "‚ãÄU V W. it.ind_is_open U ‚üπ it.ind_is_open V ‚üπ it.ind_is_open W ‚üπ V ‚äÜ U ‚üπ W ‚äÜ V
             ‚üπ (‚ãÄx. x ‚àà (ind_sheaf U) ‚üπ ind_ring_morphisms U W x = (ind_ring_morphisms V W ‚àò ind_ring_morphisms U V) x)"
    by (metis Int_absorb1 assoc_comp it.ind_is_open_def ind_ring_morphisms_def ind_sheaf_def it.is_open_from_ind_is_open is_open_subset)
  ultimately show ?thesis
    unfolding presheaf_of_rings_def presheaf_of_rings_axioms_def by blast
qed

lemma ind_sheaf_is_sheaf:
  shows "sheaf_of_rings U it.ind_is_open ind_sheaf ind_ring_morphisms b ind_add_str ind_mult_str ind_zero_str ind_one_str"
proof (intro sheaf_of_rings.intro sheaf_of_rings_axioms.intro)
  show "presheaf_of_rings U it.ind_is_open ind_sheaf ind_ring_morphisms b ind_add_str ind_mult_str ind_zero_str ind_one_str"
    using ind_sheaf_is_presheaf by blast
next
  fix V I W s
  assume oc: "open_cover_of_open_subset U it.ind_is_open V I W"
    and WV: "‚ãÄi. i ‚àà I ‚üπ W i ‚äÜ V"
    and s: "s ‚àà ind_sheaf V"
    and eq: "‚ãÄi. i ‚àà I ‚üπ ind_ring_morphisms V (W i) s = ind_zero_str (W i)"
  have "it.ind_is_open V"
    using oc open_cover_of_open_subset.is_open_subset by blast
  then have "s ‚àà ùîâ V"
    by (metis ind_sheaf.ind_sheaf_def ind_sheaf_axioms it.ind_is_open_def inf.absorb2 s)
  then have "s = ùü¨‚áòV‚áô"
    by (metis Int_absorb1 Int_subset_iff WV ind_sheaf.ind_zero_str_def ind_sheaf_axioms eq it.ind_is_open_def ind_ring_morphisms_def is_open_subset locality oc it.open_cover_from_ind_open_cover open_cover_of_open_subset.is_open_subset)
  then show "s = ind_zero_str V"
    by (metis Int_absorb1 it.ind_is_open_def ind_zero_str_def oc open_cover_of_open_subset.is_open_subset)
next
  fix V I W s
  assume oc: "open_cover_of_open_subset U it.ind_is_open V I W"
    and WV: "‚àÄi. i ‚àà I ‚ü∂ W i ‚äÜ V ‚àß s i ‚àà ind_sheaf (W i)"
    and eq: "‚ãÄi j. ‚ü¶i ‚àà I; j ‚àà I‚üß ‚üπ ind_ring_morphisms (W i) (W i ‚à© W j) (s i) = ind_ring_morphisms (W j) (W i ‚à© W j) (s j)"
  have "is_open V"
    using it.is_open_from_ind_is_open is_open_subset oc open_cover_of_open_subset.is_open_subset by blast
  moreover have "open_cover_of_open_subset S is_open V I W"
    using it.open_cover_from_ind_open_cover oc ind_topology.intro ind_topology_axioms_def is_open_subset it.is_subset topological_space_axioms by blast
  moreover have "œÅ (W i) (W i ‚à© W j) (s i) = œÅ (W j) (W i ‚à© W j) (s j)"
    if "i‚ààI" "j‚ààI" for i j
  proof -
    have "U ‚à© W i = W i" and "U ‚à© W j = W j"
      by (metis Int_absorb1 WV it.ind_is_open_def oc open_cover_of_open_subset.is_open_subset
            subset_trans that)+
    then show ?thesis
      using eq[unfolded ind_ring_morphisms_def,OF that] by (metis inf_sup_aci(2))
  qed
  moreover have "‚àÄi. i‚ààI ‚ü∂ W i ‚äÜ V ‚àß s i ‚àà ùîâ (W i)"
    by (metis WV it.ind_is_open_def ind_sheaf_def inf.orderE inf_idem inf_aci(3) oc open_cover_of_open_subset.is_open_subset)
  ultimately
  obtain t where "t ‚àà (ùîâ V) ‚àß (‚àÄi. i‚ààI ‚ü∂ œÅ V (W i) t = s i)"
    using glueing by blast
  then have "t ‚àà ind_sheaf V"
    unfolding ind_sheaf_def using oc
    by (metis Int_absorb1 cover_of_subset_def open_cover_of_open_subset_def open_cover_of_subset_def)
  moreover have "‚àÄi. i‚ààI ‚ü∂ ind_ring_morphisms V (W i) t = s i"
    unfolding ind_ring_morphisms_def
    by (metis oc Int_absorb1 ‚Äπt ‚àà ùîâ V ‚àß (‚àÄi. i ‚àà I ‚ü∂ œÅ V (W i) t = s i)‚Ä∫ cover_of_subset_def open_cover_of_open_subset_def open_cover_of_subset_def)
  ultimately show "‚àÉt. t ‚àà (ind_sheaf V) ‚àß (‚àÄi. i‚ààI ‚ü∂ ind_ring_morphisms V (W i) t = s i)" by blast
qed

end (* ind_sheaf *)

(* construction 0.22 *)
locale im_sheaf = sheaf_of_rings + continuous_map
begin

(* def 0.24 *)
definition im_sheaf:: "'c set => 'b set"
  where "im_sheaf V ‚â° ùîâ (f‚áß¬Ø S V)"

definition im_sheaf_morphisms:: "'c set ‚áí 'c set ‚áí ('b ‚áí 'b)"
  where "im_sheaf_morphisms U V ‚â° œÅ (f‚áß¬Ø S U) (f‚áß¬Ø S V)"

definition add_im_sheaf:: "'c set ‚áí 'b ‚áí 'b ‚áí 'b"
  where "add_im_sheaf ‚â° ŒªV x y. +‚áò(f‚áß¬Ø S V)‚áô x y"

definition mult_im_sheaf:: "'c set ‚áí 'b ‚áí 'b ‚áí 'b"
  where "mult_im_sheaf ‚â° ŒªV x y. ‚ãÖ‚áò(f‚áß¬Ø S V)‚áô x y"

definition zero_im_sheaf:: "'c set ‚áí 'b"
  where "zero_im_sheaf ‚â° ŒªV. ùü¨‚áò(f‚áß¬Ø S V)‚áô"

definition one_im_sheaf:: "'c set ‚áí 'b"
  where "one_im_sheaf ‚â° ŒªV. ùü≠‚áò(f‚áß¬Ø S V)‚áô"

lemma im_sheaf_is_presheaf:
  "presheaf_of_rings S' (is_open') im_sheaf im_sheaf_morphisms b
add_im_sheaf mult_im_sheaf zero_im_sheaf one_im_sheaf"
proof (intro presheaf_of_rings.intro presheaf_of_rings_axioms.intro)
  show "topological_space S' is_open'"
    by (simp add: target.topological_space_axioms)
  show "‚ãÄU V. ‚ü¶is_open' U; is_open' V; V ‚äÜ U‚üß
           ‚üπ ring_homomorphism (im_sheaf_morphisms U V)
(im_sheaf U) (add_im_sheaf U) (mult_im_sheaf U) (zero_im_sheaf U) (one_im_sheaf U)
(im_sheaf V) (add_im_sheaf V) (mult_im_sheaf V) (zero_im_sheaf V) (one_im_sheaf V)"
    unfolding add_im_sheaf_def mult_im_sheaf_def zero_im_sheaf_def one_im_sheaf_def
    by (metis Int_commute Int_mono im_sheaf_def im_sheaf_morphisms_def is_continuous is_ring_morphism subset_refl vimage_mono)
  show "im_sheaf {} = {b}" using im_sheaf_def ring_of_empty by simp
  show "‚ãÄU. is_open' U ‚üπ (‚ãÄx. x ‚àà (im_sheaf U) ‚üπ im_sheaf_morphisms U U x = x)"
    using im_sheaf_morphisms_def by (simp add: im_sheaf_def is_continuous)
  show "‚ãÄU V W.
       ‚ü¶is_open' U; is_open' V; is_open' W; V ‚äÜ U; W ‚äÜ V‚üß
       ‚üπ (‚ãÄx. x ‚àà (im_sheaf U) ‚üπ im_sheaf_morphisms U W x = (im_sheaf_morphisms V W ‚àò im_sheaf_morphisms U V) x)"
    by (metis Int_mono assoc_comp im_sheaf_def im_sheaf_morphisms_def ind_topology.is_subset is_continuous ind_topology_is_open_self vimage_mono)
qed

(* ex 0.23 *)
lemma im_sheaf_is_sheaf:
  shows "sheaf_of_rings S' (is_open') im_sheaf im_sheaf_morphisms b
add_im_sheaf mult_im_sheaf zero_im_sheaf one_im_sheaf"
proof (intro sheaf_of_rings.intro sheaf_of_rings_axioms.intro)
  show "presheaf_of_rings S' is_open' im_sheaf im_sheaf_morphisms b
add_im_sheaf mult_im_sheaf zero_im_sheaf one_im_sheaf"
    using im_sheaf_is_presheaf by force
next
  fix U I V s
  assume oc: "open_cover_of_open_subset S' is_open' U I V"
    and VU: "‚ãÄi. i ‚àà I ‚üπ V i ‚äÜ U"
    and s: "s ‚àà im_sheaf U"
    and eq0: "‚ãÄi. i ‚àà I ‚üπ im_sheaf_morphisms U (V i) s =zero_im_sheaf (V i)"
  have "open_cover_of_open_subset S is_open (f‚áß¬Ø S U) I (Œªi. f‚áß¬Ø S (V i))"
    by (simp add: oc open_cover_of_open_subset_from_target_to_source)
  then show "s = zero_im_sheaf U" using zero_im_sheaf_def
    by (smt VU im_sheaf_def im_sheaf_morphisms_def eq0 inf.absorb_iff2 inf_le2 inf_sup_aci(1) inf_sup_aci(3) locality s vimage_Int)
next
  fix U I V s
  assume oc: "open_cover_of_open_subset S' is_open' U I V"
    and VU: "‚àÄi. i ‚àà I ‚ü∂ V i ‚äÜ U ‚àß s i ‚àà im_sheaf (V i)"
    and eq: "‚ãÄi j. ‚ü¶i ‚àà I; j ‚àà I‚üß ‚üπ im_sheaf_morphisms (V i) (V i ‚à© V j) (s i) = im_sheaf_morphisms (V j) (V i ‚à© V j) (s j)"
  have "‚àÉt. t ‚àà ùîâ (f  ‚áß¬Ø S U) ‚àß (‚àÄi. i ‚àà I ‚ü∂ œÅ (f  ‚áß¬Ø S U) (f  ‚áß¬Ø S (V i)) t = s i)"
  proof (rule glueing)
    show "open_cover_of_open_subset S is_open (f ‚áß¬Ø S U) I (Œªi. f ‚áß¬Ø S (V i))"
      using oc open_cover_of_open_subset_from_target_to_source by presburger
    show "‚àÄi. i ‚àà I ‚ü∂ f ‚áß¬Ø S (V i) ‚äÜ f ‚áß¬Ø S U ‚àß s i ‚àà ùîâ (f ‚áß¬Ø S (V i))"
      using VU im_sheaf_def by blast
    show "œÅ (f ‚áß¬Ø S (V i)) (f ‚áß¬Ø S (V i) ‚à© f ‚áß¬Ø S (V j)) (s i) = œÅ (f ‚áß¬Ø S (V j)) (f ‚áß¬Ø S (V i) ‚à© f ‚áß¬Ø S (V j)) (s j)"
      if "i ‚àà I" "j ‚àà I" for i j
      using im_sheaf_morphisms_def eq that
      by (smt Int_commute Int_left_commute inf.left_idem vimage_Int)
  qed
  then obtain t where "t ‚àà ùîâ (f‚áß¬Ø S U) ‚àß (‚àÄi. i‚ààI ‚ü∂ œÅ (f‚áß¬Ø S U) (f‚áß¬Ø S (V i)) t = s i)" ..
  then show "‚àÉt. t ‚àà im_sheaf U ‚àß (‚àÄi. i ‚àà I ‚ü∂ im_sheaf_morphisms U (V i) t = s i)"
    using im_sheaf_def im_sheaf_morphisms_def by auto
qed

sublocale sheaf_of_rings S' is_open' im_sheaf im_sheaf_morphisms b
    add_im_sheaf mult_im_sheaf zero_im_sheaf one_im_sheaf
  using im_sheaf_is_sheaf .

end (* im_sheaf *)

lemma (in sheaf_of_rings) id_to_iso_of_sheaves:
  shows "iso_sheaves_of_rings S is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str
            (im_sheaf.im_sheaf S ùîâ (identity S))
            (im_sheaf.im_sheaf_morphisms S œÅ (identity S))
            b
            (ŒªV. +‚áòidentity S ‚áß¬Ø S V‚áô) (ŒªV. ‚ãÖ‚áòidentity S ‚áß¬Ø S V‚áô) (ŒªV. ùü¨‚áòidentity S ‚áß¬Ø S V‚áô) (ŒªV. ùü≠‚áòidentity S ‚áß¬Ø S V‚áô) (ŒªU. identity (ùîâ U))"
    (is "iso_sheaves_of_rings S is_open ùîâ œÅ b _ _ _ _ _ _ b  ?add ?mult ?zero ?one ?F")
proof-
  have preq[simp]: "‚ãÄV. V ‚äÜ S ‚üπ (identity S ‚áß¬Ø S V) = V"
    by auto
  interpret id: im_sheaf S is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str S is_open "identity S"
    by intro_locales (auto simp add: Set_Theory.map_def continuous_map_axioms_def open_imp_subset)
  have 1[simp]: "‚ãÄV. V ‚äÜ S ‚üπ im_sheaf.im_sheaf S ùîâ (identity S) V = ùîâ V"
    by (simp add: id.im_sheaf_def)
  have 2[simp]: "‚ãÄU V. ‚ü¶U ‚äÜ S; V ‚äÜ S‚üß ‚üπ im_sheaf.im_sheaf_morphisms S œÅ (identity S) U V ‚â° œÅ U V"
    using id.im_sheaf_morphisms_def by auto
  show ?thesis
  proof intro_locales
    have rh: "‚ãÄU. is_open U ‚üπ
         ring_homomorphism (identity (ùîâ U)) (ùîâ U) +‚áòU‚áô ‚ãÖ‚áòU‚áô ùü¨‚áòU‚áô ùü≠‚áòU‚áô (ùîâ U) +‚áòU‚áô ‚ãÖ‚áòU‚áô ùü¨‚áòU‚áô ùü≠‚áòU‚áô"
      using id_is_mor_pr_rngs morphism_presheaves_of_rings.is_ring_morphism by fastforce
    show "morphism_presheaves_of_rings_axioms is_open ùîâ œÅ add_str mult_str zero_str one_str
           id.im_sheaf id.im_sheaf_morphisms ?add ?mult ?zero ?one ?F"
      unfolding morphism_presheaves_of_rings_axioms_def
      by (auto simp: rh open_imp_subset intro: is_map_from_is_homomorphism map.map_closed)
    have œÅ: "‚ãÄU V W x. ‚ü¶is_open U; is_open V; is_open W; V ‚äÜ U; W ‚äÜ V; x ‚àà ùîâ U‚üß ‚üπ œÅ V W (œÅ U V x) = œÅ U W x"
      by (metis assoc_comp comp_def)
    show "presheaf_of_rings_axioms is_open id.im_sheaf id.im_sheaf_morphisms b ?add ?mult ?zero ?one"
      by (auto simp: œÅ presheaf_of_rings_axioms_def is_ring_morphism open_imp_subset ring_of_empty)
    then have "presheaf_of_rings S is_open id.im_sheaf id.im_sheaf_morphisms b ?add ?mult ?zero ?one"
      by (metis id.im_sheaf_is_presheaf presheaf_of_rings_def)
    moreover
    have "morphism_presheaves_of_rings_axioms is_open
          id.im_sheaf id.im_sheaf_morphisms ?add ?mult ?zero ?one ùîâ œÅ add_str
          mult_str zero_str one_str (ŒªU. Œªx‚ààùîâ U. x)"
      unfolding morphism_presheaves_of_rings_axioms_def
      by (auto simp: rh open_imp_subset intro: is_map_from_is_homomorphism map.map_closed)
    ultimately
    show "iso_presheaves_of_rings_axioms S is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str
            id.im_sheaf id.im_sheaf_morphisms b ?add ?mult ?zero ?one ?F"
      by (auto simp: presheaf_of_rings_axioms iso_presheaves_of_rings_axioms_def morphism_presheaves_of_rings_def open_imp_subset)
  qed
qed


subsection ‚ÄπQuotient Ring‚Ä∫

(*Probably for Group_Theory*)
context group begin

lemma cancel_imp_equal:
  "‚ü¶ u ‚ãÖ inverse v = ùü≠;  u ‚àà G; v ‚àà G ‚üß ‚üπ u = v"
  by (metis invertible invertible_inverse_closed invertible_right_cancel invertible_right_inverse)

end

(*Probably for Ring_Theory*)
context ring begin

lemma inverse_distributive: "‚ü¶ a ‚àà R; b ‚àà R; c ‚àà R ‚üß ‚üπ a ‚ãÖ (b - c) = a ‚ãÖ b - a ‚ãÖ c"
    "‚ü¶ a ‚àà R; b ‚àà R; c ‚àà R ‚üß ‚üπ (b - c) ‚ãÖ a = b ‚ãÖ a - c ‚ãÖ a"
  using additive.invertible additive.invertible_inverse_closed distributive
        local.left_minus local.right_minus by presburger+

end

locale quotient_ring = comm:comm_ring R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" "ùü¨" "ùü≠" + submonoid S R "(‚ãÖ)" "ùü≠"
  for S and R and addition (infixl "+" 65) and multiplication (infixl "‚ãÖ" 70) and zero ("ùü¨") and
unit ("ùü≠")
begin

lemmas comm_ring_simps =
  comm.multiplicative.associative
  comm.additive.associative
  comm.comm_mult
  comm.additive.commutative
  right_minus

definition rel:: "('a √ó 'a) ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) ‚áí bool" (infix "‚àº" 80)
  where "x ‚àº y ‚â° ‚àÉs1. s1 ‚àà S ‚àß s1 ‚ãÖ (snd y ‚ãÖ fst x - snd x ‚ãÖ fst y) = ùü¨"

lemma rel_refl: "‚ãÄx. x ‚àà R √ó S ‚üπ x ‚àº x"
    by (auto simp: rel_def)

lemma rel_sym:
  assumes "x ‚àº y" "x ‚àà R √ó S" "y ‚àà R √ó S" shows "y ‚àº x"
proof -
  obtain rx sx ry sy s
    where ¬ß: "rx ‚àà R" "sx ‚àà S" "ry ‚àà R" "s ‚àà S" "sy ‚àà S" "s ‚ãÖ (sy ‚ãÖ rx - sx ‚ãÖ ry) = ùü¨" "x = (rx,sx)" "y = (ry,sy)"
    using assms by (auto simp: rel_def)
  then have "s ‚ãÖ (sx ‚ãÖ ry - sy ‚ãÖ rx) = ùü¨"
    by (metis sub comm.additive.cancel_imp_equal comm.inverse_distributive(1) comm.multiplicative.composition_closed)
  with ¬ß show ?thesis
    by (auto simp: rel_def)
qed

lemma rel_trans:
  assumes "x ‚àº y" "y ‚àº z" "x ‚àà R √ó S" "y ‚àà R √ó S" "z ‚àà R √ó S" shows "x ‚àº z"
  using assms
proof (clarsimp simp: rel_def)
  fix r s r2 s2 r1 s1 sx sy
  assume ¬ß: "r ‚àà R" "s ‚àà S" "r1 ‚àà R" "s1 ‚àà S" "sx ‚àà S" "r2 ‚àà R" "s2 ‚àà S" "sy ‚àà S"
    and sx0: "sx ‚ãÖ (s1 ‚ãÖ r2 - s2 ‚ãÖ r1) = ùü¨" and sy0: "sy ‚ãÖ (s2 ‚ãÖ r - s ‚ãÖ r2) = ùü¨"
  show "‚àÉu. u ‚àà S ‚àß u ‚ãÖ (s1 ‚ãÖ r - s ‚ãÖ r1) = ùü¨"
  proof (intro exI conjI)
    show "sx ‚ãÖ sy ‚ãÖ s1 ‚ãÖ s2 ‚àà S"
      using ¬ß by blast
    have sx: "sx ‚ãÖ s1 ‚ãÖ r2 = sx ‚ãÖ s2 ‚ãÖ r1" and sy: "sy ‚ãÖ s2 ‚ãÖ r = sy ‚ãÖ s ‚ãÖ r2"
      using sx0 sy0 ¬ß comm.additive.cancel_imp_equal comm.inverse_distributive(1)
        comm.multiplicative.associative comm.multiplicative.composition_closed sub
      by metis+
    then
    have "sx ‚ãÖ sy ‚ãÖ s1 ‚ãÖ s2 ‚ãÖ (s1 ‚ãÖ r - s ‚ãÖ r1) = sx ‚ãÖ sy ‚ãÖ s1 ‚ãÖ s2 ‚ãÖ s1 ‚ãÖ r - sx ‚ãÖ sy ‚ãÖ s1 ‚ãÖ s2 ‚ãÖ s ‚ãÖ r1"
      using "¬ß" ‚Äπsx ‚ãÖ sy ‚ãÖ s1 ‚ãÖ s2 ‚àà S‚Ä∫
        comm.inverse_distributive(1) comm.multiplicative.associative comm.multiplicative.composition_closed
        sub
      by presburger
    also have "... = sx ‚ãÖ sy ‚ãÖ s1 ‚ãÖ s ‚ãÖ s1 ‚ãÖ r2 - sx ‚ãÖ sy ‚ãÖ s1 ‚ãÖ s2 ‚ãÖ s ‚ãÖ r1"
      using ¬ß
      by (smt sy comm.comm_mult comm.multiplicative.associative comm.multiplicative.composition_closed sub)
    also have "... = sx ‚ãÖ sy ‚ãÖ s1 ‚ãÖ s ‚ãÖ s1 ‚ãÖ r2 - sx ‚ãÖ sy ‚ãÖ s1 ‚ãÖ s1 ‚ãÖ s ‚ãÖ r2"
      using ¬ß by (smt sx comm.comm_mult comm.multiplicative.associative
          comm.multiplicative.composition_closed sub)
    also have "... = ùü¨"
      using ¬ß by (simp add: comm.ring_mult_ac)
    finally show "sx ‚ãÖ sy ‚ãÖ s1 ‚ãÖ s2 ‚ãÖ (s1 ‚ãÖ r - s ‚ãÖ r1) = ùü¨" .
  qed
qed

interpretation rel: equivalence "R √ó S" "{(x,y) ‚àà (R√óS)√ó(R√óS). x ‚àº y}"
  by (blast intro: equivalence.intro rel_refl rel_sym rel_trans)


notation equivalence.Partition (infixl "'/" 75)

definition frac:: "'a ‚áí 'a ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set" (infixl "'/" 75)
  where "r / s ‚â° rel.Class (r, s)"

lemma frac_Pow:"(r, s) ‚àà R √ó S ‚üπ frac r s ‚àà Pow (R √ó S) "
  using local.frac_def rel.Class_closed2 by auto

lemma frac_eqI:
  assumes "s1‚ààS" and "(r, s) ‚àà R √ó S" "(r', s') ‚àà R √ó S"
     and eq:"s1 ‚ãÖ s' ‚ãÖ r = s1 ‚ãÖ s ‚ãÖ r'"
  shows "frac r s = frac r' s'"
  unfolding frac_def
proof (rule rel.Class_eq)
  have "s1 ‚ãÖ (s' ‚ãÖ r - s ‚ãÖ r') = ùü¨"
    using assms comm.inverse_distributive(1) comm.multiplicative.associative by auto
  with ‚Äπs1‚ààS‚Ä∫ have "(r, s) ‚àº (r', s')"
    unfolding rel_def by auto
  then show "((r, s), r', s') ‚àà {(x, y). (x, y) ‚àà (R √ó S) √ó R √ó S ‚àß x ‚àº y}"
    using assms(2,3) by auto
qed

lemma frac_eq_Ex:
  assumes "(r, s) ‚àà R √ó S" "(r', s') ‚àà R √ó S" "frac r s = frac r' s'"
  obtains s1 where "s1‚ààS" "s1 ‚ãÖ (s' ‚ãÖ r - s ‚ãÖ r') = ùü¨"
proof -
  have "(r, s) ‚àº (r', s')"
    using ‚Äπfrac r s = frac r' s'‚Ä∫ rel.Class_equivalence[OF assms(1,2)]
    unfolding frac_def by auto
  then show ?thesis unfolding rel_def
    by (metis fst_conv snd_conv that)
qed

lemma frac_cancel:
  assumes "s1‚ààS" and "(r, s) ‚àà R √ó S"
  shows "frac (s1‚ãÖr) (s1‚ãÖs) = frac r s"
  apply (rule frac_eqI[of ùü≠])
  using assms comm_ring_simps by auto

lemma frac_eq_obtains:
  assumes "(r,s) ‚àà R √ó S" and x_def:"x=(SOME x. x‚àà(frac r s))"
  obtains s1 where "s1‚ààS" "s1 ‚ãÖ s ‚ãÖ fst x = s1 ‚ãÖ snd x ‚ãÖ r" and "x ‚àà R √ó S"
proof -
  have "x‚àà(r/s)"
    unfolding x_def
    apply (rule someI[of _ "(r,s)"])
    using assms(1) local.frac_def by blast
  from rel.ClassD[OF this[unfolded frac_def] ‚Äπ(r,s) ‚àà R √ó S‚Ä∫]
  have x_RS:"x‚ààR √ó S" and "x ‚àº (r,s)" by auto
  from this(2) obtain s1 where "s1‚ààS" and "s1 ‚ãÖ (s ‚ãÖ fst x - snd x ‚ãÖ r) = ùü¨"
    unfolding rel_def by auto
  then have x_eq:"s1 ‚ãÖ s ‚ãÖ fst x = s1 ‚ãÖ snd x ‚ãÖ r"
    using comm.distributive x_RS assms(1)
    by (smt comm.additive.group_axioms group.cancel_imp_equal comm.inverse_distributive(1)
        mem_Sigma_iff comm.multiplicative.associative comm.multiplicative.composition_closed prod.collapse sub)
  then show ?thesis using that x_RS ‚Äπs1‚ààS‚Ä∫ by auto
qed

definition valid_frac::"('a √ó 'a) set ‚áí bool" where
  "valid_frac X ‚â° ‚àÉr‚ààR. ‚àÉs‚ààS. r / s = X"

lemma frac_non_empty[simp]:"(a,b) ‚àà R √ó S ‚üπ valid_frac (frac a b)"
  unfolding frac_def valid_frac_def by blast

definition add_rel_aux:: "'a ‚áí 'a ‚áí 'a ‚áí 'a ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set"
  where "add_rel_aux r s r' s' ‚â° (r‚ãÖs' + r'‚ãÖs) / (s‚ãÖs')"

definition add_rel:: "('a √ó 'a) set ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set"
  where "add_rel X Y ‚â°
  let x = (SOME x. x ‚àà X) in
  let y = (SOME y. y ‚àà Y) in
  add_rel_aux (fst x) (snd x) (fst y) (snd y)"

lemma add_rel_frac:
  assumes "(r,s) ‚àà R √ó S" "(r',s')‚àà R √ó S"
  shows "add_rel (r/s) (r'/s') = (r‚ãÖs' + r'‚ãÖs) / (s‚ãÖs')"
proof -
  define x where "x=(SOME x. x‚àà(r/s))"
  define y where "y=(SOME y. y‚àà(r'/s'))"

  obtain s1 where [simp]:"s1 ‚àà S" and x_eq:"s1 ‚ãÖ s ‚ãÖ fst x = s1 ‚ãÖ snd x ‚ãÖ r" and x_RS:"x ‚àà R √ó S"
    using frac_eq_obtains[OF ‚Äπ(r,s) ‚àà R √ó S‚Ä∫ x_def] by auto
  obtain s2 where [simp]:"s2 ‚àà S" and y_eq:"s2 ‚ãÖ s' ‚ãÖ fst y = s2 ‚ãÖ snd y ‚ãÖ r'" and y_RS:"y ‚àà R √ó S"
    using frac_eq_obtains[OF ‚Äπ(r',s') ‚àà R √ó S‚Ä∫ y_def] by auto

  have "add_rel (r/s) (r'/s') = (fst x ‚ãÖ snd y + fst y ‚ãÖ snd x) / (snd x ‚ãÖ snd y)"
    unfolding add_rel_def add_rel_aux_def x_def y_def Let_def by auto
  also have "... = (r‚ãÖs' + r'‚ãÖs) / (s‚ãÖs')"
  proof (rule frac_eqI[of "s1 ‚ãÖ s2"])
    have "snd y ‚ãÖ  s' ‚ãÖ s2 ‚ãÖ (s1 ‚ãÖ  s ‚ãÖ fst x)  = snd y ‚ãÖ s' ‚ãÖ s2 ‚ãÖ (s1 ‚ãÖ  snd x ‚ãÖ  r)"
      using x_eq by simp
    then have "s1 ‚ãÖ s2 ‚ãÖ s ‚ãÖ s' ‚ãÖ fst x ‚ãÖ snd y =  s1 ‚ãÖ s2 ‚ãÖ snd x ‚ãÖ snd y ‚ãÖ r ‚ãÖ s'"
      using comm.multiplicative.associative assms x_RS y_RS comm.comm_mult by auto
    moreover have "snd x ‚ãÖ s ‚ãÖs1 ‚ãÖ (s2 ‚ãÖ s' ‚ãÖ fst y) = snd x ‚ãÖ s ‚ãÖs1 ‚ãÖ (s2 ‚ãÖ snd y ‚ãÖ r')"
      using y_eq by simp
    then have "s1 ‚ãÖ s2 ‚ãÖ s ‚ãÖ s' ‚ãÖ fst y ‚ãÖ snd x = s1 ‚ãÖ s2 ‚ãÖ snd x ‚ãÖ snd y ‚ãÖ r' ‚ãÖ s"
      using comm.multiplicative.associative assms x_RS y_RS comm.comm_mult
      by auto
    ultimately show "s1 ‚ãÖ s2 ‚ãÖ (s ‚ãÖ s') ‚ãÖ (fst x ‚ãÖ snd y + fst y ‚ãÖ snd x)
        = s1 ‚ãÖ s2 ‚ãÖ (snd x ‚ãÖ snd y) ‚ãÖ (r ‚ãÖ s' + r' ‚ãÖ s)"
      using comm.multiplicative.associative assms x_RS y_RS comm.distributive
      by auto
    show "s1 ‚ãÖ s2 ‚àà S" "(fst x ‚ãÖ snd y + fst y ‚ãÖ snd x, snd x ‚ãÖ snd y) ‚àà R √ó S"
        "(r ‚ãÖ s' + r' ‚ãÖ s, s ‚ãÖ s') ‚àà R √ó S"
      using assms x_RS y_RS by auto
  qed
  finally show ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma valid_frac_add[intro,simp]:
  assumes "valid_frac X" "valid_frac Y"
  shows "valid_frac (add_rel X Y)"
proof -
  obtain r s r' s' where "r‚ààR" "s‚ààS" "r'‚ààR" "s'‚ààS"
      and *:"add_rel X Y = (r‚ãÖs' + r'‚ãÖs) / (s‚ãÖs')"
  proof -
    define x where "x=(SOME x. x‚ààX)"
    define y where "y=(SOME y. y‚ààY)"
    have "x‚ààX" "y‚ààY"
      using assms unfolding x_def y_def valid_frac_def some_in_eq local.frac_def
      by blast+
    then obtain "x ‚àà R √ó S" "y ‚àà R √ó S"
      using assms
      by (simp add: valid_frac_def x_def y_def) (metis frac_eq_obtains mem_Sigma_iff)
    moreover have "add_rel X Y = (fst x ‚ãÖ snd y + fst y ‚ãÖ snd x) / (snd x ‚ãÖ snd y)"
      unfolding add_rel_def add_rel_aux_def x_def y_def Let_def by auto
    ultimately show ?thesis using that by auto
  qed
  from this(1-4)
  have "(r‚ãÖs' + r'‚ãÖs,s‚ãÖs') ‚àà R √ó S"
    by auto
  with * show ?thesis by auto
qed

definition uminus_rel:: "('a √ó 'a) set ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set"
  where "uminus_rel X ‚â° let x = (SOME x. x ‚àà X) in (comm.additive.inverse (fst x) / snd x)"

lemma uminus_rel_frac:
  assumes "(r,s) ‚àà R √ó S"
  shows "uminus_rel (r/s) = (comm.additive.inverse r) / s"
proof -
  define x where "x=(SOME x. x‚àà(r/s))"

  obtain s1 where [simp]:"s1 ‚àà S" and x_eq:"s1 ‚ãÖ s ‚ãÖ fst x = s1 ‚ãÖ snd x ‚ãÖ r" and x_RS:"x ‚àà R √ó S"
    using frac_eq_obtains[OF ‚Äπ(r,s) ‚àà R √ó S‚Ä∫ x_def] by auto

  have "uminus_rel (r/s)= (comm.additive.inverse (fst x)) / (snd x )"
    unfolding uminus_rel_def x_def Let_def by auto
  also have "... = (comm.additive.inverse r) / s"
    apply (rule frac_eqI[of s1])
    using x_RS assms x_eq by (auto simp add: comm.right_minus)
  finally show ?thesis .
qed

lemma valid_frac_uminus[intro,simp]:
  assumes "valid_frac X"
  shows "valid_frac (uminus_rel X)"
proof -
  obtain r s where "r‚ààR" "s‚ààS"
      and *:"uminus_rel X = (comm.additive.inverse r) / s"
  proof -
    define x where "x=(SOME x. x‚ààX)"
    have "x‚ààX"
      using assms unfolding x_def valid_frac_def some_in_eq local.frac_def
      by blast
    then have "x‚àà R √ó S"
      using assms valid_frac_def
      by (metis frac_eq_obtains mem_Sigma_iff x_def)
    moreover have "uminus_rel X = (comm.additive.inverse (fst x) ) / (snd x)"
      unfolding uminus_rel_def x_def Let_def by auto
    ultimately show ?thesis using that by auto
  qed
  from this(1-3)
  have "(comm.additive.inverse r,s) ‚àà R √ó S" by auto
  with * show ?thesis by auto
qed

definition mult_rel_aux:: "'a ‚áí 'a ‚áí 'a ‚áí 'a ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set"
  where "mult_rel_aux r s r' s' ‚â° (r‚ãÖr') / (s‚ãÖs')"

definition mult_rel:: "('a √ó 'a) set ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set"
  where "mult_rel X Y ‚â°
  let x = (SOME x. x ‚àà X) in
  let y = (SOME y. y ‚àà Y) in
  mult_rel_aux (fst x) (snd x) (fst y) (snd y)"

lemma mult_rel_frac:
  assumes "(r,s) ‚àà R √ó S" "(r',s')‚àà R √ó S"
  shows "mult_rel (r/s) (r'/s') = (r‚ãÖ r') / (s‚ãÖs')"
proof -
   define x where "x=(SOME x. x‚àà(r/s))"
  define y where "y=(SOME y. y‚àà(r'/s'))"

  obtain s1 where [simp]:"s1 ‚àà S" and x_eq:"s1 ‚ãÖ s ‚ãÖ fst x = s1 ‚ãÖ snd x ‚ãÖ r" and x_RS:"x ‚àà R √ó S"
