    using frac_eq_obtains[OF ‚Äπ(r,s) ‚àà R √ó S‚Ä∫ x_def] by auto
  obtain s2 where [simp]:"s2 ‚àà S" and y_eq:"s2 ‚ãÖ s' ‚ãÖ fst y = s2 ‚ãÖ snd y ‚ãÖ r'" and y_RS:"y ‚àà R √ó S"
    using frac_eq_obtains[OF ‚Äπ(r',s') ‚àà R √ó S‚Ä∫ y_def] by auto

  have "mult_rel (r/s) (r'/s') = (fst x ‚ãÖ fst y ) / (snd x ‚ãÖ snd y)"
    unfolding mult_rel_def mult_rel_aux_def x_def y_def Let_def by auto
  also have "... = (r‚ãÖ r') / (s‚ãÖs')"
  proof (rule frac_eqI[of "s1 ‚ãÖ s2"])
    have "(s1 ‚ãÖ s ‚ãÖ fst x) ‚ãÖ (s2 ‚ãÖ s' ‚ãÖ fst y)  = (s1 ‚ãÖ snd x ‚ãÖ r) ‚ãÖ (s2 ‚ãÖ snd y ‚ãÖ r')"
      using x_eq y_eq by auto
    then show "s1 ‚ãÖ s2 ‚ãÖ (s ‚ãÖ s') ‚ãÖ (fst x ‚ãÖ fst y) = s1 ‚ãÖ s2 ‚ãÖ (snd x ‚ãÖ snd y) ‚ãÖ (r ‚ãÖ r')"
      using comm.multiplicative.associative assms x_RS y_RS comm.distributive comm.comm_mult by auto
    show "s1 ‚ãÖ s2 ‚àà S" "(fst x ‚ãÖ fst y, snd x ‚ãÖ snd y) ‚àà R √ó S"
        "(r ‚ãÖ r', s ‚ãÖ s') ‚àà R √ó S"
      using assms x_RS y_RS by auto
  qed
  finally show ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma valid_frac_mult[intro,simp]:
  assumes "valid_frac X" "valid_frac Y"
  shows "valid_frac (mult_rel X Y)"
proof -
  obtain r s r' s' where "r‚ààR" "s‚ààS" "r'‚ààR" "s'‚ààS"
      and *:"mult_rel X Y = (r‚ãÖ r') / (s‚ãÖs')"
  proof -
    define x where "x=(SOME x. x‚ààX)"
    define y where "y=(SOME y. y‚ààY)"
    have "x‚ààX" "y‚ààY"
      using assms unfolding x_def y_def valid_frac_def some_in_eq local.frac_def
      by blast+
    then obtain "x ‚àà R √ó S" "y ‚àà R √ó S"
      using assms
      by (simp add: valid_frac_def x_def y_def) (metis frac_eq_obtains mem_Sigma_iff)
    moreover have "mult_rel X Y = (fst x ‚ãÖ fst y) / (snd x ‚ãÖ snd y)"
      unfolding mult_rel_def mult_rel_aux_def x_def y_def Let_def by auto
    ultimately show ?thesis using that by auto
  qed
  from this(1-4)
  have "(r‚ãÖr',s‚ãÖs') ‚àà R √ó S"
    by auto
  with * show ?thesis by auto
qed

definition zero_rel::"('a √ó 'a) set" where
  "zero_rel = frac ùü¨ ùü≠"

definition one_rel::"('a √ó 'a) set" where
  "one_rel = frac ùü≠ ùü≠"

lemma valid_frac_zero[simp]:
  "valid_frac zero_rel"
  unfolding zero_rel_def valid_frac_def by blast

lemma valid_frac_one[simp]:
  "valid_frac one_rel"
  unfolding one_rel_def valid_frac_def by blast

definition carrier_quotient_ring:: "('a √ó 'a) set set"
  where "carrier_quotient_ring ‚â° rel.Partition"

lemma carrier_quotient_ring_iff[iff]: "X ‚àà carrier_quotient_ring ‚ü∑ valid_frac X "
  unfolding valid_frac_def carrier_quotient_ring_def
  using local.frac_def rel.natural.map_closed rel.representant_exists by fastforce

lemma frac_from_carrier:
  assumes "X ‚àà carrier_quotient_ring"
  obtains r s where "r ‚àà R" "s ‚àà S" "X = rel.Class (r,s)"
  using assms carrier_quotient_ring_def
  by (metis (no_types, lifting) SigmaE rel.representant_exists)

lemma add_minus_zero_rel:
  assumes "valid_frac a"
  shows "add_rel a (uminus_rel a) = zero_rel"
proof -
  obtain a1 a2 where a_RS:"(a1, a2)‚ààR √ó S" and a12:"a = a1 / a2 "
    using ‚Äπvalid_frac a‚Ä∫ unfolding valid_frac_def by auto
  have "add_rel a (uminus_rel a) =  ùü¨ / (a2 ‚ãÖ a2)"
    unfolding a12 using comm_ring_simps a_RS
    by (simp add:add_rel_frac uminus_rel_frac comm.right_minus)
  also have "... = ùü¨ / ùü≠"
    apply (rule frac_eqI[of ùü≠])
    using a_RS by auto
  also have "... = zero_rel" unfolding zero_rel_def ..
  finally show "add_rel a (uminus_rel a) = zero_rel" .
qed


(* ex. 0.26 *)
sublocale comm_ring carrier_quotient_ring add_rel mult_rel zero_rel one_rel
proof (unfold_locales; unfold carrier_quotient_ring_iff)
  show add_assoc:"add_rel (add_rel a b) c = add_rel a (add_rel b c)" and
       mult_assoc:"mult_rel (mult_rel a b) c = mult_rel a (mult_rel b c)" and
       distr:"mult_rel a (add_rel b c) = add_rel (mult_rel a b) (mult_rel a c)"
    if "valid_frac a" and "valid_frac b" and "valid_frac c" for a b c
  proof -
    obtain a1 a2 where a_RS:"(a1, a2)‚ààR √ó S" and a12:"a = a1 / a2 "
      using ‚Äπvalid_frac a‚Ä∫ unfolding valid_frac_def by auto
    obtain b1 b2 where b_RS:"(b1, b2)‚ààR √ó S" and b12:"b = b1 / b2 "
      using ‚Äπvalid_frac b‚Ä∫ unfolding valid_frac_def by auto
    obtain c1 c2 where c_RS:"(c1, c2)‚ààR √ó S" and c12:"c = c1 / c2"
      using ‚Äπvalid_frac c‚Ä∫ unfolding valid_frac_def by auto

    have "add_rel (add_rel a b) c = add_rel (add_rel (a1/a2) (b1/b2)) (c1/c2)"
      using a12 b12 c12 by auto
    also have "... = ((a1 ‚ãÖ b2 + b1 ‚ãÖ a2) ‚ãÖ c2 + c1 ‚ãÖ (a2 ‚ãÖ b2)) / (a2 ‚ãÖ b2 ‚ãÖ c2)"
      using a_RS b_RS c_RS by (simp add:add_rel_frac)
    also have "... = add_rel (a1/a2) (add_rel (b1/b2) (c1/c2))"
      using a_RS b_RS c_RS comm.distributive comm_ring_simps
      by (auto simp add:add_rel_frac)
    also have "... = add_rel a (add_rel b c)"
      using a12 b12 c12 by auto
    finally show "add_rel (add_rel a b) c = add_rel a (add_rel b c)" .

    show "mult_rel (mult_rel a b) c = mult_rel a (mult_rel b c)"
      unfolding a12 b12 c12 using comm_ring_simps a_RS b_RS c_RS
      by (auto simp add:mult_rel_frac)

    have "mult_rel a (add_rel b c) = (a1 ‚ãÖ (b1 ‚ãÖ c2 + c1 ‚ãÖ b2)) / (a2 ‚ãÖ (b2 ‚ãÖ c2))"
      unfolding a12 b12 c12 using a_RS b_RS c_RS
      by (simp add:mult_rel_frac add_rel_frac)
    also have "... = (a2 ‚ãÖ (a1 ‚ãÖ (b1 ‚ãÖ c2 + c1 ‚ãÖ b2))) / (a2 ‚ãÖ (a2 ‚ãÖ (b2 ‚ãÖ c2)))"
      using a_RS b_RS c_RS by (simp add:frac_cancel)
    also have "... = add_rel (mult_rel a b) (mult_rel a c)"
      unfolding a12 b12 c12 using comm_ring_simps a_RS b_RS c_RS comm.distributive
      by (auto simp add:mult_rel_frac add_rel_frac)
    finally show "mult_rel a (add_rel b c) = add_rel (mult_rel a b) (mult_rel a c)"
      .
  qed
  show add_0:"add_rel zero_rel a = a"
      and mult_1:"mult_rel one_rel a = a"
     if "valid_frac a" for a
  proof -
    obtain a1 a2 where a_RS:"(a1, a2)‚ààR √ó S" and a12:"a = a1 / a2 "
      using ‚Äπvalid_frac a‚Ä∫ unfolding valid_frac_def by auto
    have "add_rel zero_rel a = add_rel zero_rel (a1/a2)"
      using a12 by simp
    also have "... = (a1/a2)"
      using a_RS comm_ring_simps comm.distributive zero_rel_def
      by (auto simp add:add_rel_frac)
    also have "... = a"
      using a12 by auto
    finally show "add_rel zero_rel a = a" .
    show "mult_rel one_rel a = a"
      unfolding a12 one_rel_def using a_RS by (auto simp add:mult_rel_frac)
  qed
  show add_commute:"add_rel a b = add_rel b a"
    and mult_commute:"mult_rel a b = mult_rel b a"
    if "valid_frac a" and "valid_frac b" for a b
  proof -
    obtain a1 a2 where a_RS:"(a1, a2)‚ààR √ó S" and a12:"a = a1 / a2 "
      using ‚Äπvalid_frac a‚Ä∫ unfolding valid_frac_def by auto
    obtain b1 b2 where b_RS:"(b1, b2)‚ààR √ó S" and b12:"b = b1 / b2 "
      using ‚Äπvalid_frac b‚Ä∫ unfolding valid_frac_def by auto

    show "add_rel a b = add_rel b a" "mult_rel a b = mult_rel b a"
      unfolding a12 b12  using comm_ring_simps a_RS b_RS
      by (auto simp add:mult_rel_frac add_rel_frac)
  qed
  show "add_rel a zero_rel = a" if "valid_frac a" for a
    using that add_0 add_commute by auto
  show "mult_rel a one_rel = a" if "valid_frac a" for a
    using that mult_commute mult_1 by auto
  show "monoid.invertible carrier_quotient_ring add_rel zero_rel a"
    if "valid_frac a" for a
  proof -
    have "Group_Theory.monoid carrier_quotient_ring add_rel zero_rel"
      apply (unfold_locales)
      using add_0 add_assoc add_commute by simp_all
    moreover have "add_rel a (uminus_rel a) = zero_rel" "add_rel (uminus_rel a) a = zero_rel"
      using add_minus_zero_rel add_commute that by auto
    ultimately show "monoid.invertible carrier_quotient_ring add_rel zero_rel a"
      unfolding monoid.invertible_def
      apply (rule monoid.invertibleI)
      using add_commute ‚Äπvalid_frac a‚Ä∫ by auto
  qed
  show "mult_rel (add_rel b c) a = add_rel (mult_rel b a) (mult_rel c a)"
    if "valid_frac a" and "valid_frac b" and "valid_frac c" for a b c
    using that mult_commute add_commute distr by (simp add: valid_frac_add)
qed auto

end (* quotient_ring *)

notation quotient_ring.carrier_quotient_ring
           ("(_ ‚áß¬Ø _/ ‚áò(2_ _ _))‚áô" [60,1000,1000,1000,1000]1000)


subsection ‚ÄπLocal Rings at Prime Ideals‚Ä∫

context pr_ideal
begin

lemma submonoid_pr_ideal:
  shows "submonoid (R ‚àñ I) R (‚ãÖ) ùü≠"
proof
  show "a ‚ãÖ b ‚àà R‚àñI" if "a ‚àà R‚àñI" "b ‚àà R‚àñI" for a b
    using that by (metis Diff_iff absorbent comm.multiplicative.composition_closed)
  show "ùü≠ ‚àà R‚àñI"
    using ideal.ideal(2) ideal_axioms pr_ideal.carrier_neq pr_ideal_axioms by fastforce
qed auto

interpretation local:quotient_ring "(R ‚àñ I)" R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠
  apply intro_locales
  by (meson submonoid_def submonoid_pr_ideal)

(* definition 0.28 *)
definition carrier_local_ring_at:: "('a √ó 'a) set set"
  where "carrier_local_ring_at ‚â° (R ‚àñ I)‚áß¬Ø R‚áò(+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô"

definition add_local_ring_at:: "('a √ó 'a) set ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set"
  where "add_local_ring_at ‚â° local.add_rel "

definition mult_local_ring_at:: "('a √ó 'a) set ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set"
  where "mult_local_ring_at ‚â° local.mult_rel "

definition uminus_local_ring_at:: "('a √ó 'a) set ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set"
  where "uminus_local_ring_at ‚â° local.uminus_rel "

definition zero_local_ring_at:: "('a √ó 'a) set"
  where "zero_local_ring_at ‚â° local.zero_rel"

definition one_local_ring_at:: "('a √ó 'a) set"
  where "one_local_ring_at ‚â° local.one_rel"

sublocale comm_ring carrier_local_ring_at add_local_ring_at mult_local_ring_at
            zero_local_ring_at one_local_ring_at
  by (simp add: add_local_ring_at_def carrier_local_ring_at_def local.local.comm_ring_axioms
      mult_local_ring_at_def one_local_ring_at_def zero_local_ring_at_def)


lemma frac_from_carrier_local:
  assumes "X ‚àà carrier_local_ring_at"
  obtains r s where "r ‚àà R" "s ‚àà R" "s ‚àâ I" "X = local.frac r s"
proof-
  have "X ‚àà (R ‚àñ I)‚áß¬Ø R‚áò(+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô" using assms by (simp add: carrier_local_ring_at_def)
  then have "X ‚àà quotient_ring.carrier_quotient_ring (R ‚àñ I) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨" by blast
  then obtain r s where "r ‚àà R" "s ‚àà (R ‚àñ I)" "X = local.frac r s"
    using local.frac_from_carrier by (metis local.frac_def)
  thus thesis using that by blast
qed

lemma eq_from_eq_frac:
  assumes "local.frac r s = local.frac r' s'"
    and "s ‚àà (R ‚àñ I)" and "s' ‚àà (R ‚àñ I)" and "r ‚àà R" "r' ‚àà R"
  obtains h where "h ‚àà (R ‚àñ I)" "h ‚ãÖ (s' ‚ãÖ r - s ‚ãÖ r') = ùü¨"
    using local.frac_eq_Ex[of r s r' s'] assms by blast

end (* pr_ideal *)

abbreviation carrier_of_local_ring_at::
"'a set ‚áí 'a set ‚áí ('a ‚áí 'a ‚áí 'a) ‚áí ('a ‚áí 'a ‚áí 'a) ‚áí 'a ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set set" ("_ ‚áò_ _ _ _‚áô")
where "R ‚áòI add mult zero‚áô ‚â° pr_ideal.carrier_local_ring_at R I add mult zero"


subsection ‚ÄπSpectrum of a Ring‚Ä∫

(* construction 0.29 *)
context comm_ring
begin

interpretation zariski_top_space: topological_space Spec is_zariski_open
  unfolding is_zariski_open_def using generated_topology_is_topology
  by blast

lemma spectrum_imp_cxt_quotient_ring:
  "ùî≠ ‚àà Spec ‚üπ quotient_ring (R ‚àñ ùî≠) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠"
  apply (intro_locales)
  using pr_ideal.submonoid_pr_ideal spectrum_def submonoid_def by fastforce

lemma spectrum_imp_pr:
  "ùî≠ ‚àà Spec ‚üπ pr_ideal R ùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠"
  unfolding spectrum_def by auto

lemma frac_in_carrier_local:
  assumes "ùî≠ ‚àà Spec" and "r ‚àà R" and "s ‚àà R" and "s ‚àâ ùî≠"
  shows "(quotient_ring.frac (R ‚àñ ùî≠) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ r s) ‚àà R‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô"
proof -
  interpret qr:quotient_ring "R ‚àñ ùî≠" R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠
    using spectrum_imp_cxt_quotient_ring[OF ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà Spec‚Ä∫] .
  interpret pi:pr_ideal R ùî≠ "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠
    using spectrum_imp_pr[OF ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà Spec‚Ä∫] .
  show ?thesis unfolding pi.carrier_local_ring_at_def
    using assms(2-) by (auto intro:qr.frac_non_empty)
qed

definition is_locally_frac:: "('a set ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set) ‚áí 'a set set ‚áí bool"
  where "is_locally_frac s V ‚â° (‚àÉr f. r ‚àà R ‚àß f ‚àà R ‚àß (‚àÄùîÆ ‚àà V. f ‚àâ ùîÆ ‚àß
            s ùîÆ = quotient_ring.frac (R ‚àñ ùîÆ) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ r f))"

lemma is_locally_frac_subset:
  assumes "is_locally_frac s U" "V ‚äÜ U"
  shows "is_locally_frac s V"
  using assms unfolding is_locally_frac_def
  by (meson subsetD)

lemma is_locally_frac_cong:
  assumes "‚ãÄx. x‚ààU ‚üπ f x=g x"
  shows "is_locally_frac f U = is_locally_frac g U"
  unfolding is_locally_frac_def using assms by simp

definition is_regular:: "('a set ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set) ‚áí 'a set set ‚áí bool"
  where "is_regular s U ‚â°
‚àÄùî≠. ùî≠ ‚àà U ‚ü∂ (‚àÉV. is_zariski_open V ‚àß V ‚äÜ U ‚àß ùî≠ ‚àà V ‚àß (is_locally_frac s V))"

lemma map_on_empty_is_regular:
  fixes s:: "'a set ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set"
  shows "is_regular s {}"
  by (simp add: is_regular_def)

lemma cring0_is_regular [simp]: "cring0.is_regular x = (ŒªU. U={})"
  unfolding cring0.is_regular_def cring0_is_zariski_open
  by blast

definition sheaf_spec:: "'a set set ‚áí ('a set ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set) set" ("ùí™ _" [90]90)
  where "ùí™ U ‚â° {s‚àà(Œ†‚á©E ùî≠‚ààU. (R‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô)). is_regular s U}"

lemma cring0_sheaf_spec_empty [simp]: "cring0.sheaf_spec {} = {Œªx. undefined}"
  by (simp add: cring0.sheaf_spec_def)

lemma sec_has_right_codom:
  assumes "s ‚àà ùí™ U" and "ùî≠ ‚àà U"
  shows "s ùî≠ ‚àà (R‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô)"
using assms sheaf_spec_def by auto


lemma is_regular_has_right_codom:
  assumes "U ‚äÜ Spec" "ùî≠ ‚àà U" "is_regular s U"
  shows "s ùî≠ ‚àà R‚àñùî≠ ‚áß¬Ø R‚áò(+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô"
proof -
  interpret qr:quotient_ring "(R ‚àñ ùî≠)" R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠
    using spectrum_imp_cxt_quotient_ring assms by auto
  show ?thesis using assms
    by (smt frac_in_carrier_local is_locally_frac_def is_regular_def
          pr_ideal.carrier_local_ring_at_def spectrum_imp_pr subset_eq)
qed

lemma sec_is_extensional:
  assumes "s ‚àà ùí™ U"
  shows "s ‚àà extensional U"
  using assms sheaf_spec_def by (simp add: PiE_iff)

definition ùí™b::"'a set ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set"
  where "ùí™b = (Œªùî≠. undefined)"

lemma ùí™_on_emptyset: "ùí™ {} = {ùí™b}"
  unfolding sheaf_spec_def ùí™b_def
  by (auto simp:Set_Theory.map_def map_on_empty_is_regular)

lemma sheaf_spec_of_empty_is_singleton:
  fixes U:: "'a set set"
  assumes "U = {}" and "s ‚àà extensional U" and "t ‚àà extensional U"
  shows "s = t"
  using assms by (simp add: Set_Theory.map_def)

definition add_sheaf_spec:: "('a set) set ‚áí ('a set ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set) ‚áí ('a set ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set) ‚áí ('a set ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set)"
  where "add_sheaf_spec U s s' ‚â° Œªùî≠‚ààU. quotient_ring.add_rel (R ‚àñ ùî≠) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ (s ùî≠) (s' ùî≠)"

lemma is_regular_add_sheaf_spec:
  assumes "is_regular s U" and "is_regular s' U" and "U ‚äÜ Spec"
  shows "is_regular (add_sheaf_spec U s s') U"
proof -
  have "add_sheaf_spec U s s' ùî≠ ‚àà R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô" if "ùî≠ ‚àà U" for ùî≠
  proof -
    interpret pi: pr_ideal R ùî≠ "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠
      using ‚ÄπU ‚äÜ Spec‚Ä∫[unfolded spectrum_def] ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫ by blast
    have "s ùî≠ ‚àà pi.carrier_local_ring_at"
      "s' ùî≠ ‚àà pi.carrier_local_ring_at"
      using ‚Äπis_regular s U‚Ä∫ ‚Äπis_regular s' U‚Ä∫
      unfolding is_regular_def is_locally_frac_def using that
      using assms(3) frac_in_carrier_local by fastforce+
    then show ?thesis
      unfolding add_sheaf_spec_def using that
      by (simp flip:pi.add_local_ring_at_def)
  qed
  moreover have "(‚àÉV‚äÜU. is_zariski_open V ‚àß ùî≠ ‚àà V ‚àß is_locally_frac (add_sheaf_spec U s s') V)"
    if "ùî≠ ‚àà U" for ùî≠
  proof -
    obtain V1 r1 f1 where "V1 ‚äÜU" "is_zariski_open V1" "ùî≠ ‚àà V1" "r1 ‚àà R" "f1 ‚àà R" and
        q_V1:"(‚àÄùîÆ. ùîÆ ‚àà V1 ‚ü∂ f1 ‚àâ ùîÆ ‚àß s ùîÆ = quotient_ring.frac (R‚àñùîÆ) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ r1 f1)"
      using ‚Äπis_regular s U‚Ä∫[unfolded is_regular_def] ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫
      unfolding is_locally_frac_def by auto
    obtain V2 r2 f2 where "V2 ‚äÜU" "is_zariski_open V2" "ùî≠ ‚àà V2" "r2 ‚àà R" "f2 ‚àà R" and
        q_V2:"(‚àÄùîÆ. ùîÆ ‚àà V2 ‚ü∂ f2 ‚àâ ùîÆ ‚àß s' ùîÆ = quotient_ring.frac (R‚àñùîÆ) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ r2 f2)"
      using ‚Äπis_regular s' U‚Ä∫[unfolded is_regular_def]  ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫
      unfolding is_locally_frac_def by auto

    define V3 where "V3 = V1 ‚à© V2"
    define r3 where "r3 = r1 ‚ãÖ f2 + r2 ‚ãÖ f1 "
    define f3 where "f3 = f1 ‚ãÖ f2"
    have "V3 ‚äÜU" "ùî≠ ‚àà V3" "r3 ‚àà R" "f3 ‚àà R"
      unfolding V3_def r3_def f3_def
      using ‚ÄπV1 ‚äÜ U‚Ä∫ ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà V1‚Ä∫ ‚ÄπV2 ‚äÜ U‚Ä∫ ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà V2‚Ä∫ ‚Äπf1 ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπf2 ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr1 ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr2 ‚àà R‚Ä∫ by blast+
    moreover have "is_zariski_open V3" using ‚Äπis_zariski_open V1‚Ä∫ ‚Äπis_zariski_open V2‚Ä∫ topological_space.open_inter by (simp add: V3_def)
    moreover have "f3 ‚àâ ùîÆ"
        "add_sheaf_spec U s s' ùîÆ = quotient_ring.frac (R‚àñùîÆ) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ r3 f3"
        if "ùîÆ ‚àà V3" for ùîÆ
    proof -
      interpret q:quotient_ring "R‚àñùîÆ" R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨
        using ‚ÄπU ‚äÜ Spec‚Ä∫ ‚ÄπV3 ‚äÜ U‚Ä∫ ‚ÄπùîÆ ‚àà V3‚Ä∫ quotient_ring_def local.comm_ring_axioms
          pr_ideal.submonoid_pr_ideal spectrum_def
        by fastforce
      have "f1 ‚àâ ùîÆ" "s ùîÆ = q.frac r1 f1"
        using q_V1 ‚ÄπùîÆ ‚àà V3‚Ä∫  unfolding V3_def by auto
      have "f2 ‚àâ ùîÆ" "s' ùîÆ = q.frac r2 f2"
        using q_V2 ‚ÄπùîÆ ‚àà V3‚Ä∫  unfolding V3_def by auto

      have "q.add_rel (q.frac r1 f1) (q.frac r2 f2) = q.frac (r1 ‚ãÖ f2 + r2 ‚ãÖ f1) (f1 ‚ãÖ f2)"
        apply (rule q.add_rel_frac)
        subgoal by (simp add: ‚Äπf1 ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπf1 ‚àâ ùîÆ‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr1 ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr2 ‚àà R‚Ä∫)
        subgoal using ‚Äπf2 ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπf2 ‚àâ ùîÆ‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr2 ‚àà R‚Ä∫ by blast
        done
      then have "q.add_rel (s ùîÆ) (s' ùîÆ) = q.frac r3 f3"
        unfolding r3_def f3_def using ‚Äπs ùîÆ = q.frac r1 f1‚Ä∫ ‚Äπs' ùîÆ = q.frac r2 f2‚Ä∫
        by auto
      then show "add_sheaf_spec U s s' ùîÆ = q.frac r3 f3"
        unfolding add_sheaf_spec_def using ‚ÄπV3 ‚äÜ U‚Ä∫ ‚ÄπùîÆ ‚àà V3‚Ä∫ by auto
      show "f3 ‚àâ ùîÆ" using that unfolding V3_def f3_def
        using ‚Äπf1 ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπf1 ‚àâ ùîÆ‚Ä∫ ‚Äπf2 ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπf2 ‚àâ ùîÆ‚Ä∫ q.sub_composition_closed by auto
    qed
    ultimately show ?thesis using is_locally_frac_def by metis
  qed
  ultimately show ?thesis unfolding is_regular_def is_locally_frac_def by meson
qed

lemma add_sheaf_spec_in_sheaf_spec:
  assumes "s ‚àà ùí™ U" and "t ‚àà ùí™ U" and "U ‚äÜ Spec"
  shows "add_sheaf_spec U s t ‚àà ùí™ U"
proof -
  have "add_sheaf_spec U s t ùî≠ ‚àà R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô"
      if "ùî≠ ‚àà U" for ùî≠
  proof -
    interpret qr:quotient_ring "(R‚àñùî≠)" R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠
      apply (rule spectrum_imp_cxt_quotient_ring)
      using that ‚ÄπU ‚äÜ Spec‚Ä∫ by auto
    interpret pi:pr_ideal R ùî≠ "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠
      using that ‚ÄπU ‚äÜ Spec‚Ä∫ by (auto intro:spectrum_imp_pr)
    have "qr.valid_frac (s ùî≠)" "qr.valid_frac (t ùî≠)"
      using sec_has_right_codom[OF _ that] ‚Äπs ‚àà ùí™ U‚Ä∫ ‚Äπt ‚àà ùí™ U‚Ä∫
      by (auto simp:pi.carrier_local_ring_at_def)
    then show ?thesis
      using that unfolding add_sheaf_spec_def pi.carrier_local_ring_at_def
      by auto
  qed
  moreover have "is_regular (add_sheaf_spec U s t) U"
    using ‚Äπs ‚àà ùí™ U‚Ä∫ ‚Äπt ‚àà ùí™ U‚Ä∫ ‚ÄπU ‚äÜ Spec‚Ä∫ is_regular_add_sheaf_spec
    unfolding sheaf_spec_def by auto
  moreover have "add_sheaf_spec U s t ‚àà extensional U"
    unfolding add_sheaf_spec_def by auto
  ultimately show ?thesis
    unfolding sheaf_spec_def by (simp add: PiE_iff)
qed

definition mult_sheaf_spec:: "('a set) set ‚áí ('a set ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set) ‚áí ('a set ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set) ‚áí ('a set ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set)"
  where "mult_sheaf_spec U s s' ‚â° Œªùî≠‚ààU. quotient_ring.mult_rel (R ‚àñ ùî≠) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ (s ùî≠) (s' ùî≠)"

lemma is_regular_mult_sheaf_spec:
  assumes "is_regular s U" and "is_regular s' U" and "U ‚äÜ Spec"
  shows "is_regular (mult_sheaf_spec U s s') U"
proof -
  have "mult_sheaf_spec U s s' ùî≠ ‚àà R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô" if "ùî≠ ‚àà U" for ùî≠
  proof -
    interpret pi: pr_ideal R ùî≠ "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠
      using ‚ÄπU ‚äÜ Spec‚Ä∫[unfolded spectrum_def] ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫ by blast
    have "s ùî≠ ‚àà pi.carrier_local_ring_at"
      "s' ùî≠ ‚àà pi.carrier_local_ring_at"
      using ‚Äπis_regular s U‚Ä∫ ‚Äπis_regular s' U‚Ä∫
      unfolding is_regular_def using that
      using assms(3) frac_in_carrier_local in_mono is_locally_frac_def by fastforce+
    then show ?thesis
      unfolding mult_sheaf_spec_def using that
      by (simp flip:pi.mult_local_ring_at_def)
  qed
  moreover have "(‚àÉV‚äÜU. is_zariski_open V ‚àß ùî≠ ‚àà V ‚àß is_locally_frac (mult_sheaf_spec U s s') V)"
    if "ùî≠ ‚àà U" for ùî≠
  proof -
    obtain V1 r1 f1 where "V1 ‚äÜU" "is_zariski_open V1" "ùî≠ ‚àà V1" "r1 ‚àà R" "f1 ‚àà R" and
        q_V1:"(‚àÄùîÆ. ùîÆ ‚àà V1 ‚ü∂ f1 ‚àâ ùîÆ ‚àß s ùîÆ = quotient_ring.frac (R‚àñùîÆ) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ r1 f1)"
      using ‚Äπis_regular s U‚Ä∫[unfolded is_regular_def] ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫ unfolding is_locally_frac_def
      by auto
    obtain V2 r2 f2 where "V2 ‚äÜU" "is_zariski_open V2" "ùî≠ ‚àà V2" "r2 ‚àà R" "f2 ‚àà R" and
        q_V2:"(‚àÄùîÆ. ùîÆ ‚àà V2 ‚ü∂ f2 ‚àâ ùîÆ ‚àß s' ùîÆ = quotient_ring.frac (R‚àñùîÆ) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ r2 f2)"
      using ‚Äπis_regular s' U‚Ä∫[unfolded is_regular_def] ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫ unfolding is_locally_frac_def
      by auto

    define V3 where "V3 = V1 ‚à© V2"
    define r3 where "r3 = r1 ‚ãÖ r2  "
    define f3 where "f3 = f1 ‚ãÖ f2"
    have "V3 ‚äÜU" "ùî≠ ‚àà V3" "r3 ‚àà R" "f3 ‚àà R"
      unfolding V3_def r3_def f3_def
      using ‚ÄπV1 ‚äÜ U‚Ä∫ ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà V1‚Ä∫ ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà V2‚Ä∫ ‚Äπf1 ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπf2 ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr1 ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr2 ‚àà R‚Ä∫ by blast+
    moreover have "is_zariski_open V3"
      using topological_space.open_inter by (simp add: V3_def ‚Äπis_zariski_open V1‚Ä∫ ‚Äπis_zariski_open V2‚Ä∫)
    moreover have "f3 ‚àâ ùîÆ"
        "mult_sheaf_spec U s s' ùîÆ = quotient_ring.frac (R‚àñùîÆ) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ r3 f3"
        if "ùîÆ ‚àà V3" for ùîÆ
    proof -
      interpret q:quotient_ring "R‚àñùîÆ" R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨
        using ‚ÄπU ‚äÜ Spec‚Ä∫ ‚ÄπV3 ‚äÜ U‚Ä∫ ‚ÄπùîÆ ‚àà V3‚Ä∫ quotient_ring_def local.comm_ring_axioms
          pr_ideal.submonoid_pr_ideal spectrum_def
        by fastforce
      have "f1 ‚àâ ùîÆ" "s ùîÆ = q.frac r1 f1"
        using q_V1 ‚ÄπùîÆ ‚àà V3‚Ä∫  unfolding V3_def by auto
      have "f2 ‚àâ ùîÆ" "s' ùîÆ = q.frac r2 f2"
        using q_V2 ‚ÄπùîÆ ‚àà V3‚Ä∫  unfolding V3_def by auto

      have "q.mult_rel (q.frac r1 f1) (q.frac r2 f2) = q.frac (r1 ‚ãÖ r2 ) (f1 ‚ãÖ f2)"
        apply (rule q.mult_rel_frac)
        subgoal by (simp add: ‚Äπf1 ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπf1 ‚àâ ùîÆ‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr1 ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr2 ‚àà R‚Ä∫)
        subgoal using ‚Äπf2 ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπf2 ‚àâ ùîÆ‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr2 ‚àà R‚Ä∫ by blast
        done
      then have "q.mult_rel (s ùîÆ) (s' ùîÆ) = q.frac r3 f3"
        unfolding r3_def f3_def using ‚Äπs ùîÆ = q.frac r1 f1‚Ä∫ ‚Äπs' ùîÆ = q.frac r2 f2‚Ä∫
        by auto
      then show "mult_sheaf_spec U s s' ùîÆ = q.frac r3 f3"
        unfolding mult_sheaf_spec_def using ‚ÄπV3 ‚äÜ U‚Ä∫ ‚ÄπùîÆ ‚àà V3‚Ä∫ by auto
      show "f3 ‚àâ ùîÆ" using that unfolding V3_def f3_def
        using ‚Äπf1 ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπf1 ‚àâ ùîÆ‚Ä∫ ‚Äπf2 ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπf2 ‚àâ ùîÆ‚Ä∫ q.sub_composition_closed by auto
    qed
    ultimately show ?thesis using is_locally_frac_def by metis
  qed
  ultimately show ?thesis unfolding is_regular_def is_locally_frac_def by meson
qed

lemma mult_sheaf_spec_in_sheaf_spec:
  assumes "s ‚àà ùí™ U" and "t ‚àà ùí™ U" and "U ‚äÜ Spec"
  shows "mult_sheaf_spec U s t ‚àà ùí™ U"
proof -
  have "mult_sheaf_spec U s t ùî≠ ‚àà R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô"
      if "ùî≠ ‚àà U" for ùî≠
  proof -
    interpret qr:quotient_ring "(R‚àñùî≠)" R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠
      apply (rule spectrum_imp_cxt_quotient_ring)
      using that ‚ÄπU ‚äÜ Spec‚Ä∫ by auto
    interpret pi:pr_ideal R ùî≠ "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠
      using that ‚ÄπU ‚äÜ Spec‚Ä∫ by (auto intro:spectrum_imp_pr)
    have "qr.valid_frac (s ùî≠)" "qr.valid_frac (t ùî≠)"
      using sec_has_right_codom[OF _ that] ‚Äπs ‚àà ùí™ U‚Ä∫ ‚Äπt ‚àà ùí™ U‚Ä∫
      by (auto simp:pi.carrier_local_ring_at_def)
    then show ?thesis
      using that unfolding mult_sheaf_spec_def pi.carrier_local_ring_at_def
      by auto
  qed
  moreover have "is_regular (mult_sheaf_spec U s t) U"
    using ‚Äπs ‚àà ùí™ U‚Ä∫ ‚Äπt ‚àà ùí™ U‚Ä∫ ‚ÄπU ‚äÜ Spec‚Ä∫ is_regular_mult_sheaf_spec
    unfolding sheaf_spec_def by auto
  moreover have "mult_sheaf_spec U s t ‚àà extensional U"
    unfolding mult_sheaf_spec_def by auto
  ultimately show ?thesis
    unfolding sheaf_spec_def by (simp add: PiE_iff)
qed

definition uminus_sheaf_spec::"('a set) set ‚áí ('a set ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set) ‚áí ('a set ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set)"
  where "uminus_sheaf_spec U s ‚â° Œªùî≠‚ààU. quotient_ring.uminus_rel (R ‚àñ ùî≠) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ (s ùî≠) "

lemma is_regular_uminus_sheaf_spec:
  assumes "is_regular s U" and "U ‚äÜ Spec"
  shows "is_regular (uminus_sheaf_spec U s) U"
proof -
  have "uminus_sheaf_spec U s ùî≠ ‚àà R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô" if "ùî≠ ‚àà U" for ùî≠
  proof -
    interpret pi: pr_ideal R ùî≠ "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠
      using ‚ÄπU ‚äÜ Spec‚Ä∫[unfolded spectrum_def] ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫ by blast
    interpret qr:quotient_ring "(R‚àñùî≠)"
      by (simp add: quotient_ring_def local.comm_ring_axioms pi.submonoid_pr_ideal)

    have "s ùî≠ ‚àà pi.carrier_local_ring_at"
      using ‚Äπis_regular s U‚Ä∫
      unfolding is_regular_def using that
      using assms(2) frac_in_carrier_local in_mono is_locally_frac_def by fastforce
    then show ?thesis
      unfolding uminus_sheaf_spec_def pi.carrier_local_ring_at_def using that
      by simp
  qed
  moreover have "(‚àÉV‚äÜU. is_zariski_open V ‚àß ùî≠ ‚àà V ‚àß is_locally_frac (uminus_sheaf_spec U s) V)"
    if "ùî≠ ‚àà U" for ùî≠
  proof -
    obtain V1 r1 f1 where "V1 ‚äÜU" "is_zariski_open V1" "ùî≠ ‚àà V1" "r1 ‚àà R" "f1 ‚àà R" and
        q_V1:"(‚àÄùîÆ. ùîÆ ‚àà V1 ‚ü∂ f1 ‚àâ ùîÆ ‚àß s ùîÆ = quotient_ring.frac (R‚àñùîÆ) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ r1 f1)"
      using ‚Äπis_regular s U‚Ä∫[unfolded is_regular_def] ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫ unfolding is_locally_frac_def
      by auto

    define V3 where "V3 = V1 "
    define r3 where "r3 = additive.inverse r1"
    define f3 where "f3 = f1"
    have "V3 ‚äÜU" "ùî≠ ‚àà V3" "r3 ‚àà R" "f3 ‚àà R"
      unfolding V3_def r3_def f3_def
      using ‚ÄπV1 ‚äÜ U‚Ä∫ ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà V1‚Ä∫ ‚Äπf1 ‚àà R‚Ä∫  ‚Äπr1 ‚àà R‚Ä∫ by blast+
    moreover have "is_zariski_open V3"
      using topological_space.open_inter by (simp add: V3_def ‚Äπis_zariski_open V1‚Ä∫)
    moreover have "f3 ‚àâ ùîÆ"
        "uminus_sheaf_spec U s ùîÆ = quotient_ring.frac (R‚àñùîÆ) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ r3 f3"
        if "ùîÆ ‚àà V3" for ùîÆ
    proof -
      interpret q:quotient_ring "R‚àñùîÆ" R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨
        using ‚ÄπU ‚äÜ Spec‚Ä∫ ‚ÄπV3 ‚äÜ U‚Ä∫ ‚ÄπùîÆ ‚àà V3‚Ä∫ quotient_ring_def local.comm_ring_axioms
          pr_ideal.submonoid_pr_ideal spectrum_def
        by fastforce
      have "f1 ‚àâ ùîÆ" "s ùîÆ = q.frac r1 f1"
        using q_V1 ‚ÄπùîÆ ‚àà V3‚Ä∫  unfolding V3_def by auto

      have "q.uminus_rel (q.frac r1 f1) = q.frac (additive.inverse r1) f1"
        apply (rule q.uminus_rel_frac)
        by (simp add: ‚Äπf1 ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπf1 ‚àâ ùîÆ‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr1 ‚àà R‚Ä∫)
      then have "q.uminus_rel (s ùîÆ) = q.frac r3 f3"
        unfolding r3_def f3_def using ‚Äπs ùîÆ = q.frac r1 f1‚Ä∫ by auto
      then show "uminus_sheaf_spec U s ùîÆ = q.frac r3 f3"
        unfolding uminus_sheaf_spec_def using ‚ÄπV3 ‚äÜ U‚Ä∫ ‚ÄπùîÆ ‚àà V3‚Ä∫ by auto
      show "f3 ‚àâ ùîÆ" using that unfolding V3_def f3_def
        using ‚Äπf1 ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπf1 ‚àâ ùîÆ‚Ä∫ q.sub_composition_closed by auto
    qed
    ultimately show ?thesis using is_locally_frac_def by metis
  qed
  ultimately show ?thesis unfolding is_regular_def is_locally_frac_def by meson
qed

lemma uminus_sheaf_spec_in_sheaf_spec:
  assumes "s ‚àà ùí™ U" and "U ‚äÜ Spec"
  shows "uminus_sheaf_spec U s ‚àà ùí™ U"
proof -
  have "uminus_sheaf_spec U s ùî≠ ‚àà R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô"
      if "ùî≠ ‚àà U" for ùî≠
  proof -
    interpret qr:quotient_ring "(R‚àñùî≠)" R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠
      apply (rule spectrum_imp_cxt_quotient_ring)
      using that ‚ÄπU ‚äÜ Spec‚Ä∫ by auto
    interpret pi:pr_ideal R ùî≠ "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠
      using that ‚ÄπU ‚äÜ Spec‚Ä∫ by (auto intro:spectrum_imp_pr)
    have "qr.valid_frac (s ùî≠)"
      using sec_has_right_codom[OF _ that] ‚Äπs ‚àà ùí™ U‚Ä∫
      by (auto simp:pi.carrier_local_ring_at_def)
    then show ?thesis
      using that unfolding uminus_sheaf_spec_def pi.carrier_local_ring_at_def
      by auto
  qed
  moreover have "is_regular (uminus_sheaf_spec U s) U"
    using ‚Äπs ‚àà ùí™ U‚Ä∫  ‚ÄπU ‚äÜ Spec‚Ä∫ is_regular_uminus_sheaf_spec
    unfolding sheaf_spec_def by auto
  moreover have "uminus_sheaf_spec U s ‚àà extensional U"
    unfolding uminus_sheaf_spec_def by auto
  ultimately show ?thesis
    unfolding sheaf_spec_def by (simp add: PiE_iff)
qed

definition zero_sheaf_spec:: "'a set set ‚áí ('a set ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set)"
  where "zero_sheaf_spec U ‚â° Œªùî≠‚ààU. quotient_ring.zero_rel (R ‚àñ ùî≠) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠"

lemma is_regular_zero_sheaf_spec:
  assumes "is_zariski_open U"
  shows "is_regular (zero_sheaf_spec U) U"
proof -
  have "zero_sheaf_spec U ùî≠ ‚àà R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô" if "ùî≠ ‚àà U" for ùî≠
    unfolding zero_sheaf_spec_def
    using assms closed_subsets_def closed_subsets_empty quotient_ring.carrier_quotient_ring_iff
      quotient_ring.valid_frac_zero quotient_ring_def local.comm_ring_axioms
      pr_ideal.carrier_local_ring_at_def pr_ideal.submonoid_pr_ideal subsetD that zariski_open_is_subset
    by fastforce
  moreover have "(‚àÉV‚äÜU. is_zariski_open V ‚àß ùî≠ ‚àà V ‚àß is_locally_frac (zero_sheaf_spec U) V)"
    if "ùî≠ ‚àà U" for ùî≠
  proof -
    define V3 where "V3 = U"
    define r3 where "r3 = ùü¨ "
    define f3 where "f3 = ùü≠"
    have "V3 ‚äÜU" "ùî≠ ‚àà V3" "r3 ‚àà R" "f3 ‚àà R"
      unfolding V3_def r3_def f3_def using that by auto
    moreover have "is_zariski_open V3" using assms by (simp add: V3_def)
    moreover have "f3 ‚àâ ùîÆ"
        "zero_sheaf_spec U ùîÆ = quotient_ring.frac (R‚àñùîÆ) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ r3 f3"
        if "ùîÆ ‚àà V3" for ùîÆ
      subgoal using V3_def assms f3_def pr_ideal.submonoid_pr_ideal spectrum_def
          submonoid.sub_unit_closed that zariski_open_is_subset by fastforce
      subgoal
      proof -
        interpret q:quotient_ring "R‚àñùîÆ" R
          using V3_def assms quotient_ring_def local.comm_ring_axioms
            pr_ideal.submonoid_pr_ideal spectrum_def that zariski_open_is_subset by fastforce
        show ?thesis unfolding zero_sheaf_spec_def
          using V3_def f3_def q.zero_rel_def r3_def that by auto
      qed
      done
    ultimately show ?thesis using is_locally_frac_def  by metis
  qed
  ultimately show ?thesis unfolding is_regular_def is_locally_frac_def  by meson
qed

lemma zero_sheaf_spec_in_sheaf_spec:
  assumes "is_zariski_open U"
  shows "zero_sheaf_spec U ‚àà ùí™ U"
proof -
  have "zero_sheaf_spec U ùî≠ ‚àà R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô"if "ùî≠ ‚àà U" for ùî≠
  proof -
    interpret qr:quotient_ring "(R‚àñùî≠)" R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠
      by (meson assms comm_ring.zariski_open_is_subset local.comm_ring_axioms
          spectrum_imp_cxt_quotient_ring subsetD that)
    interpret pi:pr_ideal R ùî≠ "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠
      by (meson assms spectrum_imp_pr subsetD that zariski_open_is_subset)
    show ?thesis unfolding zero_sheaf_spec_def pi.carrier_local_ring_at_def
      using that by auto
  qed
  moreover have "is_regular (zero_sheaf_spec U) U"
    using is_regular_zero_sheaf_spec assms by auto
  moreover have "zero_sheaf_spec U ‚àà extensional U"
    by (simp add: zero_sheaf_spec_def)
  ultimately show ?thesis unfolding sheaf_spec_def by (simp add: PiE_iff)
qed

definition one_sheaf_spec:: "'a set set ‚áí ('a set ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set)"
  where "one_sheaf_spec U ‚â° Œªùî≠‚ààU. quotient_ring.one_rel (R ‚àñ ùî≠) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠"

lemma is_regular_one_sheaf_spec:
  assumes "is_zariski_open U"
  shows "is_regular (one_sheaf_spec U) U"
proof -
  have "one_sheaf_spec U ùî≠ ‚àà R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô" if "ùî≠ ‚àà U" for ùî≠
    unfolding one_sheaf_spec_def
    by (smt assms closed_subsets_empty comm_ring.closed_subsets_def
        quotient_ring.carrier_quotient_ring_iff quotient_ring.valid_frac_one
        quotient_ring_def local.comm_ring_axioms mem_Collect_eq
        pr_ideal.carrier_local_ring_at_def pr_ideal.submonoid_pr_ideal
        restrict_apply subsetD that zariski_open_is_subset)
  moreover have "(‚àÉV‚äÜU. is_zariski_open V ‚àß ùî≠ ‚àà V ‚àß is_locally_frac (one_sheaf_spec U) V)"
    if "ùî≠ ‚àà U" for ùî≠
  proof -
    define V3 where "V3 = U"
    define r3 where "r3 = ùü≠"
    define f3 where "f3 = ùü≠"
    have "V3 ‚äÜU" "ùî≠ ‚àà V3" "r3 ‚àà R" "f3 ‚àà R"
      unfolding V3_def r3_def f3_def using that by auto
    moreover have "is_zariski_open V3" using assms by (simp add: V3_def)
    moreover have "f3 ‚àâ ùîÆ"
        "one_sheaf_spec U ùîÆ = quotient_ring.frac (R‚àñùîÆ) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ r3 f3"
        if "ùîÆ ‚àà V3" for ùîÆ
      subgoal using V3_def assms f3_def pr_ideal.submonoid_pr_ideal spectrum_def
          submonoid.sub_unit_closed that zariski_open_is_subset by fastforce
      subgoal
      proof -
        interpret q:quotient_ring "R‚àñùîÆ" R
          using V3_def assms quotient_ring_def local.comm_ring_axioms
            pr_ideal.submonoid_pr_ideal spectrum_def that zariski_open_is_subset by fastforce
        show ?thesis unfolding one_sheaf_spec_def
          using V3_def f3_def q.one_rel_def r3_def that by auto
      qed
      done
    ultimately show ?thesis using is_locally_frac_def by metis
  qed
  ultimately show ?thesis unfolding is_regular_def is_locally_frac_def by meson
qed

lemma one_sheaf_spec_in_sheaf_spec:
  assumes "is_zariski_open U"
  shows "one_sheaf_spec U ‚àà ùí™ U"
proof -
  have "one_sheaf_spec U ùî≠ ‚àà R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô"if "ùî≠ ‚àà U" for ùî≠
  proof -
    interpret qr:quotient_ring "(R‚àñùî≠)" R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠
      by (meson assms comm_ring.zariski_open_is_subset local.comm_ring_axioms
          spectrum_imp_cxt_quotient_ring subsetD that)
    interpret pi:pr_ideal R ùî≠ "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠
      by (meson assms spectrum_imp_pr subsetD that zariski_open_is_subset)
    show ?thesis unfolding one_sheaf_spec_def pi.carrier_local_ring_at_def
      using that by auto
  qed
  moreover have "is_regular (one_sheaf_spec U) U"
    using is_regular_one_sheaf_spec assms by auto
  moreover have "one_sheaf_spec U ‚àà extensional U"
    by (simp add: one_sheaf_spec_def)
  ultimately show ?thesis unfolding sheaf_spec_def by (simp add: PiE_iff)
qed

lemma zero_sheaf_spec_extensional[simp]:
  "zero_sheaf_spec U ‚àà extensional U"
  unfolding zero_sheaf_spec_def by simp

lemma one_sheaf_spec_extensional[simp]:
  "one_sheaf_spec U ‚àà extensional U"
  unfolding one_sheaf_spec_def by simp

lemma add_sheaf_spec_extensional[simp]:
  "add_sheaf_spec U a b ‚àà extensional U"
  unfolding add_sheaf_spec_def by simp

lemma mult_sheaf_spec_extensional[simp]:
  "mult_sheaf_spec U a b ‚àà extensional U"
  unfolding mult_sheaf_spec_def by simp

lemma sheaf_spec_extensional[simp]:
  "a ‚àà ùí™ U ‚üπ a ‚àà extensional U"
  unfolding sheaf_spec_def by (simp add: PiE_iff Set_Theory.map_def)

lemma sheaf_spec_on_open_is_comm_ring:
  assumes "is_zariski_open U"
  shows "comm_ring (ùí™ U) (add_sheaf_spec U) (mult_sheaf_spec U) (zero_sheaf_spec U) (one_sheaf_spec U)"
proof unfold_locales
  show add_ùí™:"add_sheaf_spec U a b ‚àà ùí™ U"
    and "mult_sheaf_spec U a b ‚àà ùí™ U"
    if "a ‚àà ùí™ U" "b ‚àà ùí™ U" for a b
    subgoal by (simp add: add_sheaf_spec_in_sheaf_spec assms that(1,2) zariski_open_is_subset)
    subgoal by (simp add: assms mult_sheaf_spec_in_sheaf_spec that(1,2) zariski_open_is_subset)
    done
  show "zero_sheaf_spec U ‚àà ùí™ U" "one_sheaf_spec U ‚àà ùí™ U"
    subgoal by (simp add: assms zero_sheaf_spec_in_sheaf_spec)
    subgoal by (simp add: assms one_sheaf_spec_in_sheaf_spec)
    done

  have imp_qr:"quotient_ring (R‚àñùî≠) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠" if "ùî≠ ‚àà U" for ùî≠
    using that
    by (meson assms comm_ring.spectrum_imp_cxt_quotient_ring in_mono local.comm_ring_axioms
          zariski_open_is_subset)
  have qr_valid_frac:"quotient_ring.valid_frac (R‚àñùî≠) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ (s ùî≠)"
      if "s ‚àà ùí™ U" "ùî≠ ‚àà U" for s ùî≠
    using assms comm_ring.zariski_open_is_subset quotient_ring.carrier_quotient_ring_iff
      imp_qr local.comm_ring_axioms pr_ideal.carrier_local_ring_at_def sec_has_right_codom
      spectrum_imp_pr that(1) that(2) by fastforce

  show add_zero:"add_sheaf_spec U (zero_sheaf_spec U) a = a" if "a ‚àà ùí™ U" for a
  proof -
    have "add_sheaf_spec U (zero_sheaf_spec U) a ùî≠ = a ùî≠" if "ùî≠ ‚àà U" for ùî≠
    proof -
      interpret cq:quotient_ring "R‚àñùî≠" R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠
        using imp_qr that by auto
      show ?thesis unfolding add_sheaf_spec_def zero_sheaf_spec_def
        using that by (simp add: ‚Äπa ‚àà ùí™ U‚Ä∫ qr_valid_frac)
    qed
    then show "add_sheaf_spec U (zero_sheaf_spec U) a = a"
      using that by(auto intro: extensionalityI[where A=U])
  qed
  show add_assoc:"add_sheaf_spec U (add_sheaf_spec U a b) c
      = add_sheaf_spec U a (add_sheaf_spec U b c)"
    if "a ‚àà ùí™ U" and "b ‚àà ùí™ U" and "c ‚àà ùí™ U"
    for a b c
  proof (rule extensionalityI)
    fix ùî≠ assume "ùî≠ ‚àà U"
    interpret cq:quotient_ring "R‚àñùî≠" R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠ using ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫ imp_qr by auto
    show "add_sheaf_spec U (add_sheaf_spec U a b) c ùî≠ = add_sheaf_spec U a (add_sheaf_spec U b c) ùî≠"
      unfolding add_sheaf_spec_def using ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫
      by (simp add: cq.additive.associative qr_valid_frac that(1) that(2) that(3))
  qed (auto simp add:add_sheaf_spec_def)
  show add_comm:"add_sheaf_spec U x y = add_sheaf_spec U y x"
    if "x ‚àà ùí™ U" and "y ‚àà ùí™ U" for x y
  proof (rule extensionalityI)
    fix ùî≠ assume "ùî≠ ‚àà U"
    interpret cq:quotient_ring "R‚àñùî≠" R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠ using ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫ imp_qr by auto
    show " add_sheaf_spec U x y ùî≠ = add_sheaf_spec U y x ùî≠"
      unfolding add_sheaf_spec_def using ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫
      by (simp add: cq.additive.commutative qr_valid_frac that(1) that(2))
  qed auto
  show mult_comm:"mult_sheaf_spec U x y = mult_sheaf_spec U y x"
    if "x ‚àà ùí™ U" and "y ‚àà ùí™ U" for x y
  proof (rule extensionalityI)
    fix ùî≠ assume "ùî≠ ‚àà U"
    interpret cq:quotient_ring "R‚àñùî≠" R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠ using ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫ imp_qr by auto
    show "mult_sheaf_spec U x y ùî≠ = mult_sheaf_spec U y x ùî≠"
      unfolding mult_sheaf_spec_def using ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫
      by (simp add: cq.comm_mult qr_valid_frac that(1) that(2))
  qed auto
  show add_zero:"add_sheaf_spec U a (zero_sheaf_spec U) = a"
      if "a ‚àà ùí™ U" for a
    using add_zero add_comm that by (simp add: ‚Äπzero_sheaf_spec U ‚àà ùí™ U‚Ä∫)

  show "mult_sheaf_spec U (mult_sheaf_spec U a b) c = mult_sheaf_spec U a (mult_sheaf_spec U b c)"
    if "a ‚àà ùí™ U" and "b ‚àà ùí™ U"
      and "c ‚àà ùí™ U"
    for a b c
  proof (rule extensionalityI)
    fix ùî≠ assume "ùî≠ ‚àà U"
    interpret cq:quotient_ring "R‚àñùî≠" R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠ using ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫ imp_qr by auto
    show "mult_sheaf_spec U (mult_sheaf_spec U a b) c ùî≠
                = mult_sheaf_spec U a (mult_sheaf_spec U b c) ùî≠"
      unfolding mult_sheaf_spec_def using ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫
      by (simp add: cq.multiplicative.associative qr_valid_frac that(1) that(2) that(3))
  qed (auto simp add:add_sheaf_spec_def)

  show "mult_sheaf_spec U (one_sheaf_spec U) a = a"
    if "a ‚àà ùí™ U" for a
  proof (rule extensionalityI)
    fix ùî≠ assume "ùî≠ ‚àà U"
    interpret cq:quotient_ring "R‚àñùî≠" R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠ using ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫ imp_qr by auto
    show "mult_sheaf_spec U (one_sheaf_spec U) a ùî≠ = a ùî≠"
      unfolding mult_sheaf_spec_def using ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫
      by (simp add: one_sheaf_spec_def qr_valid_frac that)
  qed (auto simp add: ‚Äπa ‚àà ùí™ U‚Ä∫)
  then show "mult_sheaf_spec U a (one_sheaf_spec U) = a"
    if "a ‚àà ùí™ U" for a
    by (simp add: ‚Äπone_sheaf_spec U ‚àà ùí™ U‚Ä∫ mult_comm that)

  show "mult_sheaf_spec U a (add_sheaf_spec U b c)
          = add_sheaf_spec U (mult_sheaf_spec U a b) (mult_sheaf_spec U a c)"
    if "a ‚àà ùí™ U" and "b ‚àà ùí™ U" and "c ‚àà ùí™ U" for a b c
  proof (rule extensionalityI)
    fix ùî≠ assume "ùî≠ ‚àà U"
    interpret cq:quotient_ring "R‚àñùî≠" R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠ using ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫ imp_qr by auto
    show "mult_sheaf_spec U a (add_sheaf_spec U b c) ùî≠ =
         add_sheaf_spec U (mult_sheaf_spec U a b) (mult_sheaf_spec U a c) ùî≠"
      unfolding mult_sheaf_spec_def add_sheaf_spec_def
      by (simp add: cq.distributive(1) qr_valid_frac that(1) that(2) that(3))
  qed auto
  then show "mult_sheaf_spec U (add_sheaf_spec U b c) a
                = add_sheaf_spec U (mult_sheaf_spec U b a) (mult_sheaf_spec U c a)"
    if "a ‚àà ùí™ U" and "b ‚àà ùí™ U" and "c ‚àà ùí™ U" for a b c
    by (simp add: add_ùí™ mult_comm that(1) that(2) that(3))
  show "monoid.invertible (ùí™ U) (add_sheaf_spec U) (zero_sheaf_spec U) u"
    if "u ‚àà ùí™ U" for u
  proof (rule monoid.invertibleI)
    show "Group_Theory.monoid (ùí™ U) (add_sheaf_spec U) (zero_sheaf_spec U)"
      apply unfold_locales
      using add_ùí™ ‚Äπzero_sheaf_spec U ‚àà ùí™ U‚Ä∫ add_assoc ‚Äπzero_sheaf_spec U ‚àà ùí™ U‚Ä∫
        add_comm add_zero  add_zero
      by simp_all
    show "add_sheaf_spec U u (uminus_sheaf_spec U u) = zero_sheaf_spec U"
    proof (rule extensionalityI)
      fix ùî≠ assume "ùî≠ ‚àà U"
      interpret cq:quotient_ring "R‚àñùî≠" R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠ using ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫ imp_qr by auto

      have "cq.add_rel (u ùî≠) (cq.uminus_rel (u ùî≠)) = cq.zero_rel"
        by (simp add: ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫ cq.add_minus_zero_rel qr_valid_frac that)
      then show "add_sheaf_spec U u (uminus_sheaf_spec U u) ùî≠ = zero_sheaf_spec U ùî≠"
        unfolding add_sheaf_spec_def uminus_sheaf_spec_def zero_sheaf_spec_def
        using ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫ by simp
    qed auto
    then show "add_sheaf_spec U (uminus_sheaf_spec U u) u = zero_sheaf_spec U"
      by (simp add: add_comm assms comm_ring.zariski_open_is_subset local.comm_ring_axioms
          that uminus_sheaf_spec_in_sheaf_spec)
    show "u ‚àà ùí™ U" using that .
    show "uminus_sheaf_spec U u ‚àà ùí™ U"
      by (simp add: assms comm_ring.zariski_open_is_subset local.comm_ring_axioms
            that uminus_sheaf_spec_in_sheaf_spec)
  qed
qed

definition sheaf_spec_morphisms::
"'a set set ‚áí 'a set set ‚áí (('a set ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set) ‚áí ('a set ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set))"
where "sheaf_spec_morphisms U V ‚â° Œªs‚àà(ùí™ U). restrict s V"

lemma sheaf_morphisms_sheaf_spec:
  assumes "s ‚àà ùí™ U"
  shows "sheaf_spec_morphisms U U s = s"
  using assms sheaf_spec_def restrict_on_source sheaf_spec_morphisms_def
  by auto

lemma sheaf_spec_morphisms_are_maps:
  assumes (*this assumption seems redundant: "is_zariski_open U" and*)
    "is_zariski_open V" and "V ‚äÜ U"
  shows "Set_Theory.map (sheaf_spec_morphisms U V) (ùí™ U) (ùí™ V)"
proof -
  have "sheaf_spec_morphisms U V ‚àà extensional (ùí™ U)"
    unfolding sheaf_spec_morphisms_def by auto
  moreover have "sheaf_spec_morphisms U V ‚àà (ùí™ U) ‚Üí (ùí™ V)"
    unfolding sheaf_spec_morphisms_def
  proof
    fix s assume "s ‚àà ùí™ U"
    then have "s ‚àà (Œ†‚á©E ùî≠‚ààU. R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô)"
        and p:"‚àÄùî≠. ùî≠ ‚àà U ‚ü∂ (‚àÉV. is_zariski_open V ‚àß V ‚äÜ U ‚àß ùî≠ ‚àà V ‚àß is_locally_frac s V)"
      unfolding sheaf_spec_def is_regular_def by auto
    have "restrict s V ‚àà (Œ†‚á©E ùî≠‚ààV. R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô)"
      using ‚Äπs ‚àà (Œ†‚á©E ùî≠‚ààU. R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô)‚Ä∫ using ‚ÄπV ‚äÜ U‚Ä∫ by auto
    moreover have "(‚àÉVa. is_zariski_open Va ‚àß Va ‚äÜ V ‚àß ùî≠ ‚àà Va ‚àß is_locally_frac (restrict s V) Va)"
      if "ùî≠ ‚àà V" for ùî≠
    proof -
      obtain U1 where "is_zariski_open U1" "U1 ‚äÜ U" "ùî≠ ‚àà U1" "is_locally_frac s U1"
        using p[rule_format, of ùî≠] that ‚ÄπV ‚äÜ U‚Ä∫ ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà V‚Ä∫ by auto
      define V1 where "V1 = U1 ‚à© V"
      have "is_zariski_open V1"
        using ‚Äπis_zariski_open V‚Ä∫ ‚Äπis_zariski_open U1‚Ä∫ by (simp add: V1_def)
      moreover have "is_locally_frac s V1"
        using is_locally_frac_subset[OF ‚Äπis_locally_frac s U1‚Ä∫] unfolding V1_def by simp
      then have "is_locally_frac (restrict s V) V1"
        unfolding restrict_def V1_def using is_locally_frac_cong by (smt in_mono inf_le2)
      moreover have "V1 ‚äÜ V" "ùî≠ ‚àà V1"
        unfolding V1_def using ‚ÄπV ‚äÜ U‚Ä∫ ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U1‚Ä∫ that by auto
      ultimately show ?thesis by auto
    qed
    ultimately show "restrict s V ‚àà ùí™ V"
      unfolding sheaf_spec_def is_regular_def by auto
  qed
  ultimately show ?thesis
    by (simp add: extensional_funcset_def map.intro)
qed

lemma sheaf_spec_morphisms_are_ring_morphisms:
  assumes U: "is_zariski_open U" and V: "is_zariski_open V" and "V ‚äÜ U"
  shows "ring_homomorphism (sheaf_spec_morphisms U V)
                           (ùí™ U) (add_sheaf_spec U) (mult_sheaf_spec U) (zero_sheaf_spec U) (one_sheaf_spec U)
                           (ùí™ V) (add_sheaf_spec V) (mult_sheaf_spec V) (zero_sheaf_spec V) (one_sheaf_spec V)"
proof intro_locales
  show "Set_Theory.map (sheaf_spec_morphisms U V) (ùí™ U) (ùí™ V)"
    by (simp add: assms sheaf_spec_morphisms_are_maps)
  show "Group_Theory.monoid (ùí™ U) (add_sheaf_spec U) (zero_sheaf_spec U)"
    using sheaf_spec_on_open_is_comm_ring [OF U]
    by (auto simp: comm_ring_def ring_def abelian_group_def commutative_monoid_def)
  show "Group_Theory.group_axioms (ùí™ U) (add_sheaf_spec U) (zero_sheaf_spec U)"
    using sheaf_spec_on_open_is_comm_ring [OF U]
    by (auto simp: comm_ring_def ring_def abelian_group_def commutative_monoid_def group_def)
  show "commutative_monoid_axioms (ùí™ U) (add_sheaf_spec U)"
    using sheaf_spec_on_open_is_comm_ring [OF U]
    by (auto simp: comm_ring_def ring_def abelian_group_def commutative_monoid_def group_def)
  show "Group_Theory.monoid (ùí™ U) (mult_sheaf_spec U) (one_sheaf_spec U)"
    by (meson U comm_ring_def ring_def sheaf_spec_on_open_is_comm_ring)
  show "ring_axioms (ùí™ U) (add_sheaf_spec U) (mult_sheaf_spec U)"
    by (meson U comm_ring.axioms(1) ring_def sheaf_spec_on_open_is_comm_ring)
  show "Group_Theory.monoid (ùí™ V) (add_sheaf_spec V) (zero_sheaf_spec V)"
    using sheaf_spec_on_open_is_comm_ring [OF V]
    by (auto simp: comm_ring_def ring_def abelian_group_def commutative_monoid_def)
  show "Group_Theory.group_axioms (ùí™ V) (add_sheaf_spec V) (zero_sheaf_spec V)"
    using sheaf_spec_on_open_is_comm_ring [OF V]
    by (auto simp: comm_ring_def ring_def abelian_group_def commutative_monoid_def group_def)
  show "commutative_monoid_axioms (ùí™ V) (add_sheaf_spec V)"
    using sheaf_spec_on_open_is_comm_ring [OF V]
    by (auto simp: comm_ring_def ring_def abelian_group_def commutative_monoid_def group_def)
  show "Group_Theory.monoid (ùí™ V) (mult_sheaf_spec V) (one_sheaf_spec V)"
    by (meson V comm_ring.axioms(1) ring_def sheaf_spec_on_open_is_comm_ring)
  show "ring_axioms (ùí™ V) (add_sheaf_spec V) (mult_sheaf_spec V)"
    by (meson V comm_ring_def ring_def sheaf_spec_on_open_is_comm_ring)
  show "monoid_homomorphism_axioms (sheaf_spec_morphisms U V) (ùí™ U)
              (add_sheaf_spec U) (zero_sheaf_spec U) (add_sheaf_spec V) (zero_sheaf_spec V)"
  proof
    fix x y
    assume xy: "x ‚àà ùí™ U" "y ‚àà ùí™ U"
    have "sheaf_spec_morphisms U V (add_sheaf_spec U x y) = restrict (add_sheaf_spec U x y) V"
      by (simp add: U add_sheaf_spec_in_sheaf_spec comm_ring.zariski_open_is_subset local.comm_ring_axioms sheaf_spec_morphisms_def xy)
    also have "... = add_sheaf_spec V (restrict x V) (restrict y V)"
      using add_sheaf_spec_def ‚ÄπV ‚äÜ U‚Ä∫ by force
    also have "... = add_sheaf_spec V (sheaf_spec_morphisms U V x) (sheaf_spec_morphisms U V y)"
      by (simp add: sheaf_spec_morphisms_def xy)
    finally show "sheaf_spec_morphisms U V (add_sheaf_spec U x y) = add_sheaf_spec V (sheaf_spec_morphisms U V x) (sheaf_spec_morphisms U V y)" .
  next
    have "sheaf_spec_morphisms U V (zero_sheaf_spec U) = restrict (zero_sheaf_spec U) V"
      by (simp add: U comm_ring.sheaf_spec_morphisms_def local.comm_ring_axioms zero_sheaf_spec_in_sheaf_spec)
    also have "... = zero_sheaf_spec V"
      by (metis FuncSet.restrict_restrict assms(3) inf.absorb_iff2 zero_sheaf_spec_def)
    finally show "sheaf_spec_morphisms U V (zero_sheaf_spec U) = zero_sheaf_spec V" .
  qed
  show "monoid_homomorphism_axioms (sheaf_spec_morphisms U V) (ùí™ U)
              (mult_sheaf_spec U) (one_sheaf_spec U) (mult_sheaf_spec V) (one_sheaf_spec V)"
  proof
    fix x y
    assume xy: "x ‚àà ùí™ U" "y ‚àà ùí™ U"
        have "sheaf_spec_morphisms U V (mult_sheaf_spec U x y) = restrict (mult_sheaf_spec U x y) V"
      by (simp add: U mult_sheaf_spec_in_sheaf_spec comm_ring.zariski_open_is_subset local.comm_ring_axioms sheaf_spec_morphisms_def xy)
    also have "... = mult_sheaf_spec V (restrict x V) (restrict y V)"
      using mult_sheaf_spec_def ‚ÄπV ‚äÜ U‚Ä∫ by force
    also have "... = mult_sheaf_spec V (sheaf_spec_morphisms U V x) (sheaf_spec_morphisms U V y)"
      by (simp add: sheaf_spec_morphisms_def xy)
    finally show "sheaf_spec_morphisms U V (mult_sheaf_spec U x y) = mult_sheaf_spec V (sheaf_spec_morphisms U V x) (sheaf_spec_morphisms U V y)" .
  next
    have "sheaf_spec_morphisms U V (one_sheaf_spec U) = restrict (one_sheaf_spec U) V"
      by (simp add: U comm_ring.sheaf_spec_morphisms_def local.comm_ring_axioms one_sheaf_spec_in_sheaf_spec)
    also have "... = one_sheaf_spec V"
      by (metis FuncSet.restrict_restrict assms(3) inf.absorb_iff2 one_sheaf_spec_def)
    finally show "sheaf_spec_morphisms U V (one_sheaf_spec U) = one_sheaf_spec V" .
  qed
qed

lemma sheaf_spec_is_presheaf:
  shows "presheaf_of_rings Spec is_zariski_open sheaf_spec sheaf_spec_morphisms ùí™b
add_sheaf_spec mult_sheaf_spec zero_sheaf_spec one_sheaf_spec"
proof intro_locales
  have "sheaf_spec {} = {ùí™b}"
  proof
    show "{ùí™b} ‚äÜ ùí™ {}"
      using undefined_is_map_on_empty map_on_empty_is_regular sheaf_spec_def ùí™_on_emptyset by auto
    thus "ùí™ {} ‚äÜ {ùí™b}"
      using sheaf_spec_def sheaf_spec_of_empty_is_singleton by auto
  qed
  moreover have "‚ãÄU. is_zariski_open U ‚üπ (‚ãÄs. s ‚àà (ùí™ U) ‚üπ sheaf_spec_morphisms U U s = s)"
    using sheaf_spec_morphisms_def sheaf_morphisms_sheaf_spec by simp
  moreover have "sheaf_spec_morphisms U W s = (sheaf_spec_morphisms V W ‚àò sheaf_spec_morphisms U V) s"
    if "is_zariski_open U" "is_zariski_open V" "is_zariski_open W" "V ‚äÜ U" "W ‚äÜ V" and "s ‚àà ùí™ U"
    for U V W s
  proof -
    have "restrict s V ‚àà ùí™ V"
      using that by (smt map.map_closed restrict_apply sheaf_spec_morphisms_are_maps sheaf_spec_morphisms_def)
    with that show ?thesis
      by (simp add: sheaf_spec_morphisms_def inf_absorb2)
  qed
  ultimately show "presheaf_of_rings_axioms is_zariski_open sheaf_spec
                    sheaf_spec_morphisms ùí™b add_sheaf_spec mult_sheaf_spec zero_sheaf_spec one_sheaf_spec"
    unfolding presheaf_of_rings_def presheaf_of_rings_axioms_def using sheaf_spec_morphisms_are_ring_morphisms
    by blast
qed

(* ex. 0.30 *)
lemma sheaf_spec_is_sheaf:
  shows "sheaf_of_rings Spec is_zariski_open sheaf_spec sheaf_spec_morphisms ùí™b
add_sheaf_spec mult_sheaf_spec zero_sheaf_spec one_sheaf_spec"
proof (intro sheaf_of_rings.intro sheaf_of_rings_axioms.intro)
  show "presheaf_of_rings Spec is_zariski_open sheaf_spec sheaf_spec_morphisms ùí™b
     add_sheaf_spec mult_sheaf_spec zero_sheaf_spec one_sheaf_spec"
    using sheaf_spec_is_presheaf by simp
next
  fix U I V s assume H: "open_cover_of_open_subset Spec is_zariski_open U I V"
                        "‚ãÄi. i ‚àà I ‚üπ V i ‚äÜ U"
                        "s ‚àà ùí™ U"
                        "‚ãÄi. i ‚àà I ‚üπ sheaf_spec_morphisms U (V i) s = zero_sheaf_spec (V i)"
  then have "s ùî≠ = zero_sheaf_spec U ùî≠" if "ùî≠ ‚àà U" for ùî≠
  proof -
    from that obtain i where F: "i ‚àà I" "ùî≠ ‚àà (V i)" "is_zariski_open (V i)"
      using H(1) unfolding open_cover_of_subset_def open_cover_of_open_subset_def
      by (metis cover_of_subset.cover_of_select_index cover_of_subset.select_index_belongs open_cover_of_subset_axioms_def)
    then have "sheaf_spec_morphisms U (V i) s ùî≠ = quotient_ring.zero_rel (R ‚àñ ùî≠) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠"
      using H(2,4) F by (simp add: zero_sheaf_spec_def)
    thus "s ùî≠ = zero_sheaf_spec U ùî≠"
      using sheaf_spec_morphisms_def zero_sheaf_spec_def F(2) by (simp add: H(3) ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫)
  qed
  moreover have "s ‚àà extensional U" " zero_sheaf_spec U ‚àà extensional U"
    by (simp_all add: H(3))
  ultimately show "s = zero_sheaf_spec U" using extensionalityI by blast
next
  fix U I V s assume H: "open_cover_of_open_subset Spec is_zariski_open U I V"
                        "‚àÄi. i ‚àà I ‚ü∂ V i ‚äÜ U ‚àß s i ‚àà ùí™ (V i)"
                        "‚ãÄi j. i ‚àà I ‚üπ
                                  j ‚àà I ‚üπ
                                    sheaf_spec_morphisms (V i) (V i ‚à© V j) (s i) =
                                    sheaf_spec_morphisms (V j) (V i ‚à© V j) (s j)"
  define t where D: "t ‚â° Œªùî≠‚ààU. s (cover_of_subset.select_index I V ùî≠) ùî≠"
  then have F1: "s i ùî≠ = s j ùî≠" if "i ‚àà I" "j ‚àà I" "ùî≠ ‚àà V i" "ùî≠ ‚àà V j" for ùî≠ i j
  proof -
    have "s i ùî≠ = sheaf_spec_morphisms (V i) (V i ‚à© V j) (s i) ùî≠"
      using that sheaf_spec_morphisms_def by (simp add: H(2))
    moreover have "‚Ä¶ = sheaf_spec_morphisms (V j) (V i ‚à© V j) (s j) ùî≠"
      using H(3) that by fastforce
    moreover have "‚Ä¶ = s j ùî≠"
      using sheaf_spec_morphisms_def that by (simp add: H(2))
    ultimately show "s i ùî≠ = s j ùî≠" by blast
  qed
  have "t ‚àà ùí™ U"
  proof-
    have "t ùî≠ ‚àà (R‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô)" if "ùî≠‚ààU" for ùî≠
      using D H(1) H(2) cover_of_subset.cover_of_select_index
        cover_of_subset.select_index_belongs open_cover_of_open_subset.axioms(1)
        open_cover_of_subset_def sec_has_right_codom that by fastforce
    moreover have "t ‚àà extensional U"
      using D by blast
    moreover have "is_regular t U"
      unfolding is_regular_def
    proof (intro strip conjI)
      fix ùî≠
      assume "ùî≠ ‚àà U"
      show "‚àÉV. is_zariski_open V ‚àß V ‚äÜ U ‚àß ùî≠ ‚àà V ‚àß is_locally_frac t V"
      proof -
        have cov_in_I: "cover_of_subset.select_index I V ùî≠ ‚àà I"
          by (meson H(1) ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫ cover_of_subset.select_index_belongs open_cover_of_open_subset_def open_cover_of_subset_def)
        have V: "V (cover_of_subset.select_index I V ùî≠) ‚äÜ U"
          using H(2) by (meson H(1) ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫ cover_of_subset.select_index_belongs open_cover_of_open_subset_def open_cover_of_subset_def)
        have V2: "‚àÉV'. is_zariski_open V' ‚àß V'‚äÜ V (cover_of_subset.select_index I V ùî≠) ‚àß ùî≠ ‚àà V' ‚àß
                 is_locally_frac (s (cover_of_subset.select_index I V ùî≠)) V'"
          using H(1,2)
          unfolding sheaf_spec_def open_cover_of_open_subset_def open_cover_of_subset_def is_regular_def
          using ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫ cov_in_I cover_of_subset.cover_of_select_index by fastforce
        have "‚ãÄV' ùîÆ. is_zariski_open V' ‚àß V' ‚äÜ V (cover_of_subset.select_index I V ùî≠) ‚üπ ùîÆ ‚àà V' ‚üπ t ùîÆ = s (cover_of_subset.select_index I V ùî≠) ùîÆ"
          by (smt D F1 H(1) V ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫ cover_of_subset.cover_of_select_index cover_of_subset.select_index_belongs open_cover_of_open_subset_def open_cover_of_subset_def restrict_apply subsetD)
        with V V2 show ?thesis unfolding is_locally_frac_def
          by (smt subset_trans)
      qed
    qed
    ultimately show ?thesis unfolding sheaf_spec_def by (simp add:PiE_iff)
  qed
  have "sheaf_spec_morphisms U (V i) t = s i" if "i ‚àà I" for i
  proof
    fix ùî≠
    have "sheaf_spec_morphisms U (V i) t ùî≠ = s i ùî≠" if "ùî≠ ‚àà U"
    proof-
      from that H(1)
      obtain j where "j ‚àà I ‚àß ùî≠ ‚àà V j ‚àß t ùî≠ = s j ùî≠"
        unfolding D open_cover_of_subset_def open_cover_of_open_subset_def
        by (meson cover_of_subset.cover_of_select_index cover_of_subset.select_index_belongs restrict_apply')
      thus "sheaf_spec_morphisms U (V i) t ùî≠ = s i ùî≠"
        using ‚Äπt ‚àà ùí™ U‚Ä∫ ‚Äπi ‚àà I‚Ä∫ H(2) that
        unfolding sheaf_spec_morphisms_def
        apply (simp add: D split: if_split_asm)
        by (metis (mono_tags, hide_lams) F1  extensional_arb [OF sec_is_extensional])
    qed
    thus "sheaf_spec_morphisms U (V i) t ùî≠ = s i ùî≠"
      using sheaf_spec_morphisms_def D F1
      by (smt H(2) ‚Äπi ‚àà I‚Ä∫ ‚Äπt ‚àà ùí™ U‚Ä∫ comm_ring.sheaf_morphisms_sheaf_spec local.comm_ring_axioms restrict_apply subsetD)
  qed
  thus "‚àÉt. t ‚àà (ùí™ U) ‚àß (‚àÄi. i ‚àà I ‚ü∂ sheaf_spec_morphisms U (V i) t = s i)"
    using ‚Äπt ‚àà ùí™ U‚Ä∫ by blast
qed

lemma shrinking:
  assumes "is_zariski_open U" and "ùî≠ ‚àà U" and "s ‚àà ùí™ U" and "t ‚àà ùí™ U"
  obtains V a f b g where "is_zariski_open V" "V ‚äÜ U" "ùî≠ ‚àà V" "a ‚àà R" "f ‚àà R" "b ‚àà R" "g ‚àà R"
"f ‚àâ ùî≠" "g ‚àâ ùî≠"
"‚ãÄùîÆ. ùîÆ ‚àà V ‚üπ f ‚àâ ùîÆ ‚àß s ùîÆ = quotient_ring.frac (R‚àñùîÆ) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ a f"
"‚ãÄùîÆ. ùîÆ ‚àà V ‚üπ g ‚àâ ùîÆ ‚àß t ùîÆ = quotient_ring.frac (R‚àñùîÆ) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ b g"
proof-
  obtain Vs a f where "is_zariski_open Vs" "Vs ‚äÜ U" "ùî≠ ‚àà Vs" "a ‚àà R" "f ‚àà R"
"‚ãÄùîÆ. ùîÆ ‚àà Vs ‚üπ f ‚àâ ùîÆ ‚àß s ùîÆ = quotient_ring.frac (R‚àñùîÆ) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ a f"
    using assms(2,3) sheaf_spec_def is_regular_def is_locally_frac_def by auto
  obtain Vt b g where "is_zariski_open Vt" "Vt ‚äÜ U" "ùî≠ ‚àà Vt" "b ‚àà R" "g ‚àà R"
"‚ãÄùîÆ. ùîÆ ‚àà Vt ‚üπ g ‚àâ ùîÆ ‚àß t ùîÆ = quotient_ring.frac (R‚àñùîÆ) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ b g"
    using assms(2,4) sheaf_spec_def is_regular_def is_locally_frac_def by auto
  then have "is_zariski_open (Vs ‚à© Vt)" "Vs ‚à© Vt ‚äÜ U" "ùî≠ ‚àà Vs ‚à© Vt"
"‚ãÄùîÆ. ùîÆ ‚àà (Vs ‚à© Vt) ‚üπ f ‚àâ ùîÆ ‚àß s ùîÆ = quotient_ring.frac (R‚àñùîÆ) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ a f"
"‚ãÄùîÆ. ùîÆ ‚àà (Vs ‚à© Vt) ‚üπ g ‚àâ ùîÆ ‚àß t ùîÆ = quotient_ring.frac (R‚àñùîÆ) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ b g"
    using topological_space.open_inter apply (simp add: ‚Äπis_zariski_open Vs‚Ä∫)
    using ‚ÄπVs ‚äÜ U‚Ä∫ apply auto[1] apply (simp add: ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà Vs‚Ä∫ ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà Vt‚Ä∫)
    apply (simp add: ‚Äπ‚ãÄùîÆ. ùîÆ ‚àà Vs ‚üπ f ‚àâ ùîÆ ‚àß s ùîÆ = quotient_ring.frac (R‚àñùîÆ) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ a f‚Ä∫)
    by (simp add: ‚Äπ‚ãÄùîÆ. ùîÆ ‚àà Vt ‚üπ g ‚àâ ùîÆ ‚àß t ùîÆ = quotient_ring.frac (R‚àñùîÆ) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ b g‚Ä∫)
  thus ?thesis using ‚Äπa ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπb ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπf ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπg ‚àà R‚Ä∫ that by presburger
qed

end (* comm_ring *)


section ‚ÄπSchemes‚Ä∫

subsection ‚ÄπRinged Spaces‚Ä∫

(* definition 0.32 *)
locale ringed_space = sheaf_of_rings

context comm_ring
begin

lemma spec_is_ringed_space:
  shows "ringed_space Spec is_zariski_open sheaf_spec sheaf_spec_morphisms ùí™b
add_sheaf_spec mult_sheaf_spec zero_sheaf_spec one_sheaf_spec"
proof (intro ringed_space.intro)
  show "sheaf_of_rings Spec is_zariski_open sheaf_spec sheaf_spec_morphisms ùí™b
     add_sheaf_spec mult_sheaf_spec zero_sheaf_spec one_sheaf_spec"
    using sheaf_spec_is_sheaf by simp
qed

end (* comm_ring *)

(* definition 0.33 *)
locale morphism_ringed_spaces =
im_sheaf X is_open‚á©X ùí™‚á©X œÅ‚á©X b add_str‚á©X mult_str‚á©X zero_str‚á©X one_str‚á©X Y is_open‚á©Y f +
 codom: ringed_space Y is_open‚á©Y ùí™‚á©Y œÅ‚á©Y d add_str‚á©Y mult_str‚á©Y zero_str‚á©Y one_str‚á©Y
for X and is_open‚á©X and ùí™‚á©X and œÅ‚á©X and b and add_str‚á©X and mult_str‚á©X and zero_str‚á©X and one_str‚á©X
and Y and is_open‚á©Y and ùí™‚á©Y and œÅ‚á©Y and d and add_str‚á©Y and mult_str‚á©Y and zero_str‚á©Y and one_str‚á©Y
and f +
fixes œÜ‚á©f:: "'c set ‚áí ('d ‚áí 'b)"
assumes is_morphism_of_sheaves: "morphism_sheaves_of_rings
Y is_open‚á©Y ùí™‚á©Y œÅ‚á©Y d add_str‚á©Y mult_str‚á©Y zero_str‚á©Y one_str‚á©Y
im_sheaf im_sheaf_morphisms b add_im_sheaf mult_im_sheaf zero_im_sheaf one_im_sheaf
œÜ‚á©f"


subsection ‚ÄπDirect Limits of Rings‚Ä∫

(* construction 0.34 *)
locale direct_lim = sheaf_of_rings +
  fixes I:: "'a set set"
  assumes subset_of_opens: "‚ãÄU. U ‚àà I ‚üπ is_open U"
    and has_lower_bound: "‚ãÄU V. ‚ü¶ U‚ààI; V‚ààI ‚üß ‚üπ ‚àÉW‚ààI. W ‚äÜ U ‚à© V"
begin

definition get_lower_bound:: "'a set ‚áí 'a set ‚áí 'a set" where
  "get_lower_bound U V= (SOME W. W ‚àà I ‚àß W ‚äÜ U ‚àß W ‚äÜ V)"

lemma get_lower_bound[intro]:
  assumes "U ‚àà I" "V ‚àà I"
  shows "get_lower_bound U V ‚àà I" "get_lower_bound U V ‚äÜ U" "get_lower_bound U V ‚äÜ V"
proof -
  have "‚àÉW. W ‚àà I ‚àß W ‚äÜ U ‚àß W ‚äÜ V"
    using has_lower_bound[OF assms] by auto
  from someI_ex[OF this]
  show "get_lower_bound U V ‚àà I" "get_lower_bound U V ‚äÜ U" "get_lower_bound U V ‚äÜ V"
    unfolding get_lower_bound_def by auto
qed

lemma obtain_lower_bound_finite:
  assumes "finite Us"  "Us ‚â† {}" "Us ‚äÜ I"
  obtains W where "W ‚àà I" "‚àÄU‚ààUs. W ‚äÜ U"
  using assms
proof (induct Us arbitrary:thesis)
  case (insert U F)
  have ?case when "F={}"
    using insert.prems(1) insert.prems(3) that by blast
  moreover have ?case when "F‚â†{}"
  proof -
    obtain W where "W ‚àà I" "‚àÄU‚ààF. W ‚äÜ U"
      using insert.hyps(3) insert.prems(3) by auto
    obtain W1 where "W1 ‚ààI" "W1 ‚äÜ U" "W1 ‚äÜ W"
      by (meson ‚ÄπW ‚àà I‚Ä∫ get_lower_bound(1) get_lower_bound(2) get_lower_bound(3)
          insert.prems(3) insert_subset)
    then have "‚àÄa‚ààinsert U F. W1 ‚äÜ a"
      using ‚Äπ‚àÄU‚ààF. W ‚äÜ U‚Ä∫ by auto
    with ‚ÄπW1 ‚ààI‚Ä∫ show ?thesis
      using insert(4) by auto
  qed
  ultimately show ?case by auto
qed simp

definition principal_subs :: "'a set set ‚áí 'a set ‚áí 'a set filter" where
  "principal_subs As A = Abs_filter (ŒªP. ‚àÄx. (x‚ààAs ‚àß x ‚äÜ A) ‚ü∂ P x)"

lemma eventually_principal_subs: "eventually P (principal_subs As A) ‚ü∑ (‚àÄx. x‚ààAs ‚àß x‚äÜA ‚ü∂ P x)"
  unfolding principal_subs_def
  by (rule eventually_Abs_filter, rule is_filter.intro) auto

lemma principal_subs_UNIV[simp]: "principal_subs UNIV UNIV = top"
  by (auto simp: filter_eq_iff eventually_principal_subs)

lemma principal_subs_empty[simp]: "principal_subs {} s = bot"
  (*"principal_subs ss {} = bot"*)
  by (auto simp: filter_eq_iff eventually_principal_subs)

lemma principal_subs_le_iff[iff]:
  "principal_subs As A ‚â§ principal_subs As' A'
            ‚ü∑ {x. x‚ààAs ‚àß x ‚äÜ A} ‚äÜ {x. x‚ààAs' ‚àß x ‚äÜ A'}"
  unfolding le_filter_def eventually_principal_subs by blast

lemma principal_subs_eq_iff[iff]:
    "principal_subs As A = principal_subs As' A' ‚ü∑{x. x‚ààAs ‚àß x ‚äÜ A} = {x. x‚ààAs' ‚àß x ‚äÜ A'}"
  unfolding eq_iff by simp

lemma principal_subs_inj_on[simp]:"inj_on (principal_subs As) As"
  unfolding inj_on_def by auto

definition lbound :: "'a set set ‚áí ('a set) filter" where
  "lbound Us = (INF S‚àà{S. S‚ààI ‚àß (‚àÄu‚ààUs. S ‚äÜ u)}. principal_subs I S)"

lemma eventually_lbound_finite:
  assumes "finite A" "A‚â†{}" "A‚äÜI"
  shows "(‚àÄ‚á©F w in lbound A. P w) ‚ü∑ (‚àÉw0. w0 ‚àà I ‚àß (‚àÄa‚ààA. w0 ‚äÜ a) ‚àß (‚àÄw. (w‚äÜw0 ‚àß w‚ààI) ‚ü∂ P w))"
proof -
  have "‚àÉx. x ‚àà I ‚àß (‚àÄxa‚ààA. x ‚äÜ xa)"
    by (metis Int_iff assms inf.order_iff obtain_lower_bound_finite)
  moreover have " ‚àÉx. x ‚àà I ‚àß Ball A ((‚äÜ) x)
              ‚àß {xa ‚àà I. xa ‚äÜ x} ‚äÜ {x ‚àà I. x ‚äÜ a}
                ‚àß {xa ‚àà I. xa ‚äÜ x} ‚äÜ {x ‚àà I. x ‚äÜ b}"
    if "a ‚àà I ‚àß (‚àÄx‚ààA. a ‚äÜ x)" "b ‚àà I ‚àß (‚àÄx‚ààA. b ‚äÜ x)" for a b
    apply (rule exI[where x="get_lower_bound a b"])
    using that apply auto
    subgoal using get_lower_bound(2) by blast
    subgoal by (meson get_lower_bound(2) subsetD)
    subgoal by (meson get_lower_bound(3) subsetD)
    done
  moreover have "(‚àÉb‚àà{S ‚àà I. Ball A ((‚äÜ) S)}. eventually P (principal_subs I b)) =
    (‚àÉw0. w0 ‚àà I ‚àß Ball A ((‚äÜ) w0) ‚àß (‚àÄw. w ‚äÜ w0 ‚àß w ‚àà I ‚ü∂ P w))"
    unfolding eventually_principal_subs by force
  ultimately show ?thesis unfolding lbound_def
    by (subst eventually_INF_base) auto
qed

lemma lbound_eq:
  assumes A:"finite A" "A‚â†{}" "A‚äÜI"
  assumes B:"finite B" "B‚â†{}" "B‚äÜI"
  shows "lbound A = lbound B"
proof -
  have "eventually P (lbound A')" if "eventually P (lbound B')"
    and A':"finite A'" "A'‚â†{}" "A' ‚äÜ I"
    and B':"finite B'" "B'‚â†{}" "B' ‚äÜ I"
  for P A' B'
  proof -
    obtain w0 where w0:"w0 ‚àà I" "(‚àÄa‚ààB'. w0 ‚äÜ a)" "(‚àÄw. w ‚äÜ w0 ‚àß w ‚àà I ‚ü∂ P w)"
      using ‚Äπeventually P (lbound B')‚Ä∫ unfolding eventually_lbound_finite[OF B',of P]
      by auto
    obtain w1 where w1:"w1 ‚àà I" "‚àÄU‚ààA'. w1 ‚äÜ U"
      using obtain_lower_bound_finite[OF A'] by auto
    define w2 where "w2=get_lower_bound w0 w1"
    have "w2 ‚àà I" using ‚Äπw0 ‚àà I‚Ä∫ ‚Äπw1 ‚àà I‚Ä∫ unfolding w2_def by auto
    moreover have "‚àÄa‚ààA'. w2 ‚äÜ a"
      unfolding w2_def by (meson dual_order.trans get_lower_bound(3) w0(1) w1(1) w1(2))
    moreover have "‚àÄw. w ‚äÜ w2 ‚àß w ‚àà I ‚ü∂ P w"
      unfolding w2_def by (meson dual_order.trans get_lower_bound(2) w0(1) w0(3) w1(1))
    ultimately show ?thesis unfolding eventually_lbound_finite[OF A',of P] by auto
  qed
  then have "eventually P (lbound A) = eventually P (lbound B)" for P
    using A B by auto
  then show ?thesis unfolding filter_eq_iff by auto
qed

lemma lbound_leq:
  assumes "A ‚äÜ B"
  shows "lbound A ‚â§lbound B"
  unfolding lbound_def
  apply (rule Inf_superset_mono)
  apply (rule image_mono)
  using assms by auto

definition llbound::"('a set) filter" where
  "llbound = lbound {SOME a. a‚ààI}"

lemma llbound_not_bot:
  assumes "I‚â† {}"
  shows "llbound ‚â† bot"
  unfolding trivial_limit_def llbound_def
  apply (subst eventually_lbound_finite)
  using assms by (auto simp add: some_in_eq)

lemma llbound_lbound:
  assumes "finite A" "A‚â†{}" "A‚äÜI"
  shows "lbound A = llbound"
  unfolding llbound_def
  apply (rule lbound_eq)
  using assms by (auto simp add: some_in_eq)

definition rel:: "('a set √ó 'b) ‚áí ('a set √ó 'b) ‚áí bool" (infix "‚àº" 80)
  where "x ‚àº y ‚â° (fst x ‚àà I ‚àß fst y ‚àà I) ‚àß (snd x ‚àà ùîâ (fst x) ‚àß snd y ‚àà ùîâ (fst y)) ‚àß
(‚àÉW. (W ‚àà I) ‚àß (W ‚äÜ fst x ‚à© fst y) ‚àß œÅ (fst x) W (snd x) = œÅ (fst y) W (snd y))"

lemma rel_is_equivalence:
  shows "equivalence (Sigma I ùîâ) {(x, y). x ‚àº y}"
  unfolding equivalence_def
proof (intro conjI strip)
  show "(a, c) ‚àà {(x, y). x ‚àº y}"
    if "(a, b) ‚àà {(x, y). x ‚àº y}" "(b, c) ‚àà {(x, y). x ‚àº y}" for a b c
  proof -
    obtain W1 where W1:"fst a ‚àà I" "fst b ‚àà I" "snd a ‚àà ùîâ (fst a)" "snd b ‚àà ùîâ (fst b)"
                    "W1 ‚àà I" "W1 ‚äÜ fst a" "W1 ‚äÜ fst b"
                    "œÅ (fst a) W1 (snd a) = œÅ (fst b) W1 (snd b)"
      using ‚Äπ(a, b) ‚àà {(x, y). x ‚àº y}‚Ä∫ unfolding rel_def by auto
    obtain W2 where W2:"fst b ‚àà I" "fst c ‚àà I" "snd b ‚àà ùîâ (fst b)" "snd c ‚àà ùîâ (fst c)"
                    "W2 ‚àà I" "W2 ‚äÜ fst b" "W2 ‚äÜ fst c"
                    "œÅ (fst b) W2 (snd b) = œÅ (fst c) W2 (snd c)"
      using ‚Äπ(b, c) ‚àà {(x, y). x ‚àº y}‚Ä∫ unfolding rel_def by auto
    obtain W3 where W3:"W3 ‚ààI" "W3 ‚äÜ W1 ‚à© W2"
      using has_lower_bound[OF ‚ÄπW1‚ààI‚Ä∫ ‚ÄπW2‚ààI‚Ä∫] by auto
    from ‚ÄπW3 ‚äÜ W1 ‚à© W2‚Ä∫
    have "W3 ‚äÜ fst a ‚à© fst c" using W1(6) W2(7) by blast
    moreover have "œÅ (fst a) W3 (snd a) = œÅ (fst c) W3 (snd c)"
      using W1 W2 by (metis W3(1) W3(2) eq_œÅ le_inf_iff subset_of_opens)
    moreover note ‚ÄπW3 ‚ààI‚Ä∫ W1 W2
    ultimately show ?thesis
      unfolding rel_def by auto
  qed
qed (auto simp: rel_def Int_commute)

interpretation rel:equivalence "(Sigma I ùîâ)" "{(x, y). x ‚àº y}"
  using rel_is_equivalence .

definition class_of:: "'a set ‚áí 'b ‚áí ('a set √ó 'b) set" ("‚åä(_,/ _)‚åã")
  where "‚åäU,s‚åã ‚â° rel.Class (U, s)"

lemma class_of_eqD:
  assumes "‚åäU1,s1‚åã = ‚åäU2,s2‚åã" "(U1,s1) ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ" "(U2,s2) ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ"
  obtains W where "W ‚àà I" "W ‚äÜ U1 ‚à© U2" "œÅ U1 W s1 = œÅ U2 W s2"
  using rel.Class_equivalence[OF assms(2,3)] assms(1)
  unfolding class_of_def rel_def by auto

lemma class_of_eqI:
  assumes "(U1,s1) ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ" "(U2,s2) ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ"
  assumes "W ‚àà I" "W ‚äÜ U1 ‚à© U2" "œÅ U1 W s1 = œÅ U2 W s2"
  shows "‚åäU1,s1‚åã = ‚åäU2,s2‚åã"
  unfolding class_of_def
  apply (rule rel.Class_eq)
  using assms  by (auto simp: rel_def)

lemma class_of_0_in:
  assumes "U ‚àà I"
  shows "ùü¨‚áòU‚áô ‚àà ùîâ U"
proof -
  have "ring (ùîâ U) +‚áòU‚áô ‚ãÖ‚áòU‚áô ùü¨‚áòU‚áô ùü≠‚áòU‚áô"
    using assms subset_of_opens is_ring_from_is_homomorphism by blast
  then show ?thesis
    unfolding ring_def abelian_group_def Group_Theory.group_def by (meson monoid.unit_closed)
qed

lemma rel_Class_iff: "x ‚àº y ‚ü∑ y ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ ‚àß x ‚àà rel.Class y"
  by blast

lemma class_of_0_eq:
  assumes "U ‚àà I" "U' ‚àà I"
  shows "‚åäU, ùü¨‚áòU‚áô‚åã = ‚åäU', ùü¨‚áòU'‚áô‚åã"
proof -
  obtain W where W: "W ‚àà I" "W ‚äÜ U" "W ‚äÜ U'"
    by (metis Int_subset_iff assms has_lower_bound)
  then have "is_open W" "is_open U" "is_open U'"
    by (auto simp add: assms subset_of_opens)
  then have "œÅ U W ùü¨‚áòU‚áô = œÅ U' W ùü¨‚áòU'‚áô"
    using W is_ring_morphism [of U W] is_ring_morphism [of U' W]
    by (simp add: ring_homomorphism_def group_homomorphism_def monoid_homomorphism_def
               monoid_homomorphism_axioms_def)
  with W have "‚àÉW. W ‚àà I ‚àß W ‚äÜ U ‚àß W ‚äÜ U' ‚àß œÅ U W ùü¨‚áòU‚áô = œÅ U' W ùü¨‚áòU'‚áô" by blast
  moreover have "ùü¨‚áòU‚áô ‚àà ùîâ U" "ùü¨‚áòU'‚áô ‚àà ùîâ U'"
    by (auto simp add: assms class_of_0_in)
  ultimately have "(U, ùü¨‚áòU‚áô) ‚àº (U', ùü¨‚áòU'‚áô)"
    using assms by (auto simp: rel_def)
  then show ?thesis
    unfolding class_of_def by (simp add: rel.Class_eq)
qed

lemma class_of_1_in:
  assumes "U ‚àà I"
  shows "ùü≠‚áòU‚áô ‚àà ùîâ U"
proof -
  have "ring (ùîâ U) +‚áòU‚áô ‚ãÖ‚áòU‚áô ùü¨‚áòU‚áô ùü≠‚áòU‚áô"
    using assms subset_of_opens is_ring_from_is_homomorphism by blast
  then show ?thesis
    unfolding ring_def by (meson monoid.unit_closed)
qed

lemma class_of_1_eq:
  assumes "U ‚àà I" and "U' ‚àà I"
  shows "‚åäU, ùü≠‚áòU‚áô‚åã = ‚åäU', ùü≠‚áòU'‚áô‚åã"
proof -
  obtain W where W: "W ‚àà I" "W ‚äÜ U" "W ‚äÜ U'"
    by (metis Int_subset_iff assms has_lower_bound)
  then have "is_open W" "is_open U" "is_open U'"
    by (auto simp add: assms subset_of_opens)
  then have "œÅ U W ùü≠‚áòU‚áô = œÅ U' W ùü≠‚áòU'‚áô"
    using W is_ring_morphism [of U W] is_ring_morphism [of U' W]
    by (simp add: ring_homomorphism_def group_homomorphism_def monoid_homomorphism_def
               monoid_homomorphism_axioms_def)
  with W have "‚àÉW. W ‚àà I ‚àß W ‚äÜ U ‚àß W ‚äÜ U' ‚àß œÅ U W ùü≠‚áòU‚áô = œÅ U' W ùü≠‚áòU'‚áô" by blast
  moreover
  have "ùü≠‚áòU‚áô ‚àà ùîâ U" "ùü≠‚áòU'‚áô ‚àà ùîâ U'"
    by (auto simp add: assms class_of_1_in)
  ultimately have "(U, ùü≠‚áòU‚áô) ‚àº (U', ùü≠‚áòU'‚áô)"
    using assms by (auto simp: rel_def)
  then show ?thesis
    unfolding class_of_def by (simp add: rel.Class_eq)
qed

definition add_rel :: "('a set √ó 'b) set ‚áí ('a set √ó 'b) set ‚áí ('a set √ó 'b) set"
  where "add_rel X Y ‚â° let
              x = (SOME x. x ‚àà X);
              y = (SOME y. y ‚àà Y);
              w = get_lower_bound (fst x) (fst y)
            in
              ‚åäw, add_str w (œÅ (fst x) w (snd x)) (œÅ (fst y) w (snd y))‚åã"

definition mult_rel :: "('a set √ó 'b) set ‚áí ('a set √ó 'b) set ‚áí ('a set √ó 'b) set"
  where "mult_rel X Y ‚â° let
              x = (SOME x. x ‚àà X);
              y = (SOME y. y ‚àà Y);
              w = get_lower_bound (fst x) (fst y)
            in
              ‚åäw, mult_str w (œÅ (fst x) w (snd x)) (œÅ (fst y) w (snd y))‚åã"

definition carrier_direct_lim:: "('a set √ó 'b) set set"
  where "carrier_direct_lim ‚â° rel.Partition"

lemma zero_rel_carrier[intro]:
  assumes "U ‚àà I"
  shows "‚åäU, ùü¨‚áòU‚áô‚åã ‚àà carrier_direct_lim"
  unfolding carrier_direct_lim_def class_of_def
proof (rule rel.Block_closed)
  interpret ring "(ùîâ U)" "+‚áòU‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòU‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòU‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòU‚áô"
    by (simp add: assms is_ring_from_is_homomorphism subset_of_opens)
  show "(U, ùü¨‚áòU‚áô) ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ"
    by (simp add: assms)
qed

lemma one_rel_carrier[intro]:
  assumes "U ‚àà I"
  shows "‚åäU, ùü≠‚áòU‚áô‚åã ‚àà carrier_direct_lim"
  unfolding carrier_direct_lim_def class_of_def
  apply (rule rel.Block_closed)
  by (simp add: assms class_of_1_in)

lemma rel_carrier_Eps_in:
  fixes X :: "('a set √ó 'b) set"
  defines "a‚â°(SOME x. x ‚àà X)"
  assumes "X ‚àà carrier_direct_lim"
  shows "a ‚àà X" "a ‚ààSigma I ùîâ"  "X = ‚åäfst a, snd a‚åã"
proof -
  have "‚àÉa‚ààSigma I ùîâ. a ‚àà X ‚àß X = rel.Class a"
    using rel.representant_exists[OF ‚ÄπX ‚àà carrier_direct_lim‚Ä∫[unfolded carrier_direct_lim_def]]
    by simp
  then have "a ‚àà X ‚àß a ‚ààSigma I ùîâ ‚àß X = ‚åäfst a, snd a‚åã"
    unfolding class_of_def
    by (metis a_def assms(2) carrier_direct_lim_def ex_in_conv prod.collapse rel.Block_self
        rel.Class_closed some_in_eq)
  then show "a ‚àà X" "a ‚ààSigma I ùîâ"  "X = ‚åäfst a, snd a‚åã" by auto
qed

lemma add_rel_carrier[intro]:
  assumes "X ‚àà carrier_direct_lim" "Y ‚àà carrier_direct_lim"
  shows "add_rel X Y ‚àà carrier_direct_lim"
proof -
  define x where "x=(SOME x. x ‚àà X)"
  define y where "y=(SOME y. y ‚àà Y)"
  define z where "z=get_lower_bound (fst x) (fst y)"

  have "x‚ààX" "x‚ààSigma I ùîâ"
    using rel_carrier_Eps_in[OF ‚ÄπX ‚àà carrier_direct_lim‚Ä∫] unfolding x_def by auto
  have "y‚ààY" "y ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ"
    using rel_carrier_Eps_in[OF ‚ÄπY ‚àà carrier_direct_lim‚Ä∫] unfolding y_def by auto

  have "add_rel X Y = ‚åäz, add_str z (œÅ (fst x) z (snd x)) (œÅ (fst y) z (snd y))‚åã"
    unfolding add_rel_def Let_def
    by (fold x_def y_def z_def,rule)
  also have "... ‚àà carrier_direct_lim"
    unfolding carrier_direct_lim_def class_of_def
  proof (rule rel.Block_closed)
    have "z‚ààI" using ‚Äπx‚ààSigma I ùîâ‚Ä∫ ‚Äπy‚ààSigma I ùîâ‚Ä∫ unfolding z_def by auto
    then interpret ring "(ùîâ z)" "+‚áòz‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòz‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòz‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòz‚áô"
      using is_ring_from_is_homomorphism subset_of_opens by auto
    show "(z, +‚áòz‚áô (œÅ (fst x) z (snd x)) (œÅ (fst y) z (snd y))) ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ"
      using ‚Äπz‚ààI‚Ä∫
      apply simp
      by (metis ‚Äπx ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ‚Ä∫ ‚Äπy ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ‚Ä∫ additive.composition_closed
          direct_lim.subset_of_opens direct_lim_axioms get_lower_bound(2) get_lower_bound(3)
          is_map_from_is_homomorphism map.map_closed mem_Sigma_iff prod.exhaust_sel z_def)
  qed
  finally show ?thesis .
qed


lemma rel_eventually_llbound:
  assumes "x ‚àº y"
  shows "‚àÄ‚á©F w in llbound. œÅ (fst x) w (snd x) = œÅ (fst y) w (snd y)"
proof -
  have xy:"fst x ‚àà I" "fst y ‚àà I" "snd x ‚àà ùîâ (fst x)" "snd y ‚àà ùîâ (fst y)"
    using ‚Äπx ‚àº y‚Ä∫ unfolding rel_def by auto
  obtain w0 where w0:"w0 ‚àà I" "w0 ‚äÜ fst x ‚à© fst y" "œÅ (fst x) w0 (snd x) = œÅ (fst y) w0 (snd y)"
    using ‚Äπx ‚àº y‚Ä∫ unfolding rel_def by auto

  interpret xw0:ring_homomorphism "œÅ (fst x) w0" "ùîâ (fst x)" "+‚áòfst x‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòfst x‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòfst x‚áô"
        "ùü≠‚áòfst x‚áô" "ùîâ w0" "+‚áòw0‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòw0‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòw0‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòw0‚áô"
    by (meson is_ring_morphism le_inf_iff subset_of_opens w0 xy(1))
  interpret yw0:ring_homomorphism "œÅ (fst y) w0" "ùîâ (fst y)" "+‚áòfst y‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòfst y‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòfst y‚áô"
        "ùü≠‚áòfst y‚áô" "ùîâ w0" "+‚áòw0‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòw0‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòw0‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòw0‚áô"
    using w0 by (metis is_ring_morphism le_inf_iff subset_of_opens  xy(2))
  have "œÅ (fst x) w (snd x) = œÅ (fst y) w (snd y)" if "w ‚äÜ w0" "w ‚àà I" for w
  proof -
    interpret w0w:ring_homomorphism "œÅ w0 w" "ùîâ w0" "+‚áòw0‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòw0‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòw0‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòw0‚áô" "ùîâ w"
                  "+‚áòw‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòw‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòw‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòw‚áô"
      using is_ring_morphism subset_of_opens that w0(1) by presburger

    have "œÅ (fst x) w (snd x) = (œÅ w0 w ‚àò œÅ (fst x) w0) (snd x)"
      by (meson assoc_comp le_inf_iff subset_of_opens that w0 xy)
    also have "... = (œÅ w0 w ‚àò œÅ (fst y) w0) (snd y)"
      unfolding comp_def
      using w0(3) by auto
    also have "... = œÅ (fst y) w (snd y)"
      using w0 xy by (metis Int_subset_iff assoc_comp subset_of_opens that)
    finally show ?thesis .
  qed
  with w0 have "‚àÉw0. w0 ‚àà I ‚àß w0 ‚äÜ fst x ‚à© fst y
            ‚àß (‚àÄw. (w‚äÜw0 ‚àß w‚ààI) ‚ü∂ œÅ (fst x) w (snd x) = œÅ (fst y) w (snd y))"
    by auto
  then have "‚àÄ‚á©F w in lbound {fst x,fst y}. œÅ (fst x) w (snd x) = œÅ (fst y) w (snd y)"
    apply (subst eventually_lbound_finite)
    using xy(1,2) by auto
  then show ?thesis
    using llbound_lbound[of "{fst x,fst y}"] xy(1,2) by auto
qed

lemma
  fixes x y:: "'a set √ó 'b" and z z':: "'a set"
  assumes xy:"x ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ" "y ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ"
  assumes z:"z‚ààI" "z ‚äÜ fst x" "z ‚äÜ fst y"
  assumes z':"z'‚ààI" "z' ‚äÜ fst x" "z' ‚äÜ fst y"
  shows add_rel_well_defined:"‚åäz, add_str z (œÅ (fst x) z (snd x)) (œÅ (fst y) z (snd y))‚åã =
          ‚åäz', add_str z' (œÅ (fst x) z' (snd x)) (œÅ (fst y) z' (snd y))‚åã" (is "?add")
    and mult_rel_well_defined:
        "‚åäz, mult_str z (œÅ (fst x) z (snd x)) (œÅ (fst y) z (snd y))‚åã =
         ‚åäz', mult_str z' (œÅ (fst x) z' (snd x)) (œÅ (fst y) z' (snd y))‚åã" (is "?mult")
proof -
  interpret xz:ring_homomorphism "(œÅ (fst x) z)" "(ùîâ (fst x))"
              "+‚áòfst x‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòfst x‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòfst x‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòfst x‚áô" "(ùîâ z)" "+‚áòz‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòz‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòz‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòz‚áô"
    using is_ring_morphism ‚Äπx ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ‚Ä∫ z subset_of_opens by force
  interpret yz:ring_homomorphism "(œÅ (fst y) z)" "(ùîâ (fst y))"
              "+‚áòfst y‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòfst y‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòfst y‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòfst y‚áô" "(ùîâ z)" "+‚áòz‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòz‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòz‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòz‚áô"
    using is_ring_morphism ‚Äπy ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ‚Ä∫ z subset_of_opens by force
  interpret xz':ring_homomorphism "(œÅ (fst x) z')" "(ùîâ (fst x))"
              "+‚áòfst x‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòfst x‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòfst x‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòfst x‚áô" "(ùîâ z')" "+‚áòz'‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòz'‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòz'‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòz'‚áô"
    using is_ring_morphism ‚Äπx ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ‚Ä∫ z' subset_of_opens by force
  interpret yz':ring_homomorphism "(œÅ (fst y) z')" "(ùîâ (fst y))"
              "+‚áòfst y‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòfst y‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòfst y‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòfst y‚áô" "(ùîâ z')" "+‚áòz'‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòz'‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòz'‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòz'‚áô"
    using is_ring_morphism ‚Äπy ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ‚Ä∫ z' subset_of_opens by force

  obtain w where w:"w ‚àà I" "w ‚äÜ z ‚à© z'"
    using has_lower_bound ‚Äπz‚ààI‚Ä∫ ‚Äπz'‚ààI‚Ä∫ by meson

  interpret zw:ring_homomorphism "œÅ z w" "(ùîâ z)" "+‚áòz‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòz‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòz‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòz‚áô"
      "ùîâ w" "+‚áòw‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòw‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòw‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòw‚áô"
    using w by (meson is_ring_morphism le_inf_iff subset_of_opens z(1))
  interpret z'w:ring_homomorphism "œÅ z' w" "(ùîâ z')" "+‚áòz'‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòz'‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòz'‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòz'‚áô"
      "ùîâ w" "+‚áòw‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòw‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòw‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòw‚áô"
