    using ‚Äπw ‚àà I‚Ä∫ ‚Äπw ‚äÜ z ‚à© z'‚Ä∫ z' by (meson is_ring_morphism le_inf_iff subset_of_opens)

  show ?add
  proof (rule class_of_eqI[OF _ _ ‚Äπw ‚àà I‚Ä∫ ‚Äπw ‚äÜ z ‚à© z'‚Ä∫])
    define xz yz where "xz = œÅ (fst x) z (snd x)" and "yz = œÅ (fst y) z (snd y)"
    define xz' yz' where "xz' = œÅ (fst x) z' (snd x)" and "yz' = œÅ (fst y) z' (snd y)"
    show "(z, +‚áòz‚áô xz yz) ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ" "(z', +‚áòz'‚áô xz' yz') ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ"
      subgoal using assms(1) assms(2) xz_def yz_def z(1) by fastforce
      subgoal using assms(1) assms(2) xz'_def yz'_def z'(1) by fastforce
      done
    have "œÅ z w (+‚áòz‚áô xz yz) = +‚áòw‚áô (œÅ z w xz) (œÅ z w yz)"
      apply (rule zw.additive.commutes_with_composition)
      using assms(1,2) xz_def yz_def by force+
    also have "... = +‚áòw‚áô (œÅ (fst x) w (snd x)) (œÅ (fst y) w (snd y))"
      unfolding xz_def yz_def
      using assoc_comp w z subset_of_opens assms
      by (metis SigmaE le_inf_iff o_def prod.sel)
    also have "... = +‚áòw‚áô (œÅ z' w xz') (œÅ z' w yz')"
      unfolding xz'_def yz'_def
      using assoc_comp  w z' subset_of_opens assms
      by (metis SigmaE le_inf_iff o_def prod.sel)
    also have "... = œÅ z' w (+‚áòz'‚áô xz' yz')"
      using assms(2) xy(1) xz'_def yz'_def z'w.additive.commutes_with_composition by force
    finally show "œÅ z w (+‚áòz‚áô xz yz) = œÅ z' w (+‚áòz'‚áô xz' yz')" .
  qed

  show ?mult
  proof (rule class_of_eqI[OF _ _ ‚Äπw ‚àà I‚Ä∫ ‚Äπw ‚äÜ z ‚à© z'‚Ä∫])
    define xz yz where "xz = œÅ (fst x) z (snd x)" and "yz = œÅ (fst y) z (snd y)"
    define xz' yz' where "xz' = œÅ (fst x) z' (snd x)" and "yz' = œÅ (fst y) z' (snd y)"
    show "(z, ‚ãÖ‚áòz‚áô xz yz) ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ" "(z', ‚ãÖ‚áòz'‚áô xz' yz') ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ"
      unfolding xz_def yz_def xz'_def yz'_def
      using assms by auto
    have "œÅ z w (‚ãÖ‚áòz‚áô xz yz) = ‚ãÖ‚áòw‚áô (œÅ z w xz) (œÅ z w yz)"
      apply (rule zw.multiplicative.commutes_with_composition)
      using xy xz_def yz_def by force+
    also have "... = ‚ãÖ‚áòw‚áô (œÅ (fst x) w (snd x)) (œÅ (fst y) w (snd y))"
      unfolding xz_def yz_def
      using xy w z assoc_comp
      by (metis SigmaE fst_conv le_inf_iff o_def snd_conv subset_of_opens)
    also have "... = ‚ãÖ‚áòw‚áô (œÅ z' w xz') (œÅ z' w yz')"
      unfolding xz'_def yz'_def
      using xy w z' assoc_comp
      by (metis SigmaE fst_conv le_inf_iff o_def snd_conv subset_of_opens)
    also have "... = œÅ z' w (‚ãÖ‚áòz'‚áô xz' yz')"
      unfolding xz'_def yz'_def
      using monoid_homomorphism.commutes_with_composition xy z'w.multiplicative.monoid_homomorphism_axioms by fastforce
    finally show "œÅ z w (‚ãÖ‚áòz‚áô xz yz) = œÅ z' w (‚ãÖ‚áòz'‚áô xz' yz')" .
  qed
qed

lemma add_rel_well_defined_llbound:
  fixes x y:: "'a set √ó 'b" and z z':: "'a set"
  assumes "x ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ" "y ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ"
  assumes z:"z‚ààI" "z ‚äÜ fst x" "z ‚äÜ fst y"
  shows "‚àÄ‚á©F w in llbound. ‚åäz, add_str z (œÅ (fst x) z (snd x)) (œÅ (fst y) z (snd y))‚åã =
          ‚åäw, add_str w (œÅ (fst x) w (snd x)) (œÅ (fst y) w (snd y))‚åã" (is "‚àÄ‚á©F w in _. ?P w")
proof -
  have  "‚àÄw. w ‚äÜ z ‚àß w ‚àà I ‚ü∂?P w "
    by (meson add_rel_well_defined assms(1) assms(2) dual_order.trans z(1) z(2) z(3))
  then have "‚àÄ‚á©F w in lbound {fst x,fst y}. ?P w"
    apply (subst eventually_lbound_finite)
    using assms by auto
  then show ?thesis
    using llbound_lbound[of "{fst x,fst y}"] assms(1,2) by auto
qed

lemma mult_rel_well_defined_llbound:
  fixes x y:: "'a set √ó 'b" and z z':: "'a set"
  assumes "x ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ" "y ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ"
  assumes z:"z‚ààI" "z ‚äÜ fst x" "z ‚äÜ fst y"
  shows "‚àÄ‚á©F w in llbound. ‚åäz, mult_str z (œÅ (fst x) z (snd x)) (œÅ (fst y) z (snd y))‚åã =
          ‚åäw, mult_str w (œÅ (fst x) w (snd x)) (œÅ (fst y) w (snd y))‚åã" (is "‚àÄ‚á©F w in _. ?P w")
proof -
  have  "‚àÄw. w ‚äÜ z ‚àß w ‚àà I ‚ü∂?P w "
    by (meson mult_rel_well_defined assms(1) assms(2) dual_order.trans z(1) z(2) z(3))
  then have "‚àÄ‚á©F w in lbound {fst x,fst y}. ?P w"
    apply (subst eventually_lbound_finite)
    using assms by auto
  then show ?thesis
    using llbound_lbound[of "{fst x,fst y}"] assms(1,2) by auto
qed

lemma add_rel_class_of:
  fixes U V W :: "'a set" and x y :: 'b
  assumes uv_sigma:"(U, x) ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ" "(V, y) ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ"
  assumes w:"W ‚àà I" "W ‚äÜ U" "W ‚äÜ V"
  shows "add_rel ‚åäU, x‚åã ‚åäV, y‚åã = ‚åäW, +‚áòW‚áô (œÅ U W x) (œÅ V W y)‚åã"
proof -
  define ux where "ux = (SOME ux. ux ‚àà ‚åäU, x‚åã)"
  define vy where "vy = (SOME ux. ux ‚àà ‚åäV, y‚åã)"
  have "ux ‚àà ‚åäU, x‚åã" "vy ‚àà ‚åäV, y‚åã "
    unfolding ux_def vy_def using uv_sigma class_of_def some_in_eq by blast+
  then have "ux ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ" "vy ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ"
    using class_of_def uv_sigma by blast+
  then have "fst ux ‚àà I" "fst vy ‚àà I" by auto

  define w1 where "w1 = get_lower_bound (fst ux) (fst vy)"
  have w1:"w1 ‚àà I" "w1 ‚äÜ fst ux" "w1 ‚äÜ fst vy"
    using get_lower_bound[OF ‚Äπfst ux ‚àà I‚Ä∫ ‚Äπfst vy ‚àà I‚Ä∫] unfolding w1_def by auto

  have "add_rel ‚åäU, x‚åã ‚åäV, y‚åã = ‚åäw1, +‚áòw1‚áô (œÅ (fst ux) w1 (snd ux)) (œÅ (fst vy) w1 (snd vy))‚åã"
    unfolding add_rel_def
    apply (fold ux_def vy_def)
    by (simp add:Let_def w1_def)
  moreover have "‚àÄ‚á©F w in llbound.
            ... = ‚åäw, add_str w (œÅ (fst ux) w (snd ux)) (œÅ (fst vy) w (snd vy))‚åã"
    apply (rule add_rel_well_defined_llbound)
    using ‚Äπux ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ‚Ä∫ ‚Äπvy ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ‚Ä∫ w1 by auto
  ultimately have "‚àÄ‚á©F w in llbound. add_rel ‚åäU, x‚åã ‚åäV, y‚åã
      = ‚åäw, add_str w (œÅ (fst ux) w (snd ux)) (œÅ (fst vy) w (snd vy))‚åã"
    by simp
  moreover have
    "‚àÄ‚á©F w in llbound. œÅ (fst ux) w (snd ux) = œÅ (fst (U, x)) w (snd (U, x))"
    "‚àÄ‚á©F w in llbound. œÅ (fst vy) w (snd vy) = œÅ (fst (V, y)) w (snd (V, y))"
    subgoal
      apply (rule rel_eventually_llbound)
      using ‚Äπux ‚àà ‚åäU, x‚åã‚Ä∫ class_of_def uv_sigma(1) by auto
    subgoal
      apply (rule rel_eventually_llbound)
      using ‚Äπvy ‚àà ‚åäV, y‚åã‚Ä∫ class_of_def uv_sigma(2) by auto
    done
  ultimately have "‚àÄ‚á©F w in llbound. add_rel ‚åäU, x‚åã ‚åäV, y‚åã
      = ‚åäw, add_str w (œÅ U w x) (œÅ V w y)‚åã"
    apply eventually_elim
    by auto
  moreover have "‚àÄ‚á©F w in llbound. ‚åäW, +‚áòW‚áô (œÅ U W x) (œÅ V W y)‚åã = ‚åäw, +‚áòw‚áô (œÅ U w x) (œÅ V w y)‚åã"
    apply (rule add_rel_well_defined_llbound[of "(U,x)" "(V,y)" W,simplified])
    using w uv_sigma by auto
  ultimately have "‚àÄ‚á©F w in llbound.
      add_rel ‚åäU, x‚åã ‚åäV, y‚åã = ‚åäW, +‚áòW‚áô (œÅ U W x) (œÅ V W y)‚åã"
    apply eventually_elim
    by auto
  moreover have "llbound‚â†bot" using llbound_not_bot w(1) by blast
  ultimately show ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma mult_rel_class_of:
  fixes U V W :: "'a set" and x y :: 'b
  assumes uv_sigma:"(U, x) ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ" "(V, y) ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ"
  assumes w:"W ‚àà I" "W ‚äÜ U" "W ‚äÜ V"
  shows "mult_rel ‚åäU, x‚åã ‚åäV, y‚åã = ‚åäW, ‚ãÖ‚áòW‚áô (œÅ U W x) (œÅ V W y)‚åã"
proof -
  define ux where "ux = (SOME ux. ux ‚àà ‚åäU, x‚åã)"
  define vy where "vy = (SOME ux. ux ‚àà ‚åäV, y‚åã)"
  have "ux ‚àà ‚åäU, x‚åã" "vy ‚àà ‚åäV, y‚åã "
    unfolding ux_def vy_def using uv_sigma class_of_def some_in_eq by blast+
  then have "ux ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ" "vy ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ"
    using class_of_def uv_sigma by blast+
  then have "fst ux ‚àà I" "fst vy ‚àà I" by auto

  define w1 where "w1 = get_lower_bound (fst ux) (fst vy)"
  have w1:"w1 ‚àà I" "w1 ‚äÜ fst ux" "w1 ‚äÜ fst vy"
    using get_lower_bound[OF ‚Äπfst ux ‚àà I‚Ä∫ ‚Äπfst vy ‚àà I‚Ä∫] unfolding w1_def by auto

  have "mult_rel ‚åäU, x‚åã ‚åäV, y‚åã = ‚åäw1, ‚ãÖ‚áòw1‚áô (œÅ (fst ux) w1 (snd ux)) (œÅ (fst vy) w1 (snd vy))‚åã"
    unfolding mult_rel_def
    apply (fold ux_def vy_def)
    by (simp add:Let_def w1_def)
  moreover have "‚àÄ‚á©F w in llbound.
            ... = ‚åäw, mult_str w (œÅ (fst ux) w (snd ux)) (œÅ (fst vy) w (snd vy))‚åã"
    apply (rule mult_rel_well_defined_llbound)
    using ‚Äπux ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ‚Ä∫ ‚Äπvy ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ‚Ä∫ w1 by auto
  ultimately have "‚àÄ‚á©F w in llbound. mult_rel ‚åäU, x‚åã ‚åäV, y‚åã
      = ‚åäw, mult_str w (œÅ (fst ux) w (snd ux)) (œÅ (fst vy) w (snd vy))‚åã"
    by simp
  moreover have
    "‚àÄ‚á©F w in llbound. œÅ (fst ux) w (snd ux) = œÅ (fst (U, x)) w (snd (U, x))"
    "‚àÄ‚á©F w in llbound. œÅ (fst vy) w (snd vy) = œÅ (fst (V, y)) w (snd (V, y))"
    subgoal
      apply (rule rel_eventually_llbound)
      using ‚Äπux ‚àà ‚åäU, x‚åã‚Ä∫ class_of_def uv_sigma(1) by auto
    subgoal
      apply (rule rel_eventually_llbound)
      using ‚Äπvy ‚àà ‚åäV, y‚åã‚Ä∫ class_of_def uv_sigma(2) by auto
    done
  ultimately have "‚àÄ‚á©F w in llbound. mult_rel ‚åäU, x‚åã ‚åäV, y‚åã
      = ‚åäw, mult_str w (œÅ U w x) (œÅ V w y)‚åã"
    apply eventually_elim
    by auto
  moreover have "‚àÄ‚á©F w in llbound. ‚åäW, ‚ãÖ‚áòW‚áô (œÅ U W x) (œÅ V W y)‚åã = ‚åäw, ‚ãÖ‚áòw‚áô (œÅ U w x) (œÅ V w y)‚åã"
    apply (rule mult_rel_well_defined_llbound[of "(U,x)" "(V,y)" W,simplified])
    using w uv_sigma by auto
  ultimately have "‚àÄ‚á©F w in llbound.
      mult_rel ‚åäU, x‚åã ‚åäV, y‚åã = ‚åäW, ‚ãÖ‚áòW‚áô (œÅ U W x) (œÅ V W y)‚åã"
    apply eventually_elim
    by auto
  moreover have "llbound‚â†bot" using llbound_not_bot w(1) by blast
  ultimately show ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma mult_rel_carrier[intro]:
  assumes "X ‚àà carrier_direct_lim" "Y ‚àà carrier_direct_lim"
  shows "mult_rel X Y ‚àà carrier_direct_lim"
proof -
  define x where "x=(SOME x. x ‚àà X)"
  define y where "y=(SOME y. y ‚àà Y)"

  have "x‚ààX" "x‚ààSigma I ùîâ"
    using rel_carrier_Eps_in[OF ‚ÄπX ‚àà carrier_direct_lim‚Ä∫] unfolding x_def by auto
  have "y‚ààY" "y ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ"
    using rel_carrier_Eps_in[OF ‚ÄπY ‚àà carrier_direct_lim‚Ä∫] unfolding y_def by auto

  define z where "z=get_lower_bound (fst x) (fst y)"
  have "z ‚àà I" "z ‚äÜ fst x" "z ‚äÜ fst y"
  proof -
    have "fst x ‚àà I" "fst y ‚àà I"
      using ‚Äπx ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ‚Ä∫ ‚Äπy ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ‚Ä∫ by auto
    then show "z ‚àà I" "z ‚äÜ fst x" "z ‚äÜ fst y"
      using get_lower_bound[of "fst x" "fst y",folded z_def] by auto
  qed

  have "mult_rel X Y = ‚åäz, mult_str z (œÅ (fst x) z (snd x)) (œÅ (fst y) z (snd y))‚åã"
    unfolding mult_rel_def Let_def
    by (fold x_def y_def z_def,rule)
  also have "... ‚àà carrier_direct_lim"
    unfolding carrier_direct_lim_def class_of_def
  proof (rule rel.Block_closed)
    interpret ring "(ùîâ z)" "+‚áòz‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòz‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòz‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòz‚áô"
      by (simp add: ‚Äπz ‚àà I‚Ä∫ is_ring_from_is_homomorphism subset_of_opens)
    show "(z, ‚ãÖ‚áòz‚áô (œÅ (fst x) z (snd x)) (œÅ (fst y) z (snd y))) ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ"
      by (metis SigmaE SigmaI ‚Äπx ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ‚Ä∫ ‚Äπy ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ‚Ä∫ ‚Äπz ‚àà I‚Ä∫ ‚Äπz ‚äÜ fst x‚Ä∫ ‚Äπz ‚äÜ fst y‚Ä∫
          direct_lim.subset_of_opens direct_lim_axioms fst_conv
          is_map_from_is_homomorphism map.map_closed multiplicative.composition_closed snd_conv)
  qed
  finally show ?thesis .
qed

(* exercise 0.35 *)
lemma direct_lim_is_ring:
  assumes "U ‚àà I"
  shows "ring carrier_direct_lim add_rel mult_rel ‚åäU, ùü¨‚áòU‚áô‚åã ‚åäU, ùü≠‚áòU‚áô‚åã"
proof unfold_locales
  show add_rel: "add_rel a b ‚àà carrier_direct_lim" and mult_rel: "mult_rel a b ‚àà carrier_direct_lim"
    if "a ‚àà carrier_direct_lim" "b ‚àà carrier_direct_lim" for a b
    using ‚ÄπU ‚àà I‚Ä∫ that by auto
  show zero_rel: "‚åäU, ùü¨‚áòU‚áô‚åã ‚àà carrier_direct_lim" and one_rel: "‚åäU, ùü≠‚áòU‚áô‚åã ‚àà carrier_direct_lim"
    using ‚ÄπU ‚àà I‚Ä∫ by auto

  show add_rel_0: "add_rel ‚åäU, ùü¨‚áòU‚áô‚åã X = X"
    and "mult_rel ‚åäU, ùü≠‚áòU‚áô‚åã X = X"
    and "mult_rel X ‚åäU, ùü≠‚áòU‚áô‚åã = X"
      if "X ‚àà carrier_direct_lim" for X
  proof -
    define x where "x=(SOME x. x ‚àà X)"
    have x:"x‚ààX" "x‚ààSigma I ùîâ" "fst x‚ààI" and X_alt:"X= ‚åäfst x, snd x‚åã"
      using rel_carrier_Eps_in[OF ‚ÄπX ‚àà carrier_direct_lim‚Ä∫]
      unfolding x_def by auto

    obtain w0 where w0:"w0‚ààI" "w0 ‚äÜ U" "w0 ‚äÜ fst x"
      using has_lower_bound[OF ‚ÄπU‚ààI‚Ä∫ ‚Äπfst x‚ààI‚Ä∫] by blast

    interpret uw0:ring_homomorphism "œÅ U w0" "ùîâ U" "+‚áòU‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòU‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòU‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòU‚áô" "ùîâ w0" "+‚áòw0‚áô"
                    "‚ãÖ‚áòw0‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòw0‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòw0‚áô"
      using is_ring_morphism ‚ÄπU‚ààI‚Ä∫ w0 subset_of_opens by auto
    interpret xw0:ring_homomorphism "œÅ (fst x) w0" "ùîâ (fst x)" "+‚áòfst x‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòfst x‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòfst x‚áô"
                    "ùü≠‚áòfst x‚áô" "ùîâ w0" "+‚áòw0‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòw0‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòw0‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòw0‚áô"
      using is_ring_morphism ‚Äπfst x‚ààI‚Ä∫ w0 subset_of_opens by auto

    have "add_rel ‚åäU, ùü¨‚áòU‚áô‚åã X = ‚åäw0, +‚áòw0‚áô (œÅ U w0 ùü¨‚áòU‚áô) (œÅ (fst x) w0 (snd x))‚åã"
      unfolding X_alt
      apply (subst add_rel_class_of)
      using ‚ÄπU ‚àà I‚Ä∫ w0 x by simp_all
    also have "... = ‚åäw0, +‚áòw0‚áô ùü¨‚áòw0‚áô (œÅ (fst x) w0 (snd x))‚åã"
      by (simp add:uw0.additive.commutes_with_unit )
    also have "... = ‚åäw0, œÅ (fst x) w0 (snd x)‚åã"
      apply (subst uw0.target.additive.left_unit)
      using carrier_direct_lim_def rel.block_closed that x(1) by auto
    also have "... = X"
      unfolding X_alt
      apply (rule class_of_eqI[where W=w0])
      using w0 x subset_of_opens by auto
    finally show "add_rel ‚åäU, ùü¨‚áòU‚áô‚åã X = X" .

    have "mult_rel ‚åäU, ùü≠‚áòU‚áô‚åã X = ‚åäw0, ‚ãÖ‚áòw0‚áô (œÅ U w0 ùü≠‚áòU‚áô) (œÅ (fst x) w0 (snd x))‚åã"
      unfolding X_alt
      apply (subst mult_rel_class_of)
      using ‚ÄπU ‚àà I‚Ä∫ w0 x by simp_all
    also have "... = ‚åäw0, ‚ãÖ‚áòw0‚áô ùü≠‚áòw0‚áô (œÅ (fst x) w0 (snd x))‚åã"
      by (simp add: uw0.multiplicative.commutes_with_unit)
    also have "... = ‚åäw0, œÅ (fst x) w0 (snd x)‚åã"
      apply (subst uw0.target.multiplicative.left_unit)
      using carrier_direct_lim_def rel.block_closed that x(1) by auto
    also have "... = X"
      using X_alt ‚Äπ‚åäw0, œÅ (fst x) w0 (snd x)‚åã = X‚Ä∫ by force
    finally show "mult_rel ‚åäU, ùü≠‚áòU‚áô‚åã X = X" .

    have "mult_rel X ‚åäU, ùü≠‚áòU‚áô‚åã = ‚åäw0, ‚ãÖ‚áòw0‚áô (œÅ (fst x) w0 (snd x)) (œÅ U w0 ùü≠‚áòU‚áô)‚åã"
      unfolding X_alt
      apply (subst mult_rel_class_of)
      using ‚ÄπU ‚àà I‚Ä∫ w0 x by simp_all
    also have "... = ‚åäw0, ‚ãÖ‚áòw0‚áô (œÅ (fst x) w0 (snd x)) ùü≠‚áòw0‚áô ‚åã"
      by (simp add: uw0.multiplicative.commutes_with_unit)
    also have "... = ‚åäw0, œÅ (fst x) w0 (snd x)‚åã"
      apply (subst uw0.target.multiplicative.right_unit)
      using carrier_direct_lim_def rel.block_closed that x(1) by auto
    also have "... = X"
      using X_alt ‚Äπ‚åäw0, œÅ (fst x) w0 (snd x)‚åã = X‚Ä∫ by force
    finally show "mult_rel X ‚åäU, ùü≠‚áòU‚áô‚åã = X" .
  qed

  show add_rel_commute: "add_rel X Y = add_rel Y X"
    if "X ‚àà carrier_direct_lim" "Y ‚àà carrier_direct_lim" for X Y
  proof -
    define x where "x=(SOME x. x ‚àà X)"
    define y where "y=(SOME y. y ‚àà Y)"

    have x:"x‚ààX" "x‚ààSigma I ùîâ"
      using rel_carrier_Eps_in[OF ‚ÄπX ‚àà carrier_direct_lim‚Ä∫] unfolding x_def by auto
    have y:"y‚ààY" "y ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ"
      using rel_carrier_Eps_in[OF ‚ÄπY ‚àà carrier_direct_lim‚Ä∫] unfolding y_def by auto

    define z where "z=get_lower_bound (fst x) (fst y)"
    have z:"z ‚àà I" "z ‚äÜ fst x" "z ‚äÜ fst y" and z_alt:"z=get_lower_bound (fst y) (fst x) "
    proof -
      have "fst x ‚àà I" "fst y ‚àà I"
        using ‚Äπx ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ‚Ä∫ ‚Äπy ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ‚Ä∫ by auto
      then show "z ‚àà I" "z ‚äÜ fst x" "z ‚äÜ fst y"
        using get_lower_bound[of "fst x" "fst y",folded z_def] by auto
      show "z=get_lower_bound (fst y) (fst x) "
        by (metis (no_types, lifting) Eps_cong get_lower_bound_def z_def)
    qed

    interpret xz:ring_homomorphism "(œÅ (fst x) z)" "(ùîâ (fst x))" "+‚áòfst x‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòfst x‚áô"
                      "ùü¨‚áòfst x‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòfst x‚áô" "(ùîâ z)" "+‚áòz‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòz‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòz‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòz‚áô"
      using is_ring_morphism z x subset_of_opens by force

    interpret yz:ring_homomorphism "(œÅ (fst y) z)" "(ùîâ (fst y))" "+‚áòfst y‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòfst y‚áô"
                      "ùü¨‚áòfst y‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòfst y‚áô" "(ùîâ z)" "+‚áòz‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòz‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòz‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòz‚áô"
      using is_ring_morphism z y subset_of_opens by auto

    have "add_rel X Y = ‚åäz, add_str z (œÅ (fst x) z (snd x)) (œÅ (fst y) z (snd y))‚åã"
      unfolding add_rel_def Let_def by (fold x_def y_def z_def,rule)
    also have "... = add_rel Y X"
      unfolding add_rel_def Let_def
      apply (fold x_def y_def z_alt)
      using ‚Äπx ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ‚Ä∫ ‚Äπy ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ‚Ä∫ xz.target.additive.commutative by auto
    finally show "add_rel X Y = add_rel Y X" .
  qed

  show add_assoc:"add_rel (add_rel X Y) Z = add_rel X (add_rel Y Z)"
       "mult_rel (mult_rel X Y) Z = mult_rel X (mult_rel Y Z)"
       "mult_rel X (add_rel Y Z) = add_rel (mult_rel X Y) (mult_rel X Z)"
       "mult_rel (add_rel Y Z) X = add_rel (mult_rel Y X) (mult_rel Z X)"
    if "X ‚àà carrier_direct_lim" "Y ‚àà carrier_direct_lim" "Z ‚àà carrier_direct_lim" for X Y Z
  proof -
    define x where "x=(SOME x. x ‚àà X)"
    define y where "y=(SOME y. y ‚àà Y)"
    define z where "z=(SOME z. z ‚àà Z)"

    have x:"x‚ààX" "x‚ààSigma I ùîâ" and x_alt:"X = ‚åäfst x,snd x‚åã"
      using rel_carrier_Eps_in[OF ‚ÄπX ‚àà carrier_direct_lim‚Ä∫] unfolding x_def by auto
    have y:"y‚ààY" "y ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ" and y_alt:"Y = ‚åäfst y,snd y‚åã"
      using rel_carrier_Eps_in[OF ‚ÄπY ‚àà carrier_direct_lim‚Ä∫] unfolding y_def by auto
    have z:"z‚ààZ" "z ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ" and z_alt:"Z = ‚åäfst z,snd z‚åã"
      using rel_carrier_Eps_in[OF ‚ÄπZ ‚àà carrier_direct_lim‚Ä∫] unfolding z_def by auto

    obtain w0 where w0:"w0 ‚àà I" "w0 ‚äÜ fst x" "w0 ‚äÜ fst y" "w0 ‚äÜ fst z"
      using obtain_lower_bound_finite[of "{fst x,fst y,fst z}"] x y z
      by force

    interpret xw0:ring_homomorphism "œÅ (fst x) w0" "ùîâ (fst x)" "+‚áòfst x‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòfst x‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòfst x‚áô"
                    "ùü≠‚áòfst x‚áô" "ùîâ w0" "+‚áòw0‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòw0‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòw0‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòw0‚áô"
      using is_ring_morphism x w0 subset_of_opens by auto
    interpret yw0:ring_homomorphism "œÅ (fst y) w0" "ùîâ (fst y)" "+‚áòfst y‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòfst y‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòfst y‚áô"
                    "ùü≠‚áòfst y‚áô" "ùîâ w0" "+‚áòw0‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòw0‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòw0‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòw0‚áô"
      using is_ring_morphism y w0 subset_of_opens by auto
    interpret zw0:ring_homomorphism "œÅ (fst z) w0" "ùîâ (fst z)" "+‚áòfst z‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòfst z‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòfst z‚áô"
                    "ùü≠‚áòfst z‚áô" "ùîâ w0" "+‚áòw0‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòw0‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòw0‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòw0‚áô"
      using is_ring_morphism z w0 subset_of_opens by auto

    have "add_rel (add_rel X Y) Z = ‚åäw0, +‚áòw0‚áô ((+‚áòw0‚áô (œÅ (fst x) w0 (snd x))
                                (œÅ (fst y) w0 (snd y)))) (œÅ (fst z) w0 (snd z))‚åã"
      unfolding x_alt y_alt z_alt
      using x y z w0 subset_of_opens add_rel_class_of
      by (force simp add: add_rel_class_of)
    also have "... = ‚åäw0, +‚áòw0‚áô (œÅ (fst x) w0 (snd x))
                              (+‚áòw0‚áô (œÅ (fst y) w0 (snd y)) (œÅ (fst z) w0 (snd z)))‚åã"
      using x(2) xw0.target.additive.associative y(2) z(2) by force
    also have "... =  add_rel X (add_rel Y Z)"
      unfolding x_alt y_alt z_alt
      using x y z w0 add_rel_class_of subset_of_opens by force
    finally show "add_rel (add_rel X Y) Z = add_rel X (add_rel Y Z)" .

    have "mult_rel (mult_rel X Y) Z = ‚åäw0, ‚ãÖ‚áòw0‚áô ((‚ãÖ‚áòw0‚áô (œÅ (fst x) w0 (snd x))
                                (œÅ (fst y) w0 (snd y)))) (œÅ (fst z) w0 (snd z))‚åã"
      unfolding x_alt y_alt z_alt
      using x y z w0 mult_rel_class_of subset_of_opens by force
    also have "... = ‚åäw0, ‚ãÖ‚áòw0‚áô (œÅ (fst x) w0 (snd x))
                              (‚ãÖ‚áòw0‚áô (œÅ (fst y) w0 (snd y)) (œÅ (fst z) w0 (snd z)))‚åã"
      apply (subst xw0.target.multiplicative.associative)
      using w0 x y z by auto
    also have "... =  mult_rel X (mult_rel Y Z)"
      unfolding x_alt y_alt z_alt
      using x y z w0 mult_rel_class_of subset_of_opens by force
    finally show "mult_rel (mult_rel X Y) Z = mult_rel X (mult_rel Y Z)" .

    have "mult_rel X (add_rel Y Z) = ‚åäw0, ‚ãÖ‚áòw0‚áô (œÅ (fst x) w0 (snd x))
                  (+‚áòw0‚áô (œÅ (fst y) w0 (snd y)) (œÅ (fst z) w0 (snd z)))‚åã"
      unfolding x_alt y_alt z_alt
      using x y z w0 add_rel_class_of mult_rel_class_of subset_of_opens by force
    also have "... = ‚åäw0, +‚áòw0‚áô (‚ãÖ‚áòw0‚áô (œÅ (fst x) w0 (snd x)) (œÅ (fst y) w0 (snd y)))
            (‚ãÖ‚áòw0‚áô (œÅ (fst x) w0 (snd x)) (œÅ (fst z) w0 (snd z)))‚åã"
      apply (subst xw0.target.distributive)
      using w0 x y z by auto
    also have "... = add_rel (mult_rel X Y) (mult_rel X Z)"
      unfolding x_alt y_alt z_alt
      using x y z w0 add_rel_class_of mult_rel_class_of subset_of_opens by force
    finally show "mult_rel X (add_rel Y Z) = add_rel (mult_rel X Y) (mult_rel X Z)" .

    have "mult_rel (add_rel Y Z) X = ‚åäw0, ‚ãÖ‚áòw0‚áô (+‚áòw0‚áô (œÅ (fst y) w0 (snd y))
                                          (œÅ (fst z) w0 (snd z))) (œÅ (fst x) w0 (snd x))‚åã"
      unfolding x_alt y_alt z_alt
      using x y z w0 add_rel_class_of mult_rel_class_of subset_of_opens by force
    also have "... = ‚åäw0, +‚áòw0‚áô (‚ãÖ‚áòw0‚áô (œÅ (fst y) w0 (snd y)) (œÅ (fst x) w0 (snd x)))
            (‚ãÖ‚áòw0‚áô (œÅ (fst z) w0 (snd z)) (œÅ (fst x) w0 (snd x)))‚åã"
      apply (subst xw0.target.distributive)
      using w0 x y z by auto
    also have "... = add_rel (mult_rel Y X) (mult_rel Z X)"
      unfolding x_alt y_alt z_alt
      using x y z w0 add_rel_class_of mult_rel_class_of subset_of_opens by force
    finally show "mult_rel (add_rel Y Z) X = add_rel (mult_rel Y X) (mult_rel Z X)" .
  qed

  show add_rel_0':"‚ãÄa. a ‚àà carrier_direct_lim ‚üπ add_rel a ‚åäU, ùü¨‚áòU‚áô‚åã = a"
    using add_rel_0 add_rel_commute zero_rel by force

  interpret Group_Theory.monoid carrier_direct_lim add_rel "‚åäU, ùü¨‚áòU‚áô‚åã"
    apply unfold_locales
    by (simp_all add: zero_rel add_rel_carrier add_assoc add_rel_0 add_rel_0')

  show "monoid.invertible carrier_direct_lim add_rel ‚åäU, ùü¨‚áòU‚áô‚åã X"
    if "X ‚àà carrier_direct_lim" for X
  proof -
    define x where "x=(SOME x. x ‚àà X)"
    have x:"x‚ààX" "x‚ààSigma I ùîâ" "fst x‚ààI" and X_alt:"X= ‚åäfst x, snd x‚åã"
      using rel_carrier_Eps_in[OF ‚ÄπX ‚àà carrier_direct_lim‚Ä∫]
      unfolding x_def by auto

    obtain w0 where w0: "w0 ‚àà I" "w0 ‚äÜ U" "w0 ‚äÜ fst x"
      using has_lower_bound[OF ‚ÄπU‚ààI‚Ä∫ ‚Äπfst x‚ààI‚Ä∫] by blast

    interpret uw0:ring_homomorphism "œÅ U w0" "ùîâ U" "+‚áòU‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòU‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòU‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòU‚áô" "ùîâ w0" "+‚áòw0‚áô"
                    "‚ãÖ‚áòw0‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòw0‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòw0‚áô"
      using is_ring_morphism ‚ÄπU‚ààI‚Ä∫ w0 subset_of_opens by auto
    interpret xw0:ring_homomorphism "œÅ (fst x) w0" "ùîâ (fst x)" "+‚áòfst x‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòfst x‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòfst x‚áô"
                    "ùü≠‚áòfst x‚áô" "ùîâ w0" "+‚áòw0‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòw0‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòw0‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòw0‚áô"
      using is_ring_morphism ‚Äπfst x‚ààI‚Ä∫ w0 subset_of_opens by auto

    define Y where "Y=‚åäfst x, xw0.source.additive.inverse (snd x)‚åã"

    have "add_rel X Y  = ‚åäw0, +‚áòw0‚áô (œÅ (fst x) w0 (snd x))
                                  (œÅ (fst x) w0 (xw0.source.additive.inverse (snd x)))‚åã"
      unfolding X_alt Y_def
    proof (subst add_rel_class_of)
      show "(fst x, xw0.source.additive.inverse (snd x)) ‚àà Sigma I ùîâ"
        using x(2) xw0.source.additive.invertible xw0.source.additive.invertible_inverse_closed
        by force
    qed (use x w0 in auto)
    also have "... =  ‚åäw0, ùü¨‚áòw0‚áô‚åã"
      apply (subst xw0.additive.invertible_image_lemma)
      subgoal using x(2) xw0.source.additive.invertible by force
      using x(2) by auto
    also have "... =  ‚åäU, ùü¨‚áòU‚áô‚åã"
      by (simp add: assms class_of_0_eq w0(1))
    finally have "add_rel X Y = ‚åäU, ùü¨‚áòU‚áô‚åã" .
    moreover have "Y ‚àà carrier_direct_lim"
      using Group_Theory.group_def Y_def carrier_direct_lim_def class_of_def
        monoid.invertible_inverse_closed x(2) xw0.source.additive.group_axioms
        xw0.source.additive.invertible by fastforce
    moreover have "add_rel Y X = ‚åäU, ùü¨‚áòU‚áô‚åã"
      using ‚ÄπY ‚àà carrier_direct_lim‚Ä∫ ‚Äπadd_rel X Y = ‚åäU, ùü¨‚áòU‚áô‚åã‚Ä∫
      by (simp add: add_rel_commute that)
    ultimately show ?thesis
      unfolding invertible_def[OF that] by auto
  qed
qed


(* The canonical function from ùîâ U into lim ùîâ for U ‚àà I:*)
definition canonical_fun:: "'a set ‚áí 'b ‚áí ('a set √ó 'b) set"
  where "canonical_fun U x = ‚åäU, x‚åã"


lemma rel_I1:
  assumes "s ‚àà ùîâ U" "x ‚àà ‚åäU, s‚åã" "U ‚àà I"
  shows "(U, s) ‚àº x"
proof -
  have Us: "‚åäU, s‚åã ‚àà carrier_direct_lim"
    using assms unfolding carrier_direct_lim_def class_of_def
    by (simp add: equivalence.Class_in_Partition rel_is_equivalence)
  then show ?thesis
    using rel_Class_iff assms
    by (metis carrier_direct_lim_def class_of_def mem_Sigma_iff rel.Block_self rel.Class_self rel.block_closed)
qed

lemma rel_I2:
  assumes "s ‚àà ùîâ U" "x ‚àà ‚åäU, s‚åã" "U ‚àà I"
  shows "(U, s) ‚àº (SOME x. x ‚àà ‚åäU, s‚åã)"
  using carrier_direct_lim_def class_of_def rel_carrier_Eps_in(2) rel_carrier_Eps_in(3) assms
  by fastforce

lemma carrier_direct_limE:
  assumes "X ‚àà carrier_direct_lim"
  obtains U s where "U ‚àà I" "s ‚àà ùîâ U" "X = ‚åäU,s‚åã"
  using assms carrier_direct_lim_def class_of_def by auto



end (* direct_lim *)

abbreviation "dlim ‚â° direct_lim.carrier_direct_lim"


subsubsection ‚ÄπUniversal property of direct limits‚Ä∫

proposition (in direct_lim) universal_property:
  fixes A:: "'c set" and œà:: "'a set ‚áí ('b ‚áí 'c)" and add:: "'c ‚áí 'c ‚áí 'c"
    and mult:: "'c ‚áí 'c ‚áí 'c" and zero:: "'c" and one:: "'c"
  assumes "ring A add mult zero one"
    and r_hom: "‚ãÄU. U ‚àà I ‚üπ ring_homomorphism (œà U) (ùîâ U) (+‚áòU‚áô) (‚ãÖ‚áòU‚áô) ùü¨‚áòU‚áô ùü≠‚áòU‚áô A add mult zero one"
    and eq: "‚ãÄU V x. ‚ü¶U ‚àà I; V ‚àà I; V ‚äÜ U; x ‚àà (ùîâ U)‚üß ‚üπ (œà V ‚àò œÅ U V) x = œà U x"
  shows "‚àÄV‚ààI. ‚àÉ!u. ring_homomorphism u carrier_direct_lim add_rel mult_rel ‚åäV,ùü¨‚áòV‚áô‚åã ‚åäV,ùü≠‚áòV‚áô‚åã A add mult zero one
‚àß (‚àÄU‚ààI. ‚àÄx‚àà(ùîâ U). (u ‚àò canonical_fun U) x = œà U x)"
proof
  fix V assume "V ‚àà I"
  interpret ring_V: ring carrier_direct_lim add_rel mult_rel "‚åäV, ùü¨‚áòV‚áô‚åã" "‚åäV, ùü≠‚áòV‚áô‚åã"
    using ‚ÄπV ‚àà I‚Ä∫ direct_lim_is_ring by blast
  interpret ring_œàV: ring_homomorphism "œà V" "ùîâ V" "+‚áòV‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòV‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòV‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòV‚áô" A add mult zero one
    using ‚ÄπV ‚àà I‚Ä∫ r_hom by presburger

  define u where "u ‚â° ŒªX ‚àà carrier_direct_lim. let x = (SOME x. x ‚àà X) in œà (fst x) (snd x)"
    ‚Äï‚ÄπThe proposition below proves that @{term u} is well defined.‚Ä∫
  have œà_eqI: "œà x1 x2 = œà y1 y2" if "(x1,x2) ‚àº (y1,y2)"
    for x1 x2 y1 y2
    by (smt (verit, best) Int_subset_iff assms(3) comp_apply fst_conv rel_def snd_conv that)
  have u_eval: "u ‚åäU,s‚åã = œà U s" if "U ‚àà I" "s ‚àà ùîâ U" for U s
  proof -
    have Us: "‚åäU, s‚åã ‚àà carrier_direct_lim"
      using that unfolding carrier_direct_lim_def class_of_def
      by (simp add: equivalence.Class_in_Partition rel_is_equivalence)
    with that show ?thesis
      apply (simp add: u_def Let_def)
      by (metis œà_eqI prod.exhaust_sel rel_I2 rel_carrier_Eps_in(1))
  qed

  have u_PiE: "u ‚àà carrier_direct_lim ‚Üí‚á©E A"
  proof
    fix X
    assume "X ‚àà carrier_direct_lim" then show "u X ‚àà A"
      by (metis carrier_direct_limE map.map_closed r_hom ring_homomorphism_def u_eval)
  qed (auto simp: u_def)
  have hom_u: "ring_homomorphism u carrier_direct_lim add_rel mult_rel ‚åäV, ùü¨‚áòV‚áô‚åã ‚åäV, ùü≠‚áòV‚áô‚åã
                                     A add mult zero one"
  proof
    have "u (add_rel ‚åäU,s‚åã ‚åäV,t‚åã) = add (u ‚åäU,s‚åã) (u ‚åäV,t‚åã)"
      if "U ‚àà I" "V ‚àà I" "s ‚àà ùîâ U" "t ‚àà ùîâ V" for U V s t
    proof -
      obtain W where "W ‚àà I" and Wsub: "W ‚äÜ U ‚à© V"
        using assms has_lower_bound by (metis ‚ÄπU ‚àà I‚Ä∫ ‚ÄπV ‚àà I‚Ä∫)
      interpret ring_œàW: ring_homomorphism "œà W" "ùîâ W" "+‚áòW‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòW‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòW‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòW‚áô" A add mult zero one
        using ‚ÄπW ‚àà I‚Ä∫ r_hom by presburger
      have "u (add_rel ‚åäU,s‚åã ‚åäV,t‚åã) = u (‚åäW, +‚áòW‚áô (œÅ U W s) (œÅ V W t)‚åã)"
        using Wsub ‚ÄπW ‚àà I‚Ä∫ add_rel_class_of that by force
      also have "‚Ä¶ = œà W (+‚áòW‚áô (œÅ U W s) (œÅ V W t))"
        by (metis Wsub ‚ÄπW ‚àà I‚Ä∫ direct_lim.subset_of_opens direct_lim_axioms is_map_from_is_homomorphism le_infE map.map_closed ring_œàW.source.additive.composition_closed that u_eval)
      also have "‚Ä¶ = add (œà W ((œÅ U W s))) (œà W ((œÅ V W t)))"
        using that
        by (meson ‚ÄπW ‚àà I‚Ä∫ ‚ÄπW ‚äÜ U ‚à© V‚Ä∫ inf.bounded_iff is_ring_morphism map.map_closed ring_œàW.additive.commutes_with_composition ring_homomorphism_def subset_of_opens)
      also have "‚Ä¶ = add (œà U s) (œà V t)"
        using ‚ÄπW ‚àà I‚Ä∫ ‚ÄπW ‚äÜ U ‚à© V‚Ä∫ eq that by force
      also have "... = add (u ‚åäU,s‚åã) (u ‚åäV,t‚åã)"
        by (simp add: that u_eval)
      finally show "u (add_rel ‚åäU,s‚åã ‚åäV,t‚åã) = add (u ‚åäU,s‚åã) (u ‚åäV,t‚åã)" .
    qed
    then show "u (add_rel X Y) = add (u X) (u Y)"
      if "X ‚àà carrier_direct_lim" and "Y ‚àà carrier_direct_lim" for X Y
      by (metis (no_types, lifting) carrier_direct_limE that)
    show "u ‚åäV, ùü¨‚áòV‚áô‚åã = zero"
      using ‚ÄπV ‚àà I‚Ä∫ ring_œàV.additive.commutes_with_unit ring_œàV.source.additive.unit_closed
        u_eval by presburger
    have "u (mult_rel ‚åäU,s‚åã ‚åäV,t‚åã) = mult (u ‚åäU,s‚åã) (u ‚åäV,t‚åã)"
      if "U ‚àà I" "V ‚àà I" "s ‚àà ùîâ U" "t ‚àà ùîâ V" for U V s t
    proof -
      obtain W where "W ‚àà I" and Wsub: "W ‚äÜ U ‚à© V"
        by (meson ‚ÄπU ‚àà I‚Ä∫ ‚ÄπV ‚àà I‚Ä∫ has_lower_bound)
      interpret ring_œàW: ring_homomorphism "œà W" "ùîâ W" "+‚áòW‚áô" "‚ãÖ‚áòW‚áô" "ùü¨‚áòW‚áô" "ùü≠‚áòW‚áô" A add mult zero one
        using ‚ÄπW ‚àà I‚Ä∫ r_hom by presburger
      have "u (mult_rel ‚åäU,s‚åã ‚åäV,t‚åã) = u (‚åäW, ‚ãÖ‚áòW‚áô (œÅ U W s) (œÅ V W t)‚åã)"
        using Wsub ‚ÄπW ‚àà I‚Ä∫ mult_rel_class_of that by force
      also have "‚Ä¶ = œà W (‚ãÖ‚áòW‚áô (œÅ U W s) (œÅ V W t))"
        by (metis Wsub ‚ÄπW ‚àà I‚Ä∫ direct_lim.subset_of_opens direct_lim_axioms is_map_from_is_homomorphism
            le_infE map.map_closed ring_œàW.source.multiplicative.composition_closed that u_eval)
      also have "‚Ä¶ = mult (œà W ((œÅ U W s))) (œà W ((œÅ V W t)))"
        by (meson Wsub ‚ÄπW ‚àà I‚Ä∫ inf.boundedE is_ring_morphism map.map_closed ring_œàW.multiplicative.commutes_with_composition ring_homomorphism_def subset_of_opens that)
      also have "‚Ä¶ = mult (œà U s) (œà V t)"
        using Wsub ‚ÄπW ‚àà I‚Ä∫ eq that by force
      also have "... = mult (u ‚åäU,s‚åã) (u ‚åäV,t‚åã)"
        using that u_eval by presburger
      finally show "u (mult_rel ‚åäU,s‚åã ‚åäV,t‚åã) = mult (u ‚åäU,s‚åã) (u ‚åäV,t‚åã)" .
    qed
    then show "u (mult_rel X Y) = mult (u X) (u Y)"
      if "X ‚àà carrier_direct_lim" and "Y ‚àà carrier_direct_lim" for X Y
      by (metis (no_types, lifting) carrier_direct_limE that)
    show "u (‚åäV, ùü≠‚áòV‚áô‚åã) = one"
      by (simp add: ‚ÄπV ‚àà I‚Ä∫ ring_œàV.multiplicative.commutes_with_unit u_eval)
  qed (simp add: u_PiE)
  show "‚àÉ!u. ring_homomorphism u carrier_direct_lim add_rel mult_rel ‚åäV, ùü¨‚áòV‚áô‚åã ‚åäV, ùü≠‚áòV‚áô‚åã
                                      A add mult zero one ‚àß
                  (‚àÄU‚ààI. ‚àÄx‚ààùîâ U. (u ‚àò canonical_fun U) x = œà U x)"
  proof
    show "ring_homomorphism u carrier_direct_lim add_rel mult_rel ‚åäV, ùü¨‚áòV‚áô‚åã ‚åäV, ùü≠‚áòV‚áô‚åã A add mult zero one ‚àß (‚àÄU‚ààI. ‚àÄx‚ààùîâ U. (u ‚àò canonical_fun U) x = œà U x)"
      by (simp add: canonical_fun_def hom_u u_eval)
    fix v
    assume v: "ring_homomorphism v carrier_direct_lim add_rel mult_rel ‚åäV, ùü¨‚áòV‚áô‚åã ‚åäV, ùü≠‚áòV‚áô‚åã A add mult zero one ‚àß (‚àÄU‚ààI. ‚àÄx‚ààùîâ U. (v ‚àò canonical_fun U) x = œà U x)"
    have "u X = v X" if "X ‚àà carrier_direct_lim" for X
      by (metis v canonical_fun_def carrier_direct_limE comp_apply that u_eval)
    moreover have "v ‚àà carrier_direct_lim ‚Üí‚á©E A"
      by (metis v Set_Theory.map_def ring_homomorphism_def)
    ultimately show "v = u"
      using PiE_ext u_PiE by blast
  qed
qed


subsection ‚ÄπLocally Ringed Spaces‚Ä∫

subsubsection ‚ÄπStalks of a Presheaf‚Ä∫

locale stalk = direct_lim +
  fixes x:: "'a"
  assumes is_elem: "x ‚àà S" and index: "I = {U. is_open U ‚àß x ‚àà U}"
begin

(* definition 0.37 *)
definition carrier_stalk:: "('a set √ó 'b) set set"
  where "carrier_stalk ‚â° dlim ùîâ œÅ (neighborhoods x)"

lemma neighborhoods_eq:"neighborhoods x = I"
  unfolding index neighborhoods_def by simp

definition add_stalk:: "('a set √ó 'b) set ‚áí ('a set √ó 'b) set ‚áí ('a set √ó 'b) set"
  where "add_stalk ‚â° add_rel"

definition mult_stalk:: "('a set √ó 'b) set ‚áí ('a set √ó 'b) set ‚áí ('a set √ó 'b) set"
  where "mult_stalk ‚â° mult_rel"

definition zero_stalk:: "'a set ‚áí ('a set √ó 'b) set"
  where "zero_stalk V ‚â° class_of V ùü¨‚áòV‚áô"

definition one_stalk:: "'a set ‚áí ('a set √ó 'b) set"
  where "one_stalk V ‚â° class_of V ùü≠‚áòV‚áô"

lemma class_of_in_stalk:
  assumes "A ‚àà (neighborhoods x)" and "z ‚àà ùîâ A"
  shows "class_of A z ‚àà carrier_stalk"
proof -
  interpret equivalence "Sigma I ùîâ" "{(x, y). x ‚àº y}"
    using rel_is_equivalence by blast
  show ?thesis
    using assms unfolding carrier_stalk_def neighborhoods_def
    by (metis (no_types, lifting) carrier_direct_lim_def class_of_def index mem_Sigma_iff natural.map_closed)
qed

lemma stalk_is_ring:
  assumes "is_open V" and "x ‚àà V"
  shows "ring carrier_stalk add_stalk mult_stalk (zero_stalk V) (one_stalk V)"
proof -
  interpret r: ring carrier_direct_lim add_rel mult_rel "‚åäV, ùü¨‚áòV‚áô‚åã" "‚åäV, ùü≠‚áòV‚áô‚åã"
    using assms direct_lim_is_ring index by blast
  show ?thesis
    using r.additive.monoid_axioms
    unfolding zero_stalk_def one_stalk_def add_stalk_def mult_stalk_def carrier_stalk_def
    using index neighborhoods_def r.ring_axioms by metis
qed


lemma in_zero_stalk [simp]:
  assumes "V ‚àà I"
  shows "(V, zero_str V) ‚àà zero_stalk V"
  by (simp add: assms zero_stalk_def class_of_def class_of_0_in equivalence.Class_self rel_is_equivalence)

lemma in_one_stalk [simp]:
  assumes "V ‚àà I"
  shows "(V, one_str V) ‚àà one_stalk V"
  by (simp add: assms one_stalk_def class_of_def class_of_1_in equivalence.Class_self rel_is_equivalence)

lemma universal_property_for_stalk:
  fixes A:: "'c set" and œà:: "'a set ‚áí ('b ‚áí 'c)"
  assumes ringA: "ring A add mult zero one"
    and hom: "‚ãÄU. U ‚àà neighborhoods x ‚üπ ring_homomorphism (œà U) (ùîâ U) (+‚áòU‚áô) (‚ãÖ‚áòU‚áô) ùü¨‚áòU‚áô ùü≠‚áòU‚áô A add mult zero one"
    and eq: "‚ãÄU V s. ‚ü¶U ‚àà neighborhoods x; V ‚àà neighborhoods x; V‚äÜU; s ‚àà ùîâ U‚üß ‚üπ (œà V ‚àò œÅ U V) s = œà U s"
  shows "‚àÄV‚àà(neighborhoods x). ‚àÉ!u. ring_homomorphism u
carrier_stalk add_stalk mult_stalk (zero_stalk V) (one_stalk V) A add mult zero one
‚àß (‚àÄU‚àà(neighborhoods x). ‚àÄs‚àà(ùîâ U). (u ‚àò canonical_fun U) s = œà U s)"
proof -
  note neighborhoods_eq [simp]
  have "‚àÄV‚ààI. ‚àÉ!u. ring_homomorphism u carrier_direct_lim add_rel mult_rel
                      ‚åäV, ùü¨‚áòV‚áô‚åã ‚åäV, ùü≠‚áòV‚áô‚åã A add mult zero one ‚àß
                          (‚àÄU‚ààI. ‚àÄx‚ààùîâ U. (u ‚àò canonical_fun U) x = œà U x)"
    apply (rule universal_property[OF ringA hom])
    using eq by simp_all
  then show ?thesis
    unfolding carrier_stalk_def add_stalk_def mult_stalk_def zero_stalk_def one_stalk_def
    by simp
qed

end (* stalk *)

sublocale stalk ‚äÜ direct_lim by (simp add: direct_lim_axioms)


subsubsection ‚ÄπMaximal Ideals‚Ä∫

(* definition 0.38 *)
locale max_ideal = comm_ring R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" "ùü¨" "ùü≠" + ideal I  R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" "ùü¨" "ùü≠"
  for R and I and addition (infixl "+" 65) and multiplication (infixl "‚ãÖ" 70) and zero ("ùü¨") and
unit ("ùü≠") +
assumes neq_ring: "I ‚â† R" and is_max: "‚ãÄùîû. ideal ùîû R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠ ‚üπ ùîû ‚â† R ‚üπ I ‚äÜ ùîû ‚üπ I = ùîû"
begin

lemma psubset_ring: "I ‚äÇ R"
  using neq_ring by blast

lemma
  shows "¬¨ (‚àÉùîû. ideal ùîû R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠ ‚àß ùîû ‚â† R ‚àß I ‚äÇ ùîû)"
  using is_max by blast

text ‚ÄπA maximal ideal is prime‚Ä∫
proposition is_pr_ideal: "pr_ideal R I (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠"
proof
  show "I ‚â† R"
    using neq_ring by fastforce
  fix x y
  assume "x ‚àà R" "y ‚àà R" and dot: "x ‚ãÖ y ‚àà I"
  then show "x ‚àà I ‚à® y ‚àà I"
  proof-
    have "False" if "x ‚àâ I" "y ‚àâ I"
    proof-
      define J where "J ‚â° {i + r ‚ãÖ x |i r. i ‚àà I ‚àß r ‚àà R}"
      have "J ‚äÜ R"
        using ‚Äπx ‚àà R‚Ä∫ by (auto simp: J_def)
      have "x ‚àà J"
        apply (simp add: J_def)
        by (metis ‚Äπx ‚àà R‚Ä∫ additive.left_unit additive.sub_unit_closed multiplicative.left_unit multiplicative.unit_closed)
      interpret monJ: monoid J "(+)" ùü¨
      proof
        have "ùü¨ = ùü¨ + ùü¨ ‚ãÖ x"
          by (simp add: ‚Äπx ‚àà R‚Ä∫)
        then show "ùü¨ ‚àà J"
          by (auto simp: J_def)
      next
        fix a b
        assume "a ‚àà J" and "b ‚àà J"
        then obtain ia ra ib rb where a: "a = ia + ra ‚ãÖ x" "ia ‚àà I" "ra ‚àà R"
                                  and b: "b = ib + rb ‚ãÖ x" "ib ‚àà I" "rb ‚àà R"
          by (auto simp: J_def)
        then have "ia + ra ‚ãÖ x + (ib + rb ‚ãÖ x) = ia + ib + (ra + rb) ‚ãÖ x"
          by (smt (z3) ‚Äπx ‚àà R‚Ä∫ additive.commutative additive.composition_closed additive.monoid_axioms additive.submonoid_axioms distributive(2) monoid.associative multiplicative.composition_closed submonoid.sub)
        with a b show "a + b ‚àà J"
          by (auto simp add: J_def)
      next
        fix a b c
        assume "a ‚àà J" and "b ‚àà J" and "c ‚àà J"
        then show "a + b + c = a + (b + c)"
          by (meson ‚ÄπJ ‚äÜ R‚Ä∫ additive.associative subsetD)
      next
        fix a
        assume "a ‚àà J"
        then show "ùü¨ + a = a" "a + ùü¨ = a"
          using ‚ÄπJ ‚äÜ R‚Ä∫ additive.left_unit additive.right_unit by blast+
      qed
      interpret idJ: ideal J R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠
      proof
        fix u
        assume "u ‚àà J"
        then obtain i r where "u = i + r ‚ãÖ x" "i ‚àà I" "r ‚àà R"
          by (auto simp: J_def)
        then have "-u = -i + (-r) ‚ãÖ x"
          by (simp add: ‚Äπx ‚àà R‚Ä∫ additive.commutative additive.inverse_composition_commute local.left_minus)
        with ‚Äπi ‚àà I‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr ‚àà R‚Ä∫ have "-u ‚àà J"
          by (auto simp: J_def)
        with ‚Äπu ‚àà J‚Ä∫ show "monoid.invertible J (+) ùü¨ u"
          using  monoid.invertibleI [where v = "-u"]
          by (simp add: ‚Äπu ‚àà J‚Ä∫ monJ.monoid_axioms ‚Äπi ‚àà I‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπu = i + r ‚ãÖ x‚Ä∫ ‚Äπx ‚àà R‚Ä∫)
      next
        fix a b
        assume "a ‚àà R" and "b ‚àà J"
        then obtain i r where ir: "b = i + r ‚ãÖ x" "i ‚àà I" "r ‚àà R"
          by (auto simp: J_def)
        then have "a ‚ãÖ (i + r ‚ãÖ x) = a ‚ãÖ i + a ‚ãÖ r ‚ãÖ x"
          by (simp add: ‚Äπa ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπx ‚àà R‚Ä∫ distributive(1) multiplicative.associative)
        then show "a ‚ãÖ b ‚àà J"
          using ‚Äπa ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ideal(1) ir by (force simp add: J_def)
        have "b ‚ãÖ a = i ‚ãÖ a + r ‚ãÖ a ‚ãÖ x"
          by (simp add: ‚Äπa ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπx ‚àà R‚Ä∫ comm_mult distributive(1) ir mult_left_assoc)
        then show "b ‚ãÖ a ‚àà J"
          by (metis ‚ÄπJ ‚äÜ R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπa ‚ãÖ b ‚àà J‚Ä∫ ‚Äπa ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπb ‚àà J‚Ä∫ comm_mult subsetD)
      qed (auto simp: ‚ÄπJ ‚äÜ R‚Ä∫)
      have "I ‚äÇ J"
      proof
        show "I ‚äÜ J"
          unfolding J_def
          apply clarify
          by (metis ‚Äπx ‚àà R‚Ä∫ additive.sub.right_unit additive.unit_closed left_zero)
        show "I ‚â† J"
          using ‚Äπx ‚àà J‚Ä∫ ‚Äπx ‚àâ I‚Ä∫ by blast
      qed
      hence "J = R"
        using idJ.ideal_axioms is_max by auto
      hence "ùü≠ ‚àà J"
        by fastforce
      then obtain a r where "a ‚àà I" "r ‚àà R" "ùü≠ = a + r‚ãÖx"
          unfolding J_def by blast
      then have "y = (a + r‚ãÖx) ‚ãÖ y"
        using ‚Äπy ‚àà R‚Ä∫ multiplicative.left_unit by presburger
      also have "‚Ä¶ = a ‚ãÖ y + r‚ãÖx‚ãÖy"
        by (simp add: ‚Äπa ‚àà I‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπx ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπy ‚àà R‚Ä∫ distributive(2))
      also have "‚Ä¶ ‚àà I"
        by (simp add: ‚Äπa ‚àà I‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπx ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπy ‚àà R‚Ä∫ dot ideal multiplicative.associative)
      finally have "y ‚àà I" .
      thus ?thesis using that(2) by auto
    qed
    thus ?thesis by auto
  qed
qed

end (* locale max_ideal *)


subsubsection ‚ÄπMaximal Left Ideals‚Ä∫

locale lideal = subgroup_of_additive_group_of_ring +
  assumes lideal: "‚ü¶ r ‚àà R; a ‚àà I ‚üß ‚üπ r ‚ãÖ a ‚àà I"

begin

lemma subset: "I ‚äÜ R"
  by simp

lemma has_one_imp_equal:
  assumes "ùü≠ ‚àà I"
  shows "I = R"
  by (metis assms lideal subset multiplicative.right_unit subsetI subset_antisym)

end

lemma (in comm_ring) ideal_iff_lideal:
  "ideal I R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠ ‚ü∑ lideal I R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠" (is "?lhs = ?rhs")
proof
  assume ?lhs
  then interpret I: ideal I R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠ .
  show ?rhs
  proof qed (use I.ideal in presburger)
next
  assume ?rhs
  then interpret I: lideal I R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠ .
  show ?lhs
  proof
    fix r a
    assume "r ‚àà R" "a ‚àà I"
    then show "r ‚ãÖ a ‚àà I"
      using I.lideal by blast
    then show "a ‚ãÖ r ‚àà I"
      by (simp add: ‚Äπa ‚àà I‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr ‚àà R‚Ä∫ comm_mult)
  qed
qed


locale max_lideal = lideal +
  assumes neq_ring: "I ‚â† R" and is_max: "‚ãÄùîû. lideal ùîû R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠ ‚üπ ùîû ‚â† R ‚üπ I ‚äÜ ùîû ‚üπ I = ùîû"

(**WHY ARE THE ARGUMENT ORDERS OF max_ideal vs max_lideal INCONSISTENT?**)
lemma (in comm_ring) max_ideal_iff_max_lideal:
  "max_ideal R I (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠ ‚ü∑ max_lideal I R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠" (is "?lhs = ?rhs")
proof
  assume ?lhs
  then interpret I: max_ideal R I "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠ .
  show ?rhs
  proof intro_locales
    show "lideal_axioms I R (‚ãÖ)"
      by (simp add: I.ideal(1) lideal_axioms.intro)
    show "max_lideal_axioms I R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠"
      by (simp add: I.is_max I.neq_ring ideal_iff_lideal max_lideal_axioms.intro)
  qed
next
  assume ?rhs
  then interpret I: max_lideal I R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠ .
  show ?lhs
  proof intro_locales
    show "ideal_axioms I R (‚ãÖ)"
      by (meson I.lideal_axioms ideal_def ideal_iff_lideal)
    show "max_ideal_axioms R I (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠"
      by (meson I.is_max I.neq_ring ideal_iff_lideal max_ideal_axioms.intro)
  qed
qed

subsubsection ‚ÄπLocal Rings‚Ä∫

(* definition 0.39 *)
locale local_ring = ring +
  assumes is_unique: "‚ãÄI J. max_lideal I R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠ ‚üπ max_lideal J R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠ ‚üπ I = J"
    and has_max_lideal: "‚àÉùî¥. max_lideal ùî¥ R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠"

(*Can this be proved from the analogous result for left, right ideals?*)
lemma im_of_ideal_is_ideal:
  assumes I: "ideal I A addA multA zeroA oneA"
    and f: "ring_epimorphism f A addA multA zeroA oneA B addB multB zeroB oneB"
  shows "ideal (f ` I) B addB multB zeroB oneB"
proof -
  interpret IA: ideal I A addA multA zeroA oneA
    using I by blast
  interpret fepi: ring_epimorphism f A addA multA zeroA oneA B addB multB zeroB oneB
    using f by force
  show ?thesis
  proof intro_locales
    show sma: "submonoid_axioms (f ` I) B addB zeroB"
    proof
      show "f ` I ‚äÜ B"
        by blast
      have "zeroA ‚àà I"
        by simp
      then show "zeroB ‚àà f ` I"
        using fepi.additive.commutes_with_unit by blast
    next
      fix b1 b2
      assume "b1 ‚àà f ` I" and "b2 ‚àà f ` I"
      then show "addB b1 b2 ‚àà f ` I"
        unfolding image_iff
        by (metis IA.additive.sub IA.additive.sub_composition_closed fepi.additive.commutes_with_composition)
    qed
    show "Group_Theory.monoid (f ` I) addB zeroB"
    proof
      fix a b
      assume "a ‚àà f ` I" "b ‚àà f ` I"
      then show "addB a b ‚àà f ` I"
        by (meson sma submonoid_axioms_def)
    next
      show "zeroB ‚àà f ` I"
        using fepi.additive.commutes_with_unit by blast
    qed auto
    show "Group_Theory.group_axioms (f ` I) addB zeroB"
    proof
      fix b
      assume "b ‚àà f ` I"
      then obtain i where "b = f i" "i ‚àà I"
        by blast
      then obtain j where "addA i j = zeroA" "j ‚àà I"
        using IA.additive.sub.invertible_right_inverse by blast
      then show "monoid.invertible (f ` I) addB zeroB b"
        by (metis IA.additive.commutative IA.additive.sub ‚ÄπGroup_Theory.monoid (f ` I) addB zeroB‚Ä∫ ‚Äπb = f i‚Ä∫ ‚Äπi ‚àà I‚Ä∫ fepi.additive.commutes_with_composition fepi.additive.commutes_with_unit image_eqI monoid.invertibleI)
    qed
    show "ideal_axioms (f ` I) B multB"
    proof
      fix b fi
      assume "b ‚àà B" and "fi ‚àà f ` I"
      then obtain i where i: "fi = f i" "i ‚àà I"
        by blast
      obtain a where a: "a ‚àà A" "f a = b"
        using ‚Äπb ‚àà B‚Ä∫ fepi.surjective by blast
      then show "multB b fi ‚àà f ` I"
        by (metis IA.additive.submonoid_axioms IA.ideal(1) ‚Äπfi = f i‚Ä∫ ‚Äπi ‚àà I‚Ä∫ fepi.multiplicative.commutes_with_composition image_iff submonoid.sub)
      then show "multB fi b ‚àà f ` I"
        by (metis IA.additive.sub IA.ideal(2) a i fepi.multiplicative.commutes_with_composition imageI)
    qed
  qed
qed

lemma im_of_lideal_is_lideal:
  assumes I: "lideal I A addA multA zeroA oneA"
    and f: "ring_epimorphism f A addA multA zeroA oneA B addB multB zeroB oneB"
  shows "lideal (f ` I) B addB multB zeroB oneB"
proof -
  interpret IA: lideal I A addA multA zeroA oneA
    using I by blast
  interpret fepi: ring_epimorphism f A addA multA zeroA oneA B addB multB zeroB oneB
    using f by force
  show ?thesis
  proof intro_locales
    show sma: "submonoid_axioms (f ` I) B addB zeroB"
    proof
      show "f ` I ‚äÜ B"
        by blast
      have "zeroA ‚àà I"
        by simp
      then show "zeroB ‚àà f ` I"
        using fepi.additive.commutes_with_unit by blast
    next
      fix b1 b2
      assume "b1 ‚àà f ` I" and "b2 ‚àà f ` I"
      then show "addB b1 b2 ‚àà f ` I"
        unfolding image_iff
        by (metis IA.additive.sub IA.additive.sub_composition_closed fepi.additive.commutes_with_composition)
    qed
    show "Group_Theory.monoid (f ` I) addB zeroB"
    proof
      fix a b
      assume "a ‚àà f ` I" "b ‚àà f ` I"
      then show "addB a b ‚àà f ` I"
        by (meson sma submonoid_axioms_def)
    next
      show "zeroB ‚àà f ` I"
        using fepi.additive.commutes_with_unit by blast
    qed auto
    show "Group_Theory.group_axioms (f ` I) addB zeroB"
    proof
      fix b
      assume "b ‚àà f ` I"
      then obtain i where "b = f i" "i ‚àà I"
        by blast
      then obtain j where "addA i j = zeroA" "j ‚àà I"
        using IA.additive.sub.invertible_right_inverse by blast
      then show "monoid.invertible (f ` I) addB zeroB b"
        by (metis IA.additive.commutative IA.additive.sub ‚ÄπGroup_Theory.monoid (f ` I) addB zeroB‚Ä∫ ‚Äπb = f i‚Ä∫ ‚Äπi ‚àà I‚Ä∫ fepi.additive.commutes_with_composition fepi.additive.commutes_with_unit image_eqI monoid.invertibleI)
    qed
    show "lideal_axioms (f ` I) B multB"
    proof
      fix b fi
      assume "b ‚àà B" and "fi ‚àà f ` I"
      then obtain i where i: "fi = f i" "i ‚àà I"
        by blast
      obtain a where a: "a ‚àà A" "f a = b"
        using ‚Äπb ‚àà B‚Ä∫ fepi.surjective by blast
      then show "multB b fi ‚àà f ` I"
        by (metis IA.additive.submonoid_axioms IA.lideal(1) ‚Äπfi = f i‚Ä∫ ‚Äπi ‚àà I‚Ä∫ fepi.multiplicative.commutes_with_composition image_iff submonoid.sub)
    qed
  qed
qed


lemma im_of_max_lideal_is_max:
  assumes I: "max_lideal I A addA multA zeroA oneA"
    and f: "ring_isomorphism f A addA multA zeroA oneA B addB multB zeroB oneB"
  shows "max_lideal (f ` I) B addB multB zeroB oneB"
proof -
  interpret maxI: max_lideal I A addA multA zeroA oneA
    using I by blast
  interpret fiso: ring_isomorphism f A addA multA zeroA oneA B addB multB zeroB oneB
    using f by force
  interpret fIB: lideal "f ` I" B addB multB zeroB oneB
  proof intro_locales
    show "submonoid_axioms (f ` I) B addB zeroB"
    proof
      show "addB a b ‚àà f ` I"
        if "a ‚àà f ` I" "b ‚àà f ` I" for a b
        using that
        by (clarsimp simp: image_iff) (metis fiso.additive.commutes_with_composition maxI.additive.sub maxI.additive.sub_composition_closed)
    qed (use fiso.additive.commutes_with_unit in auto)
    then show "Group_Theory.monoid (f ` I) addB zeroB"
      using fiso.target.additive.monoid_axioms
      unfolding submonoid_axioms_def monoid_def
      by (meson subsetD)
    then show "Group_Theory.group_axioms (f ` I) addB zeroB"
      apply (clarsimp simp:  Group_Theory.group_axioms_def image_iff monoid.invertible_def)
      by (metis fiso.additive.commutes_with_composition fiso.additive.commutes_with_unit maxI.additive.sub maxI.additive.sub.invertible maxI.additive.sub.invertible_def)
    have "‚ãÄr x. ‚ü¶r ‚àà B; x ‚àà I‚üß ‚üπ ‚àÉxa‚ààI. multB r (f x) = f xa"
      by (metis (no_types, lifting) fiso.multiplicative.commutes_with_composition fiso.surjective image_iff maxI.additive.sub maxI.lideal)
  then show "lideal_axioms (f ` I) B multB"
    by (force intro!: lideal_axioms.intro)
  qed
  show ?thesis
  proof unfold_locales
    show "f ` I ‚â† B"
      using maxI.neq_ring fiso.bijective maxI.additive.submonoid_axioms
      unfolding submonoid_axioms_def submonoid_def
      by (metis bij_betw_imp_inj_on fiso.surjective inj_on_image_eq_iff subset_iff)
  next
    fix J
    assume "lideal J B addB multB zeroB oneB" and "J ‚â† B" and fim: "f ` I ‚äÜ J"
    then interpret JB: lideal J B addB multB zeroB oneB
      by blast
    have ¬ß: "lideal (f ‚áß¬Ø A J) A addA multA zeroA oneA"
    proof intro_locales
      show sma: "submonoid_axioms (f ‚áß¬Ø A J) A addA zeroA"
      proof
        show "addA a b ‚àà f ‚áß¬Ø A J" if "a ‚àà f ‚áß¬Ø A J" and "b ‚àà f ‚áß¬Ø A J" for a b
          using that
          apply clarsimp
          using JB.additive.sub_composition_closed fiso.additive.commutes_with_composition by presburger
      qed blast+
      show "Group_Theory.monoid (f ‚áß¬Ø A J) addA zeroA"
        by (smt (verit, ccfv_threshold) Group_Theory.monoid.intro IntD2 sma maxI.additive.associative maxI.additive.left_unit maxI.additive.right_unit submonoid_axioms_def)
      show "Group_Theory.group_axioms (f ‚áß¬Ø A J) addA zeroA"
      proof
        fix x
        assume "x ‚àà f ‚áß¬Ø A J"
        then show "monoid.invertible (f ‚áß¬Ø A J) addA zeroA x"
          apply clarify
          by (smt (verit, best) JB.additive.sub.invertible JB.additive.submonoid_inverse_closed IntI ‚ÄπGroup_Theory.monoid (f ‚áß¬Ø A J) addA zeroA‚Ä∫ fiso.additive.invertible_commutes_with_inverse maxI.additive.inverse_equality maxI.additive.invertible maxI.additive.invertibleE monoid.invertible_def vimageI)
      qed
      show "lideal_axioms (f ‚áß¬Ø A J) A multA"
      proof
        fix a j
        assume ¬ß: "a ‚àà A" "j ‚àà f ‚áß¬Ø A J"
        then show "multA a j ‚àà f ‚áß¬Ø A J"
          using JB.lideal(1) fiso.map_closed fiso.multiplicative.commutes_with_composition
          by simp
      qed
    qed
    have "I = f ‚áß¬Ø A J"
    proof (rule maxI.is_max [OF ¬ß])
      show "f ‚áß¬Ø A J ‚â† A"
        using JB.additive.sub ‚ÄπJ ‚â† B‚Ä∫ fiso.surjective by blast
      show "I ‚äÜ f ‚áß¬Ø A J"
        by (meson fim image_subset_iff_subset_vimage inf_greatest maxI.additive.sub subset_iff)
    qed
    then have "J ‚äÜ f ` I"
      using JB.additive.sub fiso.surjective by blast
    with fim show "f ` I = J" ..
  qed
qed

lemma im_of_max_ideal_is_max:
  assumes I: "max_ideal A I addA multA zeroA oneA"
    and f: "ring_isomorphism f A addA multA zeroA oneA B addB multB zeroB oneB"
  shows "max_ideal B (f ` I) addB multB zeroB oneB"
proof -
  interpret maxI: max_ideal A I addA multA zeroA oneA
    using I by blast
  interpret fiso: ring_isomorphism f A addA multA zeroA oneA B addB multB zeroB oneB
    using f by force
  interpret fIB: ideal "f ` I" B addB multB zeroB oneB
    using maxI.ideal_axioms fiso.ring_homomorphism_axioms
    by (meson fiso.ring_epimorphism_axioms im_of_ideal_is_ideal)
  show ?thesis
  proof intro_locales
    show "comm_ring_axioms B multB"
    proof
      fix b1 b2
      assume "b1 ‚àà B" and "b2 ‚àà B"
      then obtain a1 a2 where a1: "a1 ‚àà A" "f a1 = b1" and a2: "a2 ‚àà A" "f a2 = b2"
        using fiso.surjective by blast
      then have "multA a1 a2 = multA a2 a1"
        using maxI.comm_mult by presburger
      then show "multB b1 b2 = multB b2 b1"
        by (metis a1 a2 fiso.multiplicative.commutes_with_composition)
    qed
    show "max_ideal_axioms B (f ` I) addB multB zeroB oneB"
    proof
      obtain i where "i ‚àà A" "i ‚àâ I"
        using maxI.neq_ring by blast
      then have "f i ‚àâ f ` I"
        unfolding image_iff
        by (metis fiso.injective inj_on_def maxI.additive.sub)
      then show "f ` I ‚â† B"
        using ‚Äπi ‚àà A‚Ä∫ fiso.map_closed by blast
    next
      fix J
      assume "ideal J B addB multB zeroB oneB" and "J ‚â† B" and fim: "f ` I ‚äÜ J"
      then interpret JB: ideal J B addB multB zeroB oneB
        by blast
      have ¬ß: "ideal (f ‚áß¬Ø A J) A addA multA zeroA oneA"
      proof intro_locales
        show sma: "submonoid_axioms (f ‚áß¬Ø A J) A addA zeroA"
        proof
          show "addA a b ‚àà f ‚áß¬Ø A J" if "a ‚àà f ‚áß¬Ø A J" and "b ‚àà f ‚áß¬Ø A J" for a b
            using that
            apply clarsimp
            using JB.additive.sub_composition_closed fiso.additive.commutes_with_composition by presburger
        qed blast+
        show "Group_Theory.monoid (f ‚áß¬Ø A J) addA zeroA"
          by (smt (verit, ccfv_threshold) Group_Theory.monoid.intro IntD2 sma maxI.additive.associative maxI.additive.left_unit maxI.additive.right_unit submonoid_axioms_def)
        show "Group_Theory.group_axioms (f ‚áß¬Ø A J) addA zeroA"
        proof
          fix x
          assume "x ‚àà f ‚áß¬Ø A J"
          then show "monoid.invertible (f ‚áß¬Ø A J) addA zeroA x"
            apply clarify
            by (smt (verit, best) JB.additive.sub.invertible JB.additive.submonoid_inverse_closed IntI ‚ÄπGroup_Theory.monoid (f ‚áß¬Ø A J) addA zeroA‚Ä∫ fiso.additive.invertible_commutes_with_inverse maxI.additive.inverse_equality maxI.additive.invertible maxI.additive.invertibleE monoid.invertible_def vimageI)
        qed
        show "ideal_axioms (f ‚áß¬Ø A J) A multA"
        proof
          fix a j
          assume ¬ß: "a ‚àà A" "j ‚àà f ‚áß¬Ø A J"
          then show "multA a j ‚àà f ‚áß¬Ø A J"
            using JB.ideal(1) fiso.map_closed fiso.multiplicative.commutes_with_composition
            by simp
          then show "multA j a ‚àà f ‚áß¬Ø A J"
            by (metis Int_iff ¬ß maxI.comm_mult)
        qed
      qed
      have "I = f ‚áß¬Ø A J"
        by (metis "¬ß" JB.additive.sub ‚ÄπJ ‚â† B‚Ä∫ fim fiso.surjective image_subset_iff_subset_vimage
            le_inf_iff maxI.is_max maxI.psubset_ring psubsetE subsetI subset_antisym)
      then show "f ` I = J"
        using JB.additive.sub fiso.surjective
        by blast
    qed
  qed
qed


lemma preim_of_ideal_is_ideal:
  fixes f :: "'a‚áí'b"
  assumes J: "ideal J B addB multB zeroB oneB"
    and "ring_homomorphism f A addA multA zeroA oneA B addB multB zeroB oneB"
  shows "ideal (f‚áß¬Ø A J) A addA multA zeroA oneA"
proof -
  interpret JB: ideal J B addB multB zeroB oneB
    using J by blast
  interpret f: ring_homomorphism f A addA multA zeroA oneA B addB multB zeroB oneB
    using assms by force
  interpret preB: ring "f ‚áß¬Ø A B" addA multA zeroA oneA
    using f.ring_preimage by blast
  show ?thesis
  proof intro_locales
    show "submonoid_axioms (f ‚áß¬Ø A J) A addA zeroA"
      by (auto simp add: submonoid_axioms_def f.additive.commutes_with_composition f.additive.commutes_with_unit)
    then show grp_fAJ: "Group_Theory.monoid (f ‚áß¬Ø A J) addA zeroA"
      by (auto simp: submonoid_axioms_def Group_Theory.monoid_def)
    show "Group_Theory.group_axioms (f ‚áß¬Ø A J) addA zeroA"
      unfolding group_def
    proof
      fix x
      assume x: "x ‚àà f ‚áß¬Ø A J"
      then have "f x ‚àà J" "x ‚àà A"
        by auto
      then obtain v where "f v ‚àà J ‚àß v ‚àà A ‚àß addA x v = zeroA"
        by (metis JB.additive.sub.invertible JB.additive.submonoid_inverse_closed f.additive.invertible_commutes_with_inverse
              f.source.additive.invertible f.source.additive.invertible_inverse_closed f.source.additive.invertible_right_inverse)
      then show "monoid.invertible (f ‚áß¬Ø A J) addA zeroA x"
        by (metis Int_iff f.source.additive.commutative grp_fAJ monoid.invertibleI vimageI x)
    qed
    show "ideal_axioms (f ‚áß¬Ø A J) A multA"
    proof
      fix a j
      assume ¬ß: "a ‚àà A" "j ‚àà f ‚áß¬Ø A J"
      then show "multA j a ‚àà f ‚áß¬Ø A J" "multA a j ‚àà f ‚áß¬Ø A J"
        using JB.ideal f.map_closed f.multiplicative.commutes_with_composition by force+
    qed
  qed
qed

lemma preim_of_max_ideal_is_max:
  fixes f:: "'a ‚áí 'b"
  assumes J: "max_ideal B J addB multB zeroB oneB"
    and f: "ring_isomorphism f A addA multA zeroA oneA B addB multB zeroB oneB"
  shows "max_ideal A (f‚áß¬Ø A J) addA multA zeroA oneA"
proof -
  interpret maxJ: max_ideal B J addB multB zeroB oneB
    using J by blast
  interpret fiso: ring_isomorphism f A addA multA zeroA oneA B addB multB zeroB oneB
    using f by force
  interpret fAJ: ideal "f‚áß¬Ø A J" A addA multA zeroA oneA
    using maxJ.ideal_axioms fiso.ring_homomorphism_axioms by (blast intro: preim_of_ideal_is_ideal)
  show ?thesis
  proof intro_locales
    show "comm_ring_axioms A multA"
    proof
      fix a b
      assume "a ‚àà A" and "b ‚àà A"
      then have "multB (f a) (f b) = multB (f b) (f a)"
        using fiso.map_closed maxJ.comm_mult by presburger
      then show "multA a b = multA b a"
        by (metis bij_betw_iff_bijections ‚Äπa ‚àà A‚Ä∫ ‚Äπb ‚àà A‚Ä∫ fiso.bijective fiso.multiplicative.commutes_with_composition fiso.source.multiplicative.composition_closed)
    qed
    show "max_ideal_axioms A (f ‚áß¬Ø A J) addA multA zeroA oneA"
    proof
      show "f ‚áß¬Ø A J ‚â† A"
        using fiso.surjective maxJ.additive.sub maxJ.neq_ring by blast
      fix I
      assume "ideal I A addA multA zeroA oneA"
        and "I ‚â† A" and "f ‚áß¬Ø A J ‚äÜ I"
      then interpret IA: ideal I A addA multA zeroA oneA
        by blast
      have mon_fI: "Group_Theory.monoid (f ` I) addB zeroB"
      proof
        fix a b
        assume "a ‚àà f ` I" "b ‚àà f ` I"
        then show "addB a b ‚àà f ` I"
          unfolding image_iff
          by (metis IA.additive.sub IA.additive.sub_composition_closed fiso.additive.commutes_with_composition)
      next
        show "zeroB ‚àà f ` I"
          using fiso.additive.commutes_with_unit by blast
      qed blast+
      have ideal_fI: "ideal (f ` I) B addB multB zeroB oneB"
      proof
        show "f ` I ‚äÜ B"
          by blast
        show "zeroB ‚àà f ` I"
          using fiso.additive.commutes_with_unit by blast
      next
        fix a b
        assume "a ‚àà f ` I" and "b ‚àà f ` I"
        then show "addB a b ‚àà f ` I"
          unfolding image_iff
          by (metis IA.additive.sub IA.additive.sub_composition_closed fiso.additive.commutes_with_composition)
      next
        fix b
        assume "b ‚àà f ` I"
        then obtain i where i: "b = f i" "i ‚àà I"
          by blast
        then obtain j where "addA i j = zeroA" "j ‚àà I"
          by (meson IA.additive.sub.invertible IA.additive.sub.invertibleE)
        then have "addB b (f j) = zeroB"
          by (metis IA.additive.sub i fiso.additive.commutes_with_composition fiso.additive.commutes_with_unit)
        then show "monoid.invertible (f ` I) addB zeroB b"
          by (metis IA.additive.sub i ‚Äπj ‚àà I‚Ä∫ fiso.map_closed imageI maxJ.additive.commutative mon_fI monoid.invertibleI)
      next
        fix a b
        assume "a ‚àà B" and "b ‚àà f ` I"
        with IA.ideal show "multB a b ‚àà f ` I" "multB b a ‚àà f ` I"
          by (smt (verit, best) IA.additive.sub fiso.multiplicative.commutes_with_composition fiso.surjective image_iff)+
      qed blast+
      have "J = f ` I"
      proof (rule maxJ.is_max [OF ideal_fI])
        show "f ` I ‚â† B"
          by (metis IA.additive.sub ‚ÄπI ‚â† A‚Ä∫ fiso.injective fiso.surjective inj_on_image_eq_iff subsetI)
        show "J ‚äÜ f ` I"
          unfolding image_def
          apply clarify
          by (smt (verit, ccfv_threshold) Int_iff ‚Äπf ‚áß¬Ø A J ‚äÜ I‚Ä∫ fiso.surjective imageE maxJ.additive.sub subset_eq vimageI)
      qed
      then show "f ‚áß¬Ø A J = I"
        using ‚Äπf ‚áß¬Ø A J ‚äÜ I‚Ä∫ by blast
    qed
  qed
qed

lemma preim_of_lideal_is_lideal:
  assumes "lideal I B addB multB zeroB oneB"
    and "ring_homomorphism f A addA multA zeroA oneA B addB multB zeroB oneB"
  shows "lideal (f ‚áß¬Ø A I) (f ‚áß¬Ø A B) addA multA zeroA oneA"
proof -
  interpret A: ring A addA multA zeroA oneA
    by (meson assms ring_homomorphism_def)
  interpret B: ring B addB multB zeroB oneB
    by (meson assms ring_homomorphism_def)
  interpret f: ring_homomorphism f A addA multA zeroA oneA B addB multB zeroB oneB
    using assms by blast
  interpret preB: ring "f ‚áß¬Ø A B" addA multA zeroA oneA
    using f.ring_preimage by blast
  interpret IB: lideal I B addB multB zeroB oneB
    by (simp add: assms)
  show ?thesis
  proof intro_locales
    show "submonoid_axioms (f ‚áß¬Ø A I) (f ‚áß¬Ø A B) addA zeroA"
      by (auto simp add: submonoid_axioms_def f.additive.commutes_with_composition f.additive.commutes_with_unit)
    have "(A.additive.inverse u) ‚àà f ‚áß¬Ø A I" if "f u ‚àà I" and "u ‚àà A" for u
    proof -
      have "f (A.additive.inverse u) = B.additive.inverse (f u)"
        using A.additive.invertible f.additive.invertible_commutes_with_inverse that by presburger
      then show ?thesis
        using A.additive.invertible_inverse_closed that by blast
    qed
    moreover have "addA (A.additive.inverse u) u = zeroA"  "addA u (A.additive.inverse u) = zeroA" if "u ‚àà A" for u
      by (auto simp add: that)
    moreover
    show "Group_Theory.monoid (f ‚áß¬Ø A I) addA zeroA"
      by (auto simp: monoid_def f.additive.commutes_with_composition f.additive.commutes_with_unit)
    ultimately show "Group_Theory.group_axioms (f ‚áß¬Ø A I) addA zeroA"
      unfolding group_axioms_def by (metis IntE monoid.invertibleI vimage_eq)
    show "lideal_axioms (f ‚áß¬Ø A I) (f ‚áß¬Ø A B) multA"
      unfolding lideal_axioms_def
      using IB.lideal f.map_closed f.multiplicative.commutes_with_composition by force
  qed
qed

lemma preim_of_max_lideal_is_max:
  assumes "max_lideal I B addB multB zeroB oneB"
      and "ring_isomorphism f A addA multA zeroA oneA B addB multB zeroB oneB"
  shows "max_lideal (f ‚áß¬Ø A I) (f ‚áß¬Ø A B) addA multA zeroA oneA"
proof -
  interpret f: ring_isomorphism f A addA multA zeroA oneA B addB multB zeroB oneB
    using assms by blast
  interpret MI: max_lideal I B addB multB zeroB oneB
    by (simp add: assms)
  interpret pre: lideal "f ‚áß¬Ø A I" "f ‚áß¬Ø A B" addA multA zeroA oneA
    by (meson preim_of_lideal_is_lideal MI.lideal_axioms f.ring_homomorphism_axioms)
  show ?thesis
  proof intro_locales
    show "max_lideal_axioms (f ‚áß¬Ø A I) (f ‚áß¬Ø A B) addA multA zeroA oneA"
    proof
      show "f ‚áß¬Ø A I ‚â† f ‚áß¬Ø A B"
        using MI.neq_ring MI.subset f.surjective by blast
      fix ùîû
      assume "lideal ùîû (f ‚áß¬Ø A B) addA multA zeroA oneA"
        and "ùîû ‚â† f ‚áß¬Ø A B"
        and "f ‚áß¬Ø A I ‚äÜ ùîû"
      then interpret lideal ùîû "f ‚áß¬Ø A B" addA multA zeroA oneA
        by metis
      have "f ` ùîû ‚â† B"
        by (metis Int_absorb1 ‚Äπùîû ‚â† f ‚áß¬Ø A B‚Ä∫ f.injective f.surjective image_subset_iff_subset_vimage inj_on_image_eq_iff subset subset_iff)
      moreover have "I ‚äÜ f ` ùîû"
        by (smt (verit, ccfv_threshold) Int_iff MI.subset ‚Äπf ‚áß¬Ø A I ‚äÜ ùîû‚Ä∫ f.surjective image_iff subset_iff vimageI)
      moreover have "lideal (f ` ùîû) B addB multB zeroB oneB"
        by (metis f.multiplicative.image.subset f.ring_epimorphism_axioms im_of_lideal_is_lideal image_subset_iff_subset_vimage inf.orderE inf_sup_aci(1) lideal_axioms)
      ultimately show "f ‚áß¬Ø A I = ùîû"
        by (metis MI.is_max ‚Äπf ‚áß¬Ø A I ‚äÜ ùîû‚Ä∫ image_subset_iff_subset_vimage le_inf_iff subset subset_antisym)
    qed
  qed
qed

lemma isomorphic_to_local_is_local:
  assumes lring: "local_ring B addB multB zeroB oneB"
    and iso: "ring_isomorphism f A addA multA zeroA oneA B addB multB zeroB oneB"
  shows "local_ring A addA multA zeroA oneA"
proof intro_locales
  interpret ring A addA multA zeroA oneA
    by (meson iso ring_homomorphism.axioms(2) ring_isomorphism.axioms(1))

  show "Group_Theory.monoid A addA zeroA"
    by (simp add: additive.monoid_axioms)
  show "Group_Theory.group_axioms A addA zeroA"
    by (meson Group_Theory.group_def additive.group_axioms)
  show "commutative_monoid_axioms A addA"
    by (simp add: additive.commutative commutative_monoid_axioms_def)
  show "Group_Theory.monoid A multA oneA"
    by (simp add: multiplicative.monoid_axioms)
  show "ring_axioms A addA multA"
    by (meson local.ring_axioms ring.axioms(3))
  have hom: "monoid_homomorphism f A multA oneA B multB oneB"
    by (meson iso ring_homomorphism_def ring_isomorphism.axioms(1))
  have "bij_betw f A B"
    using iso map.graph
    by (simp add: bijective.bijective ring_isomorphism_def bijective_map_def)
  show "local_ring_axioms A addA multA zeroA oneA"
  proof
    fix I J
    assume I: "max_lideal I A addA multA zeroA oneA" and J: "max_lideal J A addA multA zeroA oneA"
    show "I = J"
    proof-
      have "max_lideal (f ` I) B addB multB zeroB oneB"
        by (meson I im_of_max_lideal_is_max iso)
      moreover have "max_lideal (f ` J) B addB multB zeroB oneB"
        by (meson J im_of_max_lideal_is_max iso)
      ultimately have "f ` I = f ` J"
        by (meson local_ring.is_unique lring)
      thus ?thesis
        using bij_betw_imp_inj_on [OF ‚Äπbij_betw f A B‚Ä∫]
        by (meson I J inj_on_image_eq_iff lideal.subset max_lideal.axioms(1))
    qed
  next
    show "‚àÉùî¥. max_lideal ùî¥ A addA multA zeroA oneA"
      by (meson im_of_max_lideal_is_max iso local_ring.has_max_lideal lring ring_isomorphism.inverse_ring_isomorphism)
  qed
qed


(* ex. 0.40 *)
lemma (in pr_ideal) local_ring_at_is_local:
  shows "local_ring carrier_local_ring_at add_local_ring_at mult_local_ring_at zero_local_ring_at one_local_ring_at"
proof-
  interpret cq: quotient_ring "R‚àñI" R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠
    by (simp add: Comm_Ring.quotient_ring_def comm.comm_ring_axioms submonoid_pr_ideal)
  define ùî¥ where "ùî¥ ‚â° {quotient_ring.frac (R‚àñI) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ r s| r s. r ‚àà I ‚àß s ‚àà (R ‚àñ I)}"
    ‚Äï‚ÄπNow every proper ideal of @{term "R‚àñI"} is included in @{term ùî¥}, and the result follows trivially‚Ä∫
  have maximal: "ùîû ‚äÜ ùî¥"
    if "lideal ùîû carrier_local_ring_at add_local_ring_at mult_local_ring_at zero_local_ring_at one_local_ring_at"
      and ne: "ùîû ‚â† carrier_local_ring_at" for ùîû
  proof
    fix x
    interpret ùîû: lideal ùîû carrier_local_ring_at add_local_ring_at mult_local_ring_at zero_local_ring_at one_local_ring_at
      using that by blast
    assume "x ‚àà ùîû"
    have "False" if "x ‚àâ ùî¥"
    proof -
      obtain r s where "r ‚àà R" "s ‚àà R" "s ‚àâ I" "r ‚àâ I" "x = cq.frac r s"
        using frac_from_carrier_local ‚Äπx ‚àà ùîû‚Ä∫ ‚Äπx ‚àâ ùî¥‚Ä∫ [unfolded ùî¥_def, simplified]
        by (metis ùîû.additive.sub)
      then have sr: "cq.frac s r ‚àà carrier_local_ring_at"
        by (simp add: ‚Äπr ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπs ‚àà R‚Ä∫ carrier_local_ring_at_def)
      have [simp]: "r ‚ãÖ s ‚àâ I"
        using ‚Äπr ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr ‚àâ I‚Ä∫ ‚Äπs ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπs ‚àâ I‚Ä∫ absorbent by blast
      have "one_local_ring_at = cq.frac ùü≠ ùü≠"
        by (simp add: one_local_ring_at_def cq.one_rel_def)
      also have "... = cq.frac (s ‚ãÖ r) (r ‚ãÖ s)"
        using ‚Äπr ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr ‚àâ I‚Ä∫ ‚Äπs ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπs ‚àâ I‚Ä∫
        by (intro cq.frac_eqI [of ùü≠]) (auto simp: comm.comm_mult)
      also have "... = cq.mult_rel (cq.frac s r) (cq.frac r s)"
        using  ‚Äπr ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr ‚àâ I‚Ä∫ ‚Äπs ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπs ‚àâ I‚Ä∫ by (simp add: cq.mult_rel_frac)
      also have "‚Ä¶ = mult_local_ring_at (cq.frac s r) (cq.frac r s)"
        using mult_local_ring_at_def by force
      also have "... ‚àà ùîû"
        using ùîû.lideal ‚Äπx = cq.frac r s‚Ä∫ ‚Äπx ‚àà ùîû‚Ä∫ sr by blast
      finally have "one_local_ring_at ‚àà ùîû" .
      thus ?thesis
        using ne ùîû.has_one_imp_equal by force
    qed
    thus "x ‚àà ùî¥" by auto
  qed
  have uminus_closed: "uminus_local_ring_at u ‚àà ùî¥" if "u ‚àà ùî¥" for u
    using that by (force simp: ùî¥_def cq.uminus_rel_frac uminus_local_ring_at_def)
  have add_closed: "add_local_ring_at a b ‚àà ùî¥" if "a ‚àà ùî¥" "b ‚àà ùî¥" for a b
  proof -
    obtain ra sa rb sb where ab: "a = cq.frac ra sa" "b = cq.frac rb sb"
      and "ra ‚àà I" "rb ‚àà I" "sa ‚àà R" "sa ‚àâ I" "sb ‚àà R" "sb ‚àâ I"
      using ‚Äπa ‚àà ùî¥‚Ä∫ ‚Äπb ‚àà ùî¥‚Ä∫ by (auto simp: ùî¥_def)
    then have "add_local_ring_at (cq.frac ra sa) (cq.frac rb sb) = cq.frac (ra ‚ãÖ sb + rb ‚ãÖ sa) (sa ‚ãÖ sb)"
      by (force simp add: cq.add_rel_frac add_local_ring_at_def)
    moreover have "ra ‚ãÖ sb + rb ‚ãÖ sa ‚àà I"
      by (simp add: ‚Äπra ‚àà I‚Ä∫ ‚Äπrb ‚àà I‚Ä∫ ‚Äπsa ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπsb ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ideal(2))
    ultimately show ?thesis
      unfolding ùî¥_def using ‚Äπsa ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπsa ‚àâ I‚Ä∫ ‚Äπsb ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπsb ‚àâ I‚Ä∫ ab absorbent by blast
  qed
  interpret ùî¥: lideal ùî¥ carrier_local_ring_at add_local_ring_at mult_local_ring_at zero_local_ring_at one_local_ring_at
  proof intro_locales
    show subm: "submonoid_axioms ùî¥ carrier_local_ring_at add_local_ring_at zero_local_ring_at"
    proof
      show "ùî¥ ‚äÜ carrier_local_ring_at"
        using ùî¥_def comm.comm_ring_axioms comm.frac_in_carrier_local comm_ring.spectrum_def pr_ideal_axioms by fastforce
      show "zero_local_ring_at ‚àà ùî¥"
        using ùî¥_def comm.spectrum_def comm.spectrum_imp_cxt_quotient_ring not_1 pr_ideal_axioms quotient_ring.zero_rel_def zero_local_ring_at_def by fastforce
    qed (auto simp: add_closed)
    show mon: "Group_Theory.monoid ùî¥ add_local_ring_at zero_local_ring_at"
    proof
      show "zero_local_ring_at ‚àà ùî¥"
        by (meson subm submonoid_axioms_def)
    next
      fix a b c
      assume "a ‚àà ùî¥" "b ‚àà ùî¥" "c ‚àà ùî¥"
      then show "add_local_ring_at (add_local_ring_at a b) c = add_local_ring_at a (add_local_ring_at b c)"
        by (meson additive.associative in_mono subm submonoid_axioms_def)
    next
      fix a assume "a ‚àà ùî¥"
      show "add_local_ring_at zero_local_ring_at a = a"
        by (meson ‚Äπa ‚àà ùî¥‚Ä∫ subm additive.left_unit in_mono submonoid_axioms_def)
      show "add_local_ring_at a zero_local_ring_at = a"
        by (meson ‚Äπa ‚àà ùî¥‚Ä∫ additive.right_unit in_mono subm submonoid_axioms_def)
    qed (auto simp: add_closed)
    show "Group_Theory.group_axioms ùî¥ add_local_ring_at zero_local_ring_at"
    proof unfold_locales
      fix u
      assume "u ‚àà ùî¥"
      show "monoid.invertible ùî¥ add_local_ring_at zero_local_ring_at u"
      proof (rule monoid.invertibleI [OF mon])
        show "add_local_ring_at u (uminus_local_ring_at u) = zero_local_ring_at"
          using ‚Äπu ‚àà ùî¥‚Ä∫
          apply (clarsimp simp add: ùî¥_def add_local_ring_at_def zero_local_ring_at_def uminus_local_ring_at_def)
          by (metis Diff_iff  additive.submonoid_axioms cq.add_minus_zero_rel cq.valid_frac_def submonoid.sub)
        then show "add_local_ring_at (uminus_local_ring_at u) u = zero_local_ring_at"
          using subm unfolding submonoid_axioms_def
          by (simp add: ‚Äπu ‚àà ùî¥‚Ä∫ additive.commutative subset_iff uminus_closed)
      qed (use ‚Äπu ‚àà ùî¥‚Ä∫ uminus_closed in auto)
    qed
    show "lideal_axioms ùî¥ carrier_local_ring_at mult_local_ring_at"
    proof
      fix a b
      assume a: "a ‚àà carrier_local_ring_at"
      then obtain ra sa where a: "a = cq.frac ra sa" and "ra ‚àà R" and sa: "sa ‚àà R" "sa ‚àâ I"
        by (meson frac_from_carrier_local)
      then have "a ‚àà carrier_local_ring_at"
        by (simp add: comm.frac_in_carrier_local comm.spectrum_def pr_ideal_axioms)
      assume "b ‚àà ùî¥"
      then obtain rb sb where b: "b = cq.frac rb sb" and "rb ‚àà I" and sb: "sb ‚àà R" "sb ‚àâ I"
        using ùî¥_def by blast
      have "cq.mult_rel (cq.frac ra sa) (cq.frac rb sb) = cq.frac (ra ‚ãÖ rb) (sa ‚ãÖ sb)"
        using ‚Äπra ‚àà R‚Ä∫ sa  ‚Äπrb ‚àà I‚Ä∫ sb
        by (force simp: cq.mult_rel_frac)
      then show "mult_local_ring_at a b ‚àà ùî¥"
        apply (clarsimp simp add: mult_local_ring_at_def ùî¥_def a b)
        by (metis Diff_iff ‚Äπra ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπrb ‚àà I‚Ä∫ cq.sub_composition_closed ideal(1) sa sb)
    qed
  qed
  have max: "max_lideal ùî¥ carrier_local_ring_at add_local_ring_at mult_local_ring_at zero_local_ring_at one_local_ring_at"
  proof
    have False
      if "s ‚àà R‚àñI" "r ‚àà I" and eq: "cq.frac ùü≠ ùü≠ = cq.frac r s" for r s
      using that eq_from_eq_frac [OF eq] ‚Äπr ‚àà I‚Ä∫ comm.additive.abelian_group_axioms
      unfolding abelian_group_def
      by (metis Diff_iff absorbent additive.sub comm.additive.cancel_imp_equal comm.inverse_distributive(1) comm.multiplicative.composition_closed cq.sub_unit_closed ideal(1))
    then have "cq.frac ùü≠ ùü≠ ‚àâ ùî¥"
      using ùî¥_def by blast
    moreover have "cq.frac ùü≠ ùü≠ ‚àà carrier_local_ring_at"
      using carrier_local_ring_at_def cq.multiplicative.unit_closed cq.one_rel_def by force
    ultimately show "ùî¥ ‚â† carrier_local_ring_at"
      by blast
  qed (use maximal in blast)
  have "‚ãÄJ. max_lideal J carrier_local_ring_at add_local_ring_at mult_local_ring_at zero_local_ring_at one_local_ring_at
‚üπ J = ùî¥"
    by (metis maximal max max_lideal.axioms(1) max_lideal.is_max max_lideal.neq_ring)
  with max show ?thesis
    by (metis local.ring_axioms local_ring_axioms_def local_ring_def)
qed

definition (in stalk) is_local:: "'a set ‚áí bool" where
"is_local U ‚â° local_ring carrier_stalk add_stalk mult_stalk (zero_stalk U) (one_stalk U)"

(* def. 0.41 *)
locale local_ring_morphism =
source: local_ring A "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠ + target: local_ring B "(+')" "(‚ãÖ')" "ùü¨'" "ùü≠'"
+ ring_homomorphism f A "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" "ùü¨" "ùü≠" B "(+')" "(‚ãÖ')" "ùü¨'" "ùü≠'"
for f and
A and addition (infixl "+" 65) and multiplication (infixl "‚ãÖ" 70) and zero ("ùü¨") and unit ("ùü≠") and
B and addition' (infixl "+''" 65) and multiplication' (infixl "‚ãÖ''" 70) and zero' ("ùü¨''") and unit' ("ùü≠''")
+ assumes preimage_of_max_lideal:
"‚ãÄùî¥‚á©A ùî¥‚á©B. max_lideal ùî¥‚á©A A (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠ ‚üπ max_lideal ùî¥‚á©B B (+') (‚ãÖ') ùü¨' ùü≠' ‚üπ (f‚áß¬Ø A ùî¥‚á©B) = ùî¥‚á©A"

lemma id_is_local_ring_morphism:
  assumes "local_ring A add mult zero one"
  shows "local_ring_morphism (identity A) A add mult zero one A add mult zero one"
proof -
  interpret local_ring A add mult zero one
    by (simp add: assms)
  show ?thesis
  proof intro_locales
    show "Set_Theory.map (identity A) A A"
      by (simp add: Set_Theory.map_def)
    show "monoid_homomorphism_axioms (identity A) A add zero add zero"
      by (simp add: monoid_homomorphism_axioms_def)
    show "monoid_homomorphism_axioms (identity A) A mult one mult one"
      by (simp add: monoid_homomorphism_axioms_def)
    show "local_ring_morphism_axioms (identity A) A add mult zero one A add mult zero one"
    proof
      fix ùî¥‚á©A ùî¥‚á©B
      assume "max_lideal ùî¥‚á©A A add mult zero one" "max_lideal ùî¥‚á©B A add mult zero one"
      then have "ùî¥‚á©B ‚à© A = ùî¥‚á©A"
        by (metis Int_absorb2 is_unique lideal.subset max_lideal.axioms(1))
      then show "identity A ‚áß¬Ø A ùî¥‚á©B = ùî¥‚á©A"
        by (simp add: preimage_identity_self)
    qed
  qed
qed

lemma (in ring_epimorphism) preim_subset_imp_subset:
  assumes "Œ∑ ‚áß¬Ø R I ‚äÜ Œ∑ ‚áß¬Ø R J" and "I ‚äÜ R'"
  shows "I ‚äÜ J"
  using Int_absorb1 assms surjective
  by blast


lemma iso_is_local_ring_morphism:
  assumes "local_ring A addA multA zeroA oneA"
    and "ring_isomorphism f A addA multA zeroA oneA B addB multB zeroB oneB"
  shows "local_ring_morphism f A addA multA zeroA oneA B addB multB zeroB oneB"
proof -
  interpret A: local_ring A addA multA zeroA oneA
    using assms(1) by blast
  interpret B: ring B addB multB zeroB oneB
    by (meson assms(2) ring_homomorphism_def ring_isomorphism_def)
  interpret f: ring_isomorphism f A addA multA zeroA oneA B addB multB zeroB oneB
    by (simp add: assms)
  interpret preB: ring "f ‚áß¬Ø A B" addA multA zeroA oneA
    by (metis (no_types) A.ring_axioms f.multiplicative.image.subset image_subset_iff_subset_vimage inf.absorb2)
  show ?thesis
  proof
    fix I J
    assume "max_lideal I B addB multB zeroB oneB"
    then interpret MI: max_lideal I B addB multB zeroB oneB
      by simp
    assume "max_lideal J B addB multB zeroB oneB"
    then interpret MJ: max_lideal J B addB multB zeroB oneB
      by simp
    interpret GI: subgroup I B addB zeroB
      by unfold_locales
    have "max_lideal (f ‚áß¬Ø A I) (f ‚áß¬Ø A B) addA multA zeroA oneA"
      by (metis (no_types) MI.max_lideal_axioms f.ring_isomorphism_axioms preim_of_max_lideal_is_max)
    moreover have "max_lideal (f ‚áß¬Ø A J) (f ‚áß¬Ø A B) addA multA zeroA oneA"
      by (meson MJ.max_lideal_axioms f.ring_isomorphism_axioms preim_of_max_lideal_is_max)
    ultimately have "f ‚áß¬Ø A I = f ‚áß¬Ø A J"
      by (metis A.is_unique Int_absorb1 f.multiplicative.image.subset image_subset_iff_subset_vimage)
    then show "I = J"
      by (metis MI.lideal_axioms MI.neq_ring MJ.max_lideal_axioms MJ.subset f.preim_subset_imp_subset max_lideal.is_max subset_refl)
  next
    show "‚àÉùî¥. max_lideal ùî¥ B addB multB zeroB oneB"
      by (meson A.has_max_lideal assms(2) im_of_max_lideal_is_max)
  next
    fix ùî¥‚á©A ùî¥‚á©B
    assume "max_lideal ùî¥‚á©A A addA multA zeroA oneA"
        and "max_lideal ùî¥‚á©B B addB multB zeroB oneB"
    then show "f ‚áß¬Ø A ùî¥‚á©B = ùî¥‚á©A"
      by (metis A.is_unique f.multiplicative.image.subset f.ring_isomorphism_axioms image_subset_iff_subset_vimage inf.absorb2 preim_of_max_lideal_is_max)
  qed
qed

(*these epimorphism aren't actually used*)
lemma (in monoid_homomorphism) monoid_epimorphism_image:
   "monoid_epimorphism Œ∑ M (‚ãÖ) ùü≠ (Œ∑ ` M) (‚ãÖ') ùü≠'"
proof -
  interpret monoid "Œ∑ ` M" "(‚ãÖ')" "ùü≠'"
    using image.sub.monoid_axioms by force
  show ?thesis
  proof qed (auto simp: bij_betw_def commutes_with_unit commutes_with_composition)
qed

lemma (in group_homomorphism) group_epimorphism_image:
   "group_epimorphism Œ∑ G (‚ãÖ) ùü≠ (Œ∑ ` G) (‚ãÖ') ùü≠'"
proof -
  interpret group "Œ∑ ` G" "(‚ãÖ')" "ùü≠'"
    using image.sub.group_axioms by blast
  show ?thesis
  proof qed (auto simp: bij_betw_def commutes_with_composition)
qed

lemma (in ring_homomorphism) ring_epimorphism_preimage:
   "ring_epimorphism Œ∑ R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠ (Œ∑ ` R) (+') (‚ãÖ') ùü¨' ùü≠'"
proof -
  interpret ring "Œ∑ ` R" "(+')" "(‚ãÖ')" "ùü¨'" "ùü≠'"
  proof qed (auto simp add: target.distributive target.additive.commutative)
  show ?thesis
  proof qed (auto simp: additive.commutes_with_composition additive.commutes_with_unit
      multiplicative.commutes_with_composition multiplicative.commutes_with_unit)
qed

lemma comp_of_local_ring_morphisms:
