  assumes "local_ring_morphism f A addA multA zeroA oneA B addB multB zeroB oneB"
      and "local_ring_morphism g B addB multB zeroB oneB C addC multC zeroC oneC"
    shows "local_ring_morphism (compose A g f) A addA multA zeroA oneA C addC multC zeroC oneC"
proof -
  interpret f: local_ring_morphism f A addA multA zeroA oneA B addB multB zeroB oneB
    by (simp add: assms)
  interpret g: local_ring_morphism g B addB multB zeroB oneB C addC multC zeroC oneC
    by (simp add: assms)
  interpret gf: ring_homomorphism "compose A g f" A addA multA zeroA oneA C addC multC zeroC oneC
    using comp_ring_morphisms f.ring_homomorphism_axioms g.ring_homomorphism_axioms
    by fastforce
  obtain ùî¥‚á©B where ùî¥‚á©B: "max_lideal ùî¥‚á©B B addB multB zeroB oneB"
    using f.target.has_max_lideal by force
  show ?thesis
  proof intro_locales
    show "local_ring_morphism_axioms (compose A g f) A addA multA zeroA oneA C addC multC zeroC oneC"
    proof
      fix ùî¥‚á©A ùî¥‚á©C
      assume max: "max_lideal ùî¥‚á©A A addA multA zeroA oneA"
                  "max_lideal ùî¥‚á©C C addC multC zeroC oneC"
      interpret maxA: max_lideal ùî¥‚á©A A addA multA zeroA oneA
        using max by blast
      interpret maxC: max_lideal ùî¥‚á©C C addC multC zeroC oneC
        using max by blast
      have "B ‚äÜ g -` C"
        by blast
      with max interpret maxg: max_lideal "g ‚áß¬Ø B ùî¥‚á©C" "g ‚áß¬Ø B C" addB multB zeroB oneB
        by (metis Int_absorb1 ùî¥‚á©B g.preimage_of_max_lideal)
      interpret maxgf: Group_Theory.monoid "(g ‚àò f ‚Üì A) ‚áß¬Ø A ùî¥‚á©C" addA zeroA
        by (simp add: monoid_def vimage_def gf.additive.commutes_with_composition
                      gf.additive.commutes_with_unit f.source.additive.associative)
      show "(g ‚àò f ‚Üì A) ‚áß¬Ø A ùî¥‚á©C = ùî¥‚á©A"
      proof (rule maxA.is_max [symmetric])
        show "lideal ((g ‚àò f ‚Üì A) ‚áß¬Ø A ùî¥‚á©C) A addA multA zeroA oneA"
        proof
          fix u
          assume u: "u ‚àà (g ‚àò f ‚Üì A) ‚áß¬Ø A ùî¥‚á©C"
          then have "u ‚àà A"
            by auto
          show "maxgf.invertible u"
          proof (rule maxgf.invertibleI)
            show "addA u (f.source.additive.inverse u) = zeroA"
              using f.source.additive.invertible_right_inverse ‚Äπu ‚àà A‚Ä∫ by blast
            have "(g ‚àò f ‚Üì A) (f.source.additive.inverse u) = g.target.additive.inverse (g (f u))"
              by (metis f.source.additive.invertible ‚Äπu ‚àà A‚Ä∫ compose_eq
                    gf.additive.invertible_commutes_with_inverse)
            then show "(f.source.additive.inverse u) ‚àà (g ‚àò f ‚Üì A) ‚áß¬Ø A ùî¥‚á©C"
              by (metis f.source.additive.invertible f.source.additive.invertible_inverse_closed
                    g.target.additive.group_axioms Int_iff compose_eq
                    maxC.additive.subgroup_inverse_iff f.map_closed g.map_axioms group.invertible
                    map.map_closed u vimage_eq)
          qed (use u ‚Äπu ‚àà A‚Ä∫ in auto)
        next
          fix r a
          assume "r ‚àà A" and "a ‚àà (g ‚àò f ‚Üì A) ‚áß¬Ø A ùî¥‚á©C"
          then show "multA r a ‚àà (g ‚àò f ‚Üì A) ‚áß¬Ø A ùî¥‚á©C"
            by (simp add: maxC.lideal gf.multiplicative.commutes_with_composition)
        qed (use maxgf.unit_closed maxgf.composition_closed in auto)
        show "(g ‚àò f ‚Üì A) ‚áß¬Ø A ùî¥‚á©C ‚â† A"
          by (metis f.source.multiplicative.unit_closed f.target.multiplicative.unit_closed Int_iff
              compose_eq f.multiplicative.commutes_with_unit maxg.has_one_imp_equal maxg.neq_ring
              vimage_eq)
        show "ùî¥‚á©A ‚äÜ (g ‚àò f ‚Üì A) ‚áß¬Ø A ùî¥‚á©C"
          apply clarsimp
          using f.preimage_of_max_lideal g.preimage_of_max_lideal ùî¥‚á©B
          by (metis IntD1 maxA.additive.sub compose_eq max vimageD)
      qed
    qed
  qed
qed

subsubsection ‚ÄπLocally Ringed Spaces‚Ä∫

(* The key map from the stalk at a prime ideal ùî≠ to the local ring at ùî≠ *)
locale key_map = comm_ring +
  fixes ùî≠:: "'a set" assumes is_prime: "ùî≠ ‚àà Spec"
begin

interpretation pi:pr_ideal R ùî≠ "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠
  by (simp add: is_prime spectrum_imp_pr)

interpretation top: topological_space Spec is_zariski_open

  by simp

interpretation pr:presheaf_of_rings Spec is_zariski_open sheaf_spec sheaf_spec_morphisms
            ùí™b add_sheaf_spec mult_sheaf_spec zero_sheaf_spec one_sheaf_spec
  by (fact local.sheaf_spec_is_presheaf)

interpretation local:quotient_ring "(R ‚àñ ùî≠)" R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠
  using is_prime spectrum_imp_cxt_quotient_ring by presburger

interpretation st: stalk "Spec" is_zariski_open sheaf_spec sheaf_spec_morphisms
ùí™b add_sheaf_spec mult_sheaf_spec zero_sheaf_spec one_sheaf_spec "{U. is_zariski_open U ‚àß ùî≠‚ààU}" ùî≠
proof
  fix U I V s
  assume "open_cover_of_open_subset Spec is_zariski_open U I V"
    and "‚ãÄi. i ‚àà I ‚üπ V i ‚äÜ U"
    and "s ‚àà ùí™ U"
    and "‚ãÄi. i ‚àà I ‚üπ sheaf_spec_morphisms U (V i) s = zero_sheaf_spec (V i)"
  then show "s = zero_sheaf_spec U"
    by (metis sheaf_of_rings.locality sheaf_spec_is_sheaf)
next
fix U I V s
  assume "open_cover_of_open_subset Spec is_zariski_open U I V"
      and "‚àÄi. i ‚àà I ‚ü∂ V i ‚äÜ U ‚àß s i ‚àà ùí™ V i"
      and "‚ãÄi j. ‚ü¶i ‚àà I; j ‚àà I‚üß ‚üπ sheaf_spec_morphisms (V i) (V i ‚à© V j) (s i) = sheaf_spec_morphisms (V j) (V i ‚à© V j) (s j)"
  then show "‚àÉt. t ‚àà ùí™ U ‚àß (‚àÄi. i ‚àà I ‚ü∂ sheaf_spec_morphisms U (V i) t = s i)"
    by (smt (verit, ccfv_threshold) sheaf_of_rings.glueing sheaf_spec_is_sheaf)
qed (use is_prime in auto)

declare st.subset_of_opens [simp del, rule del] ‚Äï‚Äπbecause it loops!‚Ä∫

definition key_map:: "'a set set ‚áí (('a set ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set) ‚áí ('a √ó 'a) set)"
  where "key_map U ‚â° Œªs‚àà(ùí™ U). s ùî≠"

lemma key_map_is_map:
  assumes  "ùî≠ ‚àà U"
  shows "Set_Theory.map (key_map U) (ùí™ U) (R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô)"
proof
  have "‚ãÄs. s ‚àà ùí™ U ‚üπ s ùî≠ ‚àà (R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô)"
    using sheaf_spec_def assms is_regular_def by blast
  thus "key_map U ‚àà (ùí™ U) ‚Üí‚á©E (R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô)"
    using key_map_def extensional_funcset_def by simp
qed

lemma key_map_is_ring_morphism:
  assumes "ùî≠ ‚àà U" and "is_zariski_open U"
  shows "ring_homomorphism (key_map U)
(ùí™ U) (add_sheaf_spec U) (mult_sheaf_spec U) (zero_sheaf_spec U) (one_sheaf_spec U)
(R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô) (pi.add_local_ring_at) (pi.mult_local_ring_at) (pi.zero_local_ring_at) (pi.one_local_ring_at)"
proof (intro ring_homomorphism.intro)
  show "Set_Theory.map (key_map U) (ùí™ U) (R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô)" using key_map_is_map assms(1) by simp
next
  show "ring (ùí™ U) (add_sheaf_spec U) (mult_sheaf_spec U) (zero_sheaf_spec U) (one_sheaf_spec U)"
    using ‚Äπis_zariski_open U‚Ä∫ pr.is_ring_from_is_homomorphism by blast
next
  show "ring (R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô) (pi.add_local_ring_at) (pi.mult_local_ring_at) (pi.zero_local_ring_at) (pi.one_local_ring_at)"
    by (simp add: pi.ring_axioms)
next
  show "group_homomorphism (key_map U) (ùí™ U) (add_sheaf_spec U) (zero_sheaf_spec U) (R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô) (pi.add_local_ring_at) (pi.zero_local_ring_at)"
  proof intro_locales
    show "Set_Theory.map (local.key_map U) (ùí™ U) pi.carrier_local_ring_at"
      by (simp add: assms(1) key_map_is_map)
    show "Group_Theory.monoid (ùí™ U) (add_sheaf_spec U) (zero_sheaf_spec U)"
      "Group_Theory.group_axioms (ùí™ U) (add_sheaf_spec U) (zero_sheaf_spec U)"
      using pr.is_ring_from_is_homomorphism [OF ‚Äπis_zariski_open U‚Ä∫]
      unfolding ring_def Group_Theory.group_def abelian_group_def
      by blast+
    have 1: "(key_map U) (zero_sheaf_spec U) = pi.zero_local_ring_at"
      using assms
      unfolding key_map_def pi.zero_local_ring_at_def
      by (metis (no_types, lifting) restrict_apply' zero_sheaf_spec_def zero_sheaf_spec_in_sheaf_spec)
    have 2: "‚ãÄx y. ‚ü¶x ‚àà ùí™ U; y ‚àà ùí™ U‚üß ‚üπ
           (key_map U) (add_sheaf_spec U x y) = pi.add_local_ring_at (key_map U x) (key_map U y)"
      using add_sheaf_spec_in_sheaf_spec key_map_def assms pi.add_local_ring_at_def
        add_sheaf_spec_def spectrum_def zariski_open_is_subset
      by fastforce
    show "monoid_homomorphism_axioms (local.key_map U) (ùí™ U) (add_sheaf_spec U) (zero_sheaf_spec U) pi.add_local_ring_at pi.zero_local_ring_at"
      unfolding monoid_homomorphism_axioms_def
      by (auto simp: 1 2)
  qed
next
  have "(key_map U) (one_sheaf_spec U) = pi.one_local_ring_at"
    using one_sheaf_spec_def key_map_def pi.one_local_ring_at_def assms one_sheaf_spec_in_sheaf_spec spectrum_def by fastforce
  moreover have "‚ãÄx y. ‚ü¶x ‚àà ùí™ U; y ‚àà ùí™ U‚üß ‚üπ
           (key_map U) (mult_sheaf_spec U x y) = pi.mult_local_ring_at (key_map U x) (key_map U y)"
    using mult_sheaf_spec_in_sheaf_spec key_map_def assms pi.mult_local_ring_at_def
      mult_sheaf_spec_def spectrum_def zariski_open_is_subset by fastforce
  ultimately show "monoid_homomorphism (key_map U) (ùí™ U) (mult_sheaf_spec U) (one_sheaf_spec U) (R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô) (pi.mult_local_ring_at) (pi.one_local_ring_at)"
    using pr.is_ring_from_is_homomorphism [OF ‚Äπis_zariski_open U‚Ä∫] ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫
    unfolding monoid_homomorphism_def monoid_homomorphism_axioms_def ring_def
    using key_map_is_map pi.multiplicative.monoid_axioms by presburger
qed

lemma key_map_is_coherent:
  assumes "V ‚äÜ U" and "is_zariski_open U" and "is_zariski_open V" and "ùî≠ ‚àà V" and "s ‚àà ùí™ U"
  shows "(key_map V ‚àò sheaf_spec_morphisms U V) s = key_map U s"
proof-
  have "sheaf_spec_morphisms U V s ‚àà ùí™ V"
    using assms sheaf_spec_morphisms_are_maps map.map_closed
    by (metis (mono_tags, hide_lams))
  thus "(key_map V ‚àò sheaf_spec_morphisms U V) s = key_map U s"
    by (simp add: ‚Äπs ‚àà ùí™ U‚Ä∫ assms(4) key_map_def sheaf_spec_morphisms_def)
qed

lemma key_ring_morphism:
  assumes "is_zariski_open V" and "ùî≠ ‚àà V"
  shows "‚àÉœÜ. ring_homomorphism œÜ
st.carrier_stalk st.add_stalk st.mult_stalk (st.zero_stalk V) (st.one_stalk V)
(R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô) (pi.add_local_ring_at) (pi.mult_local_ring_at) (pi.zero_local_ring_at) (pi.one_local_ring_at)
‚àß
(‚àÄU‚àà(top.neighborhoods ùî≠). ‚àÄs‚ààùí™ U. (œÜ ‚àò st.canonical_fun U) s = key_map U s)"
proof -
  have "ring (R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô) (pi.add_local_ring_at) (pi.mult_local_ring_at) (pi.zero_local_ring_at) (pi.one_local_ring_at)"
    by (simp add: pi.ring_axioms)
  moreover have "V ‚àà top.neighborhoods ùî≠"
    using assms top.neighborhoods_def sheaf_spec_is_presheaf by fastforce
  moreover have "‚ãÄU. U ‚àà top.neighborhoods ùî≠ ‚üπ
          ring_homomorphism (key_map U)
(ùí™ U) (add_sheaf_spec U) (mult_sheaf_spec U) (zero_sheaf_spec U) (one_sheaf_spec U)
(R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô) (pi.add_local_ring_at) (pi.mult_local_ring_at) (pi.zero_local_ring_at) (pi.one_local_ring_at)"
    using key_map_is_ring_morphism top.neighborhoods_def sheaf_spec_is_presheaf by force
  moreover have "‚ãÄU V x. ‚ü¶U ‚àà top.neighborhoods ùî≠; V ‚àà top.neighborhoods ùî≠; V ‚äÜ U; x ‚àà ùí™ U‚üß
                          ‚üπ (key_map V ‚àò sheaf_spec_morphisms U V) x = key_map U x"
    using key_map_is_coherent
    by (metis (no_types, lifting) mem_Collect_eq top.neighborhoods_def)
  ultimately show ?thesis
    using assms local.sheaf_spec_is_presheaf zariski_open_is_subset
      st.universal_property_for_stalk[of "R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô" "pi.add_local_ring_at" "pi.mult_local_ring_at"
        "pi.zero_local_ring_at" "pi.one_local_ring_at" "key_map"]
    by auto
qed

lemma class_from_belongs_stalk:
  assumes "s ‚àà st.carrier_stalk"
  obtains U s' where "is_zariski_open U" "ùî≠ ‚àà U" "s' ‚àà ùí™ U" "s = st.class_of U s'"
proof -
  interpret dl: direct_lim Spec is_zariski_open sheaf_spec sheaf_spec_morphisms "ùí™b"
    add_sheaf_spec mult_sheaf_spec zero_sheaf_spec one_sheaf_spec "top.neighborhoods ùî≠"
    by (simp add: st.direct_lim_axioms top.neighborhoods_def)
  interpret eq: equivalence "Sigma (top.neighborhoods ùî≠) sheaf_spec" "{(x, y). dl.rel x y}"
    using dl.rel_is_equivalence by force
  note dl.subset_of_opens [simp del]
  obtain U s' where seq: "s = eq.Class (U, s')" and U: "U ‚àà top.neighborhoods ùî≠" and s': "s' ‚àà ùí™ U"
    using assms
    unfolding st.carrier_stalk_def dl.carrier_direct_lim_def
    by (metis SigmaD1 SigmaD2 eq.representant_exists old.prod.exhaust)
  show thesis
  proof
    show "is_zariski_open U"
      using U dl.subset_of_opens by blast
    show "ùî≠ ‚àà U"
      using U top.neighborhoods_def by force
    show "s' ‚àà ùí™ U"
      using s' by blast
    show "s = st.class_of U s'"
      using seq st.class_of_def top.neighborhoods_def by presburger
  qed
qed

lemma same_class_from_restrict:
  assumes "is_zariski_open U" "is_zariski_open V" "U ‚äÜ V" "s ‚àà ùí™ V" "ùî≠ ‚àà U"
  shows "st.class_of V s = st.class_of U (sheaf_spec_morphisms V U s)"
proof -
  interpret eq: equivalence "Sigma {U. is_zariski_open U ‚àß ùî≠ ‚àà U} sheaf_spec" "{(x, y). st.rel x y}"
    using st.rel_is_equivalence by blast
  show ?thesis
    unfolding st.class_of_def
  proof (rule eq.Class_eq)
     have ¬ß:"sheaf_spec_morphisms V U s ‚àà ùí™ U"
      using assms map.map_closed pr.is_map_from_is_homomorphism by fastforce
    then have "‚àÉW. is_zariski_open W ‚àß ùî≠ ‚àà W ‚àß W ‚äÜ V ‚àß W ‚äÜ U ‚àß sheaf_spec_morphisms V W s = sheaf_spec_morphisms U W (sheaf_spec_morphisms V U s)"
      using assms(1) assms(3) assms(5) by auto
    then show "((V, s), U, sheaf_spec_morphisms V U s) ‚àà {(x, y). st.rel x y}"
      using ¬ß assms by (auto simp: st.rel_def)
  qed
qed

lemma shrinking_from_belong_stalk:
  assumes "s ‚àà st.carrier_stalk" and "t ‚àà st.carrier_stalk"
  obtains U s' t' where "is_zariski_open U" "ùî≠ ‚àà U" "s' ‚àà ùí™ U" "s = st.class_of U s'"
    "t' ‚àà ùí™ U" "t = st.class_of U t'"
proof -
  obtain U s' where HU:"is_zariski_open U" "ùî≠ ‚àà U" "s' ‚àà ùí™ U" "s = st.class_of U s'"
    using assms(1) class_from_belongs_stalk by blast
  obtain V t' where HV:"is_zariski_open V" "ùî≠ ‚àà V" "t' ‚àà ùí™ V" "t = st.class_of V t'"
    using assms(2) class_from_belongs_stalk by blast
  show thesis
  proof
    have "U ‚à© V ‚äÜ Spec"
      using zariski_open_is_subset HU(1) by blast
    show "ùî≠ ‚àà U ‚à© V"
      by (simp add: ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫ ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà V‚Ä∫)
    show UV: "is_zariski_open (U ‚à© V)" using topological_space.open_inter
      by (simp add: ‚Äπis_zariski_open U‚Ä∫ ‚Äπis_zariski_open V‚Ä∫)
    show "s = st.class_of (U ‚à© V) (sheaf_spec_morphisms U (U ‚à© V) s')"
      using HU UV ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U ‚à© V‚Ä∫ same_class_from_restrict by blast
    show "t = st.class_of (U ‚à© V) (sheaf_spec_morphisms V (U ‚à© V) t')"
      using HV UV ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U ‚à© V‚Ä∫ same_class_from_restrict by blast
    show "sheaf_spec_morphisms U (U ‚à© V) s' ‚àà ùí™ (U ‚à© V)"
      using HU(3) UV map.map_closed sheaf_spec_morphisms_are_maps by fastforce
    show "sheaf_spec_morphisms V (U ‚à© V) t' ‚àà ùí™ (U ‚à© V)"
      using HV(3) UV map.map_closed sheaf_spec_morphisms_are_maps by fastforce
  qed
qed


lemma stalk_at_prime_is_iso_to_local_ring_at_prime_aux:
  assumes "is_zariski_open V" and "ùî≠ ‚àà V" and
    œÜ: "ring_homomorphism œÜ
      st.carrier_stalk st.add_stalk st.mult_stalk (st.zero_stalk V) (st.one_stalk V)
(R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô) (pi.add_local_ring_at) (pi.mult_local_ring_at) (pi.zero_local_ring_at) (pi.one_local_ring_at)"
    and all_eq: "‚àÄU‚àà(top.neighborhoods ùî≠). ‚àÄs‚ààùí™ U. (œÜ ‚àò st.canonical_fun U) s = key_map U s"
  shows "ring_isomorphism œÜ
st.carrier_stalk st.add_stalk st.mult_stalk (st.zero_stalk V) (st.one_stalk V)
(R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô) (pi.add_local_ring_at) (pi.mult_local_ring_at) (pi.zero_local_ring_at) (pi.one_local_ring_at)"
proof (intro ring_isomorphism.intro bijective_map.intro bijective.intro)
  show "ring_homomorphism œÜ
st.carrier_stalk st.add_stalk st.mult_stalk (st.zero_stalk V) (st.one_stalk V)
(R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô) (pi.add_local_ring_at) (pi.mult_local_ring_at) (pi.zero_local_ring_at) (pi.one_local_ring_at)"
    using assms(3) by simp
next
  show "Set_Theory.map œÜ st.carrier_stalk (R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô)"
    using assms(3) by (simp add: ring_homomorphism_def)
next
  show "bij_betw œÜ st.carrier_stalk (R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô)"
  proof-
    have "inj_on œÜ st.carrier_stalk"
    proof
      fix s t assume "s ‚àà st.carrier_stalk" "t ‚àà st.carrier_stalk" "œÜ s = œÜ t"
      obtain U s' t' a f b g where FU [simp]: "is_zariski_open U" "ùî≠ ‚àà U" "s' ‚àà ùí™ U" "t' ‚àà ùí™ U"
        and s: "s = st.class_of U s'" "t = st.class_of U t'"
        and s': "s' = (ŒªùîÆ‚ààU. quotient_ring.frac (R‚àñùîÆ) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ a f)"
        and t': "t' = (ŒªùîÆ‚ààU. quotient_ring.frac (R‚àñùîÆ) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ b g)"
        and "a ‚àà R" "b ‚àà R" "f ‚àà R" "g ‚àà R" "f ‚àâ ùî≠" "g ‚àâ ùî≠"
      proof-
        obtain V s' t' where HV: "s = st.class_of V s'" "t = st.class_of V t'"
                            "s' ‚àà ùí™ V" "t' ‚àà ùí™ V" "is_zariski_open V" "ùî≠ ‚àà V"
          using shrinking_from_belong_stalk by (metis (no_types, lifting) ‚Äπs ‚àà st.carrier_stalk‚Ä∫ ‚Äπt ‚àà st.carrier_stalk‚Ä∫)
        then obtain U a f b g where HU: "is_zariski_open U" "U ‚äÜ V" "ùî≠ ‚àà U" "a ‚àà R" "f ‚àà R" "b ‚àà R" "g ‚àà R"
          "f ‚àâ ùî≠" "g ‚àâ ùî≠"
          "‚ãÄùîÆ. ùîÆ ‚àà U ‚üπ f ‚àâ ùîÆ ‚àß s' ùîÆ = quotient_ring.frac (R‚àñùîÆ) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ a f"
          "‚ãÄùîÆ. ùîÆ ‚àà U ‚üπ g ‚àâ ùîÆ ‚àß t' ùîÆ = quotient_ring.frac (R‚àñùîÆ) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ b g"
          using shrinking[of V ùî≠ s' t'] by blast
        show ?thesis
        proof
          show "sheaf_spec_morphisms V U s' ‚àà ùí™ U"
            by (metis (mono_tags, hide_lams) HU(1,2) HV(3) map.map_closed sheaf_spec_morphisms_are_maps)
          show "sheaf_spec_morphisms V U t' ‚àà ùí™ U"
            by (metis (mono_tags, hide_lams) HU(1,2) HV(4) map.map_closed sheaf_spec_morphisms_are_maps)
          show "s = st.class_of U (sheaf_spec_morphisms V U s')"
            by (simp add: HU(1-3) HV same_class_from_restrict)
          show "t = st.class_of U (sheaf_spec_morphisms V U t')"
            by (simp add: HU(1-3) HV same_class_from_restrict)
          show "sheaf_spec_morphisms V U s' = (ŒªùîÆ‚ààU. quotient_ring.frac (R‚àñùîÆ) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ a f)"
            using HV(3)  sheaf_spec_morphisms_def HU(10) by fastforce
          show "sheaf_spec_morphisms V U t' = (ŒªùîÆ‚ààU. quotient_ring.frac (R‚àñùîÆ) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ b g)"
            using HV(4) HU(11) sheaf_spec_morphisms_def by fastforce
        qed (use HU in auto)
    qed
    hence fact:"local.frac a f = local.frac b g"
      proof-
        have "local.frac a f = key_map U s'"
          using key_map_def ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫ ‚Äπs' = (ŒªùîÆ‚ààU. quotient_ring.frac (R‚àñùîÆ) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ a f)‚Ä∫ ‚Äπs' ‚àà ùí™ U‚Ä∫ by auto
        also have "‚Ä¶ = œÜ (st.canonical_fun U s')"
          using ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫ ‚Äπis_zariski_open U‚Ä∫ ‚Äπs' ‚àà ùí™ U‚Ä∫ assms(4) pr.presheaf_of_rings_axioms top.neighborhoods_def by fastforce
        also have "‚Ä¶ = œÜ (st.class_of U s')" using direct_lim.canonical_fun_def is_prime st.canonical_fun_def st.class_of_def by fastforce
        also have "‚Ä¶ = œÜ s" by (simp add: ‚Äπs = st.class_of U s'‚Ä∫)
        also have "‚Ä¶ = œÜ t" using ‚ÄπœÜ s = œÜ t‚Ä∫ by simp
        also have "‚Ä¶ = œÜ (st.class_of U t')" using ‚Äπt = st.class_of U t'‚Ä∫ by auto
        also have "‚Ä¶ = œÜ (st.canonical_fun U t')"
          using direct_lim.canonical_fun_def is_prime st.canonical_fun_def st.class_of_def by fastforce
        also have "‚Ä¶ = key_map U t'"
          using ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫ ‚Äπis_zariski_open U‚Ä∫ ‚Äπt' ‚àà ùí™ U‚Ä∫ assms(4) top.neighborhoods_def by auto
        also have "‚Ä¶ = local.frac b g"
          using FU(4) local.key_map_def t' by force
        finally show ?thesis .
      qed
      then obtain h where Hh: "h ‚àà R" "h ‚àâ ùî≠" "h ‚ãÖ (g ‚ãÖ a - f ‚ãÖ b) = ùü¨"
        using pi.eq_from_eq_frac by (metis Diff_iff ‚Äπa ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπb ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπf ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπf ‚àâ ùî≠‚Ä∫ ‚Äπg ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπg ‚àâ ùî≠‚Ä∫)
      have izo: "is_zariski_open (U ‚à© ùíü(f) ‚à© ùíü(g) ‚à© ùíü(h))"
        using local.standard_open_is_zariski_open
        by (simp add: Hh(1) ‚Äπf ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπg ‚àà R‚Ä∫ standard_open_is_zariski_open)
      have ssm_s': "sheaf_spec_morphisms U (U ‚à© ùíü(f) ‚à© ùíü(g) ‚à© ùíü(h)) s'
                ‚àà ùí™ (U ‚à© ùíü(f) ‚à© ùíü(g) ‚à© ùíü(h))"
        by (metis (no_types, hide_lams) FU(3) Int_assoc inf_le1 izo map.map_closed sheaf_spec_morphisms_are_maps)
      have ssm_t': "sheaf_spec_morphisms U (U ‚à© ùíü(f) ‚à© ùíü(g) ‚à© ùíü(h)) t'
                ‚àà ùí™ (U ‚à© ùíü(f) ‚à© ùíü(g) ‚à© ùíü(h))"
        by (metis (no_types, hide_lams) FU(4) Int_assoc inf_le1 izo map.map_closed sheaf_spec_morphisms_are_maps)      have [simp]: "ùî≠ ‚àà ùíü(f)" "ùî≠ ‚àà ùíü(g)" "ùî≠ ‚àà ùíü(h)"
        using Hh ‚Äπf ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπf ‚àâ ùî≠‚Ä∫ ‚Äπg ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπg ‚àâ ùî≠‚Ä∫ belongs_standard_open_iff st.is_elem by blast+
      have eq: "s' ùîÆ = t' ùîÆ" if "ùîÆ ‚àà U ‚à© ùíü(f) ‚à© ùíü(g) ‚à© ùíü(h)" for ùîÆ
      proof -
        have "ùîÆ ‚àà Spec"
          using standard_open_def that by auto
        then        interpret q: quotient_ring "R‚àñùîÆ" R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨
          using spectrum_imp_cxt_quotient_ring by force
        note local.q.sub [simp del]  ‚Äï‚ÄπBecause it definitely loops‚Ä∫
        define RR where "RR ‚â° {(x, y). (x, y) ‚àà (R √ó (R‚àñùîÆ)) √ó R √ó (R‚àñùîÆ) ‚àß q.rel x y}"
        interpret eq: equivalence "R √ó (R‚àñùîÆ)" "RR"
          unfolding RR_def by (blast intro: equivalence.intro q.rel_refl q.rel_sym q.rel_trans)
        have Fq [simp]: "f ‚àâ ùîÆ" "g ‚àâ ùîÆ" "h ‚àâ ùîÆ"
          using belongs_standard_open_iff that
          apply (meson Int_iff ‚ÄπùîÆ ‚àà Spec‚Ä∫ ‚Äπf ‚àà R‚Ä∫)
          apply (meson Int_iff ‚ÄπùîÆ ‚àà Spec‚Ä∫ ‚Äπg ‚àà R‚Ä∫ belongs_standard_open_iff that)
          by (meson Hh(1) IntD2 ‚ÄπùîÆ ‚àà Spec‚Ä∫ belongs_standard_open_iff that)
        moreover  have "eq.Class (a, f) = eq.Class (b, g)"
        proof (rule eq.Class_eq)
          have "‚àÉs1. s1 ‚àà R ‚àß s1 ‚àâ ùîÆ ‚àß s1 ‚ãÖ (g ‚ãÖ a - f ‚ãÖ b) = ùü¨"
            using Hh ‚Äπh ‚àâ ùîÆ‚Ä∫ by blast
          then show "((a,f), b,g) ‚àà RR"
            by (simp add: RR_def q.rel_def  ‚Äπa ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπb ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπf ‚àà R‚Ä∫ ‚Äπg ‚àà R‚Ä∫)
        qed
        ultimately have "q.frac a f = q.frac b g"
          using RR_def q.frac_def by metis
        thus "s' ùîÆ = t' ùîÆ"
          by (simp add: s' t')
      qed
      show "s = t"
      proof-
        have "s = st.class_of (U ‚à© ùíü(f) ‚à© ùíü(g) ‚à© ùíü(h)) (sheaf_spec_morphisms U (U ‚à© ùíü(f) ‚à© ùíü(g) ‚à© ùíü(h)) s')"
          using ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà ùíü(f)‚Ä∫ ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà ùíü(g)‚Ä∫ ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà ùíü(h)‚Ä∫
          by (smt (verit, ccfv_threshold) FU(1-3) IntE IntI izo s(1) same_class_from_restrict subsetI)
        also have "‚Ä¶ = st.class_of (U ‚à© ùíü(f) ‚à© ùíü(g) ‚à© ùíü(h)) (sheaf_spec_morphisms U (U ‚à© ùíü(f) ‚à© ùíü(g) ‚à© ùíü(h)) t')"
        proof (rule local.st.class_of_eqI)
          show "sheaf_spec_morphisms (U ‚à© ùíü(f) ‚à© ùíü(g) ‚à© ùíü(h)) (U ‚à© ùíü(f) ‚à© ùíü(g) ‚à© ùíü(h)) (sheaf_spec_morphisms U (U ‚à© ùíü(f) ‚à© ùíü(g) ‚à© ùíü(h)) s') = sheaf_spec_morphisms (U ‚à© ùíü(f) ‚à© ùíü(g) ‚à© ùíü(h)) (U ‚à© ùíü(f) ‚à© ùíü(g) ‚à© ùíü(h)) (sheaf_spec_morphisms U (U ‚à© ùíü(f) ‚à© ùíü(g) ‚à© ùíü(h)) t')"
          proof (rule local.pr.eq_œÅ)
            show "sheaf_spec_morphisms (U ‚à© ùíü(f) ‚à© ùíü(g) ‚à© ùíü(h)) (U ‚à© ùíü(f) ‚à© ùíü(g) ‚à© ùíü(h)) (sheaf_spec_morphisms U (U ‚à© ùíü(f) ‚à© ùíü(g) ‚à© ùíü(h)) s') =
                  sheaf_spec_morphisms (U ‚à© ùíü(f) ‚à© ùíü(g) ‚à© ùíü(h)) (U ‚à© ùíü(f) ‚à© ùíü(g) ‚à© ùíü(h)) (sheaf_spec_morphisms U (U ‚à© ùíü(f) ‚à© ùíü(g) ‚à© ùíü(h)) t')"
              using eq FU(3) FU(4)
              apply (simp add: sheaf_spec_morphisms_def)
              apply (metis eq restrict_ext)
              done
          qed (use izo ssm_s' ssm_t' in auto)
        qed (auto simp: izo ssm_s' ssm_t')
        also have "‚Ä¶ = t"
          using ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà ùíü(f)‚Ä∫ ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà ùíü(g)‚Ä∫ ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà ùíü(h)‚Ä∫
          by (smt (verit, ccfv_threshold) FU(1-4) IntE IntI izo s(2) same_class_from_restrict subsetI)
        finally show ?thesis .
      qed
    qed
    moreover have "œÜ ` st.carrier_stalk = (R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô)"
    proof
      show "œÜ ` st.carrier_stalk ‚äÜ pi.carrier_local_ring_at"
        using assms(3) by (simp add: image_subset_of_target ring_homomorphism_def)
    next
      show "pi.carrier_local_ring_at ‚äÜ œÜ ` st.carrier_stalk"
      proof
        fix x assume H:"x ‚àà (R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô)"
        obtain a f where F:"a ‚àà R" "f ‚àà R" "f ‚àâ ùî≠" "x = local.frac a f"
          using pi.frac_from_carrier_local H by blast
        define s where sec_def:"s ‚â° ŒªùîÆ‚ààùíü(f). quotient_ring.frac (R‚àñùîÆ) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ a f"
        then have sec:"s ‚àà ùí™(ùíü(f))"
        proof-
          have "s ùîÆ ‚àà (R‚áòùîÆ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô)" if "ùîÆ ‚àà ùíü(f)" for ùîÆ
          proof -
            have "f ‚àâ ùîÆ" using that belongs_standard_open_iff F(2) standard_open_is_subset by blast
            then have "quotient_ring.frac (R‚àñùîÆ) R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ a f ‚àà (R‚áòùîÆ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô)"
              using F(1,2) frac_in_carrier_local ‚ÄπùîÆ ‚àà ùíü(f)‚Ä∫ standard_open_is_subset by blast
            thus "s ùîÆ ‚àà (R‚áòùîÆ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô)" using sec_def by (simp add: ‚ÄπùîÆ ‚àà ùíü(f)‚Ä∫)
          qed
          moreover have "s ‚àà  extensional (ùíü(f))"
            using sec_def by auto
          moreover have "is_regular s ùíü(f)"
            using F(1,2) standard_open_is_subset  belongs_standard_open_iff is_regular_def[of s "ùíü(f)"] standard_open_is_zariski_open
            by (smt is_locally_frac_def restrict_apply sec_def subsetD subsetI)
          ultimately show ?thesis unfolding sheaf_spec_def[of "ùíü(f)"]
            by (simp add:PiE_iff)
        qed
        then have im:"œÜ (st.class_of ùíü(f) s) = local.frac a f"
        proof-
          have "œÜ (st.class_of ùíü(f) s) = œÜ (st.canonical_fun ùíü(f) s)"
            using st.canonical_fun_def direct_lim.canonical_fun_def st.class_of_def is_prime by fastforce
          also have "‚Ä¶ = key_map ùíü(f) s"
            using all_eq st.is_elem F(2) F(3) sec
            apply (simp add: top.neighborhoods_def)
            by (meson belongs_standard_open_iff standard_open_is_zariski_open)
          also have "... = local.frac a f"
            by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) F(2,3) belongs_standard_open_iff is_prime key_map_def restrict_apply sec sec_def)
          finally show ?thesis .
        qed
        thus "x ‚àà œÜ ` st.carrier_stalk"
        proof-
          have "st.class_of ùíü(f) s ‚àà st.carrier_stalk"
          proof-
            have "ùî≠ ‚àà Spec" using is_prime by simp
            also have "ùíü(f) ‚àà (top.neighborhoods ùî≠)"
              using top.neighborhoods_def belongs_standard_open_iff F(2,3) is_prime standard_open_is_zariski_open standard_open_is_subset
              by (metis (no_types, lifting) mem_Collect_eq)
            moreover have "s ‚àà ùí™ ùíü(f)" using sec by simp
            ultimately show ?thesis using st.class_of_in_stalk by auto
          qed
          thus ?thesis using F(4) im by blast
        qed
      qed
    qed
    ultimately show ?thesis by (simp add: bij_betw_def)
  qed
qed

lemma stalk_at_prime_is_iso_to_local_ring_at_prime:
  assumes "is_zariski_open V" and "ùî≠ ‚àà V"
  shows "‚àÉœÜ. ring_isomorphism œÜ
st.carrier_stalk st.add_stalk st.mult_stalk (st.zero_stalk V) (st.one_stalk V)
(R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô) (pi.add_local_ring_at) (pi.mult_local_ring_at) (pi.zero_local_ring_at) (pi.one_local_ring_at)"
  using key_ring_morphism stalk_at_prime_is_iso_to_local_ring_at_prime_aux assms by meson

end (* key_map *)

(* def. 0.42 *)
locale locally_ringed_space = ringed_space +
  assumes stalks_are_local: "‚ãÄx U. x ‚àà U ‚üπ is_open U ‚üπ
stalk.is_local is_open ùîâ œÅ add_str mult_str zero_str one_str (neighborhoods x) x U"

context comm_ring
begin

interpretation pr: presheaf_of_rings "Spec" is_zariski_open sheaf_spec sheaf_spec_morphisms
            ùí™b add_sheaf_spec mult_sheaf_spec zero_sheaf_spec one_sheaf_spec
  by (simp add: comm_ring.sheaf_spec_is_presheaf local.comm_ring_axioms)

(* ex. 0.43 *)
lemma spec_is_locally_ringed_space:
  shows "locally_ringed_space Spec is_zariski_open sheaf_spec sheaf_spec_morphisms ùí™b
add_sheaf_spec mult_sheaf_spec zero_sheaf_spec one_sheaf_spec"
proof (intro locally_ringed_space.intro locally_ringed_space_axioms.intro)
  interpret sh: sheaf_of_rings Spec is_zariski_open sheaf_spec
     sheaf_spec_morphisms ùí™b add_sheaf_spec mult_sheaf_spec
     zero_sheaf_spec one_sheaf_spec
    using sheaf_spec_is_sheaf .

  show "ringed_space Spec is_zariski_open sheaf_spec sheaf_spec_morphisms ùí™b add_sheaf_spec mult_sheaf_spec zero_sheaf_spec one_sheaf_spec"
    using spec_is_ringed_space by simp
  show "stalk.is_local is_zariski_open sheaf_spec sheaf_spec_morphisms add_sheaf_spec mult_sheaf_spec
zero_sheaf_spec one_sheaf_spec (pr.neighborhoods ùî≠) ùî≠ U"
    if "ùî≠ ‚àà U" "is_zariski_open U" for ùî≠ U
  proof -
    interpret st: stalk Spec is_zariski_open sheaf_spec sheaf_spec_morphisms ùí™b add_sheaf_spec
      mult_sheaf_spec zero_sheaf_spec one_sheaf_spec "pr.neighborhoods ùî≠" ùî≠
    proof
      show "ùî≠ ‚àà Spec"
        by (meson in_mono that zariski_open_is_subset)
    qed (auto simp: pr.neighborhoods_def)
    interpret pri: pr_ideal R ùî≠ "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠
      by (simp add: spectrum_imp_pr st.is_elem)
    interpret km: key_map R "(+)" "(‚ãÖ)" ùü¨ ùü≠ ùî≠
    proof qed (simp add: st.is_elem)
    have "ring st.carrier_stalk st.add_stalk st.mult_stalk (st.zero_stalk U) (st.one_stalk U)"
      using st.stalk_is_ring sheaf_spec_is_presheaf ‚Äπis_zariski_open U‚Ä∫ ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫ by blast
    also have "local_ring pri.carrier_local_ring_at pri.add_local_ring_at pri.mult_local_ring_at
                 pri.zero_local_ring_at pri.one_local_ring_at"
      using pr_ideal.local_ring_at_is_local
      by (simp add: pr_ideal.local_ring_at_is_local spectrum_imp_pr st.is_elem)
    moreover
    note st.subset_of_opens [simp del]
    have "‚àÉf. ring_isomorphism f
st.carrier_stalk st.add_stalk st.mult_stalk (st.zero_stalk U) (st.one_stalk U)
(R ‚áòùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨‚áô) (pr_ideal.add_local_ring_at R ùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨) (pr_ideal.mult_local_ring_at R ùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨) (pr_ideal.zero_local_ring_at R ùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠) (pr_ideal.one_local_ring_at R ùî≠ (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠)"
      by (simp add: km.stalk_at_prime_is_iso_to_local_ring_at_prime st.index that)
    ultimately show "stalk.is_local is_zariski_open sheaf_spec sheaf_spec_morphisms add_sheaf_spec mult_sheaf_spec
zero_sheaf_spec one_sheaf_spec (pr.neighborhoods ùî≠) ùî≠ U"
      using isomorphic_to_local_is_local ‚Äπùî≠ ‚àà U‚Ä∫ ‚Äπis_zariski_open U‚Ä∫ st.is_local_def by fastforce
  qed
qed

end (* comm_ring *)

(* Construction 0.44: induced morphism between direct limits *)
locale ind_mor_btw_stalks = morphism_ringed_spaces +
  fixes x::"'a"
  assumes is_elem: "x ‚àà X"
begin

interpretation stx:stalk X is_open‚á©X ùí™‚á©X œÅ‚á©X b add_str‚á©X mult_str‚á©X zero_str‚á©X one_str‚á©X
  "{U. is_open‚á©X U ‚àß x ‚àà U}" "x"
proof qed (auto simp: is_elem)

interpretation stfx: stalk Y is_open‚á©Y ùí™‚á©Y œÅ‚á©Y d add_str‚á©Y mult_str‚á©Y zero_str‚á©Y one_str‚á©Y
  "{U. is_open‚á©Y U ‚àß (f x) ‚àà U}" "f x"
proof qed (auto simp: is_elem)

definition induced_morphism:: "('c set √ó 'd) set ‚áí ('a set √ó 'b) set" where
"induced_morphism ‚â° ŒªC ‚àà stfx.carrier_stalk. let r = (SOME r. r ‚àà C) in stx.class_of (f‚áß¬Ø X (fst r)) (œÜ‚á©f (fst r) (snd r))"

(* One should think of fst r as a V in index, and snd r as a d in ùí™‚á©Y V. *)

lemma phi_in_O:
  assumes "is_open‚á©Y V" "q ‚àà ùí™‚á©Y V"
  shows "œÜ‚á©f V q ‚àà ùí™‚á©X (f ‚áß¬Ø X (V))"
  using is_morphism_of_sheaves morphism_presheaves_of_rings.fam_morphisms_are_maps
  unfolding morphism_sheaves_of_rings_def
  by (metis assms local.im_sheaf_def map.map_closed)

lemma induced_morphism_is_well_defined:
  assumes "stfx.rel (V,q) (V',q')"
  shows "stx.class_of (f‚áß¬Ø X V) (œÜ‚á©f V q) = stx.class_of (f‚áß¬Ø X V') (œÜ‚á©f V' q')"
proof -
  obtain W where W: "is_open‚á©Y W" "f x ‚àà W" "W ‚äÜ V" "W ‚äÜ V'"
    and eq: "œÅ‚á©Y V W q = œÅ‚á©Y V' W q'"
    using assms stfx.rel_def by auto
  show ?thesis
  proof (rule stx.class_of_eqI)
    show "(f ‚áß¬Ø X V, œÜ‚á©f V q) ‚àà Sigma {U. is_open‚á©X U ‚àß x ‚àà U} ùí™‚á©X"
      using is_continuous phi_in_O assms stfx.rel_def stx.is_elem by auto
    show "(f ‚áß¬Ø X V', œÜ‚á©f V' q') ‚àà Sigma {U. is_open‚á©X U ‚àß x ‚àà U} ùí™‚á©X"
      using is_continuous phi_in_O assms stfx.rel_def stx.is_elem by auto
    show "f ‚áß¬Ø X W ‚àà {U. is_open‚á©X U ‚àß x ‚àà U}"
      using W is_continuous stx.is_elem by auto
    show "f ‚áß¬Ø X W ‚äÜ f ‚áß¬Ø X V ‚à© f ‚áß¬Ø X V'"
      using W by blast
  interpret Y: morphism_sheaves_of_rings Y is_open‚á©Y ùí™‚á©Y œÅ‚á©Y
     d add_str‚á©Y mult_str‚á©Y zero_str‚á©Y one_str‚á©Y
     local.im_sheaf im_sheaf_morphisms b
      add_im_sheaf mult_im_sheaf zero_im_sheaf one_im_sheaf œÜ‚á©f
    by (rule is_morphism_of_sheaves)
    have "œÅ‚á©X (f‚áß¬Ø X V) (f‚áß¬Ø X W) (œÜ‚á©f V q) = œÜ‚á©f W (œÅ‚á©Y V W q)"
      using assms Y.comm_diagrams W
      by (simp add: stfx.rel_def im_sheaf_morphisms_def o_def)
  also have "‚Ä¶ = œÜ‚á©f W (œÅ‚á©Y V' W q')"
    by (simp add: eq)
    also have "‚Ä¶ = œÅ‚á©X (f‚áß¬Ø X V') (f‚áß¬Ø X W) (œÜ‚á©f V' q')"
      using assms Y.comm_diagrams W
      by (simp add: stfx.rel_def im_sheaf_morphisms_def o_def)
    finally show "œÅ‚á©X (f ‚áß¬Ø X V) (f ‚áß¬Ø X W) (œÜ‚á©f V q) = œÅ‚á©X (f ‚áß¬Ø X V') (f ‚áß¬Ø X W) (œÜ‚á©f V' q')" .
  qed
qed

lemma induced_morphism_eq:
  assumes "C ‚àà stfx.carrier_stalk"
  obtains V q where "(V,q) ‚àà C" "induced_morphism C = stx.class_of (f‚áß¬Ø X V) (œÜ‚á©f V q)"
  by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) assms induced_morphism_def prod.exhaust_sel restrict_apply
            stfx.carrier_stalk_def stfx.neighborhoods_eq stfx.rel_carrier_Eps_in(1))

lemma induced_morphism_eval:
  assumes "C ‚àà stfx.carrier_stalk" and "r ‚àà C"
  shows "induced_morphism C = stx.class_of (f‚áß¬Ø X (fst r)) (œÜ‚á©f (fst r) (snd r))"
  by (smt (verit, best) assms induced_morphism_eq induced_morphism_is_well_defined
          prod.exhaust_sel stfx.carrier_direct_limE stfx.carrier_stalk_def stfx.neighborhoods_eq stfx.rel_I1)


proposition ring_homomorphism_induced_morphism:
  assumes "is_open‚á©Y V" and "f x ‚àà V"
  shows "ring_homomorphism induced_morphism
stfx.carrier_stalk stfx.add_stalk stfx.mult_stalk (stfx.zero_stalk V) (stfx.one_stalk V)
stx.carrier_stalk stx.add_stalk stx.mult_stalk (stx.zero_stalk (f‚áß¬Ø X V)) (stx.one_stalk (f‚áß¬Ø X V))"
proof intro_locales
  interpret phif: ring_homomorphism "œÜ‚á©f V" "ùí™‚á©Y V"
    "add_str‚á©Y V" "mult_str‚á©Y V" "zero_str‚á©Y V" "one_str‚á©Y V" "local.im_sheaf V"
    "add_im_sheaf V" "mult_im_sheaf V" "zero_im_sheaf V" "one_im_sheaf V"
    by (metis assms(1) is_morphism_of_sheaves morphism_presheaves_of_rings.is_ring_morphism morphism_sheaves_of_rings_def)
  interpret V: ring stfx.carrier_direct_lim stfx.add_rel stfx.mult_rel "stfx.class_of V (zero_str‚á©Y V)"
    "stfx.class_of V (one_str‚á©Y V)"
    using assms stfx.direct_lim_is_ring by force
  interpret X: ring stx.carrier_direct_lim stx.add_rel stx.mult_rel "stx.class_of X (zero_str‚á©X X)"
     "stx.class_of X (one_str‚á©X X)"
    using stx.direct_lim_is_ring stx.is_elem by auto
  interpret dlY: direct_lim Y is_open‚á©Y ùí™‚á©Y œÅ‚á©Y d add_str‚á©Y
    mult_str‚á©Y zero_str‚á©Y one_str‚á©Y "target.neighborhoods (f x)"
    using stfx.direct_lim_axioms stfx.neighborhoods_eq by force
  interpret eqY: equivalence "Sigma {U. is_open‚á©Y U ‚àß f x ‚àà U} ùí™‚á©Y" "{(x, y). stfx.rel x y}"
    using stfx.rel_is_equivalence by blast
  interpret morphY: morphism_sheaves_of_rings Y is_open‚á©Y ùí™‚á©Y œÅ‚á©Y
     d add_str‚á©Y mult_str‚á©Y zero_str‚á©Y one_str‚á©Y
     local.im_sheaf im_sheaf_morphisms b
      add_im_sheaf mult_im_sheaf zero_im_sheaf one_im_sheaf œÜ‚á©f
    by (rule is_morphism_of_sheaves)

  have 0 [iff]: "stfx.zero_stalk V ‚àà stfx.carrier_stalk"
    using stfx.carrier_stalk_def stfx.neighborhoods_eq stfx.zero_stalk_def by auto
  have 1 [iff]: "stfx.one_stalk V ‚àà stfx.carrier_stalk"
    using stfx.carrier_stalk_def stfx.neighborhoods_eq stfx.one_stalk_def by auto

  show "Set_Theory.map induced_morphism stfx.carrier_stalk stx.carrier_stalk"
  proof
    show "induced_morphism ‚àà stfx.carrier_stalk ‚Üí‚á©E stx.carrier_stalk"
    proof
      fix C
      assume C: "C ‚àà stfx.carrier_stalk"
      then obtain r where "r ‚àà C"
        by (metis stfx.carrier_stalk_def stfx.rel_carrier_Eps_in(1) target.neighborhoods_def)
      moreover have "is_open‚á©X (f ‚áß¬Ø X (fst r))"
        by (metis (no_types, lifting) C SigmaD1 ‚Äπr ‚àà C‚Ä∫ eqY.block_closed is_continuous prod.exhaust_sel stfx.carrier_direct_lim_def stfx.carrier_stalk_def stfx.neighborhoods_eq stfx.subset_of_opens)
      ultimately have "stx.class_of (f ‚áß¬Ø X (fst r)) (œÜ‚á©f (fst r) (snd r)) ‚àà stx.carrier_stalk"
        by (smt (verit, best) C IntI dlY.carrier_direct_limE mem_Collect_eq phi_in_O stfx.carrier_stalk_def stfx.neighborhoods_eq stfx.rel_I1 stfx.rel_def stx.class_of_in_stalk stx.is_elem stx.neighborhoods_eq vimage_def)
      then show "induced_morphism C ‚àà stx.carrier_stalk"
        using C ‚Äπr ‚àà C‚Ä∫ induced_morphism_eval by presburger
    qed (simp add: induced_morphism_def)
  qed
  show "Group_Theory.monoid stfx.carrier_stalk stfx.add_stalk (stfx.zero_stalk V)"
    by (simp add: V.additive.monoid_axioms stfx.add_stalk_def stfx.carrier_stalk_def stfx.neighborhoods_eq stfx.zero_stalk_def)
  show "Group_Theory.group_axioms stfx.carrier_stalk stfx.add_stalk (stfx.zero_stalk V)"
    using Group_Theory.group_def V.additive.group_axioms stfx.add_stalk_def stfx.carrier_stalk_def stfx.zero_stalk_def target.neighborhoods_def by fastforce
  show "commutative_monoid_axioms stfx.carrier_stalk stfx.add_stalk"
    using V.additive.commutative_monoid_axioms commutative_monoid_def stfx.add_stalk_def stfx.carrier_stalk_def target.neighborhoods_def by fastforce
  show "Group_Theory.monoid stfx.carrier_stalk stfx.mult_stalk (stfx.one_stalk V)"
    by (simp add: V.multiplicative.monoid_axioms stfx.carrier_stalk_def stfx.mult_stalk_def stfx.neighborhoods_eq stfx.one_stalk_def)
  show "ring_axioms stfx.carrier_stalk stfx.add_stalk stfx.mult_stalk"
    by (metis (no_types, lifting) V.additive.unit_closed mem_Collect_eq ring_def stfx.carrier_direct_limE stfx.stalk_is_ring)
  show "Group_Theory.monoid stx.carrier_stalk stx.add_stalk (stx.zero_stalk (f ‚áß¬Ø X V))"
    using abelian_group_def assms commutative_monoid_def is_continuous ring_def stx.is_elem stx.stalk_is_ring by fastforce
  show "Group_Theory.group_axioms stx.carrier_stalk stx.add_stalk (stx.zero_stalk (f ‚áß¬Ø X V))"
    using Group_Theory.group_def abelian_group_def assms is_continuous ring_def stx.is_elem stx.stalk_is_ring by fastforce
  show "commutative_monoid_axioms stx.carrier_stalk stx.add_stalk"
    using X.additive.commutative_monoid_axioms commutative_monoid_def neighborhoods_def stx.add_stalk_def stx.carrier_stalk_def by fastforce
  show "Group_Theory.monoid stx.carrier_stalk stx.mult_stalk (stx.one_stalk (f ‚áß¬Ø X V))"
    using assms is_continuous ring_def stx.is_elem stx.stalk_is_ring by fastforce
  show "ring_axioms stx.carrier_stalk stx.add_stalk stx.mult_stalk"
    using X.ring_axioms ring_def stx.add_stalk_def stx.carrier_stalk_def stx.mult_stalk_def stx.neighborhoods_eq by fastforce
  show "monoid_homomorphism_axioms induced_morphism stfx.carrier_stalk stfx.add_stalk (stfx.zero_stalk V) stx.add_stalk (stx.zero_stalk (f ‚áß¬Ø X V))"
  proof
    fix C C'
    assume CC: "C ‚àà stfx.carrier_stalk" "C' ‚àà stfx.carrier_stalk"
    show "induced_morphism (stfx.add_stalk C C') = stx.add_stalk (induced_morphism C) (induced_morphism C')"
    proof -
      obtain U q U' q' where Uq: "(U,q) ‚àà C" "(U',q') ‚àà C'"
         and eq: "induced_morphism C = stx.class_of (f‚áß¬Ø X U) (œÜ‚á©f U q)"
         and eq': "induced_morphism C' = stx.class_of (f‚áß¬Ø X U') (œÜ‚á©f U' q')"
        by (metis (no_types, lifting) CC induced_morphism_eq)
      then obtain cc [simp]: "is_open‚á©Y (U ‚à© U')" "f x ‚àà U" "f x ‚àà U'"
        using CC eqY.block_closed stfx.carrier_direct_lim_def stfx.carrier_stalk_def stfx.neighborhoods_eq target.open_inter by force
      then interpret cc_rh: ring_homomorphism "œÜ‚á©f (U ‚à© U')" "ùí™‚á©Y (U ‚à© U')"
        "add_str‚á©Y (U ‚à© U')" "mult_str‚á©Y (U ‚à© U')" "zero_str‚á©Y (U ‚à© U')"
        "one_str‚á©Y (U ‚à© U')" "local.im_sheaf (U ‚à© U')"
        "add_im_sheaf (U ‚à© U')" "mult_im_sheaf (U ‚à© U')"
        "zero_im_sheaf (U ‚à© U')" "one_im_sheaf (U ‚à© U')"
        by (metis is_morphism_of_sheaves morphism_presheaves_of_rings.is_ring_morphism morphism_sheaves_of_rings_def)
      obtain opeU [simp]: "is_open‚á©Y U" "is_open‚á©Y U'"
        by (metis (no_types, lifting) CC SigmaD1 Uq dlY.subset_of_opens eqY.block_closed stfx.carrier_direct_lim_def stfx.carrier_stalk_def stfx.neighborhoods_eq)
      obtain [simp]: "q ‚àà ùí™‚á©Y U" "q' ‚àà ùí™‚á©Y U'"
        using CC Uq stfx.carrier_direct_lim_def stfx.carrier_stalk_def stfx.neighborhoods_eq by auto

      define add where "add ‚â° add_str‚á©Y (U ‚à© U') (œÅ‚á©Y U (U ‚à© U') q) (œÅ‚á©Y U' (U ‚à© U') q')"
      have add_stalk_eq_class: "stfx.add_stalk C C' = stfx.class_of (U ‚à© U') add"
        using CC
        unfolding add_def stfx.add_stalk_def stfx.carrier_stalk_def dlY.carrier_direct_lim_def
        by (smt (verit, best) IntI Int_commute Uq cc eqY.Block_self eqY.block_closed inf.cobounded1 mem_Collect_eq stfx.add_rel_class_of stfx.class_of_def stfx.neighborhoods_eq)
       then have C: "(stfx.class_of (U ‚à© U') add) ‚àà stfx.carrier_stalk"
         using CC ‚ÄπGroup_Theory.monoid stfx.carrier_stalk stfx.add_stalk (stfx.zero_stalk V)‚Ä∫ monoid.composition_closed by fastforce
      have add_in: "add ‚àà ùí™‚á©Y (U ‚à© U')"
        apply (simp add: add_def)
        using cc_rh.source.additive.composition_closed‚Äπq ‚àà ùí™‚á©Y U‚Ä∫ ‚Äπq' ‚àà ùí™‚á©Y U'‚Ä∫
        by (metis Int_commute cc(1) codom.is_map_from_is_homomorphism inf.cobounded1 map.map_closed opeU)
      obtain V r where Vr: "(V,r) ‚àà stfx.add_stalk C C'"
           and eq: "induced_morphism (stfx.add_stalk C C') = stx.class_of (f ‚áß¬Ø X V) (œÜ‚á©f V r)"
        using induced_morphism_eq add_stalk_eq_class C by auto
      have "is_open‚á©Y V"
        by (smt (verit, best) C SigmaD1 Vr add_stalk_eq_class dlY.subset_of_opens eqY.block_closed stfx.carrier_direct_lim_def stfx.carrier_stalk_def stfx.neighborhoods_eq)
      have "r ‚àà ùí™‚á©Y V"
        by (smt (verit, best) IntI Vr add_stalk_eq_class add_in cc fst_conv mem_Collect_eq snd_conv stfx.rel_I1 stfx.rel_def)
      have fxV: "f x ‚àà V"
        using C Vr add_stalk_eq_class stfx.carrier_direct_lim_def stfx.carrier_stalk_def stfx.neighborhoods_eq by auto
      have fXUU: "is_open‚á©X (f‚áß¬Ø X (U ‚à© U'))"
        using cc(1) is_continuous by presburger
      have "(U ‚à© U', add) ‚àà stfx.class_of V r"
        by (metis (no_types, lifting) IntI Vr add_stalk_eq_class add_in cc mem_Collect_eq stfx.class_of_def stfx.rel_Class_iff stfx.rel_I1)
      then have "stfx.rel (V, r) (U ‚à© U', add)"
        by (simp add: fxV ‚Äπis_open‚á©Y V‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr ‚àà ùí™‚á©Y V‚Ä∫ stfx.rel_I1)
      then have "induced_morphism (stfx.add_stalk C C') = stx.class_of (f‚áß¬Ø X (U ‚à© U')) (œÜ‚á©f (U ‚à© U') add)"
        using eq induced_morphism_is_well_defined by presburger
      moreover have "stx.add_stalk (induced_morphism C) (induced_morphism C') =
                     stx.add_stalk (stx.class_of (f ‚áß¬Ø X U) (œÜ‚á©f U q))
                                   (stx.class_of (f ‚áß¬Ø X U') (œÜ‚á©f U' q'))"
        using CC(1) Uq(1) eq' induced_morphism_eval by auto
      moreover have "‚Ä¶ = stx.class_of (f‚áß¬Ø X (U ‚à© U'))
                                       (add_str‚á©X (f‚áß¬Ø X (U ‚à© U'))
                                                 (œÅ‚á©X (f‚áß¬Ø X (U)) (f‚áß¬Ø X (U ‚à© U')) (œÜ‚á©f (U) (q)))
                                                 (œÅ‚á©X (f‚áß¬Ø X (U')) (f‚áß¬Ø X (U ‚à© U')) (œÜ‚á©f (U') (q')))
                                        )"
        unfolding stx.add_stalk_def
        using is_continuous phi_in_O stx.is_elem fXUU
        by (intro stx.add_rel_class_of) auto
      moreover have "œÜ‚á©f (U ‚à© U') add = add_str‚á©X (f‚áß¬Ø X (U ‚à© U'))
                                       (œÜ‚á©f (U ‚à© U') (œÅ‚á©Y (U) (U ‚à© U') (q)))
                                       (œÜ‚á©f (U ‚à© U') (œÅ‚á©Y (U') (U ‚à© U') (q')))"
        unfolding add_def
      proof (subst cc_rh.additive.commutes_with_composition)
        show "œÅ‚á©Y U (U ‚à© U') q ‚àà ùí™‚á©Y (U ‚à© U')"
          by (metis ‚Äπq ‚àà ùí™‚á©Y U‚Ä∫ cc(1) codom.is_map_from_is_homomorphism inf.cobounded1 map.map_closed opeU(1))
        show "œÅ‚á©Y U' (U ‚à© U') q' ‚àà ùí™‚á©Y (U ‚à© U')"
          by (metis ‚Äπq' ‚àà ùí™‚á©Y U'‚Ä∫ cc(1) codom.is_map_from_is_homomorphism inf.commute inf_le1 map.map_closed opeU(2))
      qed (auto simp: add_im_sheaf_def)
      moreover have "‚Ä¶ = add_str‚á©X (f‚áß¬Ø X (U ‚à© U'))
                            (œÅ‚á©X (f‚áß¬Ø X (U)) (f‚áß¬Ø X (U ‚à© U')) (œÜ‚á©f (U) (q)))
                            (œÅ‚á©X (f‚áß¬Ø X U') (f‚áß¬Ø X (U ‚à© U')) (œÜ‚á©f (U') (q')))"
        using assms
        apply (simp add: stfx.rel_def morphY.comm_diagrams [symmetric, unfolded o_def])
        using im_sheaf_morphisms_def by fastforce
      ultimately show ?thesis
        by simp
    qed
  next
    have "induced_morphism (stfx.zero_stalk V) = stx.class_of (f‚áß¬Ø X V) (œÜ‚á©f V (zero_str‚á©Y V))"
      using induced_morphism_eval [OF 0, where r = "(V, zero_str‚á©Y V)"] assms by force
    also have "‚Ä¶ = stx.zero_stalk (f ‚áß¬Ø X V)"
      by (simp add: phif.additive.commutes_with_unit zero_im_sheaf_def stx.zero_stalk_def)
    finally show "induced_morphism (stfx.zero_stalk V) = stx.zero_stalk (f ‚áß¬Ø X V)" .
  qed
  show "monoid_homomorphism_axioms induced_morphism stfx.carrier_stalk stfx.mult_stalk (stfx.one_stalk V) stx.mult_stalk (stx.one_stalk (f ‚áß¬Ø X V))"
  proof
    fix C C'
    assume CC: "C ‚àà stfx.carrier_stalk" "C' ‚àà stfx.carrier_stalk"
    show "induced_morphism (stfx.mult_stalk C C') = stx.mult_stalk (induced_morphism C) (induced_morphism C')"
    proof -
      obtain U q U' q' where Uq: "(U,q) ‚àà C" "(U',q') ‚àà C'"
         and eq: "induced_morphism C = stx.class_of (f‚áß¬Ø X U) (œÜ‚á©f U q)"
         and eq': "induced_morphism C' = stx.class_of (f‚áß¬Ø X U') (œÜ‚á©f U' q')"
        by (metis (no_types, lifting) CC induced_morphism_eq)
      then obtain cc [simp]: "is_open‚á©Y (U ‚à© U')" "f x ‚àà U" "f x ‚àà U'"
        using CC eqY.block_closed stfx.carrier_direct_lim_def stfx.carrier_stalk_def stfx.neighborhoods_eq target.open_inter by force
      then interpret cc_rh: ring_homomorphism "œÜ‚á©f (U ‚à© U')" "ùí™‚á©Y (U ‚à© U')"
        "add_str‚á©Y (U ‚à© U')" "mult_str‚á©Y (U ‚à© U')" "zero_str‚á©Y (U ‚à© U')"
        "one_str‚á©Y (U ‚à© U')" "local.im_sheaf (U ‚à© U')"
        "add_im_sheaf (U ‚à© U')" "mult_im_sheaf (U ‚à© U')"
        "zero_im_sheaf (U ‚à© U')" "one_im_sheaf (U ‚à© U')"
        by (metis is_morphism_of_sheaves morphism_presheaves_of_rings.is_ring_morphism morphism_sheaves_of_rings_def)
      obtain opeU [simp]: "is_open‚á©Y U" "is_open‚á©Y U'"
        by (metis (no_types, lifting) CC SigmaD1 Uq dlY.subset_of_opens eqY.block_closed stfx.carrier_direct_lim_def stfx.carrier_stalk_def stfx.neighborhoods_eq)
      obtain [simp]: "q ‚àà ùí™‚á©Y U" "q' ‚àà ùí™‚á©Y U'"
        using CC Uq stfx.carrier_direct_lim_def stfx.carrier_stalk_def stfx.neighborhoods_eq by auto

      define mult where "mult ‚â° mult_str‚á©Y (U ‚à© U') (œÅ‚á©Y U (U ‚à© U') q) (œÅ‚á©Y U' (U ‚à© U') q')"
      have mult_stalk_eq_class: "stfx.mult_stalk C C' = stfx.class_of (U ‚à© U') mult"
        using CC
        unfolding mult_def stfx.mult_stalk_def stfx.carrier_stalk_def dlY.carrier_direct_lim_def
        by (smt (verit, best) IntI Int_commute Uq cc eqY.Block_self eqY.block_closed inf.cobounded1 mem_Collect_eq stfx.mult_rel_class_of stfx.class_of_def stfx.neighborhoods_eq)
       then have C: "(stfx.class_of (U ‚à© U') mult) ‚àà stfx.carrier_stalk"
         by (metis CC V.multiplicative.monoid_axioms monoid.composition_closed stfx.carrier_stalk_def stfx.mult_stalk_def stfx.neighborhoods_eq)
      have mult_in: "mult ‚àà ùí™‚á©Y (U ‚à© U')"
        apply (simp add: mult_def)
        using cc_rh.source.additive.composition_closed‚Äπq ‚àà ùí™‚á©Y U‚Ä∫ ‚Äπq' ‚àà ùí™‚á©Y U'‚Ä∫
        by (meson cc(1) cc_rh.source.multiplicative.composition_closed codom.is_map_from_is_homomorphism inf_le1 inf_le2 map.map_closed opeU)
      obtain V r where Vr: "(V,r) ‚àà stfx.mult_stalk C C'"
           and eq: "induced_morphism (stfx.mult_stalk C C') = stx.class_of (f ‚áß¬Ø X V) (œÜ‚á©f V r)"
        using induced_morphism_eq mult_stalk_eq_class C by auto
      have "is_open‚á©Y V"
        by (smt (verit, best) C SigmaD1 Vr mult_stalk_eq_class dlY.subset_of_opens eqY.block_closed stfx.carrier_direct_lim_def stfx.carrier_stalk_def stfx.neighborhoods_eq)
      have "r ‚àà ùí™‚á©Y V"
        by (smt (verit, best) IntI Vr mult_stalk_eq_class mult_in cc fst_conv mem_Collect_eq snd_conv stfx.rel_I1 stfx.rel_def)
      have fxV: "f x ‚àà V"
        using C Vr mult_stalk_eq_class stfx.carrier_direct_lim_def stfx.carrier_stalk_def stfx.neighborhoods_eq by auto
      have fXUU: "is_open‚á©X (f‚áß¬Ø X (U ‚à© U'))"
        using cc(1) is_continuous by presburger
      have "(U ‚à© U', mult) ‚àà stfx.class_of V r"
        by (metis (no_types, lifting) IntI Vr mult_stalk_eq_class mult_in cc mem_Collect_eq stfx.class_of_def stfx.rel_Class_iff stfx.rel_I1)
      then have "stfx.rel (V, r) (U ‚à© U', mult)"
        by (simp add: fxV ‚Äπis_open‚á©Y V‚Ä∫ ‚Äπr ‚àà ùí™‚á©Y V‚Ä∫ stfx.rel_I1)
      then have "induced_morphism (stfx.mult_stalk C C') = stx.class_of (f‚áß¬Ø X (U ‚à© U')) (œÜ‚á©f (U ‚à© U') mult)"
        using eq induced_morphism_is_well_defined by presburger
      moreover have "stx.mult_stalk (induced_morphism C) (induced_morphism C') =
                     stx.mult_stalk (stx.class_of (f ‚áß¬Ø X U) (œÜ‚á©f U q))
                                   (stx.class_of (f ‚áß¬Ø X U') (œÜ‚á©f U' q'))"
        using CC(1) Uq(1) eq' induced_morphism_eval by auto
      moreover have "‚Ä¶ = stx.class_of (f‚áß¬Ø X (U ‚à© U'))
                               (mult_str‚á©X (f‚áß¬Ø X (U ‚à© U'))
                                         (œÅ‚á©X (f ‚áß¬Ø X U) (f ‚áß¬Ø X (U ‚à© U')) (œÜ‚á©f U q))
                                         (œÅ‚á©X (f ‚áß¬Ø X U') (f ‚áß¬Ø X (U ‚à© U')) (œÜ‚á©f U' q')))"
        unfolding stx.mult_stalk_def
        using is_continuous phi_in_O stx.is_elem fXUU
        by (intro stx.mult_rel_class_of) auto
      moreover have "œÜ‚á©f (U ‚à© U') mult = mult_str‚á©X (f‚áß¬Ø X (U ‚à© U'))
                                           (œÜ‚á©f (U ‚à© U') (œÅ‚á©Y U (U ‚à© U') q))
                                           (œÜ‚á©f (U ‚à© U') (œÅ‚á©Y U' (U ‚à© U') q'))"
        unfolding mult_def
      proof (subst cc_rh.multiplicative.commutes_with_composition)
        show "œÅ‚á©Y U (U ‚à© U') q ‚àà ùí™‚á©Y (U ‚à© U')"
          by (metis ‚Äπq ‚àà ùí™‚á©Y U‚Ä∫ cc(1) codom.is_map_from_is_homomorphism inf.cobounded1 map.map_closed opeU(1))
        show "œÅ‚á©Y U' (U ‚à© U') q' ‚àà ùí™‚á©Y (U ‚à© U')"
          by (metis ‚Äπq' ‚àà ùí™‚á©Y U'‚Ä∫ cc(1) codom.is_map_from_is_homomorphism inf.commute inf_le1 map.map_closed opeU(2))
      qed (auto simp: mult_im_sheaf_def)
      moreover have "‚Ä¶ = mult_str‚á©X (f‚áß¬Ø X (U ‚à© U'))
                            (œÅ‚á©X (f ‚áß¬Ø X U) (f ‚áß¬Ø X (U ‚à© U')) (œÜ‚á©f U q))
                            (œÅ‚á©X (f ‚áß¬Ø X U') (f ‚áß¬Ø X (U ‚à© U')) (œÜ‚á©f U' q'))"
        using assms im_sheaf_morphisms_def
        by (fastforce simp: stfx.rel_def morphY.comm_diagrams [symmetric, unfolded o_def])
      ultimately show ?thesis
        by simp
    qed
  next
    have "induced_morphism (stfx.one_stalk V) = stx.class_of (f‚áß¬Ø X V) (œÜ‚á©f V (one_str‚á©Y V))"
      using induced_morphism_eval [OF 1, where r = "(V, one_str‚á©Y V)"] assms by force
    also have "‚Ä¶ = stx.one_stalk (f ‚áß¬Ø X V)"
      by (simp add: phif.multiplicative.commutes_with_unit one_im_sheaf_def stx.one_stalk_def)
    finally show "induced_morphism (stfx.one_stalk V) = stx.one_stalk (f ‚áß¬Ø X V)" .
  qed
qed


definition is_local:: "'c set ‚áí (('c set √ó 'd) set ‚áí ('a set √ó 'b) set) ‚áí bool" where
  "is_local V œÜ ‚â°
      local_ring_morphism œÜ
      stfx.carrier_stalk stfx.add_stalk stfx.mult_stalk (stfx.zero_stalk V) (stfx.one_stalk V)
      stx.carrier_stalk stx.add_stalk stx.mult_stalk (stx.zero_stalk (f‚áß¬Ø X V)) (stx.one_stalk (f‚áß¬Ø X V))"

end (* ind_mor_btw_stalks *)

notation ind_mor_btw_stalks.induced_morphism ("œÜ‚áò(3_ _ _ _/ _ _ _/ _ _ _)‚áô"
    [1000,1000,1000,1000,1000,1000,1000,1000,1000,1000]1000)

lemma (in sheaf_of_rings) induced_morphism_with_id_is_id:
  assumes "x ‚àà S"
  shows "œÜ‚áòS is_open ùîâ œÅ is_open ùîâ œÅ (identity S) (ŒªU. identity (ùîâ U)) x‚áô
       = (ŒªC‚àà(stalk.carrier_stalk is_open ùîâ œÅ x). C)"
proof -
  interpret im_sheaf S is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str S is_open "identity S"
    by (metis homeomorphism.axioms(3) id_is_homeomorphism im_sheaf_def inverse_map_identity
        sheaf_of_rings_axioms)
  interpret codom: ringed_space S is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str
    by (meson im_sheaf.axioms(1) im_sheaf_axioms ringed_space_def)

  interpret ind_mor_btw_stalks S is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str S
       is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str "identity S" "ŒªU. identity (ùîâ U)" x
    apply intro_locales
    subgoal
    proof -
      have "ring_homomorphism (identity (ùîâ U)) (ùîâ U) +‚áòU‚áô ‚ãÖ‚áòU‚áô ùü¨‚áòU‚áô ùü≠‚áòU‚áô (local.im_sheaf U) (add_im_sheaf U)
          (mult_im_sheaf U) (zero_im_sheaf U) (one_im_sheaf U)" if "is_open U" for U
        by (smt (z3) id_is_mor_pr_rngs im_sheaf.add_im_sheaf_def im_sheaf.im_sheaf_def
            im_sheaf.mult_im_sheaf_def im_sheaf_axioms local.topological_space_axioms
            morphism_presheaves_of_rings.is_ring_morphism one_im_sheaf_def that
            topological_space.open_preimage_identity zero_im_sheaf_def)
      moreover have "‚àÄU V. is_open U ‚ü∂
           is_open V ‚ü∂
           V ‚äÜ U ‚ü∂ (‚àÄx. x ‚àà ùîâ U ‚ü∂ (im_sheaf_morphisms U V ‚àò identity (ùîâ U)) x = (identity (ùîâ V) ‚àò œÅ U V) x)"
        by (smt (verit, best) comp_apply im_sheaf_morphisms_def is_map_from_is_homomorphism
            local.im_sheaf_def map.map_closed open_preimage_identity restrict_apply')
      ultimately have "morphism_presheaves_of_rings_axioms is_open ùîâ œÅ add_str mult_str
          zero_str one_str local.im_sheaf im_sheaf_morphisms add_im_sheaf mult_im_sheaf
          zero_im_sheaf one_im_sheaf (ŒªU. identity (ùîâ U))"
        unfolding morphism_presheaves_of_rings_axioms_def by auto
      then show ?thesis
        unfolding morphism_ringed_spaces_axioms_def
        by intro_locales

    qed
    subgoal by (meson assms ind_mor_btw_stalks_axioms.intro)
    done

  have "(let r = SOME r. r ‚àà C
        in direct_lim.class_of ùîâ œÅ (neighborhoods x) (identity S ‚áß¬Ø S (fst r))
            (identity (ùîâ (fst r)) (snd r))) = C"
    (is "?L= _")
    if "C‚ààstalk.carrier_stalk is_open ùîâ œÅ x" for C
  proof -
    interpret stk:stalk S is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str
                      "neighborhoods x" x
      apply unfold_locales
      using is_elem neighborhoods_def by auto
    define r where "r=(SOME x. x ‚àà C)"
    have r:"r ‚àà C" "r ‚àà Sigma (neighborhoods x) ùîâ" and "C = stk.class_of (fst r) (snd r)"
      using stk.rel_carrier_Eps_in[OF that[unfolded stk.carrier_stalk_def]] unfolding r_def by auto

    have "?L = stk.class_of (identity S ‚áß¬Ø S (fst r)) (identity (ùîâ (fst r)) (snd r))"
      unfolding r_def Let_def by simp
    also have "... =  stk.class_of (fst r) (snd r)"
      by (metis open_preimage_identity r(1) restrict_apply stk.carrier_direct_limE
          stk.carrier_stalk_def stk.rel_I1 stk.rel_def stk.subset_of_opens that)
    also have "... = C"
      using ‚ÄπC = stk.class_of (fst r) (snd r)‚Ä∫ by simp
    finally show ?thesis .
  qed
  then show ?thesis
    unfolding induced_morphism_def
    using is_elem neighborhoods_def by fastforce
qed

lemma (in locally_ringed_space) induced_morphism_with_id_is_local:
  assumes "x ‚àà S" and V: "x ‚àà V" "is_open V"
  shows "ind_mor_btw_stalks.is_local
S is_open ùîâ œÅ add_str mult_str zero_str one_str is_open ùîâ œÅ add_str mult_str zero_str one_str
(identity S) x V (œÜ‚áòS is_open ùîâ œÅ is_open ùîâ œÅ (identity S) (ŒªU. identity (ùîâ U)) x‚áô)"
proof-
  have [simp]: "(identity S)‚áß¬Ø S V = V"
    using assms by auto
  interpret stfx: stalk S is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str
                    "{U. is_open U ‚àß (identity S x) ‚àà U}" "identity S x"
  proof qed (use assms in auto)
  have "local_ring stfx.carrier_stalk stfx.add_stalk stfx.mult_stalk (stfx.zero_stalk V) (stfx.one_stalk V)"
    by (smt (verit, best) assms restrict_apply' stalks_are_local stfx.is_local_def stfx.neighborhoods_eq)
  interpret stx: stalk S is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str "{U. is_open U ‚àß x ‚àà U}" "x"
    using ‚Äπx ‚àà S‚Ä∫ stfx.stalk_axioms by fastforce
  interpret local_ring stx.carrier_stalk stx.add_stalk stx.mult_stalk
              "stx.zero_stalk ((identity S)‚áß¬Ø S V)" "stx.one_stalk ((identity S)‚áß¬Ø S V)"
    using V stalks_are_local stx.is_local_def stx.neighborhoods_eq by fastforce
  interpret imS: im_sheaf S is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str S is_open "identity S"
    by (metis homeomorphism.axioms(3) id_is_homeomorphism im_sheaf_def inverse_map_identity
        sheaf_of_rings_axioms)
  have rh: "‚ãÄU. is_open U ‚üπ
             ring_homomorphism (identity (ùîâ U)) (ùîâ U) +‚áòU‚áô ‚ãÖ‚áòU‚áô ùü¨‚áòU‚áô ùü≠‚áòU‚áô (imS.im_sheaf U)
              (imS.add_im_sheaf U) (imS.mult_im_sheaf U) (imS.zero_im_sheaf U) (imS.one_im_sheaf U)"
    unfolding imS.add_im_sheaf_def imS.mult_im_sheaf_def imS.one_im_sheaf_def
              imS.zero_im_sheaf_def imS.im_sheaf_def
    using id_is_mor_pr_rngs morphism_presheaves_of_rings.is_ring_morphism by fastforce
  interpret ind_mor_btw_stalks S is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str S
    is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str "identity S" "ŒªU. identity (ùîâ U)" x
  proof intro_locales
    show "morphism_ringed_spaces_axioms S ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str
              S is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str (identity S) (ŒªU. identity (ùîâ U))"
      unfolding morphism_ringed_spaces_axioms_def morphism_sheaves_of_rings_def
        morphism_presheaves_of_rings_def morphism_presheaves_of_rings_axioms_def
      using rh
      by (auto simp add: presheaf_of_rings_axioms imS.presheaf_of_rings_axioms
             map.map_closed [OF is_map_from_is_homomorphism] imS.im_sheaf_morphisms_def)
    show "ind_mor_btw_stalks_axioms S x"
      by (simp add: assms(1) ind_mor_btw_stalks_axioms_def)
  qed
  have "œÜ‚áòS is_open ùîâ œÅ is_open ùîâ œÅ (identity S) (ŒªU. identity (ùîâ U)) x‚áô = identity stx.carrier_stalk"
    using induced_morphism_with_id_is_id stx.is_elem by simp
  then show ?thesis
    using id_is_local_ring_morphism is_local_def local_ring_axioms stx.is_elem by fastforce
qed

(* definition 0.45 *)

locale morphism_locally_ringed_spaces = morphism_ringed_spaces +
  assumes are_local_morphisms:
    "‚ãÄx V. ‚ü¶x ‚àà X; is_open‚á©Y V; f x ‚àà V‚üß ‚üπ
ind_mor_btw_stalks.is_local X is_open‚á©X ùí™‚á©X œÅ‚á©X add_str‚á©X mult_str‚á©X zero_str‚á©X one_str‚á©X
                            is_open‚á©Y ùí™‚á©Y œÅ‚á©Y add_str‚á©Y mult_str‚á©Y zero_str‚á©Y one_str‚á©Y f
                            x V œÜ‚áòX is_open‚á©X ùí™‚á©X œÅ‚á©X is_open‚á©Y ùí™‚á©Y œÅ‚á©Y f œÜ‚á©f x‚áô"

lemma (in locally_ringed_space) id_to_mor_locally_ringed_spaces:
  shows "morphism_locally_ringed_spaces
            S is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str
            S is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str
            (identity S) (ŒªU. identity (ùîâ U))"
proof intro_locales
  interpret idim: im_sheaf S is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str S is_open "identity S"
  proof
    fix U assume "is_open U"
    then show "is_open (identity S ‚áß¬Ø S U)"
      by (simp add: open_inter preimage_identity_self)
  qed auto
  show "Set_Theory.map (identity S) S S"
    by (simp add: Set_Theory.map_def)
  show "continuous_map_axioms S is_open is_open (identity S)"
    by (simp add: continuous_map_axioms_def open_inter preimage_identity_self)
  have gh: "group_homomorphism (identity (ùîâ U)) (ùîâ U) +‚áòU‚áô
          ùü¨‚áòU‚áô (idim.im_sheaf U) (idim.add_im_sheaf U) (idim.zero_im_sheaf U)"
    if "is_open U" for U
    using that id_is_mor_pr_rngs idim.add_im_sheaf_def idim.im_sheaf_def idim.zero_im_sheaf_def morphism_presheaves_of_rings.is_ring_morphism ring_homomorphism_def by fastforce
  have "morphism_presheaves_of_rings_axioms is_open ùîâ œÅ add_str mult_str zero_str one_str idim.im_sheaf idim.im_sheaf_morphisms idim.add_im_sheaf idim.mult_im_sheaf idim.zero_im_sheaf idim.one_im_sheaf (ŒªU. identity (ùîâ U))"
    unfolding morphism_presheaves_of_rings_axioms_def
  proof (intro conjI strip)
    fix U
    assume "is_open U"
    then show "ring_homomorphism (identity (ùîâ U)) (ùîâ U) +‚áòU‚áô ‚ãÖ‚áòU‚áô ùü¨‚áòU‚áô ùü≠‚áòU‚áô (idim.im_sheaf U) (idim.add_im_sheaf U) (idim.mult_im_sheaf U) (idim.zero_im_sheaf U) (idim.one_im_sheaf U)"
      using id_is_mor_pr_rngs idim.add_im_sheaf_def idim.im_sheaf_def idim.mult_im_sheaf_def idim.one_im_sheaf_def idim.zero_im_sheaf_def morphism_presheaves_of_rings.is_ring_morphism by fastforce
    fix V x
    assume "is_open V" and "V ‚äÜ U" and "x ‚àà ùîâ U"
    then show "(idim.im_sheaf_morphisms U V ‚àò identity (ùîâ U)) x = (identity (ùîâ V) ‚àò œÅ U V) x"
      using ‚Äπis_open U‚Ä∫
      by (simp add: idim.im_sheaf_morphisms_def map.map_closed [OF is_map_from_is_homomorphism])
  qed
  then show mrs: "morphism_ringed_spaces_axioms S ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str
                      S is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str (identity S) (ŒªU. identity (ùîâ U))"
    by (simp add: idim.im_sheaf_is_presheaf morphism_presheaves_of_rings_def morphism_ringed_spaces_axioms.intro morphism_sheaves_of_rings.intro presheaf_of_rings_axioms)
  show "morphism_locally_ringed_spaces_axioms S is_open ùîâ œÅ add_str mult_str zero_str one_str
                     is_open ùîâ œÅ add_str mult_str zero_str one_str (identity S) (ŒªU. identity (ùîâ U))"
    using induced_morphism_with_id_is_local
    by (simp add: morphism_locally_ringed_spaces_axioms_def)
qed

locale iso_locally_ringed_spaces = morphism_locally_ringed_spaces +
  assumes is_homeomorphism: "homeomorphism X is_open‚á©X Y is_open‚á©Y f" and
is_iso_of_sheaves: "iso_sheaves_of_rings Y is_open‚á©Y ùí™‚á©Y œÅ‚á©Y d add_str‚á©Y mult_str‚á©Y zero_str‚á©Y one_str‚á©Y
im_sheaf im_sheaf_morphisms b add_im_sheaf mult_im_sheaf zero_im_sheaf one_im_sheaf
œÜ‚á©f"

lemma (in locally_ringed_space) id_to_iso_locally_ringed_spaces:
  shows "iso_locally_ringed_spaces
            S is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str
            S is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str
            (identity S) (ŒªU. identity (ùîâ U))"
proof -
  interpret morphism_ringed_spaces S is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str
    S is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str "identity S" "ŒªU. identity (ùîâ U)"
    by (metis id_to_mor_locally_ringed_spaces morphism_locally_ringed_spaces_def)
  show ?thesis
  proof intro_locales
    show "morphism_locally_ringed_spaces_axioms S is_open ùîâ œÅ add_str mult_str zero_str one_str is_open ùîâ œÅ add_str mult_str zero_str one_str (identity S) (ŒªU. identity (ùîâ U))"
      by (metis id_to_mor_locally_ringed_spaces morphism_locally_ringed_spaces_def)
    show "iso_locally_ringed_spaces_axioms S is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str S is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str (identity S) (ŒªU. identity (ùîâ U))"
      unfolding iso_locally_ringed_spaces_axioms_def iso_sheaves_of_rings_def iso_presheaves_of_rings_def iso_presheaves_of_rings_axioms_def
    proof (intro conjI)
      show "homeomorphism S is_open S is_open (identity S)"
        using id_is_homeomorphism by blast
      show mor:"morphism_presheaves_of_rings S is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str
            local.im_sheaf im_sheaf_morphisms b add_im_sheaf mult_im_sheaf zero_im_sheaf one_im_sheaf
            (ŒªU. identity (ùîâ U))"
        by (simp add: is_morphism_of_sheaves morphism_sheaves_of_rings.axioms)
      have "morphism_presheaves_of_rings S is_open
               local.im_sheaf im_sheaf_morphisms b add_im_sheaf mult_im_sheaf zero_im_sheaf one_im_sheaf
               ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str (ŒªU. identity (ùîâ U))"
        unfolding morphism_presheaves_of_rings_def morphism_presheaves_of_rings_axioms_def
      proof (intro conjI strip)
        show "presheaf_of_rings S is_open local.im_sheaf im_sheaf_morphisms b add_im_sheaf mult_im_sheaf zero_im_sheaf one_im_sheaf"
          using im_sheaf_is_presheaf by blast
        show "presheaf_of_rings S is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str"
          by (metis mor morphism_presheaves_of_rings_def)
      next
        fix U assume "is_open U"
        then have "ring_homomorphism (identity (ùîâ U)) (ùîâ U) +‚áòU‚áô ‚ãÖ‚áòU‚áô ùü¨‚áòU‚áô ùü≠‚áòU‚áô (ùîâ U) +‚áòU‚áô ‚ãÖ‚áòU‚áô ùü¨‚áòU‚áô ùü≠‚áòU‚áô"
          by (smt (z3) im_sheaf.add_im_sheaf_def im_sheaf.mult_im_sheaf_def im_sheaf_axioms
              local.im_sheaf_def mor morphism_presheaves_of_rings.is_ring_morphism one_im_sheaf_def
              open_preimage_identity zero_im_sheaf_def)
        then show "ring_homomorphism (identity (ùîâ U)) (local.im_sheaf U) (add_im_sheaf U) (mult_im_sheaf U) (zero_im_sheaf U) (one_im_sheaf U) (ùîâ U) +‚áòU‚áô ‚ãÖ‚áòU‚áô ùü¨‚áòU‚áô ùü≠‚áòU‚áô"
          using ‚Äπis_open U ‚Ä∫ im_sheaf.add_im_sheaf_def im_sheaf_axioms local.im_sheaf_def mult_im_sheaf_def one_im_sheaf_def zero_im_sheaf_def
          by fastforce
        fix V x
        assume "is_open V" and "V ‚äÜ U" and "x ‚àà local.im_sheaf U"
        then show "(œÅ U V ‚àò identity (ùîâ U)) x = (identity (ùîâ V) ‚àò im_sheaf_morphisms U V) x"
          using map.map_closed [OF is_map_from_is_homomorphism] ‚Äπis_open U‚Ä∫
          by (simp add: im_sheaf_morphisms_def local.im_sheaf_def)
      qed
      then show "‚àÉœà. morphism_presheaves_of_rings S is_open (im_sheaf.im_sheaf S ùîâ (identity S)) (im_sheaf.im_sheaf_morphisms S œÅ (identity S)) b
              (im_sheaf.add_im_sheaf S add_str (identity S)) (im_sheaf.mult_im_sheaf S mult_str (identity S)) (im_sheaf.zero_im_sheaf S zero_str (identity S)) (im_sheaf.one_im_sheaf S one_str (identity S)) ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str œà ‚àß (‚àÄU. is_open U ‚ü∂ (‚àÄx‚ààim_sheaf.im_sheaf S ùîâ (identity S) U. (identity (ùîâ U) ‚àò œà U) x = x) ‚àß (‚àÄx‚ààùîâ U. (œà U ‚àò identity (ùîâ U)) x = x))"
        using local.im_sheaf_def by auto
    qed
  qed
qed

end

Theory Scheme

text ‚ÄπAuthors: Anthony Bordg and Lawrence Paulson,
with some contributions from Wenda Li‚Ä∫

theory Scheme
imports "Comm_Ring"

begin

section ‚ÄπMisc‚Ä∫

lemma (in Set_Theory.map) set_map_Œ±_cong:
  assumes Œ±_eq:"‚ãÄx. x‚ààS ‚üπ Œ±' x  = Œ± x" and Œ±_ext:"Œ±' ‚àà extensional S"
  shows "Set_Theory.map Œ±' S T"
using map_axioms Œ±_eq Œ±_ext
unfolding Set_Theory.map_def by (auto simp:extensional_def)

lemma (in monoid_homomorphism) monoid_homomorphism_Œ∑_cong:
  assumes Œ∑_eq:"‚ãÄx. x‚ààM ‚üπ Œ∑' x  = Œ∑ x" and Œ∑_ext:"Œ∑' ‚àà extensional M"
  shows "monoid_homomorphism Œ∑' M (‚ãÖ) ùü≠ M' (‚ãÖ') ùü≠'"
proof -
  have "Set_Theory.map Œ∑' M M'"
    using set_map_Œ±_cong Œ∑_eq Œ∑_ext by auto
  moreover have "monoid_homomorphism_axioms Œ∑' M (‚ãÖ) ùü≠ (‚ãÖ') ùü≠'"
    unfolding monoid_homomorphism_axioms_def
    by (simp add: Œ∑_eq commutes_with_composition commutes_with_unit)
  ultimately show ?thesis
    unfolding monoid_homomorphism_def
    using source.monoid_axioms target.monoid_axioms by blast
qed

lemma (in group_homomorphism) group_homomorphism_Œ∑_cong:
  assumes Œ∑_eq:"‚ãÄx. x‚ààG ‚üπ Œ∑' x  = Œ∑ x" and Œ∑_ext:"Œ∑' ‚àà extensional G"
  shows "group_homomorphism Œ∑' G (‚ãÖ) ùü≠ G' (‚ãÖ') ùü≠'"
  by (simp add: Œ∑_eq Œ∑_ext group_homomorphism_def monoid_homomorphism_Œ∑_cong source.group_axioms
      target.group_axioms)

lemma (in ring_homomorphism) ring_homomorphism_Œ∑_cong:
  assumes Œ∑_eq:"‚ãÄx. x‚ààR ‚üπ Œ∑' x  = Œ∑ x" and Œ∑_ext:"Œ∑' ‚àà extensional R"
  shows "ring_homomorphism Œ∑' R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠ R' (+') (‚ãÖ') ùü¨' ùü≠'"
  unfolding ring_homomorphism_def
  using Œ∑_eq Œ∑_ext additive.group_homomorphism_Œ∑_cong multiplicative.monoid_homomorphism_Œ∑_cong
    set_map_Œ±_cong source.ring_axioms target.ring_axioms by presburger

lemma (in morphism_presheaves_of_rings) morphism_presheaves_of_rings_fam_cong:
  assumes fam_eq:"‚ãÄU x. ‚ü¶ is_open U; x‚ààùîâ U‚üß ‚üπ fam_morphisms' U x= fam_morphisms U x"
    and fam_ext:"‚ãÄU. is_open U ‚üπ fam_morphisms' U ‚àà extensional (ùîâ U)"
  shows "morphism_presheaves_of_rings X is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str ùîâ' œÅ' b'
      add_str' mult_str'
      zero_str' one_str' fam_morphisms'"
proof -
  have " presheaf_of_rings X is_open ùîâ œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str"
    using source.presheaf_of_rings_axioms .
  moreover have "presheaf_of_rings X is_open ùîâ' œÅ' b' add_str' mult_str' zero_str' one_str'"
    using target.presheaf_of_rings_axioms .
  moreover have "
    morphism_presheaves_of_rings_axioms is_open ùîâ œÅ add_str mult_str zero_str one_str ùîâ' œÅ' add_str' mult_str'
     zero_str' one_str' fam_morphisms'"
  proof -
    have "ring_homomorphism (fam_morphisms' U) (ùîâ U) +‚áòU‚áô ‚ãÖ‚áòU‚áô ùü¨‚áòU‚áô ùü≠‚áòU‚áô (ùîâ' U) +'‚áòU‚áô ‚ãÖ'‚áòU‚áô ùü¨'‚áòU‚áô ùü≠'‚áòU‚áô"
      if "is_open U" for U
      apply (rule is_ring_morphism[OF that,THEN ring_homomorphism.ring_homomorphism_Œ∑_cong])
      using fam_eq fam_ext
      by (auto simp add: that)
    moreover have "(œÅ' U V ‚àò fam_morphisms' U) x = (fam_morphisms' V ‚àò œÅ U V) x"
      if "is_open U" "is_open V" "V ‚äÜ U" "x ‚àà ùîâ U" for U V x
      by (metis calculation comm_diagrams fam_eq fam_morphisms_are_maps map_eq ring_homomorphism_def
          that(1) that(2) that(3) that(4))
    ultimately show ?thesis
      using comm_diagrams is_ring_morphism
      unfolding morphism_presheaves_of_rings_axioms_def by auto
  qed
  ultimately show ?thesis
    unfolding morphism_presheaves_of_rings_def by auto
qed


section ‚ÄπAffine Schemes‚Ä∫

text ‚ÄπComputational affine schemes take the isomorphism with Spec as part of their data,
while in the locale for affine schemes we merely assert the existence of such an isomorphism.‚Ä∫

locale comp_affine_scheme = comm_ring +
locally_ringed_space X is_open ùí™‚á©X œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str +
iso_locally_ringed_spaces X is_open ùí™‚á©X œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str
"Spec" is_zariski_open sheaf_spec sheaf_spec_morphisms ùí™b "ŒªU. add_sheaf_spec U"
"ŒªU. mult_sheaf_spec U" "ŒªU. zero_sheaf_spec U" "ŒªU. one_sheaf_spec U" f œÜ‚á©f
for X is_open ùí™‚á©X œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str f œÜ‚á©f

(* definition 0.46 *)
locale affine_scheme = comm_ring +
locally_ringed_space X is_open ùí™‚á©X œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str
for X is_open ùí™‚á©X œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str +
  assumes is_iso_to_spec: "‚àÉf œÜ‚á©f. iso_locally_ringed_spaces X is_open ùí™‚á©X œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str
Spec is_zariski_open sheaf_spec sheaf_spec_morphisms ùí™b (ŒªU. add_sheaf_spec U)
(ŒªU. mult_sheaf_spec U) (ŒªU. zero_sheaf_spec U) (ŒªU. one_sheaf_spec U) f œÜ‚á©f"

sublocale comp_affine_scheme ‚äÜ affine_scheme
proof
  obtain f œÜ‚á©f where "iso_locally_ringed_spaces X is_open ùí™‚á©X œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str Spec is_zariski_open sheaf_spec
        sheaf_spec_morphisms ùí™b add_sheaf_spec mult_sheaf_spec zero_sheaf_spec one_sheaf_spec f œÜ‚á©f"
    using iso_locally_ringed_spaces_axioms by auto
  show "‚àÉf œÜ‚á©f.
       iso_locally_ringed_spaces X is_open ùí™‚á©X œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str Spec is_zariski_open sheaf_spec
        sheaf_spec_morphisms ùí™b add_sheaf_spec mult_sheaf_spec zero_sheaf_spec one_sheaf_spec f œÜ‚á©f"
    using iso_locally_ringed_spaces_axioms by auto
qed


section ‚ÄπSchemes‚Ä∫

(* def. 0.47 *)
locale scheme = comm_ring +
locally_ringed_space X is_open ùí™‚á©X œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str
for X is_open ùí™‚á©X œÅ b add_str mult_str zero_str one_str +
  assumes are_affine_schemes: "‚ãÄx. x ‚àà X ‚üπ (‚àÉU. x‚ààU ‚àß is_open U ‚àß
affine_scheme  R (+) (‚ãÖ) ùü¨ ùü≠ U (ind_topology.ind_is_open X is_open U) (ind_sheaf.ind_sheaf ùí™‚á©X U)
(ind_sheaf.ind_ring_morphisms œÅ U) b (ind_sheaf.ind_add_str add_str U)
(ind_sheaf.ind_mult_str mult_str U) (ind_sheaf.ind_zero_str zero_str U)
(ind_sheaf.ind_one_str one_str U))"

locale iso_stalks =
  stk1:stalk S is_open ùîâ1 œÅ1 b add_str1 mult_str1 zero_str1 one_str1 I x +
  stk2:stalk S is_open ùîâ2 œÅ2 b add_str2 mult_str2 zero_str2 one_str2 I x
  for S is_open ùîâ1 œÅ1 b add_str1 mult_str1 zero_str1 one_str1 I x
        ùîâ2 œÅ2 add_str2 mult_str2 zero_str2 one_str2 +
  assumes
    stalk_eq:"‚àÄU‚ààI. ùîâ1 U = ùîâ2 U ‚àß add_str1 U = add_str2 U ‚àß mult_str1 U = mult_str2 U
            ‚àß zero_str1 U = zero_str2 U ‚àß one_str1 U = one_str2 U"
    and stalkœÅ_eq:"‚àÄU V. U‚ààI ‚àß V ‚ààI ‚ü∂ œÅ1 U V = œÅ2 U V"
begin

lemma
  assumes "U ‚àà I"
  shows has_ring_isomorphism:"ring_isomorphism (identity stk1.carrier_stalk) stk1.carrier_stalk
          stk1.add_stalk stk1.mult_stalk (stk1.zero_stalk U) (stk1.one_stalk U)
          stk2.carrier_stalk stk2.add_stalk stk2.mult_stalk (stk2.zero_stalk U) (stk2.one_stalk U)"
   and carrier_stalk_eq:"stk1.carrier_stalk = stk2.carrier_stalk"
   and class_of_eq:"stk1.class_of = stk2.class_of"
proof -
  have "is_open U" "x ‚àà U"
    using stk1.index assms by auto
  interpret ring1:ring stk1.carrier_stalk stk1.add_stalk stk1.mult_stalk "stk1.zero_stalk U"
                  "stk1.one_stalk U"
    using stk1.stalk_is_ring[OF ‚Äπis_open U‚Ä∫ ‚Äπx ‚àà U‚Ä∫] .
  interpret ring2:ring stk2.carrier_stalk stk2.add_stalk stk2.mult_stalk "stk2.zero_stalk U"
                  "stk2.one_stalk U"
    using stk2.stalk_is_ring[OF ‚Äπis_open U‚Ä∫ ‚Äπx ‚àà U‚Ä∫] .

  interpret e1:equivalence "Sigma I ùîâ1" "{(x, y). stk1.rel x y}"
    using stk1.rel_is_equivalence .
  interpret e2:equivalence "Sigma I ùîâ2" "{(x, y). stk2.rel x y}"
    using stk2.rel_is_equivalence .

  have Sigma_eq:"Sigma I ùîâ1  =  Sigma I ùîâ2"
  proof (rule Sigma_cong[OF refl])
    fix x assume "x ‚àà I"
    from stalk_eq[rule_format,OF this]
    show "ùîâ1 x = ùîâ2 x" by simp
  qed
  moreover have "stk1.rel xx yy ‚ü∑ stk2.rel xx yy"
                  if "xx‚ààSigma I ùîâ1" "yy‚ààSigma I ùîâ2"
                  for xx yy
    unfolding stk1.rel_def stk2.rel_def
    by (metis stalkœÅ_eq stalk_eq)
  ultimately have Class_eq: "e1.Class = e2.Class"
    unfolding e1.Class_def e2.Class_def
    by (auto intro!:ext)
  then show class_of_eq:"stk1.class_of = stk2.class_of"
    unfolding stk1.class_of_def stk2.class_of_def by auto

  show "stk1.carrier_stalk = stk2.carrier_stalk"
    using Class_eq Sigma_eq e1.natural.surjective e2.natural.surjective
      stk1.carrier_direct_lim_def stk1.carrier_stalk_def stk2.carrier_direct_lim_def
      stk2.carrier_stalk_def stk2.neighborhoods_eq by force

  let ?id = "identity stk1.carrier_stalk"
  show "ring_isomorphism (identity stk1.carrier_stalk) stk1.carrier_stalk
          stk1.add_stalk stk1.mult_stalk (stk1.zero_stalk U) (stk1.one_stalk U)
          stk2.carrier_stalk stk2.add_stalk stk2.mult_stalk (stk2.zero_stalk U) (stk2.one_stalk U)"
  proof
    show "?id (stk1.one_stalk U) = stk2.one_stalk U"
    proof -
      have "stk1.one_stalk U ‚àà stk1.carrier_stalk" by blast
      then have "?id (stk1.one_stalk U) = stk1.one_stalk U" by auto
      also have "... = stk2.one_stalk U"
        unfolding stk1.one_stalk_def stk2.one_stalk_def class_of_eq
        by (simp add: assms stalk_eq)
      finally show ?thesis .
    qed
    show "?id (stk1.zero_stalk U) = stk2.zero_stalk U"
    proof -
      have "stk1.zero_stalk U ‚àà stk1.carrier_stalk" by blast
      then have "?id (stk1.zero_stalk U) = stk1.zero_stalk U" by auto
      also have "... = stk2.zero_stalk U"
        unfolding stk1.zero_stalk_def stk2.zero_stalk_def class_of_eq
        by (simp add: assms stalk_eq)
      finally show ?thesis .
    qed


    show "?id (stk1.add_stalk X' Y') = stk2.add_stalk (?id X') (?id Y')"
      "?id (stk1.mult_stalk X' Y') = stk2.mult_stalk (?id X') (?id Y')"
      if "X' ‚àà stk1.carrier_stalk" "Y' ‚àà stk1.carrier_stalk" for X' Y'
    proof -
      define x where "x=(SOME x. x ‚àà X')"
      define y where "y=(SOME y. y ‚àà Y')"
      have x:"x‚ààX'" "x‚ààSigma I ùîâ1" and x_alt:"X' = stk1.class_of (fst x) (snd x)"
        using stk1.rel_carrier_Eps_in that(1) stk1.carrier_stalk_def stk2.neighborhoods_eq x_def
        by auto
      have y:"y‚ààY'" "y‚ààSigma I ùîâ1" and y_alt:"Y' = stk1.class_of (fst y) (snd y)"
        using stk1.rel_carrier_Eps_in that(2) stk1.carrier_stalk_def stk2.neighborhoods_eq y_def
        by auto
      obtain "fst x ‚äÜ S" "fst y ‚äÜ S"
        using x(2) y(2) stk1.index
        by (metis mem_Sigma_iff prod.collapse stk1.open_imp_subset stk2.subset_of_opens)
      obtain w where w: "w‚ààI" "w ‚äÜ fst x" "w ‚äÜ fst y"
        using stk1.has_lower_bound x(2) y(2) by force
      have "w ‚äÜ S"
        by (simp add: stk1.open_imp_subset stk1.subset_of_opens w(1))

      have "stk1.add_stalk X' Y' = stk1.class_of w (add_str1 w (œÅ1 (fst x) w (snd x))
                                         (œÅ1 (fst y) w (snd y)))"
        unfolding x_alt y_alt stk1.add_stalk_def
        apply (subst stk1.add_rel_class_of[where W=w])
        using x y w by auto
      also have "... = stk2.class_of w (add_str2 w (œÅ2 (fst x) w (snd x)) (œÅ2 (fst y) w (snd y)))"
        using class_of_eq stalkœÅ_eq stalk_eq w(1) x(2) y(2) by force
      also have "... = stk2.add_stalk X' Y'"
        unfolding stk2.add_stalk_def x_alt y_alt class_of_eq
        apply (subst stk2.add_rel_class_of[where W=w])
        using x y w by (auto simp add: Sigma_eq)
      finally have "stk1.add_stalk X' Y' = stk2.add_stalk X' Y'" .
      moreover have "stk1.add_stalk X' Y' ‚àà stk1.carrier_stalk"
        by (simp add: that(1) that(2))
      ultimately show "?id (stk1.add_stalk X' Y') = stk2.add_stalk (?id X') (?id Y')"
        using that by simp

      have "stk1.mult_stalk X' Y' = stk1.class_of w (mult_str1 w (œÅ1 (fst x) w (snd x))
                                         (œÅ1 (fst y) w (snd y)))"
